atk-s0514a1:4_4: rājayuttāpi tasmiṃ samaye adhammikā hontī”ti catukkanipāte āgatasuttanayena ovaditvā agatigamane agatiagamane
atk-s0514a1:4_5: ca ādīnavañca ānisaṃsañca kathetvā “supinakūpamā kāmā”tiādinā nayena kāmesu ādīnavaṃ vitthāretvā,
atk-s0514a1:6_0: Yuddhaṃ natthi jayo natthi, sabbe maccuparāyaṇā’.
atk-s0514a1:7_0: Tesaṃ paralokaṃ gacchantānaṃ ṭhapetvā attanā kataṃ kalyāṇakammaṃ aññā patiṭṭhā nāma natthi.
atk-s0514a1:7_2: na yasaṃ nissāya pamādaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati,

atk-s0514a1:7_4: Porāṇakarājāno anuppannepi buddhe paṇḍitānaṃ ovāde ṭhatvā dhammena rajjaṃ kāretvā devanagaraṃ pūrayamānā gamiṃsū”ti vatvā tena yācito atītaṃ āhari.

atk-s0514a1:8_1: patthentopi puttaṃ vā dhītaraṃ vā na labhi.
atk-s0514a1:8_2: So ekadivasaṃ mahantena parivārena uyyānaṃ gantvā divasabhāgaṃ uyyāne kīḷitvā maṅgalasālarukkhamūle sayanaṃ
atk-s0514a1:8_3: attharāpetvā thokaṃ niddāyitvā pabuddho sālarukkhaṃ oloketvā tattha sakuṇakulāvakaṃ passi,
atk-s0514a1:8_5: So ekaṃ purisaṃ pakkosāpetvā “imaṃ rukkhaṃ abhiruhitvā etasmiṃ kulāvake kassaci atthitaṃ vā natthitaṃ vā jānāhī”ti āha.
atk-s0514a1:8_7: devā”ti vatvā abhiruhitvā tattha tīṇi aṇḍakāni disvā rañño ārocesi.

atk-s0514a1:8_9: tāni aṇḍakāni ṭhapetvā saṇikaṃ otarāhī”ti otārāpetvā caṅkoṭakaṃ hatthena gahetvā “katarasakuṇaṇḍakāni
atk-s0514a1:8_18: Kiṃ pana ekasmiṃ kulāvake tiṇṇaṃ sakuṇikānaṃ aṇḍāni hontīti. Āma, deva,
atk-s0514a1:8_20: Rājā tussitvā “ime mama puttā bhavissantī”ti tāni tīṇi aṇḍāni tayo amacce paṭicchāpetvā “ime mayhaṃ puttā bhavissanti,
atk-s0514a1:8_21: tumhe sādhukaṃ paṭijaggitvā aṇḍakosato nikkhantakāle mamāroceyyāthā”ti āha.
atk-s0514a1:9_1: Amacco ekaṃ nesādaṃ pakkosāpetvā “tvaṃ itthibhāvaṃ vā purisabhāvaṃ vā jānāhī”ti vatvā tena taṃ vīmaṃsitvā
atk-s0514a1:9_4: Rājā tuṭṭho tassa bahuṃ dhanaṃ datvā “puttakaṃ me sādhukaṃ paṭijagga,
atk-s0514a1:9_8: Sopi amacco taṃ nesādena vīmaṃsāpetvā “itthī”ti sutvā rañño santikaṃ gantvā “dhītā te, deva,

atk-s0514a1:9_16: Rājā tuṭṭho tassapi bahuṃ dhanaṃ datvā “puttassa me mahantena parivārena maṅgalaṃ katvā ‘jambuko’tissa nāmaṃ karohī”ti vatvā uyyojesi.
atk-s0514a1:9_18: Te tayopi sakuṇā tiṇṇaṃ amaccānaṃ gehesu rājakumāraparihāreneva vaḍḍhanti.
atk-s0514a1:10_1: “ime amaccā etesaṃ mama puttānaṃ paññāsampadaṃ na jānanti,
atk-s0514a1:10_6: So amacco gantvā vessantaraṃ vanditvā taṃ sāsanaṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0514a1:10_7: Taṃ sutvā vessantaro attano paṭijaggakaṃ amaccaṃ pakkositvā “mayhaṃ kira pitā maṃ pañhaṃ pucchitukāmo,
atk-s0514a1:10_10: Amacco “ito sattame divase tava pitā āgacchatū”ti āha.
atk-s0514a1:10_11: Taṃ sutvā vessantaro “pitā me ito sattame divase āgacchatū”ti vatvā uyyojesi.
atk-s0514a1:10_13: Rājā sattame divase nagare bheriṃ carāpetvā puttassa nivesanaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0514a1:10_16: Rājā vessantarasakuṇassa gehe bhuñjitvā mahantaṃ yasaṃ anubhavitvā sakaṃ nivesanaṃ āgantvā rājaṅgaṇe
atk-s0514a1:10_17: mahantaṃ maṇḍapaṃ kārāpetvā nagare bheriṃ carāpetvā alaṅkatamaṇḍapamajjhe mahājanaparivāro nisīditvā
atk-s0514a1:10_20: Vessantarasakuṇo pitu aṅke nisīditvā pitarā saha kīḷitvā gantvā tattheva suvaṇṇapīṭhe nisīdi.
atk-s0514a1:10_21: Atha naṃ rājā mahājanamajjhe rājadhammaṃ pucchanto paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –

atk-s0514a1:14_1: Kiṃ sūti kataraṃ kiccaṃ kataṃ varaṃ uttamaṃ hoti,
atk-s0514a1:14_3: sakalaṃ rājadhammanti evaṃ kira taṃ so pucchi.
atk-s0514a1:15_0: Taṃ sutvā vessantaro pañhaṃ akathetvāva rājānaṃ tāva pamādena codento dutiyaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:18_0: Pamatto appamattaṃ maṃ, pitā puttaṃ acodayī”ti.
atk-s0514a1:19_2: Bārāṇasiggahoti catūhi saṅgahavatthūhi bārāṇasiṃ saṅgahetvā vattanto.
atk-s0514a1:19_3: Pamattoti evarūpānaṃ paṇḍitānaṃ santike vasanto pañhassa apucchanena pamatto.
atk-s0514a1:19_6: Acodayīti amaccehi “tiracchānagate putte katvā voharatī”ti avahasiyamāno pamādaṃ āpajjitvā cirassaṃ ajja codesi,
atk-s0514a1:20_1: raññā nāma tīsu dhammesu ṭhatvā dhammena rajjaṃ kāretabba”nti vatvā rājadhammaṃ kathento imā gāthāyo āha –
atk-s0514a1:23_0: Tato kiccāni kāreyya, taṃ vataṃ āhu khattiya.
atk-s0514a1:26_0: Ratto duṭṭho ca yaṃ kayirā, na taṃ kayirā tato puna.
atk-s0514a1:29_0: Sabbe bhogā vinassanti, rañño taṃ vuccate aghaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:37_0: “So tvaṃ sabbe suhadayo, sabbesaṃ rakkhito bhava;
atk-s0514a1:38_0: Alakkhiṃ nuda mahārāja, lakkhyā bhava nivesanaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:44_0: Sa kalyāṇe dhitiṃ katvā, uṭṭhāne kurute mano.
atk-s0514a1:50_0: Vāyamassu ca kiccesu, nālaso vindate sukhaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:53_0: Alaṃ mitte sukhāpetuṃ, amittānaṃ dukhāya cā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:54_2: Musāvādino hi rañño raṭṭhaṃ nirojaṃ hoti,
atk-s0514a1:54_3: pathaviyā ojā kammakaraṇaṭṭhānato sattaratanamattaṃ heṭṭhā bhassati,
atk-s0514a1:54_4: tato āhāre vā telamadhuphāṇitādīsu vā osadhesu ojā na hoti.
atk-s0514a1:54_9: asaṅgahitā sevakā rājānaṃ garucittena na olokenti. Evaṃ, tāta,
atk-s0514a1:54_12: saccaṃ pana sādutaraṃ rasānanti tadeva paṭiggahetabbaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:54_15: Imasmiṃ panatthe “dhammo have hato hantī”ti cetiyajātakaṃ kathetabbaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:55_1: rājā nāma paṭhamameva kujjhanalakkhaṇaṃ kodhampi nivāreyya. Tāta,
atk-s0514a1:55_2: aññesañhi kodho khippaṃ matthakaṃ na pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0514a1:55_4: Rājāno nāma vācāvudhā kujjhitvā olokitamattenāpi paraṃ vināsenti,
atk-s0514a1:55_5: tasmā raññā aññehi manussehi atirekataraṃ nikkodhena bhavitabbaṃ,
atk-s0514a1:55_6: khantimettānuddayāsampannena attano piyaputtaṃ viya lokaṃ volokentena bhavitabbaṃ. Tāta,
atk-s0514a1:55_7: atikodhano nāma rājā uppannaṃ yasaṃ rakkhituṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0514a1:55_10: Cūḷadhammapālajātakasmiñhi mahāpatāpano nāma rājā puttaṃ ghātetvā puttasokena hadayena phalitena matāya
atk-s0514a1:55_11: deviyā sayampi deviṃ anusocanto hadayena phaliteneva mari.
atk-s0514a1:55_13: Tasmā raññā paṭhamameva musāvādaṃ vajjetvā dutiyaṃ kodho vajjetabbo.
atk-s0514a1:56_2: Tesu tesu kiccesu uppilāvitacittatāya keḷisīlataṃ parihāsaṃ nivāreyya. Tāta,
atk-s0514a1:56_4: aparapattiyena hutvā sabbāni kiccāni attapaccakkheneva kātabbāni.
atk-s0514a1:56_5: Uppilāvitacitto hi rājā atuletvā kammāni karonto laddhaṃ yasaṃ vināseti.
atk-s0514a1:56_6: Imasmiṃ panatthe sarabhaṅgajātake purohitassa vacanaṃ gahetvā daṇḍakirañño kisavacche aparajjhitvā saha
atk-s0514a1:56_7: raṭṭhena ucchijjitvā kukkuḷaniraye nibbattabhāvo ca mātaṅgajātake majjharañño brāhmaṇānaṃ kathaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0514a1:56_8: mātaṅgatāpase aparajjhitvā saha raṭṭhena ucchijjitvā niraye nibbattabhāvo ca ghaṭapaṇḍitajātake dasabhātikarājadārakānaṃ
atk-s0514a1:56_9: mohamūḷhānaṃ vacanaṃ gahetvā kaṇhadīpāyane aparajjhitvā vāsudevakulassa nāsitabhāvo ca kathetabbo.
atk-s0514a1:57_1: paṭhamaṃ musāvādaṃ dutiyaṃ kodhaṃ tatiyaṃ adhammahāsaṃ vajjetvā tato pacchā rājā raṭṭhavāsīnaṃ kattabbakiccāni kāreyya.
atk-s0514a1:58_0: Na taṃ kayirāti yaṃ tayā rāgādivasena pacchā tāpakaraṃ kammaṃ kataṃ hoti,
atk-s0514a1:58_1: tato pubbe katato puna tādisaṃ kammaṃ na kayirā,
atk-s0514a1:58_5: Sirīti idaṃ vessantarasakuṇo pubbe bārāṇasiyaṃ pavattitakāraṇaṃ āharitvā dassento āha.
atk-s0514a1:58_7: Uṭṭhānavīriyeti yo poso uṭṭhāne vīriye ca patiṭṭhito,
atk-s0514a1:58_8: na ca paresaṃ sampattiṃ disvā usūyati,
atk-s0514a1:58_12: pucchitā ahaṃ parasampattiusūyake duhadaye ducitte kalyāṇakammadūsake yo kalyāṇakammaṃ dussanto appiyāyanto aṭṭīyanto na karoti,
atk-s0514a1:59_2: Nivesananti lakkhiyā pana nivesanaṃ bhava patiṭṭhā hohi.
atk-s0514a1:59_4: kāsipati so puriso paññāya ceva vīriyena ca sampanno.
atk-s0514a1:59_5: Mahaggatoti mahajjhāsayo corānaṃ paccayabhūte gaṇhanto amittānaṃ mūlaṃ core gaṇhanto amittānaṃ aggaṃ chindatīti vadati.
atk-s0514a1:59_11: Sa kalyāṇeti so devarājā uṭṭhānavīriye manaṃ karonto pāpakammaṃ akatvā kalyāṇe puññakammasmiññeva dhitiṃ katvā appamatto uṭṭhāne manaṃ karoti,
atk-s0514a1:59_12: tassa pana kalyāṇakamme vīriyakaraṇabhāvadassanatthaṃ sarabhaṅgajātake dvīsu devalokesu devatāhi saddhiṃ
atk-s0514a1:59_13: kapiṭṭhārāmaṃ āgantvā pañhaṃ pucchitvā dhammassa sutabhāvo,
atk-s0514a1:59_14: mahākaṇhajātake attano ānubhāvena janaṃ tāsetvā osakkantassa sāsanassa pavattitabhāvo cāti evamādīni vatthūni kathetabbāni.
atk-s0514a1:60_1: catuyonikattāyeva kira te gandhabbā nāma jātā.
atk-s0514a1:60_6: Tādisā hi rājāno dānādīni puññāni karontā devatānaṃ pattiṃ denti,
atk-s0514a1:60_7: tā taṃ pattiṃ anumoditvā sampaṭicchitvā dibbayasena vaḍḍhanti.
atk-s0514a1:60_8: Anutiṭṭhantīti tādisassa rañño vīriyaṃ karontassa appamādaṃ āpajjantassa devatā anutiṭṭhanti anugacchanti,
atk-s0514a1:61_1: Vāyamassūti tāni raṭṭhakiccāni karonto tulanavasena tīraṇavasena paccakkhakammavasena tesu tesu kiccesu vīriyaṃ karassu.
atk-s0514a1:61_3: yaṃ maṃ tvaṃ kiṃsu kiccaṃ kataṃ varanti pucchi,
atk-s0514a1:61_4: tattha tava pañheyeva ete mayā “paṭhameneva vitatha”ntiādayo vuttā,
atk-s0514a1:61_9: Alanti evaṃ vattamāno hi rājā attano mitte sukhāpetuṃ,
atk-s0514a1:62_0: Evaṃ vessantarasakuṇena ekāya gāthāya rañño pamādaṃ codetvā ekādasahi gāthāhi dhamme kathite “buddhalīḷāya
atk-s0514a1:62_1: pañho kathito”ti mahājano acchariyabbhutacittajāto sādhukārasatāni pavattesi.
atk-s0514a1:62_3: “bhonto! Amaccā mama puttena vessantarena evaṃ kathentena kena kattabbaṃ kiccaṃ kata”nti.
atk-s0514a1:62_5: “Tena hissa mahāsenaguttaṭṭhānaṃ dammī”ti vessantaraṃ ṭhānantare ṭhapesi.
atk-s0514a1:62_6: So tato paṭṭhāya mahāsenaguttaṭṭhāne ṭhito pitu kammaṃ akāsīti.
atk-s0514a1:64_0: Puna rājā katipāhaccayena purimanayeneva kuṇḍaliniyā santikaṃ dūtaṃ pesetvā sattame divase tattha gantvā
atk-s0514a1:64_1: paccāgantvā tattheva maṇḍapamajjhe nisīditvā kuṇḍaliniṃ āharāpetvā suvaṇṇapīṭhe nisinnaṃ rājadhammaṃ
atk-s0514a1:67_0: Rajjaṃ kāretukāmena, kiṃ su kiccaṃ kataṃ vara”nti.
atk-s0514a1:68_0: Tattha sakkhisīti mayā puṭṭhapañhaṃ kathetuṃ sakkhissasīti pucchati.
atk-s0514a1:68_2: Tassā kira dvīsu kaṇṇapiṭṭhesu kuṇḍalasaṇṭhānā dve lekhā ahesuṃ,
atk-s0514a1:68_5: Khattabandhunīti khattassa mahāsenaguttassa bhaginibhāvena naṃ evaṃ ālapati.
atk-s0514a1:68_6: Kasmā panesa vessantarasakuṇaṃ evaṃ apucchitvā imameva pucchatīti?
atk-s0514a1:68_11: na pucchissāmī”ti vīmaṃsanavasena evaṃ pucchitvā taññeva pañhaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0514a1:69_1: tvaṃ maṃ ‘itthikā nāma kiṃ kathessatī’ti vīmaṃsasi maññe,
atk-s0514a1:69_2: sakalaṃ te rājadhammaṃ dvīsuyeva padesu pakkhipitvā kathessāmī”ti vatvā āha –
atk-s0514a1:72_0: Aladdhassa ca yo lābho, laddhassa cānurakkhaṇā.

atk-s0514a1:78_0: Sūtova rathaṃ saṅgaṇhe, so te kiccāni kāraye.
atk-s0514a1:83_0: “Sayaṃ āyaṃ vayaṃ jaññā, sayaṃ jaññā katākataṃ;
atk-s0514a1:87_0: Mā te adhammikā yuttā, dhanaṃ raṭṭhañca nāsayuṃ.
atk-s0514a1:89_0: “Mā ca vegena kiccāni, karosi kārayesi vā;

atk-s0514a1:104_1: Yatthāti yesu dvīsu padesu sabbaṃ atthajātaṃ hitasukhaṃ patiṭṭhitaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:104_2: Aladdhassāti yo ca pubbe aladdhassa lābhassa lābho,
atk-s0514a1:104_4: anuppannassa hi lābhassa uppādanaṃ nāma na bhāro,
atk-s0514a1:104_6: Ekacco hi yasaṃ uppādetvāpi yase pamatto pamādaṃ uppādetvā pāṇātipātādīni karoti,
atk-s0514a1:104_8: Atha naṃ rājāno gāhāpetvā mahāvināsaṃ pāpenti.
atk-s0514a1:104_9: Atha vā uppannarūpādīsu kāmaguṇesu pamatto ayoniso dhanaṃ nāsento sabbasāpateyye khīṇe kapaṇo hutvā cīrakavasano kapālamādāya carati.
atk-s0514a1:104_10: Pabbajito vā pana ganthadhurādivasena lābhasakkāraṃ nibbattetvā pamatto hīnāyāvattati.
atk-s0514a1:104_11: Aparo paṭhamajhānādīni nibbattetvāpi muṭṭhassatitāya tathārūpe ārammaṇe bajjhitvā jhānā parihāyati.
atk-s0514a1:104_12: Evaṃ uppannassa yasassa vā jhānādilābhassa vā rakkhaṇameva dukkaraṃ.
atk-s0514a1:104_18: Eko pana lābhasakkāraṃ uppādetvā appamāde ṭhatvā kalyāṇakammaṃ karoti,
atk-s0514a1:104_19: tassa so yaso sukkapakkhe cando viya vaḍḍhati,
atk-s0514a1:104_21: appamatto payogasampattiyā ṭhatvā dhammena rajjaṃ kārento tava uppannaṃ yasaṃ anurakkhāhīti.
atk-s0514a1:105_1: Anakkhākitaveti anakkhe akitave ajutakare ceva akerāṭike ca.
atk-s0514a1:105_5: Yañcevāti yañca te ghare dhanaṃ siyā,
atk-s0514a1:105_8: Yathā sārathi visamamagganivāraṇatthaṃ asse saṅgaṇhanto rathaṃ saṅgaṇheyya,
atk-s0514a1:105_9: evaṃ yo saha bhogehi taṃ rakkhituṃ sakkoti,
atk-s0514a1:105_10: so te amacco nāma tādisaṃ saṅgahetvā bhaṇḍāgārikādikiccāni kāraye.
atk-s0514a1:106_1: yassa hi rañño attano antojano attano valañjanakaparijano ca dānādīhi asaṅgahito hoti,
atk-s0514a1:106_2: tassa antonivesane suvaṇṇahiraññādīni tesaṃ asaṅgahitamanussānaṃ vasena nassanti,
atk-s0514a1:106_4: tasmā tvaṃ suṭṭhusaṅgahitaantojano hutvā “ettakaṃ nāma me vitta”nti sayaṃ attano dhanaṃ avekkhitvā “asukaṭṭhāne nāma nidhiṃ nidhema,
atk-s0514a1:106_5: asukassa iṇaṃ demā”ti idaṃ ubhayampi na kare parapattiyā,
atk-s0514a1:107_0: Āyaṃ vayanti tato uppajjanakaṃ āyañca tesaṃ tesaṃ dātabbaṃ vayañca sayameva jāneyyāsīti.
atk-s0514a1:107_1: Katākatanti saṅgāme vā navakamme vā aññesu vā kiccesu “iminā idaṃ nāma mayhaṃ kataṃ,
atk-s0514a1:107_2: iminā na kata”nti etampi sayameva jāneyyāsi,
atk-s0514a1:107_5: rājā nāma sandhicchedādikārakaṃ niggahārahaṃ ānetvā dassitaṃ upaparikkhitvā sodhetvā porāṇakarājūhi ṭhapitadaṇḍaṃ oloketvā dosānurūpaṃ niggaṇheyya.
atk-s0514a1:107_11: yena vā pana jīvitaṃ dinnaṃ hoti,
atk-s0514a1:107_12: evarūpaṃ paggahārahaṃ paggahetvā mahantaṃ sakkārasammānaṃ kareyya.
atk-s0514a1:107_13: Evaṃ hissa kiccesu aññepi uraṃ datvā kattabbaṃ karissanti.
atk-s0514a1:108_0: Jānapadanti janapadavāsīnaṃ atthaṃ sayaṃ attapaccakkheneva anusāsa.
atk-s0514a1:108_1: Adhammikā yuttāti adhammikā tattha tattha niyuttā āyuttakā lañjaṃ gahetvā vinicchayaṃ bhindantā tava dhanañca raṭṭhañca mā nāsayuṃ.
atk-s0514a1:108_2: Iminā kāraṇena appamatto hutvā sayameva anusāsa.
atk-s0514a1:108_4: Vegasāti atuletvā atīretvā chandādivasena sahasā kataṃ kammañhi na sādhu na sundaraṃ.
atk-s0514a1:108_6: Tādisañhi katvā mando pacchā vippaṭisāravasena idha loke apāyadukkhaṃ anubhavanto paraloke ca anutappati.
atk-s0514a1:109_2: tava hadayaṃ kusalaṃ adhisaritvā atikkamitvā pavatte paresaṃ akusalakamme suṭṭhu bāḷhaṃ adhikopitaṃ kujjhāpitaṃ hutvā mā muñca,
atk-s0514a1:109_5: yadā te vinicchaye ṭhitassa iminā puriso vā hato sandhi vā chinnoti coraṃ dassenti,
atk-s0514a1:109_6: tadā te paresaṃ vacanehi suṭṭhu kopitampi hadayaṃ kodhavasena mā muñca,
atk-s0514a1:109_10: tasmā akujjhitvā ubhinnaṃ attapaccatthikānaṃ kathaṃ sutvā suṭṭhu sodhetvā attapaccakkhena tassa corabhāvaṃ
atk-s0514a1:109_12: Raññā hi uppannepi kodhe hadayaṃ sītalaṃ akatvā kammaṃ na kātabbaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:109_13: Yadā panassa hadayaṃ nibbutaṃ hoti mudukaṃ,
atk-s0514a1:109_15: Pharuse hi citte pakkuthite udake mukhanimittaṃ viya kāraṇaṃ na paññāyati.
atk-s0514a1:109_17: kodhena hi bahūni phītāni rājakulāni akulabhāvaṃ gatāni mahāvināsameva pattānīti.
atk-s0514a1:110_3: “ahaṃ pathavissaro”ti mā mahājanaṃ kāyaduccaritādianatthāya patārayi mā otārayi,
atk-s0514a1:110_7: tava vijite manussajātikānaṃ vā tiracchānajātikānaṃ vā itthipurisānaṃ dukhudrayo dukkhuppatti mā āsi.
atk-s0514a1:110_8: Yathā hi adhammikarājūnaṃ vijite manussā kāyaduccaritādīni katvā niraye uppajjanti,
atk-s0514a1:110_9: tava raṭṭhavāsīnaṃ taṃ dukkhaṃ yathā na hoti,
atk-s0514a1:111_2: yo rājā kismiñci āsaṅkaṃ akatvā attano kāmameva anussarati,
atk-s0514a1:111_5: vissaṭṭhayaṭṭhi viya andho niraṅkuso viya ca caṇḍahatthī hoti,
atk-s0514a1:111_7: tassa taṃ bhogabyasanaṃ aghaṃ dukkhanti vuccati.
atk-s0514a1:112_2: tvaṃ imaṃ anusāsaniṃ sutvā idāni dakkho analaso puññānaṃ karaṇena puññakaro surādipariharaṇena.
atk-s0514a1:112_3: Asoṇḍo diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikassa atthassa avināsanena avināsako bhaveyyāsīti.
atk-s0514a1:112_7: attānaṃ niraye vinipātento vinipātiko nāma hotīti.
atk-s0514a1:113_0: Evaṃ kuṇḍalinīpi ekādasahi gāthāhi dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0514a1:113_2: “bhonto! Amaccā mama dhītāya kuṇḍaliniyā evaṃ kathayamānāya kena kattabbaṃ kiccaṃ kata”nti.
atk-s0514a1:113_4: “Tena hissā bhaṇḍāgārikaṭṭhānaṃ dammī”ti kuṇḍaliniṃ ṭhānantare ṭhapesi.
atk-s0514a1:113_5: Sā tato paṭṭhāya bhaṇḍāgārikaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā pitu kammaṃ akāsīti.
atk-s0514a1:115_0: Puna rājā katipāhaccayena purimanayeneva jambukapaṇḍitassa santikaṃ dūtaṃ pesetvā sattame divase tattha
atk-s0514a1:115_1: gantvā sampattiṃ anubhavitvā paccāgato tattheva maṇḍapamajjhe nisīdi.
atk-s0514a1:115_2: Amacco jambukapaṇḍitaṃ kañcanabhaddapīṭhe nisīdāpetvā pīṭhaṃ sīsenādāya āgacchi.
atk-s0514a1:115_3: Paṇḍito pitu aṅke nisīditvā kīḷitvā gantvā kañcanapīṭheyeva nisīdi.
atk-s0514a1:115_4: Atha naṃ rājā pañhaṃ pucchanto gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:118_0: Tvaṃ dāni vadehi jambuka, balānaṃ balamuttama”nti.
atk-s0514a1:119_1: ahaṃ tava bhātaraṃ kosiyagottaṃ vessantaraṃ bhaginiñca te kuṇḍaliniṃ rājadhammaṃ apucchiṃ,
atk-s0514a1:119_7: tvaṃ me rājadhammañca balānaṃ uttamaṃ balañca kathehīti.
atk-s0514a1:120_0: Evaṃ rājā mahāsattaṃ pañhaṃ pucchanto aññesaṃ pucchitaniyāmena apucchitvā visesetvā pucchi.
atk-s0514a1:120_3: sabbaṃ te kathessāmī”ti pasāritahatthe sahassatthavikaṃ ṭhapento viya dhammadesanaṃ ārabhi –
atk-s0514a1:123_0: Tattha bāhubalaṃ nāma, carimaṃ vuccate balaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:131_0: “Taṃ balānaṃ balaṃ seṭṭhaṃ, aggaṃ paññābalaṃ balaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:135_0: Akāmassa pasayhaṃ vā, añño taṃ paṭipajjati.
atk-s0514a1:138_0: Duppañño hi kāsipati, sabbenapi na jīvati.
atk-s0514a1:141_0: Paññāsahito naro idha, api dukkhe sukhāni vindati.
atk-s0514a1:156_0: Tāni tvaṃ tāta sevassu, mā akammāya randhayi;
atk-s0514a1:158_1: imasmiṃ sattaloke mahajjhāsaye purise pañcavidhaṃ balaṃ hoti.
atk-s0514a1:158_6: Sace hi kāyabalaṃ mahantaṃ nāma bhaveyya,
atk-s0514a1:158_8: vāraṇabalaṃ pana andhabālabhāvena maraṇassa paccayaṃ jātaṃ,
atk-s0514a1:158_9: laṭukikā attano ñāṇakusalatāya vāraṇaṃ jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpesi.
atk-s0514a1:158_10: Imasmiṃ panatthe “na heva sabbattha balena kiccaṃ,
atk-s0514a1:158_11: balañhi bālassa vadhāya hotī”ti suttaṃ āharitabbaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:159_0: Bhogabalanti upatthambhanavasena sabbaṃ hiraññasuvaṇṇādi upabhogajātaṃ bhogabalaṃ nāma,
atk-s0514a1:159_2: Amaccabalanti abhejjamantassa sūrassa suhadayassa amaccamaṇḍalassa atthitā,
atk-s0514a1:159_3: taṃ balaṃ saṅgāmasūratāya purimehi balehi mahantataraṃ.
atk-s0514a1:159_4: Abhijaccabalanti tīṇi kulāni atikkamitvā khattiyakulavasena jātisampatti,
atk-s0514a1:159_8: Yāni cetānīti yāni ca etāni cattāripi balāni paṇḍito paññānubhāvena adhigaṇhāti abhibhavati,
atk-s0514a1:159_9: taṃ sabbabalānaṃ paññābalaṃ seṭṭhanti ca agganti ca vuccati.
atk-s0514a1:159_11: Tena hi balena upatthaddho paṇḍito atthaṃ vindati,
atk-s0514a1:159_13: Tadatthajotanatthaṃ “puṇṇaṃ nadiṃ yena ca peyyamāhū”ti puṇṇanadījātakañca sirīkāḷakaṇṇipañhaṃ pañcapaṇḍitapañhañca sattubhastajātaka-
atk-s0514a1:160_1: mandapañño puggalo sattaratanapuṇṇaṃ cepi uttamaṃ dharaṇiṃ labhati,
atk-s0514a1:160_2: tassa anicchamānasseva pasayhakāraṃ vā pana katvā añño paññāsampanno taṃ paṭipajjati.
atk-s0514a1:160_3: Mando hi laddhaṃ yasaṃ rakkhituṃ kulasantakaṃ vā pana paveṇiāgatampi rajjaṃ adhigantuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0514a1:160_6: Laddhānāti jātisampattiṃ nissāya kulasantakaṃ rajjaṃ labhitvāpi.
atk-s0514a1:160_7: Sabbenapīti tena sakalenapi rajjena na jīvati,
atk-s0514a1:161_0: Evaṃ mahāsatto ettakena ṭhānena apaṇḍitassa aguṇaṃ kathetvā idāni paññaṃ pasaṃsanto “paññā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0514a1:161_3: Kittisilokavaḍḍhanīti kittighosassa ca lābhasakkārassa ca vaḍḍhanī.
atk-s0514a1:161_4: Dukkhe sukhāni vindatīti dukkhe uppannepi nibbhayo hutvā upāyakusalatāya sukhaṃ paṭilabhati.
atk-s0514a1:165_1: Dhammaṭṭhanti sabhāvakāraṇe ṭhitaṃ bahussutaṃ anāgamma taṃ asaddahanto.
atk-s0514a1:165_2: Avinibbhujanti atthānatthaṃ kāraṇākāraṇaṃ anogāhanto atīrento na koci paññaṃ adhigacchati, tātāti.
atk-s0514a1:166_1: Kāluṭṭhāyīti vīriyaṃ kātuṃ yuttakāle vīriyassa kārako.
atk-s0514a1:166_2: Anuṭṭhahatīti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ kāle taṃ taṃ kiccaṃ karoti.
atk-s0514a1:166_3: Tassāti tassa puggalassa kammaphalaṃ samijjhati nipphajjati.
atk-s0514a1:166_4: Anāyatanasīlassāti anāyatanaṃ vuccati lābhayasasukhānaṃ anākaro dussīlyakammaṃ,
atk-s0514a1:166_7: kusalassa kammassa karaṇakāle nibbindiyakārissa nibbinditvā ukkaṇṭhitvā karontassa evarūpassa, tāta,
atk-s0514a1:166_8: puggalassa kammānaṃ attho sammā na vipaccati na sampajjati,
atk-s0514a1:166_9: tīṇi kulaggāni ca cha kāmasaggāni ca na upanetīti attho.
atk-s0514a1:167_0: Yogappayogasaṅkhātanti yoge yuñjitabbayuttake kāraṇe payogakoṭṭhāsabhūtaṃ paññaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:167_2: Tāni tvanti etāni ca dve purimāni ca mayā vuttakāraṇāni sabbāni, tāta,
atk-s0514a1:167_4: mayā vuttaṃ ovādaṃ hadaye katvā attano ghare dhanaṃ rakkha.
atk-s0514a1:167_5: Mā akammāya randhayīti ayuttena akāraṇena mā randhayi,
atk-s0514a1:167_6: taṃ dhanaṃ mā jhāpayi mā nāsayi.
atk-s0514a1:167_8: Akammunā hīti ayuttakammakaraṇena dummedho puggalo sakaṃ dhanaṃ nāsetvā pacchā duggato.
atk-s0514a1:167_9: Naḷāgāraṃva sīdatīti yathā naḷāgāraṃ mūlato paṭṭhāya jīramānaṃ appatiṭṭhaṃ patati,
atk-s0514a1:167_10: evaṃ akāraṇena dhanaṃ nāsetvā apāyesu nibbattatīti.
atk-s0514a1:168_0: Evampi bodhisatto ettakena ṭhānena pañca balāni vaṇṇetvā paññābalaṃ ukkhipitvā candamaṇḍalaṃ nīharanto
atk-s0514a1:168_1: viya kathetvā idāni dasahi gāthāhi rañño ovādaṃ dento āha –
atk-s0514a1:171_0: Idha dhammaṃ caritvāna, rāja saggaṃ gamissasi.
atk-s0514a1:174_0: Idha dhammaṃ caritvāna, rāja saggaṃ gamissasi.
atk-s0514a1:177_0: Idha dhammaṃ caritvāna, rāja saggaṃ gamissasi.
atk-s0514a1:180_0: Idha dhammaṃ caritvāna, rāja saggaṃ gamissasi.
atk-s0514a1:183_0: Idha dhammaṃ caritvāna, rāja saggaṃ gamissasi.
atk-s0514a1:186_0: Idha dhammaṃ caritvāna, rāja saggaṃ gamissasi.
atk-s0514a1:189_0: Idha dhammaṃ caritvāna, rāja saggaṃ gamissasi.
atk-s0514a1:192_0: Idha dhammaṃ caritvāna, rāja saggaṃ gamissasi.
atk-s0514a1:195_0: Idha dhammaṃ caritvāna, rāja saggaṃ gamissasi.
atk-s0514a1:198_0: Suciṇṇena divaṃ pattā, mā dhammaṃ rāja pāmado”ti.
atk-s0514a1:199_0: Tattha paṭhamagāthāya tāva idha dhammanti mātāpitupaṭṭhānadhammaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:199_1: Taṃ kālasseva vuṭṭhāya mātāpitūnaṃ mukhodakadantakaṭṭhadānamādiṃ katvā sabbasarīrakiccapariharaṇaṃ karontova pūrehīti vadati.
atk-s0514a1:199_2: Puttadāresūti puttadhītaro tāva pāpā nivāretvā kalyāṇe nivesento sippaṃ uggaṇhāpento vayappattakāle patirūpakulavaṃsena
atk-s0514a1:199_3: āvāhavivāhaṃ karonto samaye dhanaṃ dento puttesu dhammaṃ carati nāma,
atk-s0514a1:199_4: bhariyaṃ sammānento anavamānento anaticaranto issariyaṃ vossajjento alaṅkāraṃ anuppadento dāresu dhammaṃ carati nāma.
atk-s0514a1:199_5: Mittāmaccesūti mittāmacce catūhi saṅgahavatthūhi saṅgaṇhanto avisaṃvādento etesu dhammaṃ carati nāma.
atk-s0514a1:199_6: Vāhanesu balesu cāti hatthiassādīnaṃ vāhanānaṃ balakāyassa ca dātabbayuttakaṃ dento sakkāraṃ karonto
atk-s0514a1:199_7: hatthiassādayo mahallakakāle kammesu ayojento tesu dhammaṃ carati nāma.
atk-s0514a1:200_0: Gāmesu nigamesu cāti gāmanigamavāsino daṇḍabalīhi apīḷentova tesu dhammaṃ carati nāma.
atk-s0514a1:200_1: Raṭṭhe janapadesu cāti raṭṭhañca janapadañca akāraṇena kilamento hitacittaṃ apaccupaṭṭhapento tattha adhammaṃ carati nāma,
atk-s0514a1:200_2: apīḷento pana hitacittena pharanto tattha dhammaṃ carati nāma.
atk-s0514a1:200_3: Samaṇe brāhmaṇesu cāti tesaṃ cattāro paccaye dentova tesu dhammaṃ carati nāma.
atk-s0514a1:200_4: Migapakkhīsūti sabbacatuppadasakuṇānaṃ abhayaṃ dento tesu dhammaṃ carati nāma.
atk-s0514a1:200_6: Sukhāvahoti tīsu kulasampadāsu chasu kāmasaggesu sukhaṃ āvahati.
atk-s0514a1:200_10: Mā dhammaṃ rāja pāmadoti tasmā tvaṃ, mahārāja,
atk-s0514a1:201_0: Evaṃ dasa dhammacariyagāthāyo vatvā uttaripi ovadanto osānagāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:204_0: Sappaññasevī kalyāṇī, samattaṃ sāma taṃ vidū”ti.
atk-s0514a1:205_0: Tattha tattheva te vattapadāti idaṃ purimanayeneva yojetabbaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:205_3: taṃ mayā vuttaṃ ovādaṃ tvaṃ niccakālaṃ sappaññapuggalasevī kalyāṇaguṇasamannāgato hutvā samattaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ
atk-s0514a1:205_4: sāmaṃ vidū attapaccakkhatova jānitvā yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjāti.
atk-s0514a1:206_0: Evaṃ mahāsatto ākāsagaṅgaṃ otārento viya buddhalīḷāya dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0514a1:206_4: “bhonto! Amaccā mama puttena taruṇajambuphalasamānatuṇḍena jambukapaṇḍitena evaṃ kathentena kena kattabbaṃ kiccaṃ kata”nti.
atk-s0514a1:206_6: “Tena hissa senāpatiṭṭhānaṃ dammī”ti jambukaṃ ṭhānantare ṭhapesi.
atk-s0514a1:206_7: So tato paṭṭhāya senāpatiṭṭhāne ṭhatvā pitu kammāni akāsi.
atk-s0514a1:206_9: Tayopi janā rañño atthañca dhammañca anusāsiṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:206_10: Mahāsattassovāde ṭhatvā rājā dānādīni puññāni katvā saggaparāyaṇo ahosi.
atk-s0514a1:206_11: Amaccā rañño sarīrakiccaṃ katvā sakuṇānaṃ ārocetvā “sāmi,
atk-s0514a1:206_12: jambukasakuṇa rājā tumhākaṃ chattaṃ ussāpetabbaṃ akāsī”ti vadiṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:206_14: tumhe appamattā rajjaṃ kārethā”ti mahājanaṃ sīlesu patiṭṭhāpetvā “evaṃ vinicchayaṃ pavatteyyāthā”ti vinicchayadhammaṃ
atk-s0514a1:207_0: Satthā rañño ovādavasena imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ desetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi “tadā rājā ānando ahosi,
atk-s0514a1:211_0: Alaṅkatā kuṇḍalino suvatthāti idaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto mahāmoggallānattherassa parinibbānaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0514a1:211_1: Sāriputtatthero tathāgataṃ jetavane viharantaṃ attano parinibbānaṃ anujānāpetvā gantvā nāḷakagāmake jātovarake parinibbāyi.
atk-s0514a1:211_2: Tassa parinibbutabhāvaṃ sutvā satthā rājagahaṃ gantvā veḷuvane vihāsi.
atk-s0514a1:211_4: So pana iddhibalena koṭippattabhāvena devalokacārikañca ussadanirayacārikañca gacchati.
atk-s0514a1:211_5: Devaloke buddhasāvakānaṃ mahantaṃ issariyaṃ disvā ussadanirayesu ca titthiyasāvakānaṃ mahantaṃ dukkhaṃ
atk-s0514a1:211_6: disvā manussalokaṃ āgantvā “asuko upāsako asukā ca upāsikā asukasmiṃ nāma devaloke nibbattitvā mahāsampattiṃ
atk-s0514a1:211_8: titthiyasāvakesu asuko ca asukā ca nirayādīsu asukaapāye nāma nibbattā”ti manussānaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0514a1:212_0: Te there āghātaṃ bandhitvā “imasmiṃ jīvante amhākaṃ upaṭṭhākā bhijjanti,
atk-s0514a1:212_2: mārāpessāma na”nti therassa māraṇatthaṃ samaṇaguttakassa nāma corassa sahassaṃ adaṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:212_3: So “theraṃ māressāmī”ti mahantena parivārena saddhiṃ kāḷasilaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0514a1:212_4: Thero taṃ āgacchantaṃ disvāva iddhiyā uppatitvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0514a1:212_5: Coro taṃ divasaṃ theraṃ adisvā nivattitvā punadivasepīti cha divase agamāsi.
atk-s0514a1:212_7: Sattame pana divase therassa pubbe kataṃ aparāpariyavedanīyakammaṃ okāsaṃ labhi.
atk-s0514a1:212_8: So kira pubbe bhariyāya vacanaṃ gahetvā mātāpitaro māretukāmo yānakena araññaṃ netvā corānaṃ uṭṭhitākāraṃ katvā mātāpitaro pothesi pahari.
atk-s0514a1:212_9: Te cakkhudubbalatāya rūpadassanarahitā taṃ attano puttaṃ asañjānantā “corā eva ete”ti saññāya, “tāta,
atk-s0514a1:212_15: Atha ne assāsetvā corānaṃ palāyanākāraṃ dassetvā tesaṃ hatthapāde sambāhitvā “amma, tātā,
atk-s0514a1:212_17: corā palātā”ti vatvā puna attano gehameva ānesi.
atk-s0514a1:212_18: Taṃ kammaṃ ettakaṃ kālaṃ okāsaṃ alabhitvā bhasmapaṭicchanno aṅgārarāsi viya ṭhatvā imaṃ antimasarīraṃ upadhāvitvā gaṇhi.
atk-s0514a1:212_19: Yathā hi pana sunakhaluddakena migaṃ disvā sunakho vissajjito migaṃ anubandhitvā yasmiṃ ṭhāne pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0514a1:212_21: evaṃ idaṃ kammaṃ yasmiṃ ṭhāne okāsaṃ labhati,
atk-s0514a1:213_0: Thero attanā katakammassa ākaḍḍhitabhāvaṃ ñatvā na apagacchi.
atk-s0514a1:213_1: Thero tassa nissandena ākāse uppatituṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0514a1:213_3: Coro theraṃ gahetvā therassa aṭṭhīni taṇḍulakaṇamattāni karonto bhinditvā sañcuṇṇetvā palālapiṭṭhikakaraṇaṃ
atk-s0514a1:213_4: nāma katvā “mato”ti saññāya ekasmiṃ gumbapiṭṭhe khipitvā saparivāro pakkāmi.
atk-s0514a1:213_5: Thero satiṃ paṭilabhitvā “satthāraṃ passitvā parinibbāyissāmī”ti cintetvā sarīraṃ jhānaveṭhanena veṭhetvā
atk-s0514a1:213_6: thiraṃ katvā ākāsaṃ uppatitvā ākāsena satthu santikaṃ gantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā “bhante,
atk-s0514a1:213_19: bhante”ti satthāraṃ vanditvā tālappamāṇaṃ ākāse uppatitvā parinibbānadivase sāriputtatthero viya nānappakārā
atk-s0514a1:213_20: iddhiyo katvā dhammaṃ kathetvā satthāraṃ vanditvā kāḷasilāyaṃ aṭaviyaṃ parinibbāyi.
atk-s0514a1:214_1: “amhākaṃ kira ācariyo parinibbuto”ti dibbagandhamālāvāsadhūmacandanacuṇṇāni ceva nānādārūni ca gahetvā āgamiṃsu,
atk-s0514a1:214_3: Satthā therassa santike ṭhatvā sarīranikkhepaṃ kāresi.
atk-s0514a1:214_4: Āḷāhanassa samantato yojanamatte padese pupphavassaṃ vassi.
atk-s0514a1:214_17: Satthā therassa dhātuṃ gāhāpetvā veḷuvanadvārakoṭṭhake cetiyaṃ kārāpesi.
atk-s0514a1:214_19: sāriputtatthero tathāgatassa santike aparinibbutattā buddhānaṃ santikā mahantaṃ sammānaṃ na labhi,
atk-s0514a1:214_20: moggallānatthero pana buddhānaṃ samīpe parinibbutattā mahāsammānaṃ labhī”ti.
atk-s0514a1:214_23: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na,
atk-s0514a1:214_25: idāneva moggallāno mama santikā sammānaṃ labhati,
atk-s0514a1:215_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto purohitassa brāhmaṇiyā kucchimhi paṭisandhiṃ
atk-s0514a1:215_2: Tasmiṃ khaṇe dvādasayojanike bārāṇasinagare sabbāvudhāni pajjaliṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:215_3: Purohito puttassa jātakkhaṇe bahi nikkhamitvā ākāsaṃ olokento nakkhattayogaṃ disvā “iminā nakkhattena
atk-s0514a1:215_4: jātattā eso kumāro sakalajambudīpe dhanuggahānaṃ aggo bhavissatī”ti ñatvā kālasseva rājakulaṃ gantvā
atk-s0514a1:215_5: rājānaṃ sukhasayitabhāvaṃ pucchi. “Kuto me, ācariya, sukhaṃ,
atk-s0514a1:215_6: ajja sakalanivesane āvudhāni pajjalitānī”ti vutte “mā bhāyi, deva,
atk-s0514a1:215_9: ajja amhākaṃ gehe kumārassa jātattā evaṃ ahosī”ti. “Ācariya,
atk-s0514a1:215_12: so pana sakalajambudīpe dhanuggahānaṃ aggo bhavissatī”ti. “Sādhu, ācariya,
atk-s0514a1:215_13: tena hi naṃ paṭijaggitvā vayappattakāle amhākaṃ dasseyyāsī”ti vatvā khīramūlaṃ tāva sahassaṃ dāpesi.
atk-s0514a1:215_14: Purohito taṃ gahetvā nivesanaṃ gantvā brāhmaṇiyā datvā puttassa nāmaggahaṇadivase jātakkhaṇe āvudhānaṃ pajjalitattā “jotipālo”tissa nāmaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0514a1:216_0: So mahantena parivārena vaḍḍhamāno soḷasavassakāle uttamarūpadharo ahosi.
atk-s0514a1:216_1: Athassa pitā sarīrasampattiṃ oloketvā sahassaṃ datvā, “tāta,
atk-s0514a1:216_2: takkasilaṃ gantvā disāpāmokkhassa ācariyassa santike sippaṃ uppaṇhāhī”ti āha.
atk-s0514a1:216_3: So “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā ācariyabhāgaṃ gahetvā mātāpitaro vanditvā tattha gantvā sahassaṃ datvā sippaṃ paṭṭhapetvā sattāheneva nipphattiṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0514a1:216_4: Athassa ācariyo tussitvā attano santakaṃ khaggaratanaṃ sandhiyuttaṃ meṇḍakasiṅgadhanuṃ sandhiyuttaṃ tūṇīraṃ
atk-s0514a1:216_7: idāni tvaṃ ime māṇavake sikkhāpehī”ti pañcasatamāṇavakepi tasseva niyyādesi.
atk-s0514a1:216_8: Bodhisatto sabbaṃ upakaraṇaṃ gahetvā ācariyaṃ vanditvā bārāṇasimeva āgantvā mātāpitaro vanditvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0514a1:216_9: Atha naṃ vanditvā ṭhitaṃ pitā avoca “uggahitaṃ te, tāta,
atk-s0514a1:216_11: So tassa vacanaṃ sutvā rājakulaṃ gantvā “putto me, deva,
atk-s0514a1:216_17: So “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā gehaṃ gantvā kumāraṃ pakkosāpetvā “tāta,
atk-s0514a1:216_19: So tato paṭṭhāya devasikaṃ sahassaṃ labhitvā rājānaṃ upaṭṭhahi.
atk-s0514a1:217_4: Rājā tesaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā purohitassa kathesi.
atk-s0514a1:217_9: apica rājā attano vijite dhanuggahe sannipātāpetū”ti āha.
atk-s0514a1:217_11: Rājā nagare bheriṃ carāpetvā dhanuggahe sannipātāpesi.
atk-s0514a1:217_13: Rājā tesaṃ sannipatitabhāvaṃ ñatvā “nagaravāsino jotipālassa sippaṃ passantū”ti nagare bheriṃ carāpetvā
atk-s0514a1:217_14: rājaṅgaṇaṃ sajjāpetvā mahājanaparivuto pallaṅkavare nisīditvā dhanuggahe pakkosāpetvā “jotipālo āgacchatū”ti pesesi.
atk-s0514a1:217_15: So ācariyena dinnāni dhanutūṇīrasannāhakañcukauṇhīsāni nivāsanantare ṭhapetvā khaggaṃ gāhāpetvā pakativesena rañño santikaṃ gantvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0514a1:218_1: dhanuṃ aggahetvā pana āgatattā amhākaṃ hatthato dhanuṃ gahetukāmo bhavissati,
atk-s0514a1:218_4: So sāṇiṃ parikkhipāpetvā antosāṇiyaṃ ṭhito sāṭakaṃ apanetvā sannāhakañcukaṃ pavesetvā uṇhīsaṃ sīse paṭimuñcitvā
atk-s0514a1:218_5: meṇḍakasiṅgadhanumhi pavālavaṇṇaṃ jiyaṃ āropetvā tūṇīraṃ piṭṭhe bandhitvā khaggaṃ vāmato katvā vajiraggaṃ
atk-s0514a1:218_6: nārācaṃ nakhapiṭṭhena parivattetvā sāṇiṃ vivaritvā pathaviṃ bhinditvā alaṅkatanāgakumāro viya nikkhamitvā
atk-s0514a1:218_8: Taṃ disvā mahājanā vagganti nadanti apphoṭenti seḷenti.
atk-s0514a1:219_0: Mahāsatto rājaṅgaṇe caturassaparicchedabbhantare maṇḍalaṃ katvā catūsu kaṇṇesu cattāro dhanuggahe ṭhapetvā
atk-s0514a1:219_1: ekekassa tiṃsa tiṃsa kaṇḍasahassāni dāpetvā ekekassa santike ekekaṃ kaṇḍadāyakaṃ ṭhapetvā sayaṃ vajiraggaṃ
atk-s0514a1:219_3: ime cattāro dhanuggahā ekappahāreneva sare khipitvā maṃ vijjhantu,
atk-s0514a1:219_14: Mahāsatto tāni nārācena paharitvā yathā vā tathā vā na pātesi,
atk-s0514a1:219_15: bodhikoṭṭhakaṃ pana parikkhipanto viya tālena tālaṃ,
atk-s0514a1:219_18: vājena vājaṃ anatikkamanto khipitvā saragabbhaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0514a1:219_20: So tesaṃ kaṇḍakhīṇabhāvaṃ ñatvā saragabbhaṃ avināsentova uppatitvā gantvā rañño santike aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0514a1:219_21: Mahājano unnādento vagganto apphoṭento seḷento accharaṃ paharanto mahākolāhalaṃ katvā vatthābharaṇādīni khipi.
atk-s0514a1:220_4: Sakalajambudīpe maṃ ṭhapetvā añño natthi, devāti.
atk-s0514a1:220_6: ete tāva catūsu kaṇṇesu ṭhatvā cattāropi janā maṃ vijjhituṃ na sakkhiṃsu,
atk-s0514a1:220_7: ahaṃ panete catūsu kaṇṇesu ṭhite ekeneva sarena vijjhissāmīti.
atk-s0514a1:220_9: Mahāsatto catūsu kaṇṇesu catasso kadaliyo ṭhapāpetvā nārācapuṅkhe rattasuttakaṃ bandhitvā ekaṃ kadaliṃ sandhāya khipi.
atk-s0514a1:220_10: Nārāco taṃ kadaliṃ vijjhitvā tato dutiyaṃ,
atk-s0514a1:220_13: tato paṭhamaṃ viddhameva vijjhitvā puna tassa hattheyeva patiṭṭhahi.
atk-s0514a1:220_29: Iti aññehi asādhāraṇāni imāni dvādasa sippāni dassetvā puna aññehi asādhāraṇeyeva satta mahākāye padālesi,
atk-s0514a1:220_34: ekābaddhaṃ phalakasataṃ vinivijjhitvā palālasakaṭavālukasakaṭapadarasakaṭānaṃ purimabhāgena saraṃ khipitvā pacchābhāgena nikkhamāpesi,
atk-s0514a1:220_39: Bodhisatto sare khipitvā ākāse sarapāsādādīni katvā puna ekena sarena te sare pātento bhaṅgavibhaṅge akāsīti “sarabhaṅgo”ti nāma paññāto.
atk-s0514a1:220_40: Tassa ettakāni sippāni dassentasseva sūriyo atthaṅgato.
atk-s0514a1:221_3: kesamassuṃ kāretvā nhatvā ehī”ti taṃ divasaṃ paribbayatthāya satasahassaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0514a1:221_4: Mahāsatto “iminā mayhaṃ attho natthī”ti aṭṭhārasakoṭisaṅkhyaṃ dhanaṃ sāmikānaññeva datvā mahantena parivārena
atk-s0514a1:221_5: nhāyituṃ nadiṃ gantvā kesamassuṃ kāretvā nhatvā sabbālaṅkārappaṭimaṇḍito anopamāya siriyā nivesanaṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0514a1:221_6: nānaggarasabhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā sirisayanaṃ abhiruyha nipanno dve yāme sayitvā pacchimayāme pabuddho uṭṭhāya
atk-s0514a1:221_7: pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā sayanapiṭṭhe nisinnova attano sippassa ādimajjhapariyosānaṃ olokento “mama sippassa
atk-s0514a1:221_11: pāṇātipāto kilesaparibhogesu ca adhimattappamādo niraye paṭisandhiṃ deti,
atk-s0514a1:221_14: bhariyā ca puttadhītaro ca bahū bhavissanti.
atk-s0514a1:221_15: Kilesavatthu kho pana vepullagataṃ duccajaṃ hoti,
atk-s0514a1:221_16: idāneva nikkhamitvā ekakova araññaṃ pavisitvā isipabbajjaṃ pabbajituṃ yuttaṃ mayha”nti mahāsayanato uṭṭhāya
atk-s0514a1:221_17: kañci ajānāpento pāsādā oruyha aggadvārena nikkhamitvā ekakova araññaṃ pavisitvā godhāvarinadītīre tiyojanikaṃ
atk-s0514a1:222_0: Tassa nikkhantabhāvaṃ ñatvā sakko vissakammaṃ pakkosāpetvā “tāta,
atk-s0514a1:222_3: godhāvarinadītīre kapiṭṭhavane assamaṃ māpetvā pabbajitaparikkhāre paṭiyādehī”ti āha.
atk-s0514a1:222_5: Mahāsatto taṃ ṭhānaṃ patvā ekapadikamaggaṃ disvā “pabbajitānaṃ vasanaṭṭhānena bhavitabba”nti tena maggena
atk-s0514a1:222_6: tattha gantvā kañci apassanto paṇṇasālaṃ pavisitvā pabbajitaparikkhāre disvā “sakko devarājā mama nikkhantabhāvaṃ
atk-s0514a1:222_7: aññāsi maññe”ti cintetvā sāṭakaṃ apanetvā rattavākaciraṃ nivāsetvā ca pārupitvā ca ajinacammaṃ ekaṃsagataṃ akāsi,
atk-s0514a1:222_8: jaṭāmaṇḍalaṃ bandhitvā khārikājaṃ aṃse katvā kattaradaṇḍaṃ gahetvā paṇṇasālato nikkhamitvā caṅkamaṃ āruyha
atk-s0514a1:222_9: katipayavāre aparāparaṃ caṅkamitvā pabbajjāsiriyā vanaṃ upasobhayamāno kasiṇaparikammaṃ katvā pabbajitato
atk-s0514a1:222_10: sattame divase aṭṭha samāpattiyo pañca abhiññāyo ca nibbattetvā uñchācariyāya vanamūlaphalāhāro ekakova vihāsi.
atk-s0514a1:222_11: Mātāpitaro mittasuhajjādayo ñātivaggāpissa taṃ apassantā rodantā paridevantā vicaranti.
atk-s0514a1:223_0: Atheko vanacarako araññaṃ pavisitvā kapiṭṭhakaassamapade nisinnaṃ mahāsattaṃ disvā sañjānitvā gantvā
atk-s0514a1:223_1: tena saddhiṃ paṭisanthāraṃ katvā nagaraṃ gantvā tassa mātāpitūnaṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0514a1:223_3: Rājā “etha naṃ passissāmā”ti tassa mātāpitaro gahetvā mahājanaparivuto vanacarakena desitena maggena godhāvarinadītīraṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0514a1:223_4: Bodhisatto nadītīraṃ āgantvā ākāse nisinno dhammaṃ desetvā te sabbe assamapadaṃ pavesetvā tatrapi tesaṃ
atk-s0514a1:223_5: ākāse nisinnova kāmesu ādīnavaṃ pakāsetvā dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0514a1:223_8: Athassa tattha vasanabhāvo sakalajambudīpe pākaṭo ahosi.
atk-s0514a1:223_9: Aññepi rājāno raṭṭhavāsīhi saddhiṃ āgantvā tassa santike pabbajiṃsu,
atk-s0514a1:223_12: Yo kāmavitakkaṃ vā byāpādavitakkaṃ vā vihiṃsāvitakkaṃ vā vitakketi,
atk-s0514a1:223_13: mahāsatto gantvā tassa purato ākāse nisīditvā dhammaṃ deseti,
atk-s0514a1:223_15: Tassovāde ṭhatvā aṭṭha samāpattiyo uppādetvā jhānanipphattiṃ pattā sālissaro meṇḍissaro pabbato kāḷadevilo
atk-s0514a1:223_16: kisavaccho anusisso nāradoti satta jeṭṭhantevāsino ahesuṃ.
atk-s0514a1:224_2: tvaṃ imaṃ isigaṇaṃ gahetvā majjharañño vijite kalappacullakanigamaṃ upanissāya vasāhī”ti āha.
atk-s0514a1:224_3: So “sādhū”ti tassa vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā anekasahassaṃ isigaṇaṃ gahetvā gantvā tattha vāsaṃ kappesi.
atk-s0514a1:224_4: Manussesu āgantvā pabbajantesu puna assamo paripūri.
atk-s0514a1:224_7: tvaṃ imaṃ isigaṇaṃ ādāya suraṭṭhajanapadassa sīmantare sātodikā nāma nadī atthi,
atk-s0514a1:224_14: tvaṃ dakkhiṇapathe avantiraṭṭhe ghanaselapabbato nāma atthi,
atk-s0514a1:224_18: Kisavaccho pana mahāsattaṃ āpucchitvā daṇḍakirañño vijite kumbhavatinagaraṃ nāma atthi,
atk-s0514a1:225_0: Tasmiṃ kāle daṇḍakirājā ekaṃ laddhasakkāraṃ gaṇikaṃ ṭhānā cāvesi.
atk-s0514a1:225_1: Sā attano dhammatāya vicarantī uyyānaṃ gantvā kisavacchatāpasaṃ disvā “ayaṃ kāḷakaṇṇī bhavissati,
atk-s0514a1:225_2: imassa sarīre kaliṃ pavāhetvā nhatvā gamissāmī”ti dantakaṭṭhaṃ khāditvā sabbapaṭhamaṃ tassūpari bahalakheḷaṃ
atk-s0514a1:225_3: niṭṭhubhantī kisavacchatāpasassa jaṭantare niṭṭhubhitvā dantakaṭṭhampissa sīseyeva khipitvā sayaṃ sīsaṃ
atk-s0514a1:225_5: Rājāpi taṃ saritvā puna pākatikameva akāsi.
atk-s0514a1:225_6: Sā mohamūḷhā hutvā “kāḷakaṇṇisarīre kaliṃ pavāhetvā mampi rājā puna ṭhāne ṭhapeti mayā yaso laddho”ti saññamakāsi.
atk-s0514a1:225_7: Tato nacirasseva rājā purohitaṃ ṭhānato cāvesi.
atk-s0514a1:225_8: So tassā santikaṃ gantvā “tvaṃ kena kāraṇena puna ṭhānaṃ labhasī”ti pucchi.
atk-s0514a1:225_9: Athassa sā “rājuyyāne kāḷakaṇṇisarīre kalissa pavāhitattā”ti ārocesi.
atk-s0514a1:225_10: Purohito gantvā tatheva tassa sarīre kaliṃ pavāhesi,
atk-s0514a1:225_19: tassa sarīre kaliṃ pavāhetvā yāhī”ti āha.
atk-s0514a1:225_20: So tassa kathaṃ gahetvā “ye mayā saddhiṃ āgacchanti,
atk-s0514a1:225_21: te uyyāne kāḷakaṇṇisarīre kaliṃ pavāhentū”ti vatvā uyyānaṃ pavisitvā dantakaṭṭhaṃ khāditvā sabbapaṭhamaṃ
atk-s0514a1:225_22: sayameva tassa jaṭantare kheḷaṃ niṭṭhubhitvā dantakaṭṭhañca khipitvā sīsaṃ nhāyi.
atk-s0514a1:226_0: Tasmiṃ pakkante senāpati gantvā tāpasaṃ disvā dantakaṭṭhādīni nīharitvā sādhukaṃ nhāpetvā “bhante,
atk-s0514a1:226_3: devatā pana kupitā ito sattame divase sakalaraṭṭhaṃ araṭṭhaṃ karissanti,
atk-s0514a1:226_4: tvaṃ puttadāraṃ gahetvā sīghaṃ palāyitvā aññattha yāhīti.
atk-s0514a1:226_7: So nivattitvā attano gehaṃ gantvā puttadāraṃ ādāya palāyitvā aññaṃ raṭṭhaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0514a1:226_8: Sarabhaṅgasatthā taṃ kāraṇaṃ ñatvā dve taruṇatāpase pesetvā “kisavacchaṃ mañcasivikāya ānethā”ti ākāsena āṇāpesi.
atk-s0514a1:226_9: Rājā yujjhitvā core gahetvā nagarameva paccāgami.
atk-s0514a1:226_10: Tasmiṃ āgate devatā paṭhamaṃ devaṃ vassāpesuṃ,
atk-s0514a1:226_17: Atha nesaṃ sarīre sampajjalitaṃ nānappakāraṃ āvudhavassaṃ vassi,
atk-s0514a1:226_19: Atha nesaṃ upari mahantamahantā vītaccitaṅgārā patiṃsu,
atk-s0514a1:226_21: tesaṃ upari saṭṭhihatthaṭṭhānaṃ pūrayantaṃ sukhumavālukavassaṃ vassi.
atk-s0514a1:227_0: Atha tassa raṭṭhassa anantararaṭṭhādhipatino kāliṅgo, aṭṭhako,
atk-s0514a1:227_2: “pubbe bārāṇasiyaṃ kalābukāsikarājā khantivāditāpase aparajjhitvā pathaviṃ paviṭṭhoti sūyati,
atk-s0514a1:227_5: idāni daṇḍakirājā kisavacche aparajjhitvā saha raṭṭhena vināsaṃ patto”ti sūyati.
atk-s0514a1:227_6: Imesaṃ pana catunnaṃ rājūnaṃ nibbattaṭṭhānaṃ mayaṃ na jānāma,
atk-s0514a1:227_7: taṃ no ṭhapetvā sarabhaṅgasatthāraṃ añño kathetuṃ samattho nāma natthi,
atk-s0514a1:227_9: Te tayopi mahantena parivārena pañhapucchanatthāya nikkhamiṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:227_13: Te rathehi otaritvā tayopi ekameva rathaṃ abhiruyha godhāvarinadītīraṃ sampāpuṇiṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:228_0: Tasmiṃ khaṇe sakko paṇḍukambalasilāsane nisinno satta pañhe cintetvā “ime pañhe ṭhapetvā sarabhaṅgasatthāraṃ
atk-s0514a1:228_1: añño sadevake loke kathetuṃ samattho nāma natthi,
atk-s0514a1:228_3: imepi tayo rājāno sarabhaṅgasatthāraṃ pañhaṃ pucchituṃ godhāvarinadītīraṃ pattā,
atk-s0514a1:228_4: etesaṃ pañhepi ahameva pucchissāmī”ti dvīsu devalokesu devatāhi parivuto devalokato otari.
atk-s0514a1:228_6: Tassa sarīrakiccaṃ kāretuṃ catūsu ṭhānesu anekasahassā isayo tattheva gantvā pañcasu ṭhānesu maṇḍapañca
atk-s0514a1:228_7: kāretvā anekasahassā isigaṇā kisavacchassa tāpasassa candanacitakaṃ katvā sarīraṃ jhāpesuṃ.
atk-s0514a1:228_8: Āḷāhanassa samantā aḍḍhayojanamatte ṭhāne dibbakusumavassaṃ vassi.
atk-s0514a1:228_9: Mahāsatto tassa sarīranikkhepaṃ kārāpetvā assamaṃ pavisitvā tehi isigaṇehi parivuto nisīdi.
atk-s0514a1:228_10: Tesampi rājūnaṃ nadītīraṃ āgatakāle mahāsenāvāhanatūriyasaddo ahosi.
atk-s0514a1:228_11: Mahāsatto taṃ sutvā anusissaṃ tāpasaṃ āmantetvā “tāta,
atk-s0514a1:228_14: So pānīyaghaṭaṃ ādāya tattha gantvā te rājāno disvā pucchanavasena paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:231_0: Rathesabhā tiṭṭhatha ke nu tumhe, kathaṃ vo jānanti manussaloke”ti.
atk-s0514a1:232_0: Tattha veḷuriyamuttātharukhaggabandhāti veḷuriyamaṇīhi ceva muttālambakehi ca alaṅkatatharūhi khaggaratanehi samannāgatā.
atk-s0514a1:233_0: Te tassa vacanaṃ sutvā rathā otaritvā vanditvā aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:233_1: Tesu aṭṭhakarājā tena saddhiṃ sallapanto dutiyaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:236_0: Susaññatānaṃ isīnaṃ dassanāya, idhāgatā pucchitāyemha pañhe”ti.
atk-s0514a1:237_0: Tattha uggatoti cando viya sūriyo viya ca pākaṭo paññāto.
atk-s0514a1:237_3: atha kho kāyādīhi susaññatānaṃ sīlasampannānaṃ isīnaṃ dassanatthāya idhāgatā.
atk-s0514a1:237_4: Pucchitāyemha pañheti sarabhaṅgasatthāraṃ pañhe pucchituṃ emha,
atk-s0514a1:238_2: tena hi nhatvā vissamitvā assamapadaṃ pavisitvā isigaṇaṃ vanditvā sarabhaṅgasatthārameva pañhaṃ pucchathā”ti
atk-s0514a1:238_3: tehi saddhiṃ paṭisanthāraṃ katvā pānīyaghaṭaṃ ukkhipitvā udakatheve puñchanto ākāsaṃ olokento sakkaṃ
atk-s0514a1:238_4: devarājānaṃ devagaṇaparivutaṃ erāvaṇakkhandhavaragataṃ otarantaṃ disvā tena saddhiṃ sallapanto tatiyaṃ
atk-s0514a1:241_0: Pucchāmi taṃ yakkha mahānubhāva, kataṃ taṃ jānanti manussaloke”ti.
atk-s0514a1:242_0: Tattha vehāyasanti abbhuggantvā antalikkhe ākāse tiṭṭhasi.
atk-s0514a1:246_0: Sa devarājā idamajja patto, susaññatānaṃ isīnaṃ dassanāyā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:247_0: Tattha sa devarājāti so ahaṃ sakko devarājā.
atk-s0514a1:247_1: Idamajja pattoti idaṃ ṭhānaṃ ajja āgato.
atk-s0514a1:247_2: Dassanāyāti dassanatthāya vandanatthāya sarabhaṅgasatthārañca pañhaṃ pucchanatthāyāti āha.
atk-s0514a1:248_1: tumhe pacchā āgacchathā”ti vatvā pānīyaghaṭaṃ ādāya assamapadaṃ pavisitvā pānīyaghaṭaṃ paṭisāmetvā tiṇṇaṃ
atk-s0514a1:248_2: rājūnaṃ devarājassa ca pañhapucchanatthāya āgatabhāvaṃ mahāsattassa ārocesi.
atk-s0514a1:248_4: Tayo rājāno āgantvā isigaṇaṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:248_5: Sakkopi otaritvā isigaṇaṃ upasaṅkamitvā añjaliṃ paggayha ṭhito isigaṇaṃ vaṇṇetvā vandamāno pañcamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:250_0: “Dūre sutā no isayo samāgatā, mahiddhikā iddhiguṇūpapannā;
atk-s0514a1:251_0: Vandāmi te ayire pasannacitto, ye jīvalokettha manussaseṭṭhā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:252_1: amhehi tumhe dūre devaloke ṭhitehiyeva sutāti mamāyanto evamāha.
atk-s0514a1:252_3: ime idha samāgatā amhākaṃ isayo dūre sutā yāva brahmalokā vissutā pākaṭāti.
atk-s0514a1:252_5: Iddhiguṇūpapannāti pañcavidhena iddhiguṇena samannāgatā. Ayireti, ayye.
atk-s0514a1:252_6: Yeti ye tumhe imasmiṃ jīvaloke manussesu seṭṭhāti.
atk-s0514a1:253_0: Evaṃ isigaṇaṃ vaṇṇetvā sakko cha nisajjadose pariharanto ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
atk-s0514a1:253_1: Atha naṃ isīnaṃ adhovāte nisinnaṃ disvā anusisso chaṭṭhaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:255_0: “Gandho isīnaṃ ciradikkhitānaṃ, kāyā cuto gacchati mālutena;
atk-s0514a1:256_0: Ito paṭikkamma sahassanetta, gandho isīnaṃ asuci devarājā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:257_3: Sakko hi amaccasahassehi cintitaṃ atthaṃ ekakova passati,
atk-s0514a1:257_5: Atha vā sahassanettānaṃ pana devānaṃ dassanūpacārātikkamanasamatthoti sahassanettā.
atk-s0514a1:260_0: “Gandho isīnaṃ ciradikkhitānaṃ, kāyā cuto gacchatu mālutena;
atk-s0514a1:261_0: Vicittapupphaṃ surabhiṃva mālaṃ, gandhañca etaṃ pāṭikaṅkhāma bhante;
atk-s0514a1:263_3: Etthāti etasmiṃ gandhe devā jigucchasaññino na honti.
atk-s0514a1:264_1: anusissa ahaṃ mahantena ussāhena pañhaṃ pucchituṃ āgato,
atk-s0514a1:264_3: So tassa vacanaṃ sutvā uṭṭhāyāsanā isigaṇaṃ okāsaṃ karonto gāthādvayamāha –
atk-s0514a1:266_0: “Purindado bhūtapatī yasassī, devānamindo sakko maghavā sujampati;
atk-s0514a1:267_0: Sa devarājā asuragaṇappamaddano, okāsamākaṅkhati pañha pucchituṃ.
atk-s0514a1:269_0: “Ko nevimesaṃ idha paṇḍitānaṃ, pañhe puṭṭho nipuṇe byākarissati;
atk-s0514a1:270_0: Tiṇañca raññaṃ manujādhipānaṃ, devānamindassa ca vāsavassā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:271_1: So hi pure dānaṃ dinnattā purindado,
atk-s0514a1:271_12: Imesaṃ catunnaṃ rājūnaṃ manaṃ gahetvā ko imesaṃ paṇḍitānaṃ isīnaṃ pañhe kathessati,
atk-s0514a1:271_13: pañhaṃ nesaṃ kathetuṃ samatthaṃ jānāthāti vadati.
atk-s0514a1:272_1: anusissa tvaṃ pathaviyaṃ ṭhatvā pathaviṃ apassanto viya kathesi,
atk-s0514a1:272_2: ṭhapetvā sarabhaṅgasatthāraṃ ko añño etesaṃ pañhaṃ kathetuṃ samattho”ti vatvā gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:274_0: “Ayaṃ isi sarabhaṅgo tapassī, yato jāto virato methunasmā;
atk-s0514a1:275_0: Āceraputto suvinītarūpo, so nesaṃ pañhāni viyākarissatī”ti.
atk-s0514a1:276_0: Tattha sarabhaṅgoti sare khipitvā ākāse sarapāsādādīni katvā puna ekena sarena te sare pātento bhaṅgavibhaṅge akāsīti sarabhaṅgo.
atk-s0514a1:277_0: Evañca pana vatvā isigaṇo anusissaṃ āha – “mārisa,
atk-s0514a1:277_1: tvameva satthāraṃ vanditvā isigaṇassa vacanena sakkena pucchitapañhakathanāya okāsaṃ kārehī”ti.
atk-s0514a1:277_2: So “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā satthāraṃ vanditvā okāsaṃ kārento anantaraṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:279_0: “Koṇḍañña pañhāni viyākarohi, yācanti taṃ isayo sādhurūpā;
atk-s0514a1:280_0: Koṇḍañña eso manujesu dhammo, yaṃ vuddhamāgacchati esa bhāro”ti.
atk-s0514a1:281_2: Yaṃ vuddhanti yaṃ paññāya vuddhaṃ purisaṃ esa pañhānaṃ vissajjanabhāro nāma āgacchati,
atk-s0514a1:281_4: tasmā candimasūriyasahassaṃ uṭṭhāpento viya pākaṭaṃ katvā devarañño pañhe kathehīti.
atk-s0514a1:282_0: Tato mahāpuriso okāsaṃ karonto anantaraṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:284_0: “Katāvakāsā pucchantu bhonto, yaṃ kiñci pañhaṃ manasābhipatthitaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:285_0: Ahañhi taṃ taṃ vo viyākarissaṃ, ñatvā sayaṃ lokamimaṃ parañcā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:286_0: Tattha yaṃ kiñcīti na kevalaṃ tumhākaṃyeva,
atk-s0514a1:286_1: atha kho sadevakassapi lokassa yaṃ manasābhipatthitaṃ,
atk-s0514a1:286_3: Ahañhi vo idhalokanissitaṃ vā paralokanissitaṃ vā sabbaṃ pañhaṃ imañca parañca lokaṃ sayaṃ paññāya sacchikatvā
atk-s0514a1:287_0: Evaṃ tena okāse kate sakko attanā abhisaṅkhataṃ pañhaṃ pucchi. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha –
atk-s0514a1:292_0: “Kiṃ sū vadhitvā na kadāci socati, kissappahānaṃ isayo vaṇṇayanti;
atk-s0514a1:293_0: Kassīdha vuttaṃ pharusaṃ khametha, akkhāhi me koṇḍañña etamattha”nti.
atk-s0514a1:294_0: Tattha yañcāsīti yaṃ tassa manasā abhipatthitaṃ āsi,
atk-s0514a1:294_2: Etanti etaṃ mayā pucchitamatthaṃ akkhāhi meti ekagāthāya tayo pañhe pucchi.
atk-s0514a1:297_0: “Kodhaṃ vadhitvā na kadāci socati, makkhappahānaṃ isayo vaṇṇayanti;
atk-s0514a1:298_0: Sabbesaṃ vuttaṃ pharusaṃ khametha, etaṃ khantiṃ uttamamāhu santo”ti.
atk-s0514a1:299_0: Tattha kodhaṃ vadhitvāti kodhaṃ māretvā chaḍḍetvā.
atk-s0514a1:299_4: Makkhappahānanti parehi attano kataguṇamakkhanalakkhaṇassa akataññubhāvasaṅkhātassa makkhassa pahānaṃ isayo vaṇṇayanti.
atk-s0514a1:299_5: Sabbesanti hīnamajjhimukkaṭṭhānaṃ sabbesampi pharusaṃ vacanaṃ khametha.
atk-s0514a1:302_0: “Sakkā ubhinnaṃ vacanaṃ titikkhituṃ, sadisassa vā seṭṭhatarassa vāpi;
atk-s0514a1:303_0: Kathaṃ nu hīnassa vaco khametha, akkhāhi me koṇḍañña etamattha”nti.
atk-s0514a1:306_0: “Bhayā hi seṭṭhassa vaco khametha, sārambhahetū pana sādisassa;
atk-s0514a1:307_0: Yo cīdha hīnassa vaco khametha, etaṃ khantiṃ uttamamāhu santo”ti. –
atk-s0514a1:309_4: kathaṃ sakkā attano hīnatarassa vacanaṃ adhivāsetuṃ,
atk-s0514a1:309_6: Etaṃ khantinti yadetaṃ jātigottādihīnassa vacanaṃ khamanaṃ,
atk-s0514a1:310_2: etaṃ khantiṃ uttamamāhu santo’ti vatvā idāni ‘yo cīdha hīnassa vaco khametha,
atk-s0514a1:310_6: pacchimaṃ mayā ‘ayaṃ hīno’ti ñatvā pharusavacanaṃ adhivāsentassa vasena vuttaṃ,
atk-s0514a1:310_7: yasmā pana na sakkā rūpadassanamattena sattānaṃ seṭṭhādibhāvo ñātuṃ,
atk-s0514a1:310_8: tasmā purimaṃ vutta”nti vatvā sattānaṃ aññatra saṃvāsā rūpadassanamattena seṭṭhādibhāvassa duviññeyyataṃ pakāsento gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:312_0: “Kathaṃ vijaññā catupattharūpaṃ, seṭṭhaṃ sarikkhaṃ athavāpi hīnaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:313_0: Virūparūpena caranti santo, tasmā hi sabbesaṃ vaco khamethā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:314_1: Virūparūpenāti virūpānaṃ lāmakapuggalānaṃ rūpena uttamaguṇā santopi vicaranti.
atk-s0514a1:315_1: etāya no khantiyā ānisaṃsaṃ kathehī”ti yāci.
atk-s0514a1:317_0: “Na hetamatthaṃ mahatīpi senā, sarājikā yujjhamānā labhetha;
atk-s0514a1:318_0: Yaṃ khantimā sappuriso labhetha, khantībalassūpasamanti verā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:320_0: Evaṃ mahāsattena khantiguṇe kathite te rājāno cintayiṃsu –
atk-s0514a1:320_3: Atha nesaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ viditvā sakko attanā abhisaṅkhate cattāro pañhe ṭhapetvāva tesaṃ kaṅkhaṃ pucchanto gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:322_0: “Subhāsitaṃ te anumodiyāna, aññaṃ taṃ pucchāmi tadiṅgha brūhi;
atk-s0514a1:323_0: Yathā ahuṃ daṇḍakī nāḷikero, athajjuno kalābu cāpi rājā;
atk-s0514a1:324_0: Tesaṃ gatiṃ brūhi supāpakamminaṃ, katthūpapannā isīnaṃ viheṭhakā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:325_0: Tattha anumodiyānāti idaṃ mayā puṭṭhānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ pañhānaṃ vissajjanasaṅkhātaṃ tava subhāsitaṃ anumoditvā.
atk-s0514a1:325_1: Yathā ahunti yathā cattāro janā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0514a1:326_0: Athassa vissajjento mahāsatto pañca gāthāyo abhāsi –
atk-s0514a1:328_0: “Kisañhi vacchaṃ avakiriya daṇḍakī, ucchinnamūlo sajano saraṭṭho;
atk-s0514a1:329_0: Kukkuḷanāme nirayamhi paccati, tassa phuliṅgāni patanti kāye.
atk-s0514a1:331_0: “Yo saññate pabbajite aheṭhayi, dhammaṃ bhaṇante samaṇe adūsake;
atk-s0514a1:332_0: Taṃ nāḷikeraṃ sunakhā parattha, saṅgamma khādanti viphandamānaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:335_0: Aṅgīrasaṃ gotamaṃ heṭhayitvā, khantiṃ tapassiṃ cirabrahmacāriṃ.
atk-s0514a1:337_0: “Yo khaṇḍaso pabbajitaṃ achedayi, khantiṃ vadantaṃ samaṇaṃ adūsakaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:338_0: Kalābuvīciṃ upapajja paccati, mahāpatāpaṃ kaṭukaṃ bhayānakaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:340_0: “Etāni sutvā nirayāni paṇḍito, aññāni pāpiṭṭhatarāni cettha;
atk-s0514a1:341_0: Dhammaṃ care samaṇabrāhmaṇesu, evaṃkaro saggamupeti ṭhāna”nti.
atk-s0514a1:342_1: Avakiriyāti avakiritvā niṭṭhubhanadantakaṭṭhapātanena tassa sarīre kaliṃ pavāhetvā.
atk-s0514a1:342_6: Tassa kira tattha uṇhakukkuḷe nimuggassa navahi vaṇamukhehi uṇhā chārikā pavisanti,
atk-s0514a1:342_8: Tesaṃ pana patanakāle sakalasarīraṃ dīparukkho viya jalati,
atk-s0514a1:342_11: Sarabhaṅgasatthā pathaviṃ bhinditvā taṃ tattha tathāpaccamānaṃ dassesi,
atk-s0514a1:342_13: Tassa ativiya bhītabhāvaṃ ñatvā mahāsatto taṃ nirayaṃ antaradhāpesi.
atk-s0514a1:343_5: Saṅgammāti ito cito ca samāgantvā chinditvā mahantamahantā sunakhā khādanti.
atk-s0514a1:343_6: Tasmiṃ kira kaliṅgaraṭṭhe dantapuranagare nāḷikere nāma raññe rajjaṃ kārayamāne eko mahātāpaso pañcasatatāpasaparivuto
atk-s0514a1:343_7: himavantā āgamma rājuyyāne vāsaṃ kappetvā mahājanassa dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0514a1:343_9: Rājā pana adhammiko adhammena rajjaṃ kāresi.
atk-s0514a1:343_10: So amaccesu tāpasaṃ pasaṃsantesu “ahampi dhammaṃ suṇissāmī”ti uyyānaṃ gantvā tāpasaṃ vanditvā nisīdi.
atk-s0514a1:343_11: Tāpaso raññā saddhiṃ paṭisanthāraṃ karonto “kiṃ, mahārāja,
atk-s0514a1:343_14: So tassa kujjhitvā “ayaṃ kūṭajaṭilo ettakaṃ kālaṃ nāgarānaṃ santike mamaññeva aguṇaṃ kathesi maññe,
atk-s0514a1:343_15: hotu jānissāmī”ti cintetvā “sve amhākaṃ gharadvāraṃ āgaccheyyāthā”ti nimantetvā punadivase purāṇagūthassa
atk-s0514a1:343_16: cāṭiyo paripūrāpetvā tāpasesu āgatesu tesaṃ bhikkhābhājanāni gūthassa pūrāpetvā dvāraṃ pidahāpetvā musalāni
atk-s0514a1:343_17: ca lohadaṇḍe ca gāhāpetvā isīnaṃ sīsāni bhindāpetvā jaṭāsu gāhāpetvā kaḍḍhāpetvā sunakhehi khādāpetvā
atk-s0514a1:343_18: tattheva bhinnaṃ pathaviṃ pavisitvā sunakhamahāniraye nibbattati,
atk-s0514a1:343_20: Atha naṃ mahantamahantā mahāhatthippamāṇā pañcavaṇṇā sunakhā anubandhitvā ḍaṃsitvā navayojanāya jalitaayapathaviyā
atk-s0514a1:343_22: Mahāsatto pathaviṃ dvidhā bhinditvā taṃ nirayaṃ dassetvā mahājanassa bhītabhāvaṃ ñatvā antaradhāpesi.
atk-s0514a1:344_2: Heṭhayitvāti viheṭhetvā visapītakaṇḍena vijjhitvā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpetvā.
atk-s0514a1:344_3: So kira ajjuno nāma rājā mahisakaraṭṭhe ketakarājadhāniyaṃ rajjaṃ kārento migavaṃ gantvā mige vadhitvā aṅgārapakkamaṃsaṃ khādanto vicari.
atk-s0514a1:344_4: Athekadivasaṃ migānaṃ āgamanaṭṭhāne koṭṭhakaṃ katvā mige olokayamāno aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0514a1:344_5: Tadā so tāpaso tassa rañño avidūre ekaṃ kārarukkhaṃ abhiruhitvā phalāni ocinanto ocinitaphalasākhaṃ muñci.
atk-s0514a1:344_6: Tassā vissaṭṭhāya saddena taṃṭhānaṃ pattā migā palāyiṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:344_7: Rājā kujjhitvā tāpasaṃ visamissitena sallena vijjhi.
atk-s0514a1:344_8: So parigalitvā patanto matthakena khadirakhāṇukaṃ āsādetvā sūlaggeyeva kālamakāsi.
atk-s0514a1:344_9: Rājā taṅkhaṇeyeva dvidhā bhinnaṃ pathaviṃ pavisitvā sattisūlaniraye nibbatti,
atk-s0514a1:344_11: Tatra taṃ nirayapālā jalitehi āvudhehi koṭṭetvā jalitaṃ ayapabbataṃ āropenti.
atk-s0514a1:344_14: Tasmiṃ khaṇe heṭṭhā navayojanāya jalitaayapathaviyā mahātālakkhandhappamāṇaṃ jalitaṃ ayasūlaṃ uṭṭhahati.
atk-s0514a1:344_20: Mahāsatto pathaviṃ dvidhā katvā taṃ nirayaṃ dassetvā mahājanassa bhītabhāvaṃ ñatvā antaradhāpesi.
atk-s0514a1:345_0: Khaṇḍasoti cattāro hatthapāde kaṇṇanāsañca khaṇḍākhaṇḍaṃ katvā.
atk-s0514a1:345_2: Tathā chedāpetvā dvīhi kasāhi pahārasahassehi tāḷāpetvā jaṭāsu gahetvā ākaḍḍhāpetvā paṭikujjaṃ nipajjāpetvā
atk-s0514a1:345_6: evarūpaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjitvā channaṃ jālānaṃ antare paccati.
atk-s0514a1:345_7: Vitthārato pana kalāburañño vatthu khantivādijātake kathitameva.
atk-s0514a1:345_8: Aññāni pāpiṭṭhatarāni cetthāti etehi nirayehi pāpiṭṭhatarāni ca aññāni nirayāni sutvā.
atk-s0514a1:345_11: paṇḍito kulaputto na kevalaṃ eteyeva cattāro nirayā,
atk-s0514a1:345_14: aññepi ca rājāno nirayesu uppannāti viditvā catupaccayadānadhammikārakkhāvaraṇasaṃvidhānasaṅkhātaṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇesu dhammaṃ careyyāti.
atk-s0514a1:346_0: Evaṃ mahāsattena catunnaṃ rājūnaṃ nibbattaṭṭhāne dassite tayo rājāno nikkaṅkhā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0514a1:346_1: Tato sakko avasese cattāro pañhe pucchanto gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:348_0: “Subhāsitaṃ te anumodiyāna, aññaṃ taṃ pucchāmi tadiṅgha brūhi;
atk-s0514a1:349_0: Kathaṃvidhaṃ sīlavantaṃ vadanti, kathaṃvidhaṃ paññavantaṃ vadanti;
atk-s0514a1:350_0: Kathaṃvidhaṃ sappurisaṃ vadanti, kathaṃvidhaṃ no siri no jahātī”ti.
atk-s0514a1:351_0: Tattha kathaṃvidhaṃ no siri no jahātīti kathaṃvidhaṃ nu purisaṃ paṭiladdhasirī na jahātīti.
atk-s0514a1:352_0: Athassa vissajjento mahāsatto catasso gāthāyo abhāsi –
atk-s0514a1:354_0: “Kāyena vācāya ca yodha saññato, manasā ca kiñci na karoti pāpaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:355_0: Na attahetū alikaṃ bhaṇeti, tathāvidhaṃ sīlavantaṃ vadanti.
atk-s0514a1:358_0: Kālāgataṃ atthapadaṃ na riñcati, tathāvidhaṃ paññavantaṃ vadanti.
atk-s0514a1:360_0: “Yo ve kataññū katavedi dhīro, kalyāṇamitto daḷhabhatti ca hoti;
atk-s0514a1:361_0: Dukhitassa sakkacca karoti kiccaṃ, tathāvidhaṃ sappurisaṃ vadanti.
atk-s0514a1:363_0: “Etehi sabbehi guṇehupeto, saddho mudū saṃvibhāgī vadaññū;
atk-s0514a1:364_0: Saṅgāhakaṃ sakhilaṃ saṇhavācaṃ, tathāvidhaṃ no siri no jahātī”ti.
atk-s0514a1:365_2: attahetu vā parahetu vā yasahetu vā dhanahetu vā lābhahetu vā āmisakiñcikkhahetu vā alikaṃ na kathetīti attho.
atk-s0514a1:365_4: musāvādino pana akattabbaṃ pāpaṃ nāma natthīti garubhāvadīpanatthaṃ puna evamāhāti veditabbo.
atk-s0514a1:366_0: Gambhīrapañhanti atthato ca pāḷito ca gambhīraṃ guḷhaṃ paṭicchannaṃ sattubhastajātaka-
atk-s0514a1:366_3: Manasābhicintayanti manasā abhicintento atthaṃ paṭivijjhitvā candasahassaṃ sūriyasahassaṃ uṭṭhāpento viya pākaṭaṃ katvā yo kathetuṃ sakkotīti attho.
atk-s0514a1:366_5: hitātikkantaṃ luddaṃ pharusaṃ sāhasikakammañca yo na karotīti attho.
atk-s0514a1:367_0: “Na paṇḍitā attasukhassa hetu, pāpāni kammāni samācaranti;
atk-s0514a1:368_0: Dukkhena phuṭṭhā piḷitāpi santā, chandā dosā ca na jahanti dhamma”nti. –
atk-s0514a1:370_6: vipassanācārasmiṃ yuñjanakāle cāti imāni dānādīni sampādento kālāgataṃ atthapadaṃ na riñcati na hāpeti na gaḷāpeti nāma.
atk-s0514a1:370_7: Tathāvidhanti sakka sabbaññubuddhā ca paccekabuddhā ca bodhisattā ca paññavantaṃ kathentā evarūpaṃ puggalaṃ kathenti.
atk-s0514a1:371_0: “Yo ve”ti gāthāya parena attano kataguṇaṃ jānātīti kataññū.
atk-s0514a1:371_1: Evaṃ ñatvā pana yenassa guṇo kato,
atk-s0514a1:371_3: Dukhitassāti attano sahāyassa dukkhappattassa dukkhaṃ attani āropetvā yo tassa uppannakiccaṃ sahatthena sakkaccaṃ karoti,
atk-s0514a1:371_5: Apica sappurisā nāma kataññū katavedino hontīti satapattajātaka-
atk-s0514a1:371_8: Etehi sabbehīti sakka yo etehi heṭṭhā vuttehi sīlādīhi sabbehipi guṇehi upeto.
atk-s0514a1:371_13: Catūhi saṅgahavatthūhi tesaṃ tesaṃ saṅgaṇhanato saṅgāhakaṃ,
atk-s0514a1:371_15: maṭṭhavacanatāya saṇhavācaṃ tathāvidhaṃ nu puggalaṃ adhigatayasasobhaggasaṅkhātā sirī no jahāti,
atk-s0514a1:372_0: Evaṃ mahāsatto gaganatale puṇṇacandaṃ uṭṭhāpento viya cattāro pañhe vissajjesi.
atk-s0514a1:372_1: Tato paraṃ sesapañhānaṃ pucchā ca vissajjanañca hoti –
atk-s0514a1:374_0: “Subhāsitaṃ te anumodiyāna, aññaṃ taṃ pucchāmi tadiṅgha brūhi;
atk-s0514a1:375_0: Sīlaṃ siriñcāpi satañca dhammaṃ, paññañca kaṃ seṭṭhataraṃ vadanti.
atk-s0514a1:377_0: “Paññā hi seṭṭhā kusalā vadanti, nakkhattarājāriva tārakānaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:378_0: Sīlaṃ sirī cāpi satañca dhammo, anvāyikā paññavato bhavanti.
atk-s0514a1:380_0: “Subhāsitaṃ te anumodiyāna, aññaṃ taṃ pucchāmi tadiṅgha brūhi;
atk-s0514a1:381_0: Kathaṃkaro kintikaro kimācaraṃ, kiṃ sevamāno labhatīdha paññaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:382_0: Paññāya dānippaṭipadaṃ vadehi, kathaṃkaro paññavā hoti macco.
atk-s0514a1:384_0: “Sevetha vuddhe nipuṇe bahussute, uggāhako ca paripucchako siyā;
atk-s0514a1:385_0: Suṇeyya sakkacca subhāsitāni, evaṃkaro paññavā hoti macco.
atk-s0514a1:387_0: “Sa paññavā kāmaguṇe avekkhati, aniccato dukkhato rogato ca;
atk-s0514a1:388_0: Evaṃ vipassī pajahāti chandaṃ, dukkhesu kāmesu mahabbhayesu.
atk-s0514a1:390_0: “Sa vītarāgo pavineyya dosaṃ, mettaṃ cittaṃ bhāvaye appamāṇaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:391_0: Sabbesu bhūtesu nidhāya daṇḍaṃ, anindito brahmamupeti ṭhāna”nti.
atk-s0514a1:392_4: Evaṃ imesaṃ catunnaṃ dhammānaṃ kataraṃ dhammaṃ seṭṭhataraṃ vadantīti pucchati.
atk-s0514a1:392_6: etesu catūsu dhammesu yā esā paññā nāma,
atk-s0514a1:392_11: Evaṃ sīlañca sirī cāpi satañca dhammoti ete tayopi anvāyikā paññavato bhavanti paññavantameva anugacchanti,
atk-s0514a1:393_1: Kathaṃkaroti kiṃ nāma kammaṃ karonto kiṃ ācaranto kiṃ sevamāno bhajamāno payirupāsamāno idhaloke paññaṃ labhati,
atk-s0514a1:393_4: kathaṃkaro macco paññavā nāma hotīti pucchati.
atk-s0514a1:393_7: Evaṃkaroti yo puggalo evaṃ vuttappakāre puggale sevati bhajati payirupāsati,
atk-s0514a1:393_10: pāsāṇe lekhaṃ khaṇanto viya kañcananāḷiyā sīhavasaṃ sampaṭicchanto viya ohitasoto sakkaccaṃ subhāsitāni suṇāti,
atk-s0514a1:394_0: Evaṃ mahāsatto pācīnalokadhātuto sūriyaṃ uṭṭhāpento viya paññāya paṭipadaṃ kathetvā idāni tassā paññāya guṇaṃ kathento “sa paññavā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0514a1:394_1: Tattha kāmaguṇeti kāmakoṭṭhāse hutvā abhāvaṭṭhena aniccato,
atk-s0514a1:394_3: aṭṭhanavutiyā rogamukhānaṃ kāme nissāya uppattisambhavena rogato ca avekkhati oloketi,
atk-s0514a1:394_4: so evaṃ vipassī etehi kāraṇehi kāmānaṃ aniccāditaṃ passanto “kāme nissāya uppajjanakadukkhānaṃ anto natthi,
atk-s0514a1:394_5: kāmānaṃ pahānameva sukha”nti viditvā dukkhesu kāmesu mahabbhayesu chandaṃ pajahāti.
atk-s0514a1:394_7: so puggalo evaṃ vītarāgo navāghātavatthuvasena uppajjanakasabhāvadosaṃ vinetvā mettacittaṃ bhāveyya,
atk-s0514a1:394_8: appamāṇasattārammaṇattā appamāṇaṃ taṃ bhāvetvā aparihīnajjhāno agarahito brahmaloke uppajjatī”ti.
atk-s0514a1:395_0: Evaṃ mahāsatte kāmānaṃ dosaṃ kathenteyeva tesaṃ tiṇṇampi rājūnaṃ sabalakāyānaṃ tadaṅgappahānena pañcakāmaguṇarāgo pahīno.
atk-s0514a1:395_1: Taṃ ñatvā mahāsatto tesaṃ pahaṃsanavasena gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:398_0: Kāliṅgarājassa ca uggatassa, sabbesa vo kāmarāgo pahīno”ti.
atk-s0514a1:400_0: Taṃ sutvā rājāno mahāsattassa thutiṃ karontā gāthamāhaṃsu –
atk-s0514a1:403_0: Karohi okāsamanuggahāya, yathā gatiṃ te abhisambhavemā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:404_0: Tattha anuggahāyāti pabbajjatthāya okāsaṃ no karohi.
atk-s0514a1:404_1: Yathā mayaṃ pabbajitvā tava gatiṃ nipphattiṃ abhisambhavema pāpuṇeyyāma,
atk-s0514a1:405_0: Atha nesaṃ okāsaṃ karonto mahāsatto itaraṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:407_0: “Karomi okāsamanuggahāya, tathā hi vo kāmarāgo pahīno;
atk-s0514a1:408_0: Pharātha kāyaṃ vipulāya pītiyā, yathā gatiṃ me abhisambhavethā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:409_0: Tattha pharātha kāyanti jhānapītiyā vipulāya kāyaṃ pharathāti.
atk-s0514a1:412_0: “Sabbaṃ karissāma tavānusāsaniṃ, yaṃ yaṃ tuvaṃ vakkhasi bhūripañña;
atk-s0514a1:413_0: Pharāma kāyaṃ vipulāya pītiyā, yathā gatiṃ te abhisambhavemā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:414_0: Atha nesaṃ sabalakāyānaṃ mahāsatto pabbajjaṃ dāpetvā isigaṇaṃ uyyojento gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:416_0: “Katāya vacchassa kisassa pūjā, gacchantu bhonto isayo sādhurūpā;
atk-s0514a1:417_0: Jhāne ratā hotha sadā samāhitā, esā ratī pabbajitassa seṭṭhā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:418_0: Tattha gacchantūti attano attano vasanaṭṭhānāni gacchantu.
atk-s0514a1:419_0: Isayo tassa sarabhaṅgasatthuno vacanaṃ sirasā sampaṭicchitvā vanditvā ākāsaṃ uppatitvā sakāni vasanaṭṭhānāni gamiṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:419_1: Sakkopi uṭṭhāyāsanā mahāsattassa thutiṃ katvā añjaliṃ paggayha sūriyaṃ namassanto viya mahāsattaṃ namassamāno sapariso pakkāmi.
atk-s0514a1:419_2: Etamatthaṃ viditvā satthā imā gāthāyo abhāsi –
atk-s0514a1:422_0: Te vedajātā anumodamānā, pakkāmu devā devapuraṃ yasassino.
atk-s0514a1:424_0: “Gāthā imā atthavatī subyañjanā, subhāsitā isinā paṇḍitena;
atk-s0514a1:425_0: Yo kocimā aṭṭhikatvā suṇeyya, labhetha pubbāpariyaṃ visesaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:426_0: Laddhāna pubbāpariyaṃ visesaṃ, adassanaṃ maccurājassa gacche”ti.
atk-s0514a1:427_1: Gāthā imāti idaṃ satthā sarabhaṅgasatthuno nibbānadāyakaṃ subhāsitaṃ vaṇṇento āha.
atk-s0514a1:427_5: Aṭṭhikatvāti attano atthikabhāvaṃ katvā atthiko hutvā sakkaccaṃ suṇeyya.
atk-s0514a1:427_9: tatiyajjhānaṃ aparavisesoti evaṃ aṭṭhasamāpatticatumaggavasena pubbāparabhāvena ṭhitaṃ visesaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:427_10: Adassananti pariyosāne aparavisesaṃ arahattaṃ labhitvā nibbānaṃ pāpuṇeyya.
atk-s0514a1:427_11: Nibbānappatto hi puggalo maccurājassa adassanaṃ gato nāma hotīti.
atk-s0514a1:428_0: Evaṃ satthā arahattena desanāya kūṭaṃ gaṇhitvā “na,
atk-s0514a1:428_2: pubbepi moggallānassa āḷāhane pupphavassaṃ vassī”ti vatvā saccāni pakāsetvā jātakaṃ samodhānento āha –
atk-s0514a1:431_0: Pabbato anuruddho ca, kaccāyano ca devalo;
atk-s0514a1:439_0: Athabravīti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto purāṇadutiyikāpalobhanaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0514a1:439_2: Satthā pana taṃ bhikkhuṃ “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ, bhikkhu,
atk-s0514a1:439_4: bhante”ti vutte “kena ukkaṇṭhāpitosī”ti vatvā “purāṇadutiyikāyā”ti vutte “bhikkhu esā itthī tuyhaṃ anatthakārikā,
atk-s0514a1:439_5: tvaṃ etaṃ nissāya jhānaṃ nāsetvā tīṇi saṃvaccharāni mūḷho visaññī nipajjitvā uppannāya saññāya mahāparidevaṃ paridevī”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0514a1:440_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto kāsiraṭṭhe brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā vayappatto
atk-s0514a1:440_1: sabbasippesu nipphattiṃ patvā isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā araññāyatane vanamūlaphalāhāro yāpesi.
atk-s0514a1:440_2: Athekā migī tassa passāvaṭṭhāne sambhavamissakaṃ tiṇaṃ khāditvā udakaṃ pivi.
atk-s0514a1:440_3: Ettakeneva ca tasmiṃ paṭibaddhacittā gabbhaṃ paṭilabhitvā tato paṭṭhāya katthaci agantvā tattheva tiṇaṃ khāditvā assamassa sāmanteyeva vicarati.
atk-s0514a1:440_8: Atha naṃ mahāsatto viññutappattaṃ pabbājetvā attano mahallakakāle taṃ ādāya nārivanaṃ nāma gantvā, “tāta,
atk-s0514a1:440_9: imasmiṃ himavante imehi pupphehi sadisā itthiyo nāma honti,
atk-s0514a1:440_10: tā attano vasaṃ gate mahāvināsaṃ pāpenti,
atk-s0514a1:440_11: na tāsaṃ vasaṃ nāma gantuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti ovaditvā aparabhāge brahmalokaparāyaṇo ahosi.
atk-s0514a1:441_0: Isisiṅgopi jhānakīḷaṃ kīḷanto himavantappadese vāsaṃ kappesi.
atk-s0514a1:441_3: sakko āvajjento taṃ kāraṇaṃ ñatvā “ayaṃ maṃ sakkattā cāveyya,
atk-s0514a1:441_4: ekaṃ accharaṃ pesetvā sīlamassa bhindāpessāmī”ti sakaladevalokaṃ upaparikkhanto attano aḍḍhateyyakoṭisaṅkhānaṃ
atk-s0514a1:441_5: paricārikānaṃ majjhe ekaṃ alambusaṃ nāma accharaṃ ṭhapetvā aññaṃ tassa sīlaṃ bhindituṃ samatthaṃ adisvā
atk-s0514a1:441_6: taṃ pakkosāpetvā tassa sīlabhedaṃ kātuṃ āṇāpesi.
atk-s0514a1:445_2: Jayataṃ pitāti jayantānaṃ jayappattānaṃ sesānaṃ tettiṃsāya devaputtānaṃ pitukiccasādhanena pitā.
atk-s0514a1:445_3: Parābhetvāti hadayaṃ bhinditvā olokento viya taṃ “paṭibalā aya”nti ñatvāti attho.
atk-s0514a1:446_0: Paṇḍukambalasilāsane nisinno taṃ alambusaṃ pakkosāpetvā idamāha –
atk-s0514a1:450_2: sabbā panitthiyo purise kilesamissanena missanato “missā”ti vuccanti,
atk-s0514a1:450_5: Isisiṅganti tassa kira matthake migasiṅgākārena dve cūḷā uṭṭhahiṃsu,
atk-s0514a1:451_0: Iti sakko “gaccha isisiṅgaṃ upasaṅkamitvā attano vasaṃ ānetvā sīlamassa bhindā”ti alambusaṃ āṇāpesi.
atk-s0514a1:454_0: Nibbānābhirato vuddho, tassa maggāni āvarā”ti. – vacanaṃ āha;
atk-s0514a1:455_0: Tattha purāyanti ayaṃ tāpaso vattasampanno ca brahmacariyavā ca,
atk-s0514a1:455_1: so panesa dīghāyukatāya nibbānasaṅkhāte magge abhirato guṇavuddhiyā ca vuddho.
atk-s0514a1:455_4: tāvadeva tvaṃ gantvā tassa devalokagamanāni maggāni āvara,
atk-s0514a1:462_0: Tāsampi hotu pariyāyo, tāpi yantu palobhanā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:463_0: Tattha kimeva tvanti kiṃ nāmetaṃ tvaṃ karosīti dīpeti.
atk-s0514a1:463_1: Mameva tuvaṃ sikkhasīti imasmiṃ sakaladevaloke mameva tuvaṃ ikkhasi,
atk-s0514a1:463_2: aññaṃ na passasīti adhippāyena vadati. Sa-
atk-s0514a1:463_4: Isippalobhane gacchāti kiṃkāraṇā maññeva evaṃ vadesīti adhippāyo.
atk-s0514a1:466_0: “Addhā hi saccaṃ bhaṇasi, santi aññāpi accharā;
atk-s0514a1:467_0: Tādisiyo pavarā ceva, asoke nandane vane.
atk-s0514a1:469_0: “Na tā evaṃ pajānanti, pāricariyaṃ pumaṃ gatā;
atk-s0514a1:474_0: Tattha pumaṃ gatāti purisaṃ upasaṅkamantā samānā purisapalobhinipāricariyaṃ na jānanti.
atk-s0514a1:474_2: Savasamānayissasīti taṃ tāpasaṃ attano vasaṃ ānessasīti.
atk-s0514a1:475_0: Taṃ sutvā alambusā dve gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0514a1:478_0: Vibhemi cetaṃ āsāduṃ, uggatejo hi brāhmaṇo.
atk-s0514a1:482_0: Tattha na vāhanti na ve ahaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:482_5: apicāhaṃ taṃ isiṃ sīlabhedanatthāya allīyituṃ bhāyāmi,
atk-s0514a1:482_9: mohena isiṃ palobhetvā saṃsāraṃ āpannā vaṭṭadukkhe patiṭṭhitā sattā gaṇanapathaṃ atikkantā.
atk-s0514a1:482_12: “tassa kirāhaṃ sīlaṃ bhindissāmī”ti cintayamānāya me lomāni pahaṃsantīti vadati.
atk-s0514a1:491_0: Aggiṭṭhaṃ parimajjantaṃ, isisiṅgaṃ upāgamī”ti. – imā abhisambuddhagāthā;
atk-s0514a1:492_1: āvajjeyyāsi manti attano sayanagabbhaṃ pavisitvā alaṅkaritvā isisiṅgaṃ kilesena missituṃ icchantī pakkāmi,
atk-s0514a1:492_10: Rattiṃ padhānamanuyuñjitvā pātova nhatvā udakakiccaṃ katvā paṇṇasālāyaṃ thokaṃ jhānasukhena vītināmetvā
atk-s0514a1:492_11: nikkhamitvā aggisālaṃ sammajjantaṃ taṃ isisiṅgaṃ sā upāgami,
atk-s0514a1:502_0: Gamanā kāmanīyā te, harantiyeva me mano.
atk-s0514a1:505_0: Vimaṭṭhā tuyhaṃ sussoṇī, akkhassa phalakaṃ yathā.
atk-s0514a1:520_0: Āyatā ca visālā ca, nettā tava sudassanā.
atk-s0514a1:529_0: Ko vā tvaṃ kassa vā putto, kathaṃ jānemu taṃ maya”nti.
atk-s0514a1:530_6: Suppatiṭṭhitāti samaṃ pathaviṃ phusantā suṭṭhu patiṭṭhitā.
atk-s0514a1:530_9: Harantiyeva me manoti ete evarūpena paramena itthivilāsena caṅkamantiyā tava pādā mama cittaṃ harantiyeva.
atk-s0514a1:530_12: Akkhassāti sundaravaṇṇassa akkhassa suvaṇṇaphalakaṃ viya visālā te soṇīti vadati.
atk-s0514a1:531_1: Te hi dve hutvā ure jātā vaṇṭassa abhāvā avaṇṭā,
atk-s0514a1:531_2: ure laggā eva hutvā suṭṭhu nikkhantattā sādhupaccudā,
atk-s0514a1:531_5: amilātatāya vā alambanatāya vā na anto paviṭṭhāti apatitā,
atk-s0514a1:531_6: suvaṇṇaphalake ṭhapitasuvaṇṇamayavaṭṭaalābuno aḍḍhena sadisatāya aḍḍhalābusamā thanā.
atk-s0514a1:531_7: Eṇeyyakā yathāti eṇīmigassa hi dīghā ca vaṭṭā ca gīvā sobhati yathā,
atk-s0514a1:532_8: Kasigorakkhāti iminā kasiñca gorakkhañca nissāya jīvanakasatte dasseti.
atk-s0514a1:532_11: vitthārīkatā imasmiṃ himavante yattakā isayo vasantīti attho.
atk-s0514a1:532_12: Na te samasamanti tesu sabbesu ekampi rūpalīḷāvilāsādisamatāya tayā samānaṃ na passāmi.
atk-s0514a1:532_13: Ko vā tvanti idaṃ tassā itthibhāvaṃ jānanto purisavohāravasena pucchati.
atk-s0514a1:533_0: Evaṃ pādato paṭṭhāya yāva kesā attano vaṇṇaṃ bhāsante tāpase alambusā tuṇhī hutvā tassā kathāya yathānusandhiṃ
atk-s0514a1:537_0: Ehi taṃ upagūhissaṃ, ratīnaṃ kusalo bhavā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:538_0: Tattha kassapevaṃ gate satīti kassapagotta evaṃ tava citte pavatte sati pañhakālo na hoti.
atk-s0514a1:539_3: Sā itthimāyākusalatāya tāpasaṃ anupasaṅkamitvā āgatamaggābhimukhī pāyāsi.
atk-s0514a1:543_0: Atha naṃ tāpaso gacchantiṃ disvā “ayaṃ gacchatī”ti attano dandhaparakkamaṃ mandagamanaṃ chinditvā vegena dhāvitvā kesesu hatthena parāmasi.
atk-s0514a1:549_0: Cavitamhi brahmacariyā, yathā taṃ atha tositā.
atk-s0514a1:566_0: “Na juhe na jape mante, aggihuttaṃ pahāpitaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:567_0: Ko nu me pāricariyāya, pubbe cittaṃ palobhayi.
atk-s0514a1:569_0: “Araññe me viharato, yo me tejā ha sambhutaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:571_1: Tamudāvatta kalyāṇīti taṃ kese parāmasitvā ṭhitaṃ isiṃ udāvattitvā nivattitvā kalyāṇadassanā sā suṭṭhu sobhanā.
atk-s0514a1:571_7: Tasmiṃ tamhā jhānā brahmacariyā cavite yathā taṃ sakkena patthitaṃ,
atk-s0514a1:571_9: Atha sakkassa patthanāya samiddhabhāvaṃ viditvā sā devakaññā tositā,
atk-s0514a1:572_0: Manasā agamāti sā taṃ āliṅgitvā ṭhitā “aho vata sakko pallaṅkaṃ me peseyyā”ti evaṃ pavattena manasā indaṃ agamā.
atk-s0514a1:572_1: Nandane vaneti nandijananasamatthatāya nandanavanasaṅkhāte tāvatiṃsabhavane vasantaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:572_8: Tamenaṃ tatthāti taṃ isisiṅgaṃ tattha dibbapallaṅke nisinnā sā ure katvā dhāresi.
atk-s0514a1:572_9: Tīṇi vassānīti ekamuhuttaṃ viya manussagaṇanāya tīṇi vassāni taṃ ure nipajjāpetvā tattha nisinnā dhāresi.
atk-s0514a1:573_1: So hi tīṇi saṃvaccharāni visañño sayitvā pacchā paṭiladdhasañño pabujjhi.
atk-s0514a1:573_2: Tasmiṃ pabujjhamāne hatthādiphandanaṃ disvāva alambusā tassa pabujjhanabhāvaṃ ñatvā pallaṅkaṃ antaradhāpetvā sayampi antarahitā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0514a1:573_3: Addasāsīti so assamapadaṃ olokento “kena nu khomhi sīlavināsaṃ pāpito”ti cintetvā mahantena saddena paridevamāno addasāsi.
atk-s0514a1:573_4: Haritarukkheti aggiyāyanasaṅkhātaṃ aggisālaṃ samantā parivāretvā ṭhite haritapattarukkhe.
atk-s0514a1:574_0: Na juhe na jape manteti ayamassa paridevanagāthā.
atk-s0514a1:574_3: Pāricariyāyāti ko nu kilesapāricariyāya ito pubbe mama cittaṃ palobhayīti paridevati.
atk-s0514a1:574_4: Yo me tejā ha sambhutanti ha-
atk-s0514a1:574_6: Yo mama samaṇatejena sambhūtaṃ jhānaguṇaṃ nānāratanaparipuṇṇaṃ mahantaṃ mahaṇṇave nāvaṃ viya gaṇhi,
atk-s0514a1:578_0: Avadhiṃ cittaṃ cittena, pamādo tvaṃ na bujjhasī”ti.
atk-s0514a1:579_0: So tassā kathaṃ sutvā pitarā dinnaovādaṃ saritvā “pitu vacanaṃ akatvā mahāvināsaṃ pattomhī”ti paridevanto catasso gāthāyo abhāsi –
atk-s0514a1:585_0: Iccānusāsi maṃ tāto, yathā maṃ anukampako.
atk-s0514a1:591_0: Puna vā tādiso hessaṃ, maraṇaṃ me bhavissatī”ti.
atk-s0514a1:592_3: Tāyo bujjhesi māṇavāti māṇava tvaṃ tāyo jāneyyāsi,
atk-s0514a1:592_4: ñatvā dassanapathaṃ agantvā palāpeyyāsīti yāni evarūpāni vacanāni tadā maṃ tāto anusāsati,
atk-s0514a1:592_8: tāyo attano vasaṃ gate vināsaṃ pāpentīti tvaṃ jāneyyāsi.
atk-s0514a1:592_11: Dhiratthu jīvitena meti dhiratthu garahitaṃ mama jīvitaṃ,
atk-s0514a1:593_0: So kāmarāgaṃ pahāya puna jhānaṃ uppādesi.
atk-s0514a1:593_1: Athassa samaṇatejaṃ disvā jhānassa ca uppāditabhāvaṃ ñatvā alambusā bhītā khamāpesi.
atk-s0514a1:593_2: Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā dve gāthāyo abhāsi –
atk-s0514a1:598_0: “Mā me kujjha mahāvīra, mā me kujjha mahāise;
atk-s0514a1:599_0: Mahā attho mayā ciṇṇo, tidasānaṃ yasassinaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:600_0: Tayā pakampitaṃ āsi, sabbaṃ devapuraṃ tadā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:601_0: Atha naṃ so “khamāmi te, bhadde, yathāsukhaṃ gacchā”ti vissajjento gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:604_0: Tvañca bhadde sukhī hohi, gaccha kaññe yathāsukha”nti.
atk-s0514a1:605_0: Sā taṃ vanditvā teneva suvaṇṇapallaṅkena devapuraṃ gatā.
atk-s0514a1:605_1: Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā tisso gāthāyo abhāsi –
atk-s0514a1:607_0: “Tassa pāde gahetvāna, katvā ca naṃ padakkhiṇaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:615_0: Patīto sumano vitto, devindo adadā vara”nti.
atk-s0514a1:616_1: “Patīto”tiādīhi tuṭṭhākārova dassito adadā varanti āgantvā vanditvā ṭhitāya tuṭṭho varaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0514a1:617_0: Sā tassa santike varaṃ gaṇhantī osānagāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:620_0: Nisippalobhikā gacche, etaṃ sakka varaṃ vare”ti.
atk-s0514a1:622_0: Satthā tassa bhikkhuno imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi,
atk-s0514a1:626_0: Ariyāvakāsosīti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto uposathakammaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0514a1:626_1: Tadā hi satthā uposathike upāsake sampahaṃsetvā “porāṇakapaṇḍitā mahatiṃ nāgasampattiṃ pahāya uposathavāsaṃ
atk-s0514a1:626_2: upavasiṃsuyevā”ti vatvā tehi yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0514a1:627_0: Atīte rājagahe magadharājā nāma rajjaṃ kāresi.
atk-s0514a1:627_1: Tadā bodhisatto tassa rañño aggamahesiyā kucchimhi nibbatti,
atk-s0514a1:627_3: So vayappatto takkasilāyaṃ sabbasippāni uggaṇhitvā āgantvā pitu sippaṃ dassesi.
atk-s0514a1:627_4: Atha naṃ pitā rajje abhisiñcitvā isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā uyyāne vasi.
atk-s0514a1:627_5: Bodhisatto divasassa tikkhattuṃ pitu santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0514a1:627_7: So teneva palibodhena kasiṇaparikammamattampi kātuṃ asakkonto cintesi –
atk-s0514a1:627_9: na sakkā mayā idha vasantena imaṃ jaṭaṃ chindituṃ,
atk-s0514a1:627_11: So kañci ajānāpetvā uyyānā nikkhamitvā magadharaṭṭhaṃ atikkamitvā mahisakaraṭṭhe saṅkhapāladahato nāma
atk-s0514a1:627_12: nikkhantāya kaṇṇaveṇṇāya nadiyā nivattane candakapabbataṃ upanissāya paṇṇasālaṃ katvā tattha vasanto
atk-s0514a1:627_13: kasiṇaparikammaṃ katvā jhānābhiññā nibbattetvā uñchācariyāya yāpesi.
atk-s0514a1:627_14: Tamenaṃ saṅkhapālo nāma nāgarājā mahantena parivārena kaṇṇaveṇṇanadito nikkhamitvā antarantarā upasaṅkamati.
atk-s0514a1:627_16: Athassa putto pitaraṃ daṭṭhukāmo gataṭṭhānaṃ ajānanto anuvicārāpetvā “asukaṭṭhāne nāma vasatī”ti ñatvā
atk-s0514a1:627_17: tassa dassanatthāya mahantena parivārena tattha gantvā ekamante khandhavāraṃ nivāsetvā katipayehi amaccehi
atk-s0514a1:628_0: Tasmiṃ khaṇe saṅkhapālo mahantena parivārena dhammaṃ suṇanto nisīdi.
atk-s0514a1:628_1: So taṃ rājānaṃ āgacchantaṃ disvā isiṃ vanditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi.
atk-s0514a1:628_2: Rājā pitaraṃ vanditvā paṭisanthāraṃ katvā nisīditvā pucchi – “bhante,
atk-s0514a1:628_3: katararājā nāmesa tumhākaṃ santikaṃ āgato”ti. Tāta,
atk-s0514a1:628_5: So tassa sampattiṃ nissāya nāgabhavane lobhaṃ katvā katipāhaṃ vasitvā pitu bhikkhāhāraṃ nibaddhaṃ dāpetvā
atk-s0514a1:628_6: attano nagarameva gantvā catūsu dvāresu dānasālāyo kāretvā sakalajambudīpaṃ saṅkhobhento dānaṃ datvā
atk-s0514a1:628_7: sīlaṃ rakkhitvā uposathakammaṃ katvā nāgabhavanaṃ patthetvā āyupariyosāne nāgabhavane nibbattitvā saṅkhapālanāgarājā ahosi.
atk-s0514a1:628_8: So gacchante kāle tāya sampattiyā vippaṭisārī hutvā tato paṭṭhāya manussayoniṃ patthento uposathavāsaṃ vasi.
atk-s0514a1:628_9: Athassa nāgabhavane vasantassa uposathavāso na sampajjati,
atk-s0514a1:628_11: So tato paṭṭhāya nāgabhavanā nikkhamitvā kaṇṇaveṇṇāya nadiyā avidūre mahāmaggassa ca ekapadikamaggassa
atk-s0514a1:628_12: ca antare ekaṃ vammikaṃ parikkhipitvā uposathaṃ adhiṭṭhāya samādinnasīlo “mama cammamaṃsādīhi atthikā
atk-s0514a1:628_13: cammamaṃsādīni harantū”ti attānaṃ dānamukhe vissajjetvā vammikamatthake nipanno samaṇadhammaṃ karonto
atk-s0514a1:628_14: cātuddase pannarase vasitvā pāṭipade nāgabhavanaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0514a1:629_0: Tasmiṃ ekadivasaṃ evaṃ sīlaṃ samādiyitvā nipanne paccantagāmavāsino soḷasa janā “maṃsaṃ āharissāmā”ti
atk-s0514a1:629_1: āvudhahatthā araññe vicarantā kiñci alabhitvā nikkhantā taṃ vammikamatthake nipannaṃ disvā “mayaṃ ajja
atk-s0514a1:629_3: imaṃ nāgarājānaṃ vadhitvā khādissāmā”ti cintetvā “mahā kho panesa gayhamāno palāyeyya,
atk-s0514a1:629_4: yathānipannameva taṃ bhogesu sūlehi vijjhitvā dubbalaṃ katvā gaṇhissāmā”ti sūlāni ādāya upasaṅkamiṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:629_5: Bodhisattassa sarīraṃ mahantaṃ ekadoṇikanāvappamāṇaṃ vaṭṭetvā ṭhapitasumanapupphadāmaṃ viya jiñjukaphalasannibhehi
atk-s0514a1:629_6: akkhīhi jayasumanapupphasadisena ca sīsena samannāgataṃ ativiya sobhati.
atk-s0514a1:629_7: So tesaṃ soḷasannaṃ janānaṃ padasaddena bhogantarato sīsaṃ nīharitvā rattakkhīni ummīletvā te sūlahatthe āgacchante disvā cintesi –
atk-s0514a1:629_9: ahaṃ attānaṃ dānamukhe niyyādetvā vīriyaṃ adhiṭṭhahitvā nipanno,
atk-s0514a1:629_10: ime mama sarīraṃ sattīhi koṭṭetvā chiddāvachiddaṃ karonte kodhavasena akkhīni ummīletvā na olokessāmī”ti
atk-s0514a1:629_11: attano sīlabhedabhayena daḷhaṃ adhiṭṭhāya sīsaṃ bhogantareyeva pavesetvā nipajji.
atk-s0514a1:629_12: Atha naṃ te upagantvā naṅguṭṭhe gahetvā kaḍḍhantā bhūmiyaṃ pothetvā tikhiṇasūlehi aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu vijjhitvā
atk-s0514a1:629_13: sakaṇṭakakāḷavettayaṭṭhiyo pahāramukhehi pavesetvā aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu kājenādāya mahāmaggaṃ paṭipajjiṃsu,
atk-s0514a1:629_14: mahāsatto sūlehi vijjhanato paṭṭhāya ekaṭṭhānepi kodhavasena akkhīni ummīletvā te na olokesi.
atk-s0514a1:629_15: Tassa aṭṭhahi kājehi ādāya nīyamānassa sīsaṃ olambetvā bhūmiyaṃ pahari.
atk-s0514a1:629_16: Atha naṃ “sīsamassa olambatī”ti mahāmagge nipajjāpetvā taruṇasūlena nāsāpuṭaṃ vijjhitvā rajjukaṃ pavesetvā
atk-s0514a1:629_17: sīsaṃ ukkhipitvā kājakoṭiyaṃ laggitvā punapi ukkhipitvā maggaṃ paṭipajjiṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:630_0: Tasmiṃ khaṇe videharaṭṭhe mithilanagaravāsī āḷāro nāma kuṭumbiko pañca sakaṭasatāni ādāya sukhayānake
atk-s0514a1:630_1: nisīditvā gacchanto te bhojaputte bodhisattaṃ tathā gaṇhitvā gacchante disvā tesaṃ soḷasannampi soḷasahi
atk-s0514a1:630_2: vāhagoṇehi saddhiṃ pasataṃ pasataṃ suvaṇṇamāsake sabbesaṃ nivāsanapārupanāni bhariyānampi nesaṃ vatthābharaṇāni
atk-s0514a1:630_4: Atha so nāgabhavanaṃ gantvā tattha papañcaṃ akatvā mahantena parivārena nikkhamitvā āḷāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0514a1:630_5: nāgabhavanassa vaṇṇaṃ kathetvā taṃ ādāya nāgabhavanaṃ gantvā tīhi nāgakaññāsatehi saddhiṃ mahantamassa
atk-s0514a1:630_7: Āḷāro nāgabhavane ekavassaṃ vasitvā dibbakāme paribhuñjitvā “icchāmahaṃ, samma,
atk-s0514a1:630_8: pabbajitu”nti nāgarājassa kathetvā pabbajitaparikkhāre gahetvā nāgabhavanato himavantappadesaṃ gantvā
atk-s0514a1:630_9: pabbajitvā tattha ciraṃ vasitvā aparabhāge cārikaṃ caranto bārāṇasiṃ patvā rājuyyāne vasitvā punadivase
atk-s0514a1:630_11: Atha naṃ bārāṇasirājā disvā iriyāpathe pasīditvā pakkosāpetvā paññattāsane nisīdāpetvā nānaggarasabhojanaṃ
atk-s0514a1:630_12: bhojetvā aññatarasmiṃ nīce āsane nisinno vanditvā tena saddhiṃ sallapanto paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:633_0: Kathaṃ nu vittāni pahāya bhoge, pabbaji nikkhamma gharā sapaññā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:634_3: Kulamhāti khattiyakulā vā brāhmaṇakulā vā seṭṭhikulā vā pabbajitosīti maññāmi.
atk-s0514a1:634_4: Kathaṃ nūti kena kāraṇena kiṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā dhanañca upabhoge ca pahāya gharā nikkhamitvā pabbajitosi sapañña paṇḍitapurisāti pucchati.
atk-s0514a1:635_0: Tato paraṃ tāpasassa ca rañño ca vacanappaṭivacanavasena gāthānaṃ sambandho veditabbo –
atk-s0514a1:638_0: Disvāna puññāna mahāvipākaṃ, saddhāyahaṃ pabbajitomhi rāja.
atk-s0514a1:640_0: “Na kāmakāmā na bhayā na dosā, vācaṃ musā pabbajitā bhaṇanti;
atk-s0514a1:641_0: Akkhāhi me pucchito etamatthaṃ, sutvāna me jāyihitippasādo.
atk-s0514a1:644_0: Pavaḍḍhakāyaṃ uragaṃ mahantaṃ, ādāya gacchante pamodamāne.
atk-s0514a1:646_0: “Sohaṃ samāgamma janinda tehi, pahaṭṭhalomo avacamhi bhīto;
