atk-s0514a1:647_0: Kuhiṃ ayaṃ nīyati bhīmakāyo, nāgena kiṃ kāhatha bhojaputtā.
atk-s0514a1:649_0: “Nāgo ayaṃ nīyati bhojanatthā, pavaḍḍhakāyo urago mahanto;
atk-s0514a1:650_0: Sāduñca thūlañca muduñca maṃsaṃ, na tvaṃ rasaññāsi videhaputta.
atk-s0514a1:652_0: “Ito mayaṃ gantvā sakaṃ niketaṃ, ādāya satthāni vikopayitvā;
atk-s0514a1:653_0: Maṃsāni bhokkhāma pamodamānā, mayañhi ve sattavo pannagānaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:655_0: “Sace ayaṃ nīyati bhojanatthā, pavaḍḍhakāyo urago mahanto;
atk-s0514a1:656_0: Dadāmi vo balibaddāni soḷasa, nāgaṃ imaṃ muñcatha bandhanasmā.
atk-s0514a1:658_0: “Addhā hi no bhakkho ayaṃ manāpo, bahū ca no uragā bhuttapubbā;
atk-s0514a1:659_0: Karoma te taṃ vacanaṃ aḷāra, mittañca no hohi videhaputta.
atk-s0514a1:661_0: “Tadāssu te bandhanā mocayiṃsu, yaṃ natthuto paṭimokkassa pāse;
atk-s0514a1:662_0: Mutto ca so bandhanā nāgarājā, pakkāmi pācīnamukho muhuttaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:664_0: “Gantvāna pācīnamukho muhuttaṃ, puṇṇehi nettehi palokayī maṃ;
atk-s0514a1:665_0: Tadāssahaṃ piṭṭhito anvagacchiṃ, dasaṅguliṃ añjaliṃ paggahetvā.
atk-s0514a1:667_0: “Gaccheva kho tvaṃ taramānarūpo, mā taṃ amittā punaraggahesuṃ;
atk-s0514a1:668_0: Dukkho hi luddehi punā samāgamo, adassanaṃ bhojaputtāna gaccha.
atk-s0514a1:670_0: “Agamāsi so rahadaṃ vippasannaṃ, nīlobhāsaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ sutitthaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:671_0: Samotataṃ jambuhi vetasāhi, pāvekkhi nittiṇṇabhayo patīto.
atk-s0514a1:673_0: “So taṃ pavissa nacirassa nāgo, dibbena me pāturahū janinda;
atk-s0514a1:674_0: Upaṭṭhahī maṃ pitaraṃva putto, hadayaṅgamaṃ kaṇṇasukhaṃ bhaṇanto.
atk-s0514a1:676_0: “Tvaṃ mesi mātā ca pitā aḷāra, abbhantaro pāṇadado sahāyo;
atk-s0514a1:677_0: Sakañca iddhiṃ paṭilābhakosmi, aḷāra passa me nivesanāni;
atk-s0514a1:679_1: Puññānanti tena katapuññānaṃ mahantaṃ vipākaṃ disvā kammañca phalañca paralokañca saddahitvā pavattāya saddhāya ahaṃ pabbajito.
atk-s0514a1:679_2: Na kāmakāmāti na vatthukāmenapi bhayenapi dosenapi musā bhaṇanti.
atk-s0514a1:679_4: tumhākaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā mayhampi pasādo somanassaṃ jāyissati.
atk-s0514a1:679_6: Pathe addasāsimhīti pañcannaṃ sakaṭasatānaṃ purato sukhayānake nisīditvā gacchanto mahāmagge janapadamanusse addasaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:679_14: Mayañhi vo sattavoti mayaṃ pana nāgānaṃ verino nāma.
atk-s0514a1:679_16: Mittañca no hohīti tvaṃ amhākaṃ mitto hohi,
atk-s0514a1:680_1: tehi bhojaputtehi evaṃ vutte ahaṃ tesaṃ soḷasa vāhagoṇe nivāsanapārupanāni pasataṃ pasataṃ suvaṇṇamāsake bhariyānañca nesaṃ vatthālaṅkāraṃ adāsiṃ,
atk-s0514a1:680_2: atha te saṅkhapālanāgarājānaṃ bhūmiyaṃ nipajjāpetvā attano kakkhaḷatāya sakaṇṭakakāḷavettalatāya koṭiyaṃ gahetvā ākaḍḍhituṃ ārabhiṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:680_3: Athāhaṃ nāgarājānaṃ kilamantaṃ disvā akilamentova asinā tā latā chinditvā dārakānaṃ kaṇṇavedhato vaṭṭinīharaṇaniyāmena adukkhāpento saṇikaṃ nīhariṃ,
atk-s0514a1:680_4: tasmiṃ kāle te bhojaputtā yaṃ bandhanaṃ assa natthuto pavesetvā pāse paṭimokkaṃ,
atk-s0514a1:680_6: Tassa nāsato saha pāsena taṃ rajjukaṃ nīhariṃsūti dīpeti.
atk-s0514a1:680_7: Iti te uragaṃ vissajjetvā thokaṃ gantvā “ayaṃ urago dubbalo,
atk-s0514a1:681_0: Puṇṇehīti sopi muhuttaṃ pācīnābhimukho gantvā assupuṇṇehi nettehi maṃ palokayi.
atk-s0514a1:681_5: Nittiṇṇabhayo patītoti so kira taṃ dahaṃ pavisanto āḷārassa nipaccakāraṃ dassetvā yāva naṅguṭṭhā otari,
atk-s0514a1:681_9: Dibbena meti nāgabhavane pamādaṃ anāpajjitvā mayi kaṇṇaveṇṇatīraṃ anatikkanteyeva dibbena parivārena mama purato pāturahosi.
atk-s0514a1:681_14: Passa me nivesanānīti mama nāgabhavanaṃ passa.
atk-s0514a1:681_15: Masakkasāraṃ viyāti masakkasāro vuccati osakkanaparisakkanābhāvena ghanasāratāya ca sinerupabbatarājā.
atk-s0514a1:682_0: Mahārāja! Evaṃ vatvā so nāgarājā uttari attano nāgabhavanaṃ vaṇṇento gāthādvayamāha –
atk-s0514a1:684_0: “Taṃ bhūmibhāgehi upetarūpaṃ, asakkharā ceva mudū subhā ca;
atk-s0514a1:685_0: Nīcattiṇā apparajā ca bhūmi, pāsādikā yattha jahanti sokaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:688_0: Pakkā ca pesī ca phalā suphullā, niccotukā dhārayantī phalānī”ti.
atk-s0514a1:689_0: Tattha asakkharāti yā tattha bhūmi pāsāṇasakkhararahitā mudu subhā kañcanarajatamaṇimayā sattaratanavālukākiṇṇā.
atk-s0514a1:689_3: Yattha jahanti sokanti yattha paviṭṭhamattāva nissokā honti.
atk-s0514a1:689_4: Anāvakulāti na avakulā akhāṇumā upari ukkulavikulabhāvarahitā vā samasaṇṭhitā.
atk-s0514a1:689_6: tasmiṃ nāgabhavane veḷuriyamayā pasannasalilā nīlobhāsā anekavaṇṇakamaluppalasañchannā pokkharaṇīti attho.
atk-s0514a1:689_8: Pakkā cāti tasmiṃ ambavane ambarukkhā pakkaphalā ca aḍḍhapakkaphalā ca taruṇaphalā ca phullitāyevāti attho.
atk-s0514a1:689_9: Niccotukāti channampi utūnaṃ anurūpehi pupphaphalehi samannāgatāti.
atk-s0514a1:691_0: Tesaṃ vanānaṃ naradeva majjhe, nivesanaṃ bhassarasannikāsaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:698_0: Sahassathambhaṃ atulānubhāvaṃ, yatthassa bhariyā mahesī ahosi.
atk-s0514a1:700_0: “Ekā ca nārī taramānarūpā, ādāya veḷuriyamayaṃ mahagghaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:703_0: “Tato maṃ urago hatthe gahetvā, nisīdayī pāmukhaāsanasmiṃ;
atk-s0514a1:704_0: Idamāsanaṃ atra bhavaṃ nisīdatu, bhavañhi me aññataro garūnaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:706_0: “Aññā ca nārī taramānarūpā, ādāya vāriṃ upasaṅkamitvā;
atk-s0514a1:707_0: Pādāni pakkhālayī me janinda, bhariyāva bhattū patino piyassa.
atk-s0514a1:709_0: “Aparā ca nārī taramānarūpā, paggayha sovaṇṇamayāya pātiyā;
atk-s0514a1:710_0: Anekasūpaṃ vividhaṃ viyañjanaṃ, upanāmayī bhatta manuññarūpaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:712_0: “Turiyehi maṃ bhārata bhuttavantaṃ, upaṭṭhahuṃ bhattu mano viditvā;
atk-s0514a1:713_0: Tatuttariṃ maṃ nipatī mahantaṃ, dibbehi kāmehi anappakehī”ti.
atk-s0514a1:714_3: Maṇīmayāti evarūpā tattha kūṭāgārā ca gabbhā ca.
atk-s0514a1:714_6: ahaṃ evaṃ tasmiṃ nāgabhavanaṃ vaṇṇente taṃ daṭṭhukāmo ahosiṃ,
atk-s0514a1:714_7: atha maṃ tattha netvā so saṅkhapālo hatthe gahetvā taramāno veḷuriyathambhehi sahassathambhaṃ pāsādaṃ āruyha yasmiṃ ṭhāne assa mahesī ahosi,
atk-s0514a1:714_9: Ekā cāti mayi pāsādaṃ abhiruḷhe ekā itthī aññehi maṇīhi jātimahantehi upetaṃ subhaṃ veḷuriyāsanaṃ tena nāgarājena avuttāva.
atk-s0514a1:715_2: Garūnanti mātāpitūnaṃ me tvaṃ aññataroti evaṃ vatvā nisīdāpesi.
atk-s0514a1:715_7: Upaṭṭhahunti anekasatehi turiyehi gandhabbaṃ kurumānā upaṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:715_8: Bhattu mano viditvāti attano patino cittaṃ jānitvā.
atk-s0514a1:715_10: Maṃ nipatīti so nāgarājā maṃ upasaṅkami.
atk-s0514a1:715_11: Mahantaṃ dibbehīti mahantehi uḷārehi dibbehi kāmehi tehi ca anappakehi.
atk-s0514a1:719_0: Aḷāra etāssu te kāmakārā, dadāmi te tā paricārayassū”ti.
atk-s0514a1:720_5: Paricārayassūti tā attano pādaparicārikā karohīti vatvā tīhi itthisatehi saddhiṃ mahāsampattiṃ mayhaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0514a1:724_0: Nāgassidaṃ kinti kathañca laddhaṃ, kathajjhagamāsi vimānaseṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:726_0: “Adhiccaladdhaṃ pariṇāmajaṃ te, sayaṃkataṃ udāhu devehi dinnaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:728_2: Nāgassidanti bhadramukhassa saṅkhapālanāgarājassa idaṃ sampattijātaṃ kinti kiṃ nāma kammaṃ katvā kathañca katvā laddhaṃ,
atk-s0514a1:728_6: Pariṇāmajaṃ teti kenaci tava atthāya pariṇāmitattā pariṇāmato jātaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:728_7: Sayaṃkatanti kārake pakkosāpetvā ratanāni datvā kāritanti.
atk-s0514a1:731_0: “Nādhiccaladdhaṃ na pariṇāmajaṃ me, na sayaṃkataṃ nāpi devehi dinnaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:732_0: Sakehi kammehi apāpakehi, puññehi me laddhamidaṃ vimānaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:734_0: “Kiṃ te vataṃ kiṃ pana brahmacariyaṃ, kissa suciṇṇassa ayaṃ vipāko;
atk-s0514a1:735_0: Akkhāhi me nāgarājetamatthaṃ, kathaṃ nu te laddhamidaṃ vimānaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:738_0: So ittaraṃ jīvitaṃ saṃviditvā, asassataṃ vipariṇāmadhammaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:740_0: “Annañca pānañca pasannacitto, sakkacca dānaṃ vipulaṃ adāsiṃ;
atk-s0514a1:741_0: Opānabhūtaṃ me gharaṃ tadāsi, santappitā samaṇabrāhmaṇā ca.
atk-s0514a1:744_0: Acchādanaṃ sayanamathannapānaṃ, sakkacca dānāni adamha tattha.
atk-s0514a1:746_0: “Taṃ me vataṃ taṃ pana brahmacariyaṃ, tassa suciṇṇassa ayaṃ vipāko;
atk-s0514a1:747_0: Teneva me laddhamidaṃ vimānaṃ, pahūtabhakkhaṃ bahuannapānaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:748_0: Naccehi gītehi cupetarūpaṃ, ciraṭṭhitikaṃ na ca sassatāyaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:751_0: Kimeva dāṭhāvudha kiṃ paṭicca, hatthattamāgacchi vanibbakānaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:753_0: “Bhayaṃ nu te anvagataṃ mahantaṃ, tejo nu te nānvagaṃ dantamūlaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:754_0: Kimeva dāṭhāvudha kiṃ paṭicca, kilesamāpajji vanibbakānaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:756_0: “Na me bhayaṃ anvagataṃ mahantaṃ, tejo na sakkā mama tehi hantuṃ;
atk-s0514a1:760_0: Athāgamuṃ soḷasa bhojaputtā, rajjuṃ gahetvāna daḷhañca pāsaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:762_0: “Bhetvāna nāsaṃ atikassa rajjuṃ, nayiṃsu maṃ samparigayha luddā;
atk-s0514a1:765_0: “Ekāyane taṃ pathe addasaṃsu, balena vaṇṇena cupetarūpaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:766_0: Siriyā paññāya ca bhāvitosi, kiṃ patthayaṃ nāga tapo karosi.
atk-s0514a1:768_0: “Na puttahetū na dhanassa hetū, na āyuno cāpi aḷāra hetu;
atk-s0514a1:769_0: Manussayoniṃ abhipatthayāno, tasmā parakkama tapo karomi.
atk-s0514a1:775_0: Pucchāmi taṃ nāgarājetamatthaṃ, seyyo ito kena manussaloko.
atk-s0514a1:777_0: “Aḷāra nāññatra manussalokā, suddhīva saṃvijjati saṃyamo vā;
atk-s0514a1:778_0: Ahañca laddhāna manussayoniṃ, kāhāmi jātimaraṇassa antaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:780_0: “Saṃvaccharo me vasato tavantike, annena pānena upaṭṭhitosmi;
atk-s0514a1:781_0: Āmantayitvāna palemi nāga, cirappavuṭṭhosmi ahaṃ janinda.
atk-s0514a1:783_0: “Puttā ca dārā anujīvino ca, niccānusiṭṭhā upatiṭṭhathetaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:784_0: Kaccinnu taṃ nābhisapittha koci, piyañhi me dassanaṃ tuyhaṃ aḷāra.
atk-s0514a1:786_0: “Yathāpi mātū ca pitū agāre, putto piyo paṭivihito vaseyya;
atk-s0514a1:787_0: Tatopi mayhaṃ idhameva seyyo, cittañhi te nāga mayī pasannaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:789_0: “Maṇī mamaṃ vijjati lohitaṅko, dhanāharo maṇiratanaṃ uḷāraṃ;
atk-s0514a1:790_0: Ādāya tvaṃ gaccha sakaṃ niketaṃ, laddhā dhanaṃ taṃ maṇimossajassū”ti.
atk-s0514a1:791_0: Tattha kiṃ te vatanti kiṃ tava vatasamādānaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:791_2: Opānabhūtanti catumahāpathe khatapokkharaṇī viya dhammikasamaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ yathāsukhaṃ paribhuñjitabbavibhavaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:791_3: Na ca sassatāyanti ciraṭṭhitikaṃ samānampi ce taṃ mayhaṃ sassataṃ na hotīti me katheti.
atk-s0514a1:792_1: Hantīti aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu sūlehi vijjhantā kiṃkāraṇā haniṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:792_2: Kiṃ paṭiccāti kiṃ sandhāya tvaṃ tadā tesaṃ hatthattaṃ āgacchi vasaṃ upagato.
atk-s0514a1:792_4: Tejo nu te nānvagaṃ dantamūlanti kiṃ nu tava tejo bhojaputte disvā tadā bhayaṃ mahantaṃ anvagataṃ,
atk-s0514a1:793_0: Tejo na sakkā mama tehi hantunti mama visatejo aññassa tejena abhihantumpi na sakkā.
atk-s0514a1:793_5: Samuddavelāva duraccayānīti tehi samuddavelā viya sappurisehi jīvitatthampi duraccayānīti vaṇṇitāni,
atk-s0514a1:793_6: tasmā ahaṃ sīlabhedabhayena khantimettādisamannāgato hutvā mama kopassa sīlavelantaṃ atikkamituṃ na adāsinti āha.
atk-s0514a1:794_1: Tadā hi mahāsattena sarīrassa pariccattabhāvo dānapāramī nāma hoti,
atk-s0514a1:795_0: Athāgamunti athekadivasaṃ vammikamatthake nipannaṃ disvā soḷasa bhojaputtā khararajjuñca daḷhapāsañca sūlāni ca gahetvā mama santikaṃ āgatā.
atk-s0514a1:795_1: Bhetvānāti mama sarīraṃ aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu bhinditvā sakaṇṭakakāḷavettalatā pavesetvā.
atk-s0514a1:795_2: Nāsaṃ atikassa rajjunti thokaṃ gantvā sīsaṃ me olambantaṃ disvā mahāmagge nipajjāpetvā puna nāsampi me
atk-s0514a1:795_3: bhinditvā vaṭṭarajjuṃ atikassa āvunitvā kājakoṭiyaṃ laggetvā samantato pariggahetvā maṃ nayiṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:796_2: te bhojaputtā ekāyane ekagamane jaṅghapadikamagge taṃ balena ca vaṇṇena ca upetarūpaṃ passiṃsu,
atk-s0514a1:796_3: tvaṃ pana issariyasobhaggasiriyā ca paññāya ca bhāvito vaḍḍhito,
atk-s0514a1:796_4: so tvaṃ evarūpo samānopi kimatthaṃ tapaṃ karosi,
atk-s0514a1:796_8: ahaṃ ekāyane mahāmagge taṃ addasinti attho.
atk-s0514a1:797_1: Itoti imamhā nāgabhavanā manussaloko kena uttaritaro.
atk-s0514a1:797_4: Idaṃ so manussalokeyeva buddhapaccekabuddhānaṃ uppattiṃ sandhāyāha.
atk-s0514a1:797_5: Kāhāmīti attano appaṭisandhikabhāvaṃ karonto jātijarāmaraṇassantaṃ karissāmīti. Evaṃ, mahārāja,
atk-s0514a1:797_8: tasmiṃ manussalokaṃ vaṇṇente ahaṃ pabbajjāya sinehaṃ katvā etadavocaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:797_9: Tattha upaṭṭhitosmīti annapānena ceva dibbehi ca kāmaguṇehi pariciṇṇo mānito asmi.
atk-s0514a1:798_0: Nābhisapitthāti kacci nu kho mama puttādīsu koci taṃ na akkosi na paribhāsīti pucchati.
atk-s0514a1:798_7: evaṃ sante mama lohitaṅko dhanahārako sabbakāmadado maṇi saṃvijjati,
atk-s0514a1:798_8: taṃ uḷāraṃ maṇiratanaṃ ādāya tava gehaṃ gaccha,
atk-s0514a1:798_9: tattha imassānubhāvena yāvadicchakaṃ dhanaṃ laddhā puna imaṃ maṇiṃ ossajassu,
atk-s0514a1:798_10: ossajanto ca aññattha anossajitvā attano udakacāṭiyaṃ ossajeyyāsīti vatvā mayhaṃ maṇiratanaṃ upanesīti vadati.
atk-s0514a1:799_3: pabbajituṃ pana icchāmī’ti pabbajitaparikkhāraṃ yācitvā teneva saddhiṃ nāgabhavanā nikkhamitvā taṃ nivattetvā
atk-s0514a1:799_4: himavantaṃ pavisitvā pabbajitomhī”ti vatvā rañño dhammakathaṃ kathento gāthādvayamāha –
atk-s0514a1:802_0: Ādīnavaṃ kāmaguṇesu disvā, saddhāyahaṃ pabbajitomhi rāja.
atk-s0514a1:804_0: “Dumapphalānīva patanti māṇavā, daharā ca vuddhā ca sarīrabhedā;
atk-s0514a1:805_0: Etampi disvā pabbajitomhi rāja, apaṇṇakaṃ sāmaññameva seyyo”ti.
atk-s0514a1:806_0: Tattha saddhāyāti kammañca phalañca nibbānañca saddahitvā.
atk-s0514a1:806_1: Dumapphalānīva patantīti yathā rukkhaphalāni pakkānipi apakkānipi patanti,
atk-s0514a1:806_2: tathā māṇavā daharā ca vuddhā ca patanti.
atk-s0514a1:806_4: Sāmaññameva seyyoti pabbajjāva uttamāti pabbajjāya guṇaṃ disvā pabbajitomhi,
atk-s0514a1:809_0: “Addhā have sevitabbā sapaññā, bahussutā ye bahuṭhānacintino;
atk-s0514a1:810_0: Nāgañca sutvāna tavañcaḷāra, kāhāmi puññāni anappakānī”ti.
atk-s0514a1:811_0: Tattha ye bahuṭhānacintinoti ye bahūni kāraṇāni jānanti.
atk-s0514a1:811_1: Nāgañcāti tathā appamādavihārinaṃ nāgarājānañca tava ca vacanaṃ sutvā.
atk-s0514a1:814_0: “Addhā have sevitabbā sapaññā, bahussutā ye bahuṭhānacintino;
atk-s0514a1:815_0: Nāgañca sutvāna mamañca rāja, karohi puññāni anappakānī”ti.
atk-s0514a1:816_0: Evaṃ so rañño dhammaṃ desetvā tattheva cattāro vassānamāse vasitvā puna himavantaṃ gantvā yāvajīvaṃ cattāro
atk-s0514a1:816_2: Saṅkhapālopi yāvajīvaṃ uposathavāsaṃ vasitvā rājā ca dānādīni puññāni karitvā yathākammaṃ gatā.
atk-s0514a1:817_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0514a1:821_0: Āmantayāmi nigamanti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto nekkhammapāramiṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0514a1:821_2: Atīte pana bārāṇasī sudassanaṃ nāma nagaraṃ ahosi,
atk-s0514a1:821_8: So viññutaṃ patto sutavittako savanasīlo ahosi,
atk-s0514a1:821_10: So vayappatto takkasilāyaṃ sabbasippāni uggahetvā āgato pitu santakaṃ setacchattaṃ labhitvā dhammena rajjaṃ kāresi,
atk-s0514a1:821_13: So aparabhāge puttadhītāhi vaḍḍhanto gharāvāse anabhirato araññaṃ pavisitvā pabbajitukāmo ahosi.
atk-s0514a1:822_0: So ekadivasaṃ kappakaṃ āmantetvā “yadā me, samma,
atk-s0514a1:822_3: Kappako tassa vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā aparabhāge palitaṃ disvā ārocetvā “tena hi naṃ,
atk-s0514a1:822_5: uddharitvā mama hatthe patiṭṭhapehī”ti vutte suvaṇṇasaṇḍāsena uddharitvā rañño hatthe ṭhapesi.
atk-s0514a1:822_6: Taṃ disvā mahāsatto “jarāya me sarīraṃ abhibhūta”nti bhīto taṃ palitaṃ gahetvāva pāsādā otaritvā mahājanassa
atk-s0514a1:822_7: dassanaṭṭhāne paññatte rājapallaṅke nisīditvā senāpatippamukhāni asītiamaccasahassāni purohitappamukhāni
atk-s0514a1:822_8: saṭṭhibrāhmaṇasahassāni aññe ca raṭṭhikajānapadanegamādayo bahū jane pakkosāpetvā “sirasmiṃ me palitaṃ jātaṃ,
atk-s0514a1:822_10: mama pabbajitabhāvaṃ jānāthā”ti vatvā paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:825_0: Sirasmiṃ palitaṃ jātaṃ, pabbajjaṃ dāni rocaha”nti.
atk-s0514a1:826_0: Tattha āmantayāmīti jānāpemi. Rocahanti “rocemi ahaṃ, tassa me, bhonto! Pabbajitabhāvaṃ jānāthā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:827_0: Taṃ sutvā tesu eko visāradappatto hutvā gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:829_0: “Abhuṃ me kathaṃ nu bhaṇasi, sallaṃ me deva urasi kappesi;
atk-s0514a1:830_0: Sattasatā te bhariyā, kathaṃ nu te tā bhavissantī”ti.
atk-s0514a1:831_3: Kathaṃ nu te tā bhavissantīti tā tava bhariyā tayi pabbajite anāthā nippaccayā kathaṃ bhavissanti,
atk-s0514a1:831_4: etā anāthā katvā tumhākaṃ pabbajjā nāma na yuttāti.
atk-s0514a1:837_0: Amaccādayo bodhisattassa paṭivacanaṃ dātuṃ asakkontā tassa mātu santikaṃ gantvā tamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0514a1:837_1: Sā turitaturitā āgantvā “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ, tāta,
atk-s0514a1:839_0: “Dulladdhaṃ me āsi sutasoma, yassa te homahaṃ mātā;
atk-s0514a1:840_0: Yaṃ me vilapantiyā, anapekkho pabbajasi deva.
atk-s0514a1:842_0: “Dulladdhaṃ me āsi sutasoma, yaṃ taṃ ahaṃ vijāyissaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:843_0: Yaṃ me vilapantiyā, anapekkho pabbajasi devā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:844_0: Tattha dulladdhanti yaṃ etaṃ mayā labhantiyā puttaṃ jammaṃ laddhaṃ dulladdhaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:844_1: Yaṃ meti yena kāraṇena mayi nānappakārakaṃ vipalantiyā tvaṃ pabbajituṃ icchasi,
atk-s0514a1:844_2: tena kāraṇena tādisassa puttassa labhanaṃ mama dulladdhaṃ nāmāti.
atk-s0514a1:845_0: Bodhisatto evaṃ paridevamānāyapi mātarā saddhiṃ kiñci na kathesi.
atk-s0514a1:845_1: Sā roditvā kanditvā sayameva ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0514a1:847_0: “Ko nāmeso dhammo, sutasoma kā ca nāma pabbajjā;
atk-s0514a1:848_0: Yaṃ no amhe jiṇṇe, anapekkho pabbajasi devā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:849_0: Tattha yaṃ no amheti yaṃ tvaṃ amhākaṃ putto samāno amhe jiṇṇe paṭijaggitabbakāle appaṭijaggitvā papāte
atk-s0514a1:849_1: silaṃ pavaṭṭento viya chaḍḍetvā anapekkho pabbajasi,
atk-s0514a1:849_2: tena taṃ vadāmi ko nāmeso tava dhammoti adhippāyo.
atk-s0514a1:850_6: tesaṃ vuḍḍhippattakāle pabbajissasī”ti vatvā sattamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:853_0: Mañjū tepitaṃ apassantā, maññe dukkhaṃ nigacchantī”ti.
atk-s0514a1:858_0: Mañjūhi sabbehipi tumhehi, cirampi ṭhatvā vināsabhāvo”ti.
atk-s0514a1:859_2: atha kho tumhehipi aññehipi sabbasaṅkhārehi ciraṃ ṭhatvāpi dīghamaddhānaṃ ṭhatvāpi vināsabhāvova niyato.
atk-s0514a1:859_3: Sakalasmimpi hi lokasannivāse ekasaṅkhāropi nicco nāma natthīti.
atk-s0514a1:860_1: So tassa dhammakathaṃ sutvā tuṇhī ahosi.
atk-s0514a1:860_3: Tā ca pāsādā oruyha tassa santikaṃ gantvā gopphakesu gahetvā paridevamānā gāthamāhaṃsu –
atk-s0514a1:862_0: “Chinnaṃ nu tuyhaṃ hadayaṃ, adu te karuṇā ca natthi amhesu;
atk-s0514a1:863_0: Yaṃ no vikandantiyo, anapekkho pabbajasi devā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:864_2: amhe vidhavā katvā gacchantassa appamattakassapi sinehassa abhāvena tava hadayaṃ amhesu chinnaṃ nu,
atk-s0514a1:864_3: udāhu karuṇāya abhāvena kāruññaṃ vā natthi,
atk-s0514a1:864_4: yaṃ no evaṃ vikandantiyo pahāya pabbajasīti.
atk-s0514a1:865_0: Mahāsatto tāsaṃ pādamūle parivattitvā paridevamānānaṃ paridevanasaddaṃ sutvā anantaraṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:867_0: “Na ca mayhaṃ chinnaṃ hadayaṃ, atthi karuṇāpi mayhaṃ tumhesu;
atk-s0514a1:869_0: Tattha saggañcāti ahaṃ saggañca patthayanto yasmā ayaṃ pabbajjā nāma buddhādīhi vaṇṇitā,
atk-s0514a1:870_1: Sā garubhārā paripuṇṇagabbhāpi samānā āgantvā mahāsattaṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ ṭhitā tisso gāthāyo abhāsi –
atk-s0514a1:872_0: “Dulladdhaṃ me āsi sutasoma, yassa te ahaṃ bhariyā;
atk-s0514a1:873_0: Yaṃ me vilapantiyā, anapekkho pabbajasi deva.
atk-s0514a1:875_0: “Dulladdhaṃ me āsi sutasoma, yassa te ahaṃ bhariyā;
atk-s0514a1:876_0: Yaṃ me kucchipaṭisandhiṃ, anapekkho pabbajasi deva.
atk-s0514a1:878_0: “Paripakko me gabbho, kucchigato yāva naṃ vijāyāmi;
atk-s0514a1:879_0: Māhaṃ ekā vidhavā, pacchā dukkhāni addakkhi”nti.
atk-s0514a1:880_0: Tattha yaṃ meti yasmā mama vilapantiyā tvaṃ anapekkho pabbajasi,
atk-s0514a1:880_1: tasmā yaṃ mayā tava santikā aggamahesiṭṭhānaṃ laddhaṃ,
atk-s0514a1:880_3: Dutiyagāthāya yasmā maṃ tvaṃ kucchipaṭisandhiṃ pahāya anapekkho pabbajasi,
atk-s0514a1:880_4: tasmā yaṃ mayā tava bhariyattaṃ laddhaṃ,
atk-s0514a1:880_6: Yāva nanti yāvāhaṃ taṃ gabbhaṃ vijāyāmi,
atk-s0514a1:883_0: “Paripakko te gabbho, kucchigato iṅgha tvaṃ vijāyassu;
atk-s0514a1:885_5: ahaṃ pana saddhiṃ tayā taṃ puttaṃ hitvā pabbajissāmiyevāti.
atk-s0514a1:886_0: Sā tassa vacanaṃ sutvā sokaṃ sandhāretuṃ asakkontī “ito dāni paṭṭhāya, deva,
atk-s0514a1:886_1: amhākaṃ sirī nāma natthī”ti ubhohi hatthehi hadayaṃ dhārayamānā assūni muñcantī mahāsaddena paridevi.
atk-s0514a1:888_0: “Mā tvaṃ cande rudi, mā soci vanatimiramattakkhi;
atk-s0514a1:891_0: Sā tassa vacanaṃ sutvā ṭhātuṃ asakkontī pāsādaṃ āruyha rodamānā nisīdi.
atk-s0514a1:891_1: Atha naṃ bodhisattassa jeṭṭhaputto disvā “kiṃ nu kho me mātā rodantī nisinnā”ti taṃ pucchanto gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:893_0: “Ko taṃ amma kopesi, kiṃ rodasi pekkhasi ca maṃ bāḷhaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:895_3: Pekkhasi cāti maṃ bāḷhaṃ pekkhantī kiṃkāraṇā rodasīti adhippāyo.
atk-s0514a1:895_4: Kaṃ avajjhaṃ ghātemīti aghātetabbampi kaṃ ghātemi attano ñātīnaṃ udikkhamānānaññeva,
atk-s0514a1:898_0: “Na hi so sakkā hantuṃ, vijitāvī yo maṃ tāta kopesi;
atk-s0514a1:899_0: Pitā te maṃ tāta avaca, anapekkho ahaṃ gamissāmī”ti.
atk-s0514a1:900_1: yo maṃ imissā pathaviyā vijitāvī kopesi,
atk-s0514a1:900_2: appiyasamudācārena me hadaye kopañca sokañca pavesesi,
atk-s0514a1:900_3: so tayā hantuṃ na sakkā, mañhi, tāta,
atk-s0514a1:900_4: tava pitā “ahaṃ rajjasiriñca tañca pahāya araññaṃ pavisitvā pabbajissāmī”ti avaca,
atk-s0514a1:901_0: So tassā vacanaṃ sutvā “amma! Kiṃ nāma tvaṃ kathesi,
atk-s0514a1:901_1: nanu evaṃ sante mayaṃ anāthā nāma bhavissāmā”ti paridevanto gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:903_0: “Yohaṃ pubbe niyyāmi, uyyānaṃ mattakuñjare ca yodhemi;
atk-s0514a1:904_0: Sutasome pabbajite, kathaṃ nu dāni karissāmī”ti.
atk-s0514a1:905_1: yo ahaṃ pubbe catuājaññayuttaṃ sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ rathaṃ abhiruyha uyyānaṃ gacchāmi,
atk-s0514a1:905_4: svāhaṃ idāni sutasome pabbajite kathaṃ karissāmīti?
atk-s0514a1:906_0: Athassa kaniṭṭhabhātā sattavassiko te ubhopi rodante disvā mātaraṃ upasaṅkamitvā,
atk-s0514a1:906_1: “amma! Kiṃkāraṇā tumhe rodathā”ti pucchitvā tamatthaṃ sutvā “tena hi mā rodatha,
atk-s0514a1:906_2: ahaṃ tātassa pabbajituṃ na dassāmī”ti ubhopi te assāsetvā dhātiyā saddhiṃ pāsādā oruyha pitu santikaṃ gantvā, “tāta,
atk-s0514a1:906_3: tvaṃ kira amhe akāmake pahāya ‘pabbajāmī’ti vadasi,
atk-s0514a1:906_4: ahaṃ te pabbajituṃ na dassāmī”ti pitaraṃ gīvāya daḷhaṃ gahetvā gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:908_0: “Mātucca me rudantyā, jeṭṭhassa ca bhātuno akāmassa;
atk-s0514a1:909_0: Hatthepi te gahessaṃ, na hi gacchasi no akāmāna”nti.
atk-s0514a1:910_2: kena nu kho naṃ upāyena paṭikkamāpeyya”nti.
atk-s0514a1:910_7: mā me antarāyaṃ karī”ti sayaṃ puttaṃ hatthe gahetvā apanetuṃ asakkonto tassā lañjaṃ paṭijānetvā gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:912_0: “Uṭṭhehi tvaṃ dhāti, imaṃ kumāraṃ ramehi aññattha;
atk-s0514a1:913_0: Mā me paripanthamakāsi, saggaṃ mama patthayānassā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:914_2: imaṃ kumāraṃ apanetvā āgantvā imaṃ maṇiṃ gahetvā aññattha naṃ abhiramehīti.
atk-s0514a1:915_0: Sā lañjaṃ labhitvā kumāraṃ saññāpetvā ādāya aññattha gantvā paridevamānā gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:917_0: “Yaṃ nūnimaṃ dadeyyaṃ pabhaṅkaraṃ, ko nu me imināttho;
atk-s0514a1:918_0: Sutasome pabbajite, kiṃ nu menaṃ karissāmī”ti.
atk-s0514a1:919_1: yaṃ nūna ahaṃ imaṃ lañjatthāya gahitaṃ pabhaṅkaraṃ suppabhāsaṃ maṇiṃ dadeyyaṃ,
atk-s0514a1:919_2: ko nu mayhaṃ sutasomanarinde pabbajite iminā attho,
atk-s0514a1:919_5: labhantīpi ca kiṃ nu kho etaṃ karissāmi,
atk-s0514a1:920_1: “ayaṃ rājā “gehe me dhanaṃ manda’nti saññaṃ karoti maññe,
atk-s0514a1:922_0: “Koso ca tuyhaṃ vipulo, koṭṭhāgārañca tuyhaṃ paripūraṃ;
atk-s0514a1:923_0: Pathavī ca tuyhaṃ vijitā, ramassu mā pabbaji devā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:926_0: “Koso ca mayhaṃ vipulo, koṭṭhāgārañca mayhaṃ paripūraṃ;
atk-s0514a1:927_0: Pathavī ca mayhaṃ vijitā, taṃ hitvā pabbajissāmī”ti.
atk-s0514a1:928_0: Taṃ sutvā tasmiṃ apagate kulavaḍḍhanaseṭṭhi nāma uṭṭhāya vanditvā gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:930_0: “Mayhampi dhanaṃ pahūtaṃ, saṅkhyātuṃ nopi deva sakkomi;
atk-s0514a1:931_0: Taṃ te dadāmi sabbampi, ramassu mā pabbaji devā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:934_0: “Jānāmi dhanaṃ pahūtaṃ, kulavaḍḍhana pūjito tayā casmi;
atk-s0514a1:936_0: Taṃ sutvā kulavaḍḍhane apagate mahāsatto somadattaṃ kaniṭṭhabhātaraṃ āmantetvā, “tāta,
atk-s0514a1:936_4: tvaṃ imaṃ rajjaṃ paṭipajjā”ti rajjaṃ niyyādento gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:940_0: Taṃ sutvā sopi pabbajitukāmo taṃ dīpento itaraṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:942_0: “Idañca tuyhaṃ rucitaṃ, sutasoma ajjeva dāni tvaṃ pabbaja;
atk-s0514a1:943_0: Ahampi pabbajissāmi, na ussahe tayā vinā ahaṃ ṭhātu”nti.
atk-s0514a1:944_0: Atha naṃ so paṭikkhipitvā upaḍḍhaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:946_0: “Na hi sakkā pabbajituṃ, nagare na hi paccati janapade cā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:947_0: Tattha na hi paccatīti idāneva tāva mama pabbajjādhippāyaṃ sutvāva imasmiṃ dvādasayojanike sudassananagare ca sakalajanapade ca na paccati,
atk-s0514a1:947_2: amhesu pana dvīsu pabbajitesu anāthāva raṭṭhavāsino bhavissanti,
atk-s0514a1:947_3: tasmā na hi sakkā tayā pabbajituṃ,
atk-s0514a1:948_0: Taṃ sutvā mahājano mahāsattassa pādamūle parivattitvā paridevanto upaḍḍhagāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:950_1: ahaṃ cirampi ṭhatvā tumhehi vinā bhavissāmi,
atk-s0514a1:950_2: uppannasaṅkhāro hi nicco nāma natthī”ti mahājanassa dhammaṃ kathento āha –
atk-s0514a1:953_0: Evaṃ suparittake jīvite, na ca pamajjituṃ kālo.
atk-s0514a1:960_4: Tasmā yathā parittaṃ udakaṃ rajakānaṃ khāracaṅkavāre pakkhittaṃ sīghaṃ pariyādiyati,
atk-s0514a1:960_6: Evaṃ suparittake jīvite taṃ parittakaṃ āyusaṅkhāraṃ gahetvā vicarantānaṃ sattānaṃ na puññakiriyāya pamajjituṃ kālo,
atk-s0514a1:960_8: Andhabālā pamajjantīti ajarāmarā viya hutvā gūthakalale sūkarā viya hutvā kāmapaṅke nimujjantā pamajjanti.
atk-s0514a1:961_0: Evaṃ mahāsatto mahājanassa dhammaṃ desetvā pubbakaṃ nāma pāsādaṃ āruyha sattamāya bhūmiyā ṭhito khaggena
atk-s0514a1:961_1: cūḷaṃ chinditvā “ahaṃ tumhākaṃ kiñci na homi,
atk-s0514a1:961_2: attano rājānaṃ gaṇhathā”ti saveṭhanaṃ cūḷaṃ mahājanassa antare khipi.
atk-s0514a1:961_3: Taṃ gahetvā mahājano bhūmiyaṃ parivaṭṭento parivaṭṭento paridevi.
atk-s0514a1:961_5: Paṭikkamitvā ṭhitajano taṃ oloketvā “raññā cūḷaṃ chinditvā saveṭhanā cūḷā mahājanassa antare khittā bhavissati,
atk-s0514a1:961_6: tenāyaṃ pāsādassa avidūre rajavaṭṭi uggatā”ti paridevanto gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:964_0: Maññe no kesā chinnā, yasassino dhammarājassā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:965_4: Maññe noti amhākaṃ dhammarājassa kesā chinnā bhavissantīti maññāma.
atk-s0514a1:966_0: Mahāsatto paricārikaṃ pesetvā pabbajitaparikkhāre āharāpetvā kappakena kesamassuṃ ohārāpetvā alaṅkāraṃ
atk-s0514a1:966_1: sayanapiṭṭhe pātetvā rattapaṭānaṃ dasāni chinditvā tāni kāsāyāni nivāsetvā mattikāpattaṃ vāmaaṃsakūṭe
atk-s0514a1:966_2: laggetvā kattaradaṇḍaṃ ādāya mahātale aparāparaṃ caṅkamitvā pāsādā otaritvā antaravīthiṃ paṭipajji.
atk-s0514a1:966_3: Gacchantaṃ pana naṃ na koci sañjāni.
atk-s0514a1:966_4: Athassa sattasatā khattiyakaññā pāsādaṃ abhiruhitvā taṃ adisvā ābharaṇabhaṇḍameva disvā otaritvā avasesānaṃ
atk-s0514a1:966_5: soḷasasahassānaṃ itthīnaṃ santikaṃ gantvā “amhākaṃ piyasāmiko sutasomamahissaro pabbajito”ti mahāsaddena
atk-s0514a1:966_7: Tasmiṃ khaṇe mahājano tassa pabbajitabhāvaṃ aññāsi,
atk-s0514a1:966_8: sakalanagaraṃ saṅkhubhitvā “rājā kira no pabbajito”ti rājadvāre sannipati,
atk-s0514a1:966_10: ettha bhavissatī”ti pāsādādīni rañño paribhogaṭṭhānāni gantvā rājānaṃ adisvā –
atk-s0514a1:1016_0: Tattha vītikiṇṇoti sovaṇṇapupphehi ca nānāmālyehi ca samokiṇṇo.
atk-s0514a1:1016_2: Itthāgārehīti dāsiyo upādāya itthiyo itthāgārā nāma.
atk-s0514a1:1017_0: Evaṃ tesu tesu ṭhānesu paridevitvā mahājano puna rājaṅgaṇaṃ āgantvā –
atk-s0514a1:1019_0: “Rājā vo kho pabbajito, sutasomo rajjaṃ imaṃ pahatvāna;
atk-s0514a1:1021_0: Gāthaṃ vatvā attano ghare vibhavaṃ pahāya puttadhītaro hatthesu gahetvā nikkhamitvā bodhisattasseva santikaṃ agamāsi,
atk-s0514a1:1021_1: tathā mātāpitaro puttadārā soḷasasahassā ca nāṭakitthiyo.
atk-s0514a1:1021_4: Bodhisatto dvādasayojanikaṃ parisaṃ gahetvā himavantābhimukho pāyāsi.
atk-s0514a1:1021_5: Athassa abhinikkhamanaṃ ñatvā sakko vissakammaṃ āmantetvā,
atk-s0514a1:1021_10: gaccha himavantapadese gaṅgātīre tiṃsayojanāyāmaṃ pañcadasayojanavitthataṃ assamapadaṃ māpehī”ti pesesi.
atk-s0514a1:1021_11: So tathā katvā tasmiṃ assamapade pabbajitaparikkhāre paṭiyādetvā ekapadikamaggaṃ māpetvā devalokameva gato.
atk-s0514a1:1022_0: Mahāsatto tena maggena gantvā taṃ assamapadaṃ pavisitvā paṭhamaṃ sayaṃ pabbajitvā pacchā sese pabbājesi,
atk-s0514a1:1022_3: Vissakammena pana assamamāpitaniyāmo ca bahūnaṃ pabbajitaniyāmo ca bodhisattassa assamapadasaṃvidahitaniyāmo
atk-s0514a1:1022_5: Tattha mahāsatto yassa yasseva kāmavitakkādi micchāvitakko uppajjati,
atk-s0514a1:1022_6: taṃ taṃ ākāsena upasaṅkamitvā ākāse pallaṅkena nisīditvā ovadanto gāthādvayamāha –
atk-s0514a1:1025_0: Mā vo kāmā haniṃsu, rammañhi sudassanaṃ nagaraṃ.
atk-s0514a1:1027_0: “Mettacittañca bhāvetha, appamāṇaṃ divā ca ratto ca;
atk-s0514a1:1029_0: Tattha ratikīḷitānīti kāmaratiyo ca kāyavācākhiḍḍāvasena pavattakīḷitāni ca.
atk-s0514a1:1029_1: Mā vo kāmā haniṃsūti mā tumhe vatthukāmakilesakāmā haniṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:1030_0: Sopi isigaṇo tassovāde ṭhatvā brahmalokaparāyaṇo ahosīti sabbaṃ hatthipālajātake āgatanayeneva kathetabbaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:1031_2: pubbepi tathāgato mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhantoyevā”ti vatvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi “tadā mātāpitaro mahārājakulāni ahesuṃ,
atk-s0514a1:1040_0: Uddayhate janapadoti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto purāṇadutiyikāpalobhanaṃ ārabba kathesi.
atk-s0514a1:1040_1: Kathento ca taṃ bhikkhuṃ “kena ukkaṇṭhāpitosī”ti pucchitvā “purāṇadutiyikāyā”ti vutte “na esā kho, bhikkhu,
atk-s0514a1:1040_3: pubbepi tvaṃ etaṃ nissāya jhānā parihāyitvā mahāvināsaṃ patto”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0514a1:1041_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto udiccabrāhmaṇamahāsālakule nibbattitvā vayappatto
atk-s0514a1:1041_1: uggahitasippo isipabbajjaṃ pabbijitvā jhānābhiññā nibbattetvā himavantapadese vāsaṃ kappesi.
atk-s0514a1:1041_2: Alambusājātake vuttanayeneva taṃ paṭicca ekā migī gabbhaṃ paṭilabhitvā puttaṃ vijāyi,
atk-s0514a1:1041_4: Atha naṃ pitā vayappattaṃ pabbājetvā kasiṇaparikammaṃ uggaṇhāpesi.
atk-s0514a1:1041_5: So nacirasseva jhānābhiññā uppādetvā jhānasukhena kīḷi,
atk-s0514a1:1041_8: Sakko āvajjento taṃ kāraṇaṃ ñatvā “upāyenassa sīlaṃ bhindissāmī”ti tīṇi saṃvaccharāni sakalakāsiraṭṭhe vuṭṭhiṃ nivāresi,
atk-s0514a1:1041_10: Sasse asampajjamāne dubbhikkhapīḷitā manussā sannipatitvā rājaṅgaṇe upakkosiṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:1041_11: Atha ne rājā vātapāne ṭhito “kiṃ eta”nti pucchi.
atk-s0514a1:1041_13: tīṇi saṃvaccharāni devassa avassantattā sakalaraṭṭhaṃ uddayhati,
atk-s0514a1:1041_16: Rājā sīlaṃ samādiyitvā uposathaṃ upavasantopi vassaṃ vassāpetuṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0514a1:1042_0: Tasmiṃ kāle sakko aḍḍharattasamaye tassa sirigabbhaṃ pavisitvā ekobhāsaṃ katvā vehāse aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0514a1:1042_10: himavantapadese isisiṅgo nāma tāpaso paṭivasati ghoratapo paramadhitindriyo.
atk-s0514a1:1042_11: So nibaddhaṃ deve vassante kujjhitvā ākāsaṃ olokesi,
atk-s0514a1:1042_18: taṃ pakkosāpetvā ‘asukaṭṭhānaṃ nāma gantvā tāpasassa tapaṃ bhindāhī’ti pesehī”ti.
atk-s0514a1:1042_19: Evaṃ so rājānaṃ anusāsitvā sakaṭṭhānameva agamāsi.
atk-s0514a1:1042_20: Rājā punadivase amaccehi saddhiṃ mantetvā dhītaraṃ pakkosāpetvā paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:1045_0: Ehi niḷinike gaccha, taṃ me brāhmaṇamānayā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:1046_0: Tattha taṃ meti taṃ mama anatthakāriṃ brāhmaṇaṃ attano vasaṃ ānehi,
atk-s0514a1:1054_0: “Phītaṃ janapadaṃ gantvā, hatthinā ca rathena ca;
atk-s0514a1:1059_2: phītaṃ pana subhikkhaṃ khemaṃ attano janapadaṃ hatthivāhanehi ca rathavāhanehi ca gantvā tato parampi
atk-s0514a1:1059_3: ajjhokāse paṭicchannena vayhādinā udakaṭṭhāne nāvāsaṅkhātena dārusaṅghāṭayānena gaccha.
atk-s0514a1:1059_4: Vaṇṇarūpenāti evaṃ akilamamānā gantvā tava vaṇṇena ceva rūpasampadāya ca taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ attano vasaṃ ānayissasīti.
atk-s0514a1:1060_0: Evaṃ so dhītarā saddhiṃ akathetabbampi raṭṭhaparipālanaṃ nissāya kathesi.
atk-s0514a1:1060_2: Athassā sabbaṃ dātabbayuttakaṃ datvā amaccehi saddhiṃ uyyojesi.
atk-s0514a1:1060_3: Amaccā taṃ ādāya paccantaṃ patvā tattha khandhāvāraṃ nivāsāpetvā rājadhītaraṃ ukkhipāpetvā vanacarakena
atk-s0514a1:1060_4: desitena maggena himavantaṃ pavisitvā pubbaṇhasamaye tassa assamapadassa samīpaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:1060_5: Tasmiṃ khaṇe bodhisatto puttaṃ assamapade nivāsāpetvā sayaṃ phalāphalatthāya araññaṃ paviṭṭho hoti.
atk-s0514a1:1060_6: Vanacarako sayaṃ assamaṃ agantvā tassa pana dassanaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā niḷinikāya taṃ dassento dve gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0514a1:1066_0: Maññe no aggiṃ hāpeti, isisiṅgo mahiddhiko”ti.
atk-s0514a1:1067_0: Tattha kadalīsaṅkhātā dhajā paññāṇaṃ assāti kadalīdhajapaññāṇo.
atk-s0514a1:1067_2: Saṅkhātoti eso aggi assa isisiṅgassa jhānena saṅkhāto paccakkhagato jalati.
atk-s0514a1:1067_3: Maññe no agginti aggiṃ no hāpeti juhati paricaratīti maññāmi.
atk-s0514a1:1068_0: Amaccāpi bodhisattassa araññaṃ paviṭṭhavelāya assamaṃ parivāretvā ārakkhaṃ ṭhapetvā rājadhītaraṃ isivesaṃ
atk-s0514a1:1068_1: gāhāpetvā suvaṇṇacīrakena nivāsanapārupanaṃ katvā sabbālaṅkārehi alaṅkaritvā tantubaddhaṃ cittageṇḍukaṃ
atk-s0514a1:1068_2: gāhāpetvā assamapadaṃ pesetvā sayaṃ bahi rakkhantā aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:1068_3: Sā tena geṇḍukena kīḷantī caṅkamakoṭiyaṃ otari.
atk-s0514a1:1068_4: Tasmiṃ khaṇe isisiṅgo paṇṇasāladvāre pāsāṇaphalake nisinno hoti.
atk-s0514a1:1068_5: So taṃ āgacchantiṃ disvā bhītatasito uṭṭhāya paṇṇasālaṃ pavisitvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0514a1:1068_7: Satthā tañca tato uttari ca atthaṃ pakāsento tisso gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0514a1:1078_0: Tattha geṇḍukenassāti assa isisiṅgassa assamadvāre geṇḍukena kīḷati.
atk-s0514a1:1078_2: Guyhaṃ pakāsitāni cāti guyhañca rahassaṅgaṃ pakāsitāni ca pākaṭāni mukhahatthādīni.
atk-s0514a1:1078_3: Abravīti so kira paṇṇasālāya ṭhatvā cintesi –
atk-s0514a1:1078_7: tāpaso bhavissatī”ti assamā nikkhamitvā pucchanto gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:1080_0: “Ambho ko nāma so rukkho, yassa tevaṃgataṃ phalaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:1081_0: Dūrepi khittaṃ pacceti, na taṃ ohāya gacchatī”ti.
atk-s0514a1:1082_0: Tattha yassa tevaṃgataṃ phalanti yassa tava rukkhassa evaṃgatikaṃ manoramaṃ phalaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:1082_1: Ko nāma so rukkhoti citrageṇḍukassa adiṭṭhapubbattā “rukkhaphalena tena bhavitabba”nti maññamāno evaṃ pucchati.
atk-s0514a1:1086_0: Bahavo tādisā rukkhā, yassa tevaṃgataṃ phalaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:1087_0: Dūrepi khittaṃ pacceti, na maṃ ohāya gacchatī”ti.
atk-s0514a1:1088_0: Tattha samīpe gandhamādaneti gandhamādanapabbate mama assamassa samīpe.
atk-s0514a1:1089_0: Iti sā musāvādaṃ abhāsi. Itaropi saddahitvā “tāpaso eso”ti saññāya paṭisanthāraṃ karonto gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:1091_0: “Etū bhavaṃ assamimaṃ adetu, pajjañca bhakkhañca paṭiccha dammi;
atk-s0514a1:1092_0: Idamāsanaṃ atra bhavaṃ nisīdatu, ito bhavaṃ mūlaphalāni bhuñjatū”ti.
atk-s0514a1:1093_0: Tattha assamimanti assamaṃ imaṃ bhavaṃ pavisatu.
atk-s0514a1:1094_0: Tassā paṇṇasālaṃ pavisitvā kaṭṭhattharaṇe nisīdantiyā suvaṇṇacīrake dvidhā gate sarīraṃ appaṭicchannaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0514a1:1094_1: Tāpaso mātugāmasarīrassa adiṭṭhapubbattā taṃ disvā “vaṇṇo eso”ti saññāya evamāha –
atk-s0514a1:1097_0: Akkhāhi me pucchito etamatthaṃ, kose nu te uttamaṅgaṃ paviṭṭha”nti.
atk-s0514a1:1098_0: Tattha supicchitanti dvinnaṃ ūrūnaṃ samāgamakāle suphusitaṃ sippipuṭamukhasaṇṭhānaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:1098_1: Subhalakkhaṇena hi asamannāgatāya taṃ ṭhānaṃ āvāṭadhātukaṃ hoti,
atk-s0514a1:1098_3: Kaṇharivappakāsatīti ubhosu passesu kāḷakaṃ viya khāyati.
atk-s0514a1:1098_4: Kose nu te uttamaṅgaṃ paviṭṭhanti tava uttamaṅgaṃ liṅgasaṇṭhānaṃ na paññāyati,
atk-s0514a1:1098_5: kiṃ nu taṃ tava sarīrasaṅkhāte kose paviṭṭhanti pucchati.
atk-s0514a1:1101_0: “Ahaṃ vane mūlaphalesanaṃ caraṃ, āsādayiṃ acchaṃ sughorarūpaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:1102_0: So maṃ patitvā sahasājjhapatto, panujja maṃ abbahi uttamaṅgaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:1104_0: “Svāyaṃ vaṇo khajjati kaṇḍuvāyati, sabbañca kālaṃ na labhāmi sātaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:1105_0: Paho bhavaṃ kaṇḍumimaṃ vinetuṃ, kurutaṃ bhavaṃ yācito brāhmaṇattha”nti.
atk-s0514a1:1106_5: Abbahīti mukhena mama uttamaṅgaṃ luñcitvā pakkāmi,
atk-s0514a1:1106_6: tato paṭṭhāya imasmiṃ ṭhāne vaṇo jāto.
atk-s0514a1:1106_7: Svāyanti so ayaṃ tato paṭṭhāya mayhaṃ vaṇo khajjati ceva kaṇḍuvañca karoti,
atk-s0514a1:1106_8: tappaccayā sāhaṃ sabbakālaṃ kāyikacetasikasukhaṃ na labhāmi.
atk-s0514a1:1106_10: Brāhmaṇatthanti bhavaṃ mayā yācito imaṃ brāhmaṇassa atthaṃ karotu,
atk-s0514a1:1107_0: So tassā musāvādaṃ “sabhāvo”ti saddahitvā “sace te evaṃ sukhaṃ hoti,
atk-s0514a1:1107_1: karissāmī”ti taṃ padesaṃ oloketvā anantaraṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:1109_0: “Gambhīrarūpo te vaṇo salohito, apūtiko vaṇagandho mahā ca;
atk-s0514a1:1110_0: Karomi te kiñci kasāyayogaṃ, yathā bhavaṃ paramasukhī bhaveyyā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:1111_3: Kasāyayoganti ahaṃ keci rukkhakasāye gahetvā tava ekaṃ kasāyayogaṃ karomīti.
atk-s0514a1:1114_0: “Na mantayogā na kasāyayogā, na osadhā brahmacāri kamanti;
atk-s0514a1:1115_0: Yaṃ te mudu tena vinehi kaṇḍuṃ, yathā ahaṃ paramasukhī bhaveyya”nti.
atk-s0514a1:1116_5: anekavāraṃ katehipi tehi etassa phāsukabhāvo na bhūtapubbo.
atk-s0514a1:1116_6: Yaṃ pana te etaṃ mudu aṅgajātaṃ,
atk-s0514a1:1116_7: tena ghaṭṭiyamānasseva tassa kaṇḍu na hoti,
atk-s0514a1:1117_0: So “saccaṃ eso bhaṇatī”ti sallakkhetvā “methunasaṃsaggena sīlaṃ bhijjati,
atk-s0514a1:1117_1: jhānaṃ antaradhāyatī”ti ajānanto mātugāmassa adiṭṭhapubbattā methunadhammassa ca ajānanabhāvena “bhesajja”nti vadantiyā tāya methunaṃ paṭisevi.
atk-s0514a1:1117_4: So dve tayo vāre saṃsaggaṃ katvā kilanto hutvā nikkhamitvā saraṃ oruyha nhatvā paṭippassaddhadaratho
atk-s0514a1:1117_5: āgantvā paṇṇasālāyaṃ nisīditvā punapi taṃ “tāpaso”ti maññamāno vasanaṭṭhānaṃ pucchanto gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:1119_0: “Ito nu bhoto katamena assamo, kacci bhavaṃ abhiramasi araññe;
atk-s0514a1:1120_0: Kacci nu te mūlaphalaṃ pahūtaṃ, kacci bhavantaṃ na vihiṃsanti vāḷā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:1121_0: Tattha katamenāti ito katamena disābhāgena bhoto assamo. Bhavanti ālapanametaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:1124_0: “Ito ujuṃ uttarāyaṃ disāyaṃ, khemā nadī himavatā pabhāvī;
atk-s0514a1:1125_0: Tassā tīre assamo mayha rammo, aho bhavaṃ assamaṃ mayhaṃ passe.
atk-s0514a1:1127_0: “Ambā ca sālā tilakā ca jambuyo, uddālakā pāṭaliyo ca phullā;
atk-s0514a1:1128_0: Samantato kimpurisābhigītaṃ, aho bhavaṃ assamaṃ mayhaṃ passe.
atk-s0514a1:1130_0: “Tālā ca mūlā ca phalā ca mettha, vaṇṇena gandhena upetarūpaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:1131_0: Taṃ bhūmibhāgehi upetarūpaṃ, aho bhavaṃ assamaṃ mayhaṃ passe.
atk-s0514a1:1133_0: “Phalā ca mūlā ca pahūtamettha, vaṇṇena gandhena rasenupetā;
atk-s0514a1:1134_0: Āyanti ca luddakā taṃ padesaṃ, mā me tato mūlaphalaṃ ahāsu”nti.
atk-s0514a1:1135_5: Kimpurisābhigītanti samantato parivāretvā madhurasaddena gāyantehi kimpurisehi abhigītaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:1135_6: Tālā ca mūlā ca phalā ca metthāti ettha mama assame pāsādikā tālarukkhā ca tesaññeva vaṇṇagandhādisampannā kandasaṅkhātā mūlā ca phalā ca.
atk-s0514a1:1135_7: Pahūtametthāti nānārukkhaphalā ca rukkhavallimūlā ca pahūtā ettha.
atk-s0514a1:1135_8: Mā me tatoti taṃ mama assamapadaṃ sambahulā luddakā āgacchanti,
atk-s0514a1:1135_9: mayā cettha āharitvā ṭhapitaṃ bahu madhurasamūlaphalāphalaṃ atthi,
atk-s0514a1:1135_11: Te tato mama mūlaphalāphalaṃ mā hariṃsu,
atk-s0514a1:1135_12: tasmā sacepi mayā saddhiṃ āgantukāmo, ehi, no ce,
atk-s0514a1:1136_0: Taṃ sutvā tāpaso yāva pitu āgamanā adhivāsāpetuṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:1138_0: “Pitā mamaṃ mūlaphalesanaṃ gato, idāni āgacchati sāyakāle;
atk-s0514a1:1139_0: Ubhova gacchāmase assamaṃ taṃ, yāva pitā mūlaphalato etū”ti.
atk-s0514a1:1140_0: Tattha ubhova gacchāmaseti mama pitu ārocetvā ubhova gamissāma.
atk-s0514a1:1141_1: “ayaṃ tāva araññeva vaḍḍhitabhāvena mama itthibhāvaṃ na jānāti,
atk-s0514a1:1141_2: pitā panassa maṃ disvāva jānitvā ‘tvaṃ idha kiṃ karosī’ti kājakoṭiyā paharitvā sīsampi me bhindeyya,
atk-s0514a1:1141_5: Sā tassa āgamanūpāyaṃ ācikkhantī itaraṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:1143_0: “Aññe bahū isayo sādhurūpā, rājīsayo anumagge vasanti;
atk-s0514a1:1144_0: Teyeva pucchesi mamassamaṃ taṃ, te taṃ nayissanti mamaṃ sakāse”ti.
atk-s0514a1:1145_2: aññe pana sādhusabhāvā rājisayo ca brāhmaṇisayo ca anumagge mama assamamaggapasse vasanti,
atk-s0514a1:1146_0: Evaṃ sā attano palāyanūpāyaṃ katvā paṇṇasālato nikkhamitvā taṃ olokentameva “tvaṃ nivattā”ti vatvā āgamanamaggeneva amaccānaṃ santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0514a1:1146_1: Te taṃ gahetvā khandhāvāraṃ gantvā anupubbena bārāṇasiṃ pāpuṇiṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:1146_2: Sakkopi taṃ divasameva tussitvā sakalaraṭṭhe devaṃ vassāpesi,
atk-s0514a1:1146_4: Isisiṅgatāpasassapi tāya pakkantamattāya eva kāye ḍāho uppajji.
atk-s0514a1:1146_5: So kampanto paṇṇasālaṃ pavisitvā vākacīraṃ pārupitvā socanto nipajji.
atk-s0514a1:1146_6: Bodhisatto sāyaṃ āgantvā puttaṃ apassanto “kahaṃ nu kho gato”ti kājaṃ otāretvā paṇṇasālaṃ pavisitvā taṃ nipannakaṃ disvā “tāta,
atk-s0514a1:1146_7: kiṃ karosī”ti piṭṭhiṃ parimajjanto tisso gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0514a1:1148_0: “Na te kaṭṭhāni bhinnāni, na te udakamābhataṃ;
atk-s0514a1:1149_0: Aggīpi te na hāpito, kiṃ nu mandova jhāyasi.
atk-s0514a1:1151_0: “Bhinnāni kaṭṭhāni huto ca aggi, tapanīpi te samitā brahmacārī;
atk-s0514a1:1152_0: Pīṭhañca mayhaṃ udakañca hoti, ramasi tuvaṃ brahmabhūto puratthā.
atk-s0514a1:1155_0: Na me tuvaṃ ālapasī mamajja, naṭṭhaṃ nu kiṃ cetasikañca dukkha”nti.
atk-s0514a1:1156_2: Bhinnānīti pubbe tayā mamāgamanavelāya kaṭṭhāni uddhaṭāneva honti.
atk-s0514a1:1156_3: Huto ca aggīti aggi ca huto hoti.
atk-s0514a1:1156_4: Tapanīti visibbanaaggisaṅkhātā tapanīpi te samitāva sayameva saṃvidahitāva hoti.
atk-s0514a1:1156_5: Pīṭhanti mama āsanatthāya pīṭhañca paññattameva hoti.
atk-s0514a1:1156_7: Brahmabhūtoti tuvampi ito puratthā seṭṭhabhūto imasmiṃ assame abhiramasi.
atk-s0514a1:1156_9: Asiddhabhojanoti na te kiñci amhākaṃ kandamūlaṃ vā paṇṇaṃ vā seditaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:1156_13: Naṭṭhaṃ nu kinti kiṃ nu te naṭṭhaṃ vā,
atk-s0514a1:1157_0: So pitu vacanaṃ sutvā taṃ kāraṇaṃ kathento āha –
atk-s0514a1:1163_0: Dve yamā gaṇḍā ure sujātā, suvaṇṇatindukanibhā pabhassarā.
atk-s0514a1:1165_0: “Mukhañca tassa bhusadassaneyyaṃ, kaṇṇesu lambanti ca kuñcitaggā;
atk-s0514a1:1166_0: Te jotare carato māṇavassa, suttañca yaṃ saṃyamanaṃ jaṭānaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:1168_0: “Aññā ca tassa saṃyamāni catasso, nīlā pītā lohitikā ca setā;
atk-s0514a1:1169_0: Tā piṃsare carato māṇavassa, tiriṭisaṅghāriva pāvusamhi.
atk-s0514a1:1171_0: “Na mikhalaṃ muñjamayaṃ dhāreti, na santhare no pana pabbajassa;
atk-s0514a1:1172_0: Tā jotare jaghanantare vilaggā, sateratā vijjurivantalikkhe.
atk-s0514a1:1175_0: Aghaṭṭitā niccakīḷaṃ karonti, haṃ tāta kiṃrukkhaphalāni tāni.
atk-s0514a1:1177_0: “Jaṭā ca tassa bhusadassaneyyā, parosataṃ vellitaggā sugandhā;
atk-s0514a1:1178_0: Dvedhā siro sādhu vibhattarūpo, aho nu kho mayha tathā jaṭāssu.
atk-s0514a1:1180_0: “Yadā ca so pakirati tā jaṭāyo, vaṇṇena gandhena upetarūpā;
atk-s0514a1:1181_0: Nīluppalaṃ vātasameritaṃva, tatheva saṃvāti panassamo ayaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:1183_0: “Paṅko ca tassa bhusadassaneyyo, netādiso yādiso mayhaṃ kāye;
atk-s0514a1:1184_0: So vāyati erito mālutena, vanaṃ yathā aggagimhe suphullaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:1186_0: “Nihanti so rukkhaphalaṃ pathabyā, sucittarūpaṃ ruciraṃ dassaneyyaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:1187_0: Khittañca tassa punarehi hatthaṃ, haṃ tāta kiṃrukkhaphalaṃ nu kho taṃ.
atk-s0514a1:1189_0: “Dantā ca tassa bhusadassaneyyā, suddhā samā saṅkhavarūpapannā;
atk-s0514a1:1190_0: Mano pasādenti vivariyamānā, na hi nūna so sākamakhādi tehi.
atk-s0514a1:1192_0: “Akakkasaṃ aggaḷitaṃ muhuṃ muduṃ, ujuṃ anuddhataṃ acapalamassa bhāsitaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:1193_0: Rudaṃ manuññaṃ karavīkasussaraṃ, hadayaṅgamaṃ rañjayateva me mano.
atk-s0514a1:1196_0: Icchāmi bho taṃ punadeva daṭṭhuṃ, mitto hi me māṇavohu puratthā.
atk-s0514a1:1198_0: “Susandhi sabbattha vimaṭṭhimaṃ vaṇaṃ, puthū sujātaṃ kharapattasannibhaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:1199_0: Teneva maṃ uttariyāna māṇavo, vivaritaṃ ūruṃ jaghanena piḷayi.
atk-s0514a1:1204_0: “Akakkasaṅgo na ca dīghalomo, nakhāssa dīghā api lohitaggā;
atk-s0514a1:1205_0: Mudūhi bāhāhi palissajanto, kalyāṇarūpo ramayaṃ upaṭṭhahi.
atk-s0514a1:1208_0: Hatthā mudū tehi maṃ samphusitvā, ito gato tena maṃ dahanti tāta.
atk-s0514a1:1210_0: “Na nūna so khārividhaṃ ahāsi, na nūna so kaṭṭhāni sayaṃ abhañji;
atk-s0514a1:1211_0: Na nūna so hanti dume kuṭhāriyā, na hissa hatthesu khilāni atthi.
atk-s0514a1:1213_0: “Accho ca kho tassa vaṇaṃ akāsi, so maṃbravi ‘sukhitaṃ maṃ karohi’;
atk-s0514a1:1214_0: Tāhaṃ kariṃ tena mamāsi sokhyaṃ, so cabravi ‘sukhitosmī’ti brahme.
atk-s0514a1:1216_0: “Ayañca te māluvapaṇṇasanthatā, vikiṇṇarūpāva mayā ca tena ca;
atk-s0514a1:1217_0: Kilantarūpā udake ramitvā, punappunaṃ paṇṇakuṭiṃ vajāma.
atk-s0514a1:1219_0: “Na majja mantā paṭibhanti tāta, na aggihuttaṃ napi yaññatantaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:1220_0: Na cāpi te mūlaphalāni bhuñje, yāva na passāmi taṃ brahmacāriṃ.
atk-s0514a1:1222_0: “Addhā pajānāsi tuvampi tāta, yassaṃ disaṃ vasate brahmacārī;
atk-s0514a1:1223_0: Taṃ maṃ disaṃ pāpaya tāta khippaṃ, mā te ahaṃ amarimassamamhi.
atk-s0514a1:1226_0: Taṃ maṃ vanaṃ pāpaya tāta khippaṃ, purā te pāṇaṃ vijahāmi assame”ti.
atk-s0514a1:1227_4: Vinetīti attano sarīrappabhāya assamapadaṃ ekobhāsaṃ viya vineti pūreti.
atk-s0514a1:1227_6: tassa bhoto sukaṇhehi kaṇhacchadanehi bhamaravaṇṇehi kesehi sukaṇhasīsaṃ sumajjitamaṇimayaṃ viya khāyati.
atk-s0514a1:1227_10: Ādhārarūpañca panassa kaṇṭheti kaṇṭhe ca panassa amhākaṃ bhikkhābhājanaṭṭhapanaṃ pattādhārasadisaṃ piḷandhanaṃ atthīti muttāhāraṃ sandhāya vadati.
atk-s0514a1:1228_4: “Saṃyamāni catasso”ti iminā maṇisuvaṇṇapavāḷarajatamayāni cattāri piḷandhanāni dasseti.
atk-s0514a1:1228_5: Tā piṃsareti tāni piḷandhanāni pāvusamhi pavuṭṭhe deve tiriṭisaṅghā viya viravanti.
atk-s0514a1:1228_11: yathā mayaṃ tiṇamayaṃ vā vākamayaṃ vā cīrakaṃ dhārema,
atk-s0514a1:1228_16: Niccakīḷaṃ karontīti aghaṭṭitānipi niccakālaṃ kīḷāyanti. Haṃ,
atk-s0514a1:1228_18: Kiṃ rukkhaphalāni tānīti tāni tassa māṇavassa suttāruḷhāni kaṭiyaṃ baddhāni katararukkhaphalāni nāmāti maṇisaṅghāṭiṃ sandhāyāha.
atk-s0514a1:1229_2: Dvedhāsiroti tassa sīsaṃ dvedhā katvā baddhānaṃ jaṭānaṃ vasena suṭṭhu vibhattarūpaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:1229_5: aho vata mamapi tathā assūti patthento āha.
atk-s0514a1:1229_7: Vātasameritaṃvāti yathā nāma nīluppalaṃ vātena samīritaṃ,
atk-s0514a1:1229_8: tatheva ayaṃ imasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe assamo saṃvāti.
atk-s0514a1:1229_12: So hi dassanīyo ceva sugandho ca.
atk-s0514a1:1230_1: Kiṃ rukkhaphalaṃ nu kho tanti katararukkhassa nu kho taṃ phalaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:1230_3: Na hi nūna so sākamakhādi tehīti na nūna so māṇavo mayaṃ viya tehi dantehi rukkhapaṇṇāni ceva mūlaphalāphalāni ca khādi.
atk-s0514a1:1230_4: Amhākañhi tāni khādantānaṃ sabalā paṇṇavaṇṇā dantāti dīpeti.
atk-s0514a1:1231_6: Rudanti bhāsamānassa sarasaṅkhātaṃ rudampi manoharaṃ karavīkassa viya sussaraṃ sumadhuraṃ.
atk-s0514a1:1231_9: Māṇavohūti so hi māṇavo puratthā mama mitto ahu.
atk-s0514a1:1232_0: Susandhi sabbattha vimaṭṭhimaṃ vaṇanti tāta tassa māṇavassa ūrūnaṃ antare ekaṃ vaṇaṃ atthi,
atk-s0514a1:1232_8: Tapantīti tassa māṇavassa sarīrato niccharantā suvaṇṇavaṇṇaraṃsiyo jalanti obhāsanti virocanti ca.
atk-s0514a1:1232_11: Vicitravaṭṭaṅgulikāssa sobhareti hatthāpissa varalakkhaṇavicitrāhi pavālaṅkurasadisāhi vaṭṭaṅgulīhi samannāgatā sobhanti.
atk-s0514a1:1233_1: Ramayaṃ upaṭṭhahīti maṃ ramayanto upaṭṭhahi paricari.
atk-s0514a1:1233_3: Suvaṇṇakambutalavaṭṭasucchavīti suvaṇṇamayaṃ ādāsatalaṃ viya vaṭṭā ca succhavi ca,
atk-s0514a1:1233_5: Samphusitvāti suṭṭhu phusitvā attano hatthasamphassaṃ mama sarīre pharāpetvā.
atk-s0514a1:1233_6: Ito gatoti mama olokentasseva ito gato.
atk-s0514a1:1233_7: Tena maṃ dahantīti tena tassa hatthasamphassena idāni maṃ dahanti.
atk-s0514a1:1233_8: Tathā hi tassa gatakālato paṭṭhāya mama sarīre ḍāho uṭṭhito,
atk-s0514a1:1234_1: nūna so māṇavo na khāribhāraṃ ukkhipitvā vicari.
atk-s0514a1:1234_6: ayaṃ tava māluvapaṇṇasanthatā ajja mayā ca tena ca aññamaññaṃ parāmasanāliṅganavasena parivattantehi vikiṇṇā viya ākulabyākulā jātā.
atk-s0514a1:1234_8: ahañca so ca abhiramitvā kilantarūpā paṇṇasālato nikkhamitvā udakaṃ pavisitvā ramitvā vigatadarathā punappunaṃ imameva kuṭiṃ pavisāmāti vadati.
atk-s0514a1:1235_0: Na majja mantāti ajja mama tassa gatakālato paṭṭhāya neva mantā paṭibhanti na upaṭṭhahanti na ruccanti.
atk-s0514a1:1235_1: Na aggihuttaṃ napi yaññatantanti mahābrahmuno ārādhanatthāya kattabbahomavidhūpanādiyaññakiriyāpi me na paṭibhāti na upaṭṭhāti na ruccati.
atk-s0514a1:1235_2: Na cāpi teti tayā ābhatamūlaphalāphalānipi na bhuñjāmi.
atk-s0514a1:1235_4: Vananti tassa māṇavassa assamaṃ parivāretvā ṭhitavananti.
atk-s0514a1:1236_0: Tassevaṃ vilapantassa taṃ vilāpaṃ sutvā mahāsatto “ekāya itthiyā imassa sīlaṃ bhinnaṃ bhavissatī”ti ñatvā taṃ ovadanto cha gāthāyo abhāsi –
atk-s0514a1:1241_0: “Bhavanti mittāni atho na honti, ñātīsu mittesu karonti pemaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:1242_0: Ayañca jammo kissa vā niviṭṭho, yo neva jānāti ‘kutomhi āgato’.
atk-s0514a1:1247_0: “Sace tuvaṃ dakkhasi brahmacāriṃ, sace tuvaṃ sallape brahmacārinā;
atk-s0514a1:1250_0: “Punapi ce dakkhasi brahmacāriṃ, punapi ce sallape brahmacārinā;
atk-s0514a1:1254_0: Na tāni sevetha naro sapañño, āsajja naṃ nassati brahmacārī”ti.
atk-s0514a1:1255_6: evarūpe vane vasanto yaṃ aratiṃ tvaṃ patto,
atk-s0514a1:1256_2: loke sattānaṃ mittāni nāma hontipi na hontipi tattha yesaṃ honti,
atk-s0514a1:1256_3: te attano ñātīsu ca mittesu ca pemaṃ karonti.
atk-s0514a1:1256_5: Kissa vā niviṭṭhoti kena nāma kāraṇena tasmiṃ mātugāme mittasaññāya niviṭṭho,
atk-s0514a1:1256_6: so migiyā kucchismiṃ nibbattitvā araññe vaḍḍhitattā “kutomhi āgato”ti attano āgataṭṭhānamattampi na jānāti,
atk-s0514a1:1257_1: mittāni nāma punappunaṃ saṃvāsena saṃsevanena sandhīyanti ghaṭīyanti.
atk-s0514a1:1257_2: Sveva mittoti so eva mitto asaṃgantu asamāgacchantassa purisassa tena asamāgamasaṅkhātena asaṃvāsena jīrati vinassati.
atk-s0514a1:1257_6: atha yathā nāma nipphannasassaṃ mahoghena harīyati,
atk-s0514a1:1257_7: evaṃ imaṃ attano tapoguṇaṃ pahissasi hāressasīti attho.
atk-s0514a1:1258_2: manussalokasmiñhi etāni yakkhinisaṅkhātāni bhūtāni vividharūpapaṭicchannena attano rūpena attano vasaṃ gate khādituṃ caranti,
atk-s0514a1:1258_4: Tādisañhi bhūtaṃ āsajja naṃ patvā nassati brahmacārī,
atk-s0514a1:1258_5: diṭṭhosi tāya yakkhiniyā na khāditoti puttaṃ ovadi.
atk-s0514a1:1259_0: So pitu kathaṃ sutvā “yakkhinī kira sā”ti bhīto cittaṃ nivattetvā “tāta,
atk-s0514a1:1259_6: So tathā paṭipajjitvā puna jhānābhiññā nibbattesi.
atk-s0514a1:1260_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi,
atk-s0514a1:1264_0: Nivesanaṃ kassanudaṃ sunandāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ukkaṇṭhitabhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0514a1:1264_1: So kirekadivasaṃ sāvatthiyaṃ piṇḍāya caranto ekaṃ alaṅkatapaṭiyattaṃ uttamarūpadharaṃ itthiṃ oloketvā
atk-s0514a1:1264_2: paṭibaddhacitto hutvā cittaṃ nivattetuṃ asakkonto vihārameva āgantvā tato paṭṭhāya sallaviddho viya rāgāturo
atk-s0514a1:1264_3: bhantamigapaṭibhāgo kiso dhamanīsanthatagatto uppaṇḍuppaṇḍukajāto anabhirato ekiriyāpathepi cittassādaṃ
atk-s0514a1:1264_13: so tvaṃ manussapaṭilābhaṃ paṭilabhitvā dukkhassantakiriyaṃ patthayamāno assumukhaṃ ñātijanaṃ pahāya saddhāya pabbajitvā kiṃkāraṇā kilesavasaṃ yāsi,
atk-s0514a1:1264_29: tvaṃ nāma evarūpe buddhasāsane pabbajitvā evaṃ anatthakārakānaṃ kilesānaṃ vasaṃ gatosī”ti ovaditvā attano
atk-s0514a1:1264_30: kathaṃ gāhāpetuṃ asakkontā satthu santikaṃ dhammasabhaṃ netvā “kiṃ,
atk-s0514a1:1264_35: bhante”ti vutte “bhikkhu porāṇakapaṇḍitā rajjaṃ anusāsantāpi kilese uppanne tassa vasaṃ agantvā cittaṃ
atk-s0514a1:1264_36: nivāretvā na ayuttakaṃ kariṃsū”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0514a1:1265_0: Atīte siviraṭṭhe ariṭṭhapuranagare sivi nāma rājā rajjaṃ kāresi.
atk-s0514a1:1265_5: Te ubhopi sahāyā hutvā abhivaḍḍhantā soḷasavassikā hutvā takkasilaṃ gantvā sippaṃ uggaṇhitvā āgamiṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:1265_7: Sopi abhipārakaṃ senāpatiṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā dhammena rajjaṃ kāresi.
atk-s0514a1:1265_8: Tasmiṃyeva nagare tiriṭivacchassa nāma asītikoṭivibhavassa seṭṭhino dhītā nibbatti uttamarūpadharā sobhaggappattā subhalakkhaṇena samannāgatā,
atk-s0514a1:1265_10: Sā soḷasavassikakāle atikkantamānusavaṇṇā devaccharā viya abhirūpā dassanīyā pāsādikā paramāya vaṇṇapokkharatāya samannāgatā ahosi.
atk-s0514a1:1265_12: te te sakabhāvena saṇṭhātuṃ asakkontā surāpānamadamattā viya kilesamadena mattā hutvā satiṃ paccupaṭṭhāpetuṃ samatthā nāma nāhesuṃ.
atk-s0514a1:1266_3: lakkhaṇapāṭhake brāhmaṇe pesetvā taṃ vīmaṃsāpetvā yathāruci karohī”ti āha.
atk-s0514a1:1266_5: Te seṭṭhigehaṃ gantvā katasakkārasammānā pāyāsaṃ paribhuñjiṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:1266_6: Tasmiṃ khaṇe ummādantī sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍitā tesaṃ santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0514a1:1266_7: Te taṃ disvā satiṃ paccupaṭṭhāpetuṃ asakkontā kilesamadamattā hutvā attano vippakatabhojanabhāvaṃ na jāniṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:1266_8: Ekacce ālopaṃ gahetvā “bhuñjissāmā”ti saññāya sīse ṭhapesuṃ,
atk-s0514a1:1266_12: Sā te disvā “ime kira mama lakkhaṇaṃ vīmaṃsissanti,
atk-s0514a1:1266_14: Te maṅkubhūtā rājanivesanaṃ gantvā ummādantiyā kuddhā “deva,
atk-s0514a1:1266_18: Sā taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā “ahaṃ kira kāḷakaṇṇīti raññā na gahitā,
atk-s0514a1:1266_19: kāḷakaṇṇiyo nāma na evarūpā hontī”ti vatvā “hotu,
atk-s0514a1:1267_0: Kassa pana kammassa nissandena sā evaṃ abhirūpā ahosīti?
atk-s0514a1:1267_2: Sā kira atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ daliddakule nibbattitvā ussavadivase puññasampannā itthiyo kusumbharattavatthaṃ
atk-s0514a1:1267_3: nivāsetvā alaṅkatā kīḷantiyo disvā tādisaṃ vatthaṃ nivāsetvā kīḷitukāmā hutvā mātāpitūnaṃ ārocetvā tehi,  “amma,
atk-s0514a1:1267_5: kuto no evarūpaṃ vattha”nti vutte “tena hi maṃ ekasmiṃ aḍḍhakule bhatiṃ kātuṃ anujānātha,
atk-s0514a1:1267_6: te mama guṇaṃ ñatvā dassantī”ti vatvā tehi anuññātā ekaṃ kulaṃ upasaṅkamitvā “kusumbharattavatthena bhatiṃ karomī”ti āha.
atk-s0514a1:1267_7: Atha naṃ te “tīṇi saṃvaccharāni kamme kate tava guṇaṃ ñatvā dassāmā”ti vadiṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:1267_9: Te tassā guṇaṃ ñatvā aparipuṇṇesuyeva tīsu saṃvaccharesu tassā ghanakusumbharattavatthena saddhiṃ aññampi
atk-s0514a1:1267_10: vatthaṃ datvā “tava sahāyikāhi saddhiṃ gantvā nhatvā nivāsehī”ti taṃ pesayiṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:1267_11: Sā sahāyikā ādāya gantvā rattavatthaṃ nadītīre ṭhapetvā nhāyi.
atk-s0514a1:1268_0: Tasmiṃ khaṇe eko kassapadasabalassa sāvako acchinnacīvaro sākhābhaṅgaṃ nivāsetvā ca pārupitvā ca taṃ padesaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0514a1:1268_1: Sā taṃ disvā “ayaṃ bhadanto acchinnacīvaro bhavissati,
atk-s0514a1:1268_2: pubbepi adinnabhāvena me nivāsanaṃ dullabhaṃ jāta”nti taṃ vatthaṃ dvidhā phāletvā “ekaṃ koṭṭhāsaṃ ayyassa
atk-s0514a1:1268_3: dassāmī”ti cintetvā uttaritvā attano nivāsanaṃ nivāsetvā “tiṭṭhatha,
atk-s0514a1:1268_4: bhante”ti vatvā theraṃ vanditvā rattavatthaṃ majjhe phāletvā tassekaṃ koṭṭhāsaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0514a1:1268_5: So ekamante paṭicchanne ṭhatvā sākhābhaṅgaṃ chaḍḍetvā tassekaṃ kaṇṇaṃ nivāsetvā ekaṃ pārupitvā nikkhami.
atk-s0514a1:1268_6: Athassa vatthobhāsena sakalasarīraṃ taruṇasūriyo viya ekobhāsaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0514a1:1268_7: Sā taṃ disvā “mayhaṃ ayyo paṭhamaṃ na sobhati,
atk-s0514a1:1268_9: idampi etasseva dassāmī”ti dutiyampi koṭṭhāsaṃ datvā “bhante,
atk-s0514a1:1268_10: ahaṃ bhave bhave vicarantī uttamarūpadharā bhaveyyaṃ,
atk-s0514a1:1268_11: maṃ disvā koci puriso sakabhāvena saṇṭhātuṃ mā asakkhi,
atk-s0514a1:1268_12: mayā abhirūpatarā nāma aññā mā hotū”ti patthanaṃ paṭṭhapesi.
atk-s0514a1:1269_0: Sā devaloke saṃsarantī tasmiṃ kāle ariṭṭhapure nibbattitvā tathā abhirūpā ahosi.
atk-s0514a1:1269_3: Abhipārako attano ārakkhaṭṭhānaṃ gacchanto taṃ āmantetvā “bhadde,
atk-s0514a1:1269_5: rājā nagaraṃ padakkhiṇaṃ karonto paṭhamaṃ imaṃ gehadvāraṃ āgamissati,
atk-s0514a1:1269_7: sopi taṃ disvā satiṃ upaṭṭhāpetuṃ na sakkhissatī”ti āha.
atk-s0514a1:1269_9: ahaṃ jānissāmī”ti sampaṭicchitvā tasmiṃ gate dāsiṃ āṇāpesi “rañño imaṃ gehadvāraṃ āgatakāle mayhaṃ āroceyyāsī”ti.
atk-s0514a1:1269_10: Atha sūriye atthaṅgate uggahe puṇṇacande devanagare viya nagare alaṅkate sabbadisāsu dīpesu jalitesu
atk-s0514a1:1269_11: rājā sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍito ājaññarathavaragato amaccagaṇaparivuto mahantena yasena nagaraṃ padakkhiṇaṃ
atk-s0514a1:1269_13: Taṃ pana gehaṃ manosilāvaṇṇapākāraparikkhittaṃ alaṅkatadvāraṭṭālakaṃ sobhaggappattaṃ pāsādikaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:1269_15: Sā pupphasamuggaṃ gāhāpetvā kinnarilīḷāya vātapānaṃ nissāya ṭhitā rañño pupphāni khipi.
atk-s0514a1:1269_16: So taṃ ulloketvā kilesamadamatto satiṃ upaṭṭhāpetuṃ asakkonto “abhipārakassetaṃ geha”nti sañjānitumpi nāsakkhi,
atk-s0514a1:1269_17: atha sārathiṃ āmantetvā pucchanto dve gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0514a1:1271_0: “Nivesanaṃ kassa nudaṃ sunanda, pākārena paṇḍumayena guttaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:1272_0: Kā dissati aggisikhāva dūre, vehāyasaṃ pabbataggeva acci.
atk-s0514a1:1274_0: “Dhītā nvayaṃ kassa sunanda hoti, suṇisā nvayaṃ kassa athopi bhariyā;
atk-s0514a1:1275_0: Akkhāhi me khippamidheva puṭṭho, avāvaṭā yadi vā atthi bhattā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:1276_0: Tattha kassa nudanti kassa nu idaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:1276_6: Bhattāti yadi vā assā sāmiko atthi,
atk-s0514a1:1277_0: Athassa so ācikkhanto dve gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0514a1:1279_0: “Ahañhi jānāmi janinda etaṃ, matyā ca petyā ca athopi assā;
atk-s0514a1:1280_0: Taveva so puriso bhūmipāla, rattindivaṃ appamatto tavatthe.
atk-s0514a1:1282_0: “Iddho ca phīto ca suvaḍḍhito ca, amacco ca te aññataro janinda;
atk-s0514a1:1284_0: Tattha matyā ca petyā cāti mātito ca pitito cetaṃ jānāmi.
atk-s0514a1:1284_1: Athopi assāti atha sāmikampi assā jānāmīti vadati.
atk-s0514a1:1285_0: Taṃ sutvā rājā nāmamassā thomento anantaraṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:1287_0: “Ambho ambho nāmamidaṃ imissā, matyā ca petyā ca kataṃ susādhu;
atk-s0514a1:1288_0: Tadā hi mayhaṃ avalokayantī, ummattakaṃ ummadantī akāsī”ti.
atk-s0514a1:1289_0: Tattha matyā ca petyā cāti mātarā ca pitarā ca.
atk-s0514a1:1289_2: Avalokayantīti mayā avalokitā sayampi maṃ avalokayantī maṃ ummattakaṃ akāsīti attho.
atk-s0514a1:1290_0: Sā tassa kampitabhāvaṃ ñatvā vātapānaṃ thaketvā sirigabbhameva agamāsi.
atk-s0514a1:1290_1: Raññopi tassā diṭṭhakālato paṭṭhāya nagaraṃ padakkhiṇakaraṇe cittameva nāhosi.
atk-s0514a1:1290_7: rajjampi tassevānucchavika”nti rathaṃ nivattāpetvā pāsādaṃ abhiruyha sirisayane nipajjitvā vippalapanto āha –
atk-s0514a1:1293_0: Dve puṇṇamāyo tadahū amaññahaṃ, disvāna pārāvatarattavāsiniṃ.
atk-s0514a1:1295_0: “Aḷārapamhehi subhehi vaggubhi, palobhayantī maṃ yadā udikkhati;
atk-s0514a1:1296_0: Vijambhamānā harateva me mano, jātā vane kimpurisīva pabbate.
atk-s0514a1:1301_0: “Kadāssu maṃ tambanakhā sulomā, bāhā mudū candanasāralittā;
atk-s0514a1:1302_0: Vaṭṭaṅgulī sannatadhīrakuttiyā, nārī upaññissati sīsato subhā.
atk-s0514a1:1305_0: Mudūhi bāhāhi palissajissati, brahāvane jātadumaṃva māluvā.
atk-s0514a1:1308_0: Mukhaṃ mukhena upanāmayissati, soṇḍova soṇḍassa surāya thālaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:1316_0: “Sakko ce me varaṃ dajjā, so ca labbhetha me varo;
atk-s0514a1:1319_1: Migamandalocanāti kaṇḍasantāsena palāyitvā vanantare ṭhatvā luddaṃ olokentiyā migiyā viya mandāni locanāni assāti migamandalocanā.
atk-s0514a1:1319_2: Upāvisīti padumavaṇṇena karatalena pupphāni khipitvā maṃ olokentī vātapāne nisīdi.
atk-s0514a1:1319_4: Dve puṇṇamāyoti ahaṃ tadahu tasmiṃ chaṇadivase taṃ pārāvatapādasamānavaṇṇarattavatthanivatthaṃ disvā
atk-s0514a1:1319_5: tassā mukhasobhaṃ olokento ekassa pācīnalokadhātuto ekassa abhipārakassa senāpatino nivesaneti dvinnaṃ
atk-s0514a1:1319_10: Udikkhatīti evarūpehi nettehi yasmiṃ khaṇe oloketi.
atk-s0514a1:1319_11: Pabbateti yathā himavantapabbate supupphitavane vīṇaṃ ādāya tantissarena attano saraṃ saṃsandantī kimpurisī kimpurisassa manaṃ harati,
atk-s0514a1:1320_4: Bhantāvudikkhatīti saṇhakesā puthunalāṭā āyatabhamū visālakkhī tuṅganāsā rattoṭṭhā setadantā tikhiṇadāṭhā
atk-s0514a1:1320_5: suvaṭṭitagīvā sutanubāhu susaṇṭhitapayodharā karamitamajjhā visālasoṇī suvaṇṇakadalisamānoru sā uttamitthī
atk-s0514a1:1320_6: tasmiṃ khaṇe maṃ udikkhantī bhayena vanaṃ pavisitvā puna nivattitvā luddaṃ udikkhantī bhantā migīva maṃ
atk-s0514a1:1320_10: Upaññissati manti sā subhā nārī kadā nu maṃ tehi tambanakhehi sīsato paṭṭhāya sannatena dhīrena karaṇena paritosessatīti patthento vilapati.
atk-s0514a1:1321_7: Sakassa cittassāti attano cittassa anissaro jātomhīti adhippāyo.
atk-s0514a1:1321_8: Kañcinanti kañci “ayaṃ asuko nāmā”ti na jānāmi,
atk-s0514a1:1321_13: So ca labbhethāti yaṃ me sakko varaṃ dadeyya,
atk-s0514a1:1322_2: nagaraṃ padakkhiṇaṃ karonto tumhākaṃ gharadvāraṃ patvā nivattitvā pāsādaṃ abhiruhī”ti.
atk-s0514a1:1322_3: So attano gehaṃ gantvā ummādantiṃ āmantetvā “bhadde,
atk-s0514a1:1322_5: eko mahodaro mahādāṭhiko rathe ṭhatvā āgato puriso atthi,
atk-s0514a1:1322_6: ahaṃ taṃ rājā vā arājā vāti na jānāmi,
atk-s0514a1:1322_7: eko issaroti pana vutte vātapāne ṭhatvā pupphāni khipiṃ,
atk-s0514a1:1322_9: So taṃ sutvā “nāsitomhi tayā”ti punadivase pātova rājanivesanaṃ āruyha sirigabbhadvāre ṭhatvā rañño ummādantiṃ
atk-s0514a1:1322_10: nissāya vippalāpaṃ sutvā “ayaṃ ummādantiyā paṭibaddhacitto jāto,
atk-s0514a1:1322_12: rañño ca mama ca aguṇaṃ mocetvā imassa mayā jīvitaṃ dātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti attano nivesanaṃ gantvā ekaṃ daḷhamantaṃ upaṭṭhākaṃ pakkosāpetvā, “tāta,
atk-s0514a1:1322_14: tvaṃ kañci ajānāpetvā atthaṅgate sūriye tattha gantvā antorukkhe nisīda,
atk-s0514a1:1322_15: ahaṃ tattha balikammaṃ karonto taṃ ṭhānaṃ patvā devatā namassanto,
atk-s0514a1:1322_17: amhākaṃ rājā nagaramhi chaṇe vattamāne akīḷitvā sirigabbhaṃ pavisitvā vippalapantova nipanno,
atk-s0514a1:1322_21: idaṃ nāma nissāya rājā vippalapatīti ācikkhatha,
atk-s0514a1:1322_26: so pana tava bhariyāya ummādantiyā paṭibaddhacitto.
atk-s0514a1:1322_31: ummādantimassa dehī’ti vadeyyāsī”ti evaṃ taṃ uggaṇhāpetvā uyyojesi.
atk-s0514a1:1323_0: So gantvā tasmiṃ rukkhe nisīditvā punadivase senāpatinā amaccagaṇaparivutena taṃ ṭhānaṃ gantvā yācito tathā abhāsi.
atk-s0514a1:1323_1: Senāpati “sādhū”ti vatvā devataṃ vanditvā amacce jānāpetvā nagaraṃ pavisitvā rājanivesanaṃ āruyha sirigabbhadvāraṃ ākoṭesi.
atk-s0514a1:1323_2: Rājā satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā “ko eso”ti pucchi. Ahaṃ, deva,
atk-s0514a1:1325_0: “Bhūtāni me bhūtapatī namassato, āgamma yakkho idametadabravi;
atk-s0514a1:1326_0: Rañño mano ummadantyā niviṭṭho, dadāmi te taṃ paricārayassū”ti.
atk-s0514a1:1327_0: Tattha namassatoti tumhākaṃ vippalāpakāraṇajānanatthaṃ balikammaṃ katvā namassantassa.
atk-s0514a1:1327_1: Tanti ahaṃ taṃ ummādantiṃ tumhākaṃ paricārikaṃ katvā dadāmīti.
atk-s0514a1:1328_2: mama ummādantiyā paṭibaddhacittatāya vippalapitabhāvaṃ yakkhāpi jānantī”ti pucchi. Āma, devāti.
atk-s0514a1:1328_3: So “sabbalokena kira me lāmakabhāvo ñāto”ti lajjidhamme patiṭṭhāya anantaraṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:1330_0: “Puññā ca dhaṃse amaro na camhi, jano ca me pāpamidañca jaññā;
atk-s0514a1:1331_0: Bhuso ca tyassa manaso vighāto, datvā piyaṃ ummadantiṃ adaṭṭhā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:1332_2: ahaṃ tāya saddhiṃ kilesavasena paricārento puññato ca dhaṃseyyaṃ,
atk-s0514a1:1332_3: tāya saddhiṃ paricāritamattena amaro ca na homi,
atk-s0514a1:1332_4: mahājano ca me imaṃ lāmakabhāvaṃ jāneyya,
atk-s0514a1:1332_6: tañca mama datvā pacchā piyabhariyaṃ adaṭṭhā tava manaso vighāto cassāti attho.
atk-s0514a1:1335_0: “Janinda nāññatra tayā mayā vā, sabbāpi kammassa katassa jaññā;
atk-s0514a1:1336_0: Yaṃ te mayā ummadantī padinnā, bhusehi rājā vanathaṃ sajāhi.
atk-s0514a1:1338_0: “Yo pāpakaṃ kammakaraṃ manusso, so maññati māyida maññiṃsu aññe;
atk-s0514a1:1339_0: Passanti bhūtāni karontametaṃ, yuttā ca ye honti narā pathabyā.
atk-s0514a1:1341_0: “Añño nu te koci naro pathabyā, saddheyya lokasmi na me piyāti;
atk-s0514a1:1342_0: Bhuso ca tyassa manuso vighāto, datvā piyaṃ ummadantiṃ adaṭṭhā.
atk-s0514a1:1344_0: “Addhā piyā mayha janinda esā, na sā mamaṃ appiyā bhūmipāla;
atk-s0514a1:1345_0: Gaccheva tvaṃ ummadantiṃ bhadante, sīhova selassa guhaṃ upeti.
atk-s0514a1:1347_0: “Na pīḷitā attadukhena dhīrā, sukhapphalaṃ kamma pariccajanti;
atk-s0514a1:1348_0: Sammohitā vāpi sukhena mattā, na pāpakammañca samācaranti.
atk-s0514a1:1350_0: “Tuvañhi mātā ca pitā ca mayhaṃ, bhattā patī posako devatā ca;
atk-s0514a1:1351_0: Dāso ahaṃ tuyha saputtadāro, yathāsukhaṃ sāmi karohi kāmaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:1353_0: “Yo ‘issaromhī’ti karoti pāpaṃ, katvā ca so nuttasate paresaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:1354_0: Na tena so jīvati dīghamāyu, devāpi pāpena samekkhare naṃ.
atk-s0514a1:1356_0: “Aññātakaṃ sāmikehī padinnaṃ, dhamme ṭhitā ye paṭicchanti dānaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:1357_0: Paṭicchakā dāyakā cāpi tattha, sukhapphalaññeva karonti kammaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:1359_0: “Añño nu te koci naro pathabyā, saddheyya lokasmi na me piyāti;
atk-s0514a1:1360_0: Bhuso ca tyassa manaso vighāto, datvā piyaṃ ummadantiṃ adaṭṭhā.
atk-s0514a1:1362_0: “Addhā piyā mayha janinda esā, na sā mamaṃ appiyā bhūmipāla;
atk-s0514a1:1363_0: Yaṃ te mayā ummadantī padinnā, bhusehi rājā vanathaṃ sajāhi.
atk-s0514a1:1365_0: “Yo attadukkhena parassa dukkhaṃ, sukhena vā attasukhaṃ dahāti;
atk-s0514a1:1366_0: Yathevidaṃ mayha tathā paresaṃ, yo evaṃ jānāti sa vedi dhammaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:1368_0: “Añño nu te koci naro pathabyā, saddheyya lokasmi na me piyāti;
atk-s0514a1:1369_0: Bhuso ca tyassa manaso vighāto, datvā piyaṃ ummadantiṃ adaṭṭhā.
atk-s0514a1:1371_0: “Janinda jānāsi piyā mamesā, na sā mamaṃ appiyā bhūmipāla;
atk-s0514a1:1372_0: Piyena te dammi piyaṃ janinda, piyadāyino deva piyaṃ labhanti.
atk-s0514a1:1375_0: Na hi dhammaṃ adhammena, ahaṃ vadhitumussahe.
atk-s0514a1:1377_0: “Sace tuvaṃ mayha satiṃ janinda, na kāmayāsi naravīra seṭṭha;
atk-s0514a1:1378_0: Cajāmi naṃ sabbajanassa sibyā, mayā pamuttaṃ tato avhayesi naṃ.
atk-s0514a1:1380_0: “Adūsiyaṃ ce abhipāraka tvaṃ, cajāsi katte ahitāya tyassa;
atk-s0514a1:1381_0: Mahā ca te upavādopi assa, na cāpi tyassa nagaramhi pakkho.
atk-s0514a1:1383_0: “Ahaṃ sahissaṃ upavādametaṃ, nindaṃ pasaṃsaṃ garahañca sabbaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:1384_0: Mametamāgacchatu bhūmipāla, yathāsukhaṃ sivi karohi kāmaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:1386_0: “Yo neva nindaṃ na panappasaṃsaṃ, ādiyati garahaṃ nopi pūjaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:1387_0: Sirī ca lakkhī ca apeti tamhā, āpo suvuṭṭhīva yathā thalamhā.
atk-s0514a1:1389_0: “Yaṃ kiñci dukkhañca sukhañca etto, dhammātisārañca manovighātaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:1390_0: Urasā ahaṃ paccuttarissāmi sabbaṃ, pathavī yathā thāvarānaṃ tasānaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:1393_0: Ekovimaṃ hārayissāmi bhāraṃ, dhamme ṭhito kiñci ahāpayanto.
atk-s0514a1:1395_0: “Saggūpagaṃ puññakammaṃ janinda, mā me tuvaṃ antarāyaṃ akāsi;
atk-s0514a1:1396_0: Dadāmi te ummadantiṃ pasanno, rājāva yaññe dhanaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:1398_0: “Addhā tuvaṃ katte hitesi mayhaṃ, sakhā mamaṃ ummadantī tuvañca;
atk-s0514a1:1399_0: Nindeyyu devā pitaro ca sabbe, pāpañca passaṃ abhisamparāyaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:1401_0: “Na hetadhammaṃ sivirāja vajjuṃ, sanegamā jānapadā ca sabbe;
atk-s0514a1:1402_0: Yaṃ te mayā ummadantī padinnā, bhusehi rājā vanathaṃ sajāhi.
atk-s0514a1:1404_0: “Addhā tuvaṃ katte hitesi mayhaṃ, sakhā mamaṃ ummadantī tuvañca;
atk-s0514a1:1407_0: “Āhuneyyo mesi hitānukampī, dhātā vidhātā casi kāmapālo;
atk-s0514a1:1408_0: Tayī hutā rāja mahapphalā hi, kāmena me ummadantiṃ paṭiccha.
atk-s0514a1:1410_0: “Addhā hi sabbaṃ abhipāraka tvaṃ, dhammaṃ acārī mama kattuputta;
atk-s0514a1:1411_0: Añño nu te ko idha sotthikattā, dvipado naro aruṇe jīvaloke.
atk-s0514a1:1413_0: “Tuvaṃ nu seṭṭho tvamanuttarosi, tvaṃ dhammagutto dhammavidū sumedho;
atk-s0514a1:1414_0: So dhammagutto cirameva jīva, dhammañca me desaya dhammapāla.
atk-s0514a1:1417_0: Dhammaṃ te desayissāmi, sataṃ āsevitaṃ ahaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:1426_0: Ye vāpi ñatvāna sayaṃ karonti, upamā imā mayhaṃ tuvaṃ suṇohi.
atk-s0514a1:1429_0: Sabbā tā jimhaṃ gacchanti, nette jimhaṃ gate sati.
atk-s0514a1:1432_0: So ce adhammaṃ carati, pageva itarā pajā;
atk-s0514a1:1433_0: Sabbaṃ raṭṭhaṃ dukhaṃ seti, rājā ce hoti adhammiko.
atk-s0514a1:1436_0: Sabbā gāvī ujuṃ yanti, nette ujuṃ gate sati.
atk-s0514a1:1439_0: So sace dhammaṃ carati, pageva itarā pajā;
atk-s0514a1:1440_0: Sabbaṃ raṭṭhaṃ sukhaṃ seti, rājā ce hoti dhammiko.
atk-s0514a1:1443_0: Imaṃ vā pathaviṃ sabbaṃ, vijetuṃ abhipāraka.
atk-s0514a1:1448_0: “Assitthiyo ratanaṃ maṇikañca, yañcāpi me candimasūriyā abhipālayanti;
atk-s0514a1:1449_0: Na tassa hetu visamaṃ careyyaṃ, majjhe sivīnaṃ usabhomhi jāto.
atk-s0514a1:1451_0: “Netā hitā uggato raṭṭhapālo, dhammaṃ sivīnaṃ apacāyamāno;
atk-s0514a1:1452_0: So dhammamevānuvicintayanto, tasmā sake cittavase na vatto.
atk-s0514a1:1455_0: Karissasi ciraṃ rajjaṃ, paññā hi tava tādisī.
atk-s0514a1:1458_0: Dhammaṃ pamajja khattiyo, raṭṭhā cavati issaro.
atk-s0514a1:1461_0: Idha dhammaṃ caritvāna, rāja saggaṃ gamissasi.
atk-s0514a1:1464_0: Idha dhammaṃ caritvāna, rāja saggaṃ gamissasi.
atk-s0514a1:1467_0: Idha dhammaṃ caritvāna, rāja saggaṃ gamissasi.
