atk-s0514a1:2599_0: Kāmaṃ karohi te tayā, muñca vā te hanassu vā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:2600_0: Tattha vipalāyiṃsūti satiṃ paccupaṭṭhāpetuṃ asakkontā vipallatthacittā bhijjiṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:2600_1: Kusasaddabhayaṭṭitāti kusarañño saddaṃ nissāya jātena bhayena upaddutā mūḷhacittā.
atk-s0514a1:2600_4: Tasminti evaṃ bodhisattassa saddasavaneneva saṅgāme bhinne tasmiṃ saṅgāmasīse taṃ mahāsattassa parakkamaṃ
atk-s0514a1:2600_5: passitvā tuṭṭhahadayo sakko verocanaṃ nāma maṇikkhandhaṃ tassa adāsi.
atk-s0514a1:2600_7: Bandhitvāti tesaññeva uttari sāṭakena pacchābāhaṃ bandhitvā.
atk-s0514a1:2600_8: Kāmaṃ karohi te tayāti tvaṃ attano kāmaṃ icchaṃ ruciṃ karohi,
atk-s0514a1:2603_0: “Tuyheva sattavo ete, na hi te mayha sattavo;
atk-s0514a1:2604_0: Tvaññeva no mahārāja, muñca vā te hanassu vā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:2605_0: Tattha tvaññeva noti, mahārāja, tvaṃyeva amhākaṃ issaroti.
atk-s0514a1:2609_0: Dadāhi nesaṃ ekekaṃ, hontu jāmātaro tavā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:2613_0: Tvaññeva no mahārāja, dehi nesaṃ yadicchasī”ti.
atk-s0514a1:2614_3: tvaññeva etesañca sattannaṃ rājūnaṃ mamañca imāsañca sabbesaṃ no issaro.
atk-s0514a1:2615_0: Evaṃ vutte so tā sabbāpi alaṅkārāpetvā ekekassa rañño ekekaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0514a1:2615_1: Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā pañca gāthāyo abhāsi –
atk-s0514a1:2618_0: Khattiyānaṃ tadā tesaṃ, rañño maddassa dhītaro.
atk-s0514a1:2630_0: Samaggā te tadā āsuṃ, phītaṃ dharaṇimāvasu”nti.
atk-s0514a1:2631_1: Pāyiṃsūti idāni appamattā bhaveyyāthāti kusanarindena ovaditā agamaṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:2631_2: Agamāsīti katipāhaṃ vasitvā “amhākaṃ raṭṭhaṃ gamissāmā”ti sasuraṃ āpucchitvā gato.
atk-s0514a1:2631_3: Ekarathe yantāti dvepi ekarathaṃ abhiruyha gacchantā.
atk-s0514a1:2631_4: Samānā vaṇṇarūpenāti vaṇṇena ca rūpena ca samānā hutvā.
atk-s0514a1:2631_6: Maṇiratanānubhāvena kira mahāsatto abhirūpo ahosi suvaṇṇavaṇṇo sobhaggappatto,
atk-s0514a1:2631_7: so kira pubbe paccekabuddhassa piṇḍapātanissandena buddhapaṭimākaraṇanissandena ca evaṃ tejavanto ahosi.
atk-s0514a1:2631_8: Saṃgacchīti athassa mātā mahāsattassa āgamanaṃ sutvā nagare bheriṃ carāpetvā mahāsattassa bahuṃ paṇṇākāraṃ ādāya paccuggamanaṃ katvā samāgacchi.
atk-s0514a1:2631_9: Sopi mātarā saddhiṃyeva nagaraṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā sattāhaṃ chaṇakīḷaṃ kīḷitvā alaṅkatapāsādatalaṃ abhiruhi.
atk-s0514a1:2631_11: tato paṭṭhāya yāvajīvaṃ samaggā sammodamānā phītaṃ dharaṇiṃ ajjhāvasiṃsūti.
atk-s0514a1:2632_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi,
atk-s0514a1:2636_0: Devatā nusi gandhabboti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto mātuposakabhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0514a1:2636_5: porāṇakapaṇḍitā sakalajambudīpe rajjaṃ labhamānāpi taṃ aggahetvā mātāpitaro posiṃsuyevā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0514a1:2637_0: Atīte bārāṇasī brahmavaḍḍhanaṃ nāma nagaraṃ ahosi.
atk-s0514a1:2637_1: Tattha manojo nāma rājā rajjaṃ kāresi.
atk-s0514a1:2637_2: Tattha aññataro asītikoṭivibhavo brāhmaṇamahāsālo aputtako ahosi.
atk-s0514a1:2637_3: Tassa brāhmaṇī teneva “bhoti puttaṃ patthehī”ti vuttā patthesi.
atk-s0514a1:2637_4: Atha bodhisatto brahmalokā cavitvā tassā kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi,
atk-s0514a1:2637_6: Tassa padasā gamanakāle aññopi satto brahmalokā cavitvā tassāyeva kucchimhi paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi,
atk-s0514a1:2637_8: Tesaṃ uggahitavedānaṃ sabbasippesu nipphattiṃ pattānaṃ vayappattānaṃ rūpasampadaṃ disvā brāhmaṇo brāhmaṇiṃ
atk-s0514a1:2637_9: āmantetvā “bhoti puttaṃ soṇakumāraṃ gharabandhanena bandhissāmā”ti āha.
atk-s0514a1:2637_10: Sā “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā puttassa tamatthaṃ ācikkhi. So “alaṃ, amma,
atk-s0514a1:2637_12: ahaṃ yāvajīvaṃ tumhe paṭijaggitvā tumhākaṃ accayena himavantaṃ pavisitvā pabbajissāmī”ti āha.
atk-s0514a1:2638_0: Te punappunaṃ kathentāpi tassa cittaṃ alabhitvā nandakumāraṃ āmantetvā “tāta,
atk-s0514a1:2638_1: tena hi tvaṃ kuṭumbaṃ paṭipajjāhī”ti vatvā “nāhaṃ bhātarā chaḍḍitakheḷaṃ sīsena ukkhipāmi,
atk-s0514a1:2638_2: ahampi tumhākaṃ accayena bhātarāva saddhiṃ pabbajissāmī”ti vutte tesaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā “ime dve evaṃ taruṇāva kāme pajahanti,
atk-s0514a1:2638_6: idāneva sabbe mayaṃ pabbajissāmā”ti rañño ārocetvā sabbaṃ dhanaṃ dānamukhe vissajjetvā dāsajanaṃ bhujissaṃ
atk-s0514a1:2638_7: katvā ñātīnaṃ dātabbayuttakaṃ datvā cattāropi janā brahmavaḍḍhananagarā nikkhamitvā himavantapadese pañcapadumasañchannaṃ
atk-s0514a1:2638_8: saraṃ nissāya ramaṇīye vanasaṇḍe assamaṃ māpetvā pabbajitvā tattha vasiṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:2638_10: tesaṃ pātova dantakaṭṭhañca mukhadhovanañca datvā paṇṇasālañca pariveṇañca sammajjitvā pānīyaṃ paribhojanīyaṃ
atk-s0514a1:2638_11: upaṭṭhapetvā araññato madhuraphalāphalāni āharitvā mātāpitaro khādāpenti,
atk-s0514a1:2638_12: uṇhena vā sītena vā vārinā nhāpenti,
atk-s0514a1:2639_0: Evaṃ addhāne gate nandapaṇḍito “mayā ābhataphalāphalāneva paṭhamaṃ mātāpitaro khādāpessāmī”ti purato
atk-s0514a1:2639_1: gantvā hiyyo ca parahiyyo ca gahitaṭṭhānato yāni vā tāni vā pātova āharitvā mātāpitaro khādāpesi.
atk-s0514a1:2639_2: Te tāni khāditvā mukhaṃ vikkhāletvā uposathikā bhavanti.
atk-s0514a1:2639_3: Soṇapaṇḍito pana dūraṃ gantvā madhuramadhurāni supakkasupakkāni āharitvā upanāmesi. Atha naṃ, “tāta,
atk-s0514a1:2639_4: kaniṭṭhena te ābhatāni mayaṃ pātova khāditvā uposathikā jātā,
atk-s0514a1:2639_6: Iti tassa phalāphalāni paribhogaṃ na labhanti vinassanti,
atk-s0514a1:2639_8: Evaṃ so pañcābhiññatāya dūraṃ gantvāpi āharati,
atk-s0514a1:2640_2: nando ca yāni vā tāni vā apakkaduppakkāni phalāphalāni āharitvā khādāpeti,
atk-s0514a1:2640_3: evaṃ sante ime na cīraṃ pavattissanti,
atk-s0514a1:2640_6: ito paṭṭhāya phalāphalaṃ āharitvā mamāgamanaṃ paṭimānehi,
atk-s0514a1:2640_8: So evaṃ vuttepi attano puññaṃ paccāsīsanto na tassa vacanamakāsi.
atk-s0514a1:2640_9: Mahāsatto “nando mama vacanaṃ akaronto ayuttaṃ karoti,
atk-s0514a1:2640_12: tvaṃ anovādako paṇḍitānaṃ vacanaṃ na karosi,
atk-s0514a1:2641_0: So tena palāpito tassa santike ṭhātuṃ asakkonto taṃ vanditvā mātāpitaro upasaṅkamitvā tamatthaṃ ārocetvā
atk-s0514a1:2641_1: attano paṇṇasālaṃ pavisitvā kasiṇaṃ oloketvā taṃ divasameva pañca abhiññāyo aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbattetvā cintesi –
atk-s0514a1:2641_2: “ahaṃ sīnerupādato ratanavālukā āharitvā mama bhātu paṇṇasālāya pariveṇe okiritvā bhātaraṃ khamāpetuṃ pahomi,
atk-s0514a1:2641_4: anotattato udakaṃ āharitvā mama bhātu paṇṇasālāya pariveṇe osiñcitvā bhātaraṃ khamāpetuṃ pahomi,
atk-s0514a1:2641_6: sace me bhātaraṃ devatānaṃ vasena khamāpeyyaṃ,
atk-s0514a1:2641_7: cattāro ca mahārājāno sakkañca ānetvā bhātaraṃ khamāpetuṃ pahomi,
atk-s0514a1:2641_9: sakalajambudīpe manojaṃ aggarājānaṃ ādiṃ katvā rājāno ānetvā khamāpessāmi,
atk-s0514a1:2641_10: evaṃ sante mama bhātu guṇo sakalajambudīpe avattharitvā gamissati,
atk-s0514a1:2641_12: So tāvadeva iddhiyā gantvā brahmavaḍḍhananagare tassa rañño nivesanadvāre otaritvā ṭhito “eko kira vo tāpaso daṭṭhukāmo”ti rañño ārocāpesi.
atk-s0514a1:2641_24: So dūtena puṭṭho “rājānaṃ upaṭṭhahituṃ āgatomhī”ti āha.
atk-s0514a1:2641_27: So taṃ sutvā “ahaṃ tumhākaṃ attano balena sakalajambudīpe rajjaṃ gahetvā dassāmī”ti āha.
atk-s0514a1:2642_2: kiñci upāyaṃ jānissantī”ti taṃ pakkosāpetvā āsane nisīdāpetvā vanditvā “bhante,
atk-s0514a1:2642_3: tumhe kira mayhaṃ sakalajambudīparajjaṃ gahetvā dassathā”ti pucchi.
atk-s0514a1:2642_7: antamaso khuddakamakkhikāya pivanamattampi lohitaṃ kassaci anuppādetvā tava dhanacchedaṃ akatvā attano iddhiyāva gahetvā dassāmi,
atk-s0514a1:2642_8: apica kevalaṃ papañcaṃ akatvā ajjeva nikkhamituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti.
atk-s0514a1:2642_9: So tassa vacanaṃ saddahitvā senaṅgaparivuto nagarā nikkhami.
atk-s0514a1:2642_11: nandapaṇḍito attano iddhiyā chāyaṃ katvā sītaṃ karoti,
atk-s0514a1:2642_12: deve vassante senāya upari vassituṃ na deti,
atk-s0514a1:2642_15: maggaṃ kasiṇamaṇḍalaṃ viya samaṃ katvā sayaṃ ākāse cammakhaṇḍaṃ pattharitvā pallaṅkena nisinno senāya parivuto gacchati.
atk-s0514a1:2643_0: Evaṃ senaṃ ādāya paṭhamaṃ kosalaraṭṭhaṃ gantvā nagarassāvidūre khandhāvāraṃ nivāsāpetvā “yuddhaṃ vā no
atk-s0514a1:2643_1: detu setacchattaṃ vā”ti kosalarañño dūtaṃ pāhesi.
atk-s0514a1:2643_2: So kujjhitvā “kiṃ ahaṃ na rājā”ti “yuddhaṃ dammī”ti senāya purakkhato nikkhami.
atk-s0514a1:2643_4: Nandapaṇḍito dvinnampi antare attano nisīdanaṃ ajinacammaṃ mahantaṃ katvā pasāretvā dvīhipi senāhi khittasare cammeneva sampaṭicchi.
atk-s0514a1:2643_5: Ekasenāyapi koci kaṇḍena viddho nāma natthi,
atk-s0514a1:2643_6: hatthagatānaṃ pana kaṇḍānaṃ khayena dvepi senā nirussāhā aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:2643_8: mahārājā”ti assāsetvā kosalassa santikaṃ gantvā “mahārāja, mā bhāyi,
atk-s0514a1:2643_16: So “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā taṃ attano vase vattetvā dve senā ādāya aṅgaraṭṭhaṃ gantvā aṅgaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0514a1:2643_17: tato magadharaṭṭhanti etenupāyena sakalajambudīpe rājāno attano vase vattetvā tato tehi parivuto brahmavaḍḍhananagarameva gato.
atk-s0514a1:2643_18: Rajjaṃ gaṇhanto panesa sattannaṃ saṃvaccharānaṃ upari sattadivasādhikehi sattamāsehi gaṇhi.
atk-s0514a1:2643_19: So ekekarājadhānito nānappakāraṃ khajjabhojanaṃ āharāpetvā ekasatarājāno gahetvā tehi saddhiṃ sattāhaṃ mahāpānaṃ pivi.
atk-s0514a1:2644_1: tāvassa attānaṃ na dassessāmī”ti uttarakurumhi piṇḍāya caritvā himavante kañcanaguhādvāre sattāhaṃ vasi.
atk-s0514a1:2644_2: Manojopi sattame divase attano mahantaṃ sirivibhavaṃ oloketvā “ayaṃ yaso na mayhaṃ mātāpitūhi,
atk-s0514a1:2644_5: taṃ kho pana me apassantassa ajja sattamo divaso,
atk-s0514a1:2644_6: kahaṃ nu kho me yasadāyako”ti nandapaṇḍitaṃ sari.
atk-s0514a1:2644_7: So tassa anussaraṇabhāvaṃ ñatvā āgantvā purato ākāse aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0514a1:2644_9: “ahaṃ imassa tāpasassa devatābhāvaṃ vā manussabhāvaṃ vā na jānāmi,
atk-s0514a1:2647_0: Manussabhūto iddhimā, kathaṃ jānemu taṃ maya”nti.
atk-s0514a1:2648_0: So tassa vacanaṃ sutvā sabhāvameva kathento dutiyaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:2650_0: “Nāpi devo na gandhabbo, nāpi sakko purindado;
atk-s0514a1:2652_0: Tattha bhāradhāti raṭṭhabhāradhāritāya naṃ evaṃ ālapati.
atk-s0514a1:2653_0: Taṃ sutvā rājā “manussabhūto kirāyaṃ mayhaṃ evaṃ bahupakāro,
atk-s0514a1:2653_1: mahantena yasena naṃ santappessāmī”ti cintetvā āha –
atk-s0514a1:2661_0: “Tato phītāni raṭṭhāni, vasino te bhavaṃ akā;
atk-s0514a1:2662_0: Tato ekasataṃ khatye, anuyante bhavaṃ akā.
atk-s0514a1:2668_0: “Atha vaṅge vā magadhe, mayaṃ bhoto dadāmase;
atk-s0514a1:2669_0: Atha vā assakāvantī, sumanā damma te mayaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:2672_0: Sace te attho rajjena, anusāsa yadicchasī”ti.
atk-s0514a1:2673_6: Vasino teti te raṭṭhavāsino amhākaṃ vasavattino.
atk-s0514a1:2673_10: Vada taṃ bhañjamicchasīti bhañjanti ratanassetaṃ nāmaṃ,
atk-s0514a1:2673_17: tampi te datvā ahaṃ phalakāvudhahattho tumhākaṃ rathassa purato gamissāmīti dīpeti.
atk-s0514a1:2673_18: Yadicchasīti etesu mayā vuttappakāresu yaṃ icchasi,
atk-s0514a1:2674_0: Taṃ sutvā nandapaṇḍito attano adhippāyaṃ āvikaronto āha –
atk-s0514a1:2676_0: “Na me atthopi rajjena, nagarena dhanena vā;
atk-s0514a1:2677_0: Athopi janapadena, attho mayhaṃ na vijjatī”ti.
atk-s0514a1:2678_0: “Sace te mayi sineho atthi, ekaṃ me vacanaṃ karohī”ti vatvā gāthādvayamāha –
atk-s0514a1:2681_0: Pitā mayhaṃ janettī ca, ubho sammanti assame.
atk-s0514a1:2684_0: Bhavantaṃ ajjhāvaraṃ katvā, soṇaṃ yācemu saṃvara”nti.
atk-s0514a1:2685_5: Kātaveti vattapaṭivattaphalāphalāharaṇasaṅkhātaṃ puññaṃ kātuṃ na labhāmi,
atk-s0514a1:2685_6: bhātā me soṇapaṇḍito nāma mamekasmiṃ aparādhe mā idha vasīti maṃ palāpesi.
atk-s0514a1:2685_7: Ajjhāvaranti adhiāvaraṃ te mayaṃ bhavantaṃ saparivāraṃ katvā soṇapaṇḍitaṃ saṃvaraṃ yācemu,
atk-s0514a1:2685_10: mayaṃ tayā saddhiṃ soṇaṃ yāceyyāma khamāpeyyāma,
atk-s0514a1:2685_11: imaṃ varaṃ tava santikā gaṇhāmīti attho.
atk-s0514a1:2688_0: “Karomi te taṃ vacanaṃ, yaṃ maṃ bhaṇasi brāhmaṇa;
atk-s0514a1:2689_0: Etañca kho no akkhāhi, kīvanto hontu yācakā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:2690_0: Tattha karomīti ahaṃ sakalajambudīparajjaṃ dadamāno ettakaṃ kiṃ na karissāmi,
atk-s0514a1:2694_0: Ime ca khattiyā sabbe, abhijātā yasassino;
atk-s0514a1:2695_0: Bhavañca rājā manojo, alaṃ hessanti yācakā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:2696_1: Mahāsālā ca brāhmaṇāti sārappattā brāhmaṇā ca parosatāyeva.
atk-s0514a1:2699_0: “Hatthī asse ca yojentu, rathaṃ sannayha sārathi;
atk-s0514a1:2701_0: Assamaṃ taṃ gamissāmi, yattha sammati kosiyo”ti.
atk-s0514a1:2702_2: Rathaṃ sannayha sārathīti sammasārathi tvampi rathaṃ sannayha.
atk-s0514a1:2702_3: Ābandhanānīti hatthiassarathesu ābandhitabbāni bhaṇḍāni ca gaṇhatha.
atk-s0514a1:2702_4: Pādāsussārayaddhajeti rathe ṭhapitadhajapādāsu dhaje ussārayantu ussāpentu.
atk-s0514a1:2705_0: Agamā assamaṃ rammaṃ, yattha sammati kosiyo”ti. – ayaṃ abhisambuddhagāthā;
atk-s0514a1:2706_2: evaṃ vatvā tato so rājā ekasatakhattiye gahetvā mahatiyā senāya parivuto nandapaṇḍitaṃ purato katvā nagarā nikkhami.
atk-s0514a1:2706_4: antaramagge vattamānopi avassaṃ gāmitāya evaṃ vutto.
atk-s0514a1:2706_5: Catuvīsatiakkhobhaṇisaṅkhātena balakāyena saddhiṃ maggaṃ paṭipannassa tassa nandapaṇḍito iddhānubhāvena
atk-s0514a1:2706_6: aṭṭhusabhavitthataṃ maggaṃ samaṃ māpetvā ākāse cammakhaṇḍaṃ pattharitvā tattha pallaṅkena nisīditvā senāya
atk-s0514a1:2706_7: parivuto alaṅkatahatthikkhandhe nisīditvā gacchantena raññā saddhiṃ dhammayuttakathaṃ kathento sītauṇhādiparissaye
atk-s0514a1:2707_0: Athassa assamaṃ pāpuṇanadivase soṇapaṇḍito “mama kaniṭṭhassa atirekasattamāsasattadivasādhikāni satta
atk-s0514a1:2707_1: vassāni nikkhantassā”ti āvajjetvā “kahaṃ nu kho so etarahī”ti dibbena cakkhunā olokento “catuvīsatiakkhobhaṇiparivārena
atk-s0514a1:2707_2: saddhiṃ ekasatarājāno gahetvā mamaññeva khamāpetuṃ āgacchatī”ti disvā cintesi –
atk-s0514a1:2707_3: “imehi rājūhi ceva parisāhi ca mama kaniṭṭhassa bahūni pāṭihāriyāni diṭṭhāni,
atk-s0514a1:2707_4: mamānubhāvaṃ ajānitvā ‘ayaṃ kūṭajaṭilo attano pamāṇaṃ na jānāti,
atk-s0514a1:2707_5: amhākaṃ ayyena saddhiṃ payojesī’ti maṃ vambhentā kathentā avīciparāyaṇā bhaveyyuṃ,
atk-s0514a1:2707_7: So caturaṅgulamattena aṃsaṃ aphusantaṃ ākāse kājaṃ ṭhapetvā anotattato udakaṃ āharituṃ rañño avidūre ākāsena pāyāsi.
atk-s0514a1:2707_8: Nandapaṇḍito taṃ āgacchantaṃ disvā attānaṃ dassetuṃ avisahanto nisinnaṭṭhāneyeva antaradhāyitvā palāyitvā himavantaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0514a1:2707_9: Manojarājā pana taṃ ramaṇīyena isivesena tathā āgacchantaṃ disvā gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:2711_1: Aṃsaṃ asamphusaṃ etīti aṃsaṃ asamphusanto sayameva āgacchati.
atk-s0514a1:2711_2: Udahārāyāti udakaṃ āharituṃ gacchantassa kassa esa kājo evaṃ eti,
atk-s0514a1:2719_0: Tattha sahitabbatoti sahitavato sīlācārasampanno eko tāpaso ahanti vadati.
atk-s0514a1:2719_3: Pubbe katamanussaranti tehi pubbe kataṃ mayhaṃ guṇaṃ anussarantoti.
atk-s0514a1:2720_0: Taṃ sutvā rājā tena saddhiṃ vissāsaṃ kattukāmo anantaraṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:2723_0: Maggaṃ no soṇa akkhāhi, yena gacchemu assama”nti.
atk-s0514a1:2725_0: Atha mahāsatto attano ānubhāvena assamapadagāmimaggaṃ māpetvā gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:2729_3: yena disābhāgena etaṃ meghavaṇṇaṃ supupphitakoviḷārasañchannaṃ vanaṃ dissati,
atk-s0514a1:2741_0: Assamā nikkhamitvāna, sadvāramhi upāvisī”ti. – imā abhisambuddhagāthā;
atk-s0514a1:2742_3: so isi vegena anotattaṃ gantvā pānīyaṃ ādāya tesu rājūsu assamaṃ asampattesuyeva āgantvā pānīyaghaṭe
atk-s0514a1:2742_4: pānīyamāḷake ṭhapetvā “mahājano pivissatī”ti vanakusumehi vāsetvā sammajjaniṃ ādāya assamaṃ sammajjitvā
atk-s0514a1:2742_5: paṇṇasāladvāre pitu āsanaṃ paññāpetvā pavisitvā pitaraṃ jānāpesīti attho.
atk-s0514a1:2743_0: Bodhisattassa mātā pana tassa pacchato nīcaṭṭhāne ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
atk-s0514a1:2743_2: Nandapaṇḍitopi bodhisattassa anotattato pānīyaṃ ādāya assamaṃ āgatakāle rañño santikaṃ āgantvā assamassa avidūre khandhāvāraṃ nivāsesi.
atk-s0514a1:2743_3: Atha rājā nhatvā sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍito ekasatarājaparivuto nandapaṇḍitaṃ gahetvā mahantena sirisobhaggena bodhisattaṃ khamāpetuṃ assamaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0514a1:2743_4: Atha naṃ tathā āgacchantaṃ bodhisattassa pitā disvā bodhisattaṃ pucchi,
atk-s0514a1:2752_0: Yuvā kalāpasannaddho, ko eti siriyā jalaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:2755_0: Mukhañca rucirā bhāti, ko eti siriyā jalaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:2764_0: Samantā parikīrenti, ko eti siriyā jalaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:2780_1: Paṭipannānīti etāni tūriyāni kassa purato āgacchantīti attho.
atk-s0514a1:2780_4: kassa kañcanamayena vijjuvaṇṇena uṇhīsapaṭṭena nalāṭanto parikkhittoti pucchati.
atk-s0514a1:2780_7: Ukkāmukhapahaṭṭhaṃ vāti kammārānaṃ uddhane pahaṭṭhaṃ suvaṇṇaṃ viya.
atk-s0514a1:2780_16: Caturaṅginīti etehi hatthiādīhi catūhi aṅgehi samannāgatā.
atk-s0514a1:2780_22: Ajjhāvaranti mamaṃ khamāpanatthāya nandassa parisabhāvaṃ upagantvā eti.
atk-s0514a1:2785_2: sabbepi te rājāno surabhicandanena anulittā uttamakāsikavatthadhārino sirasi patiṭṭhāpitaañjalī hutvā isīnaṃ santikaṃ upagatā.
atk-s0514a1:2786_0: Tato manojo rājā taṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisinno paṭisanthāraṃ karonto gāthādvayamāha –
atk-s0514a1:2788_0: “Kacci nu bhoto kusalaṃ, kacci bhoto anāmayaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:2789_0: Kacci uñchena yāpetha, kacci mūlaphalā bahū.
atk-s0514a1:2792_0: Vane vāḷamigākiṇṇe, kacci hiṃsā na vijjatī”ti.
atk-s0514a1:2793_0: Tato paraṃ ubhinnaṃ tesaṃ vacanapaṭivacanavasena kathitagāthā honti –
atk-s0514a1:2796_0: Atho uñchena yāpema, atho mūlaphalā bahū.
atk-s0514a1:2799_0: Vane vāḷamigākiṇṇe, hiṃsā mayhaṃ na vijjati.
atk-s0514a1:2808_0: Phalāni khuddakappāni, bhuñja rāja varaṃ varaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:2811_0: Tato piva mahārāja, sace tvaṃ abhikaṅkhasi.
atk-s0514a1:2817_0: Suṇātu bhavaṃ vacanaṃ, nandassa parisāya cā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:2818_3: Pavedayāti yaṃ imasmiṃ ṭhāne tava abhirucitaṃ atthi,
atk-s0514a1:2818_6: Varaṃ varanti ito uttamuttamaṃ gahetvā bhuñja.
atk-s0514a1:2818_9: taṃ amhehi paṭiggahitaṃ nāma tumhehi ca dinnameva nāma,
atk-s0514a1:2818_10: ettāvatā imassa janassa sabbassa agghiyaṃ tumhehi kataṃ.
atk-s0514a1:2818_14: Ajjhāvaramhāti mayañhi na aññena kammena āgatā,
atk-s0514a1:2818_15: nandassa pana parisā hutvā tumhākaṃ khamāpanatthāya āgatāti vadati.
atk-s0514a1:2819_0: Evaṃ vutte nandapaṇḍito uṭṭhāyāsanā mātāpitaro ca bhātarañca vanditvā sakaparisāya saddhiṃ sallapanto āha –
atk-s0514a1:2822_0: Ime ca khattiyā sabbe, abhijātā yasassino;
atk-s0514a1:2823_0: Bhavañca rājā manojo, anumaññantu me vaco.
atk-s0514a1:2825_0: “Ye ca santi samītāro, yakkhāni idha massame;
atk-s0514a1:2829_0: So tyāhaṃ dakkhiṇā bāhu, tava kosiya sammato.
atk-s0514a1:2832_0: Vīra puññamidaṃ ṭhānaṃ, mā maṃ kosiya vāraya.
atk-s0514a1:2839_0: Maggo saggassa lokassa, yathā jānāsi tvaṃ ise.
atk-s0514a1:2842_0: Taṃ maṃ puññā nivāreti, ariyamaggāvaro naro”ti.
atk-s0514a1:2843_3: Araññe bhūtabhabyānīti asmiṃ himavantāraññe yāni bhūtāni ceva vuḍḍhimariyādappattāni bhabyāni ca taruṇadevatāni,
atk-s0514a1:2843_4: tānipi sabbāni mama vacanaṃ suṇantūti attho.
atk-s0514a1:2843_5: “Namo katvānā”ti idaṃ so parisāya saññaṃ datvā tasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe nibbattadevatānaṃ namakkāraṃ katvā āha.
atk-s0514a1:2843_7: ajja bahūhi devatāhi mama bhātikassa dhammakathāsavanatthaṃ āgatāhi bhavitabbaṃ,
atk-s0514a1:2843_10: So devatānaṃ añjaliṃ paggahetvā parisaṃ jānāpetvā “isiṃ vakkhāmī”tiādimāha.
atk-s0514a1:2843_13: tasmā so te ahaṃ dakkhiṇā bāhūti sammato.
atk-s0514a1:2844_1: Puññamidaṃ ṭhānanti idaṃ mātāpituupaṭṭhānaṃ nāma puññaṃ saggasaṃvattanikakāraṇaṃ,
atk-s0514a1:2844_2: taṃ karontaṃ maṃ mā vārayāti vadati.
atk-s0514a1:2844_3: Sabbhi hetanti etañhi mātāpituupaṭṭhānaṃ nāma paṇḍitehi upaññātaṃ upagantvā ñātañceva vaṇṇitañca.
atk-s0514a1:2844_4: Mametaṃ upanissajāti idaṃ tvaṃ mayhaṃ nissaja vissajjehi dehi.
atk-s0514a1:2844_7: Puññānīti idāni ahaṃ mātāpitūsu puññāni kattukāmo.
atk-s0514a1:2844_8: Mama lokadadoti tassa mama tvaṃ saggalokadado hoti,
atk-s0514a1:2844_9: ahañhi tesaṃ vattaṃ upaṭṭhānaṃ katvā devaloke aparimāṇaṃ yasaṃ labhissāmi,
atk-s0514a1:2844_10: tassa me tvaṃ dāyako hohīti vadati.
atk-s0514a1:2845_1: tatheva aññepi manujā imissaṃ parisāyaṃ santi,
atk-s0514a1:2845_2: te nānappakāre dhamme idaṃ jeṭṭhāpacāyikabhāvasaṅkhātaṃ dhammakoṭṭhāsaṃ vadanti. Kinti?
atk-s0514a1:2845_4: Sukhāvahanti uṭṭhānena ca pāricariyāya ca mātāpitūnaṃ sukhāvahaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:2845_5: Taṃ manti taṃ maṃ evaṃ sammāpaṭipannampi bhātā soṇapaṇḍito tamhā puññā abhivāreti.
atk-s0514a1:2845_6: Ariyamaggāvaroti so evaṃ vārento ayaṃ naro mama piyadassanatāya ariyasaṅkhātassa vedalokassa maggāvaraṇo nāma hotīti.
atk-s0514a1:2846_0: Evaṃ nandapaṇḍitena vutte mahāsatto “imassa tāva tumhehi vacanaṃ sutaṃ,
atk-s0514a1:2853_0: Cārittena ca sampannā, na te gacchanti duggatiṃ.
atk-s0514a1:2855_0: “Mātā pitā ca bhātā ca, bhaginī ñāti bandhavā;
atk-s0514a1:2856_0: Sabbe jeṭṭhassa te bhārā, evaṃ jānāhi bhāradha.
atk-s0514a1:2860_0: Tattha bhāturajjhāvarāti mama bhātu parisā hutvā āgatā bhonto sabbepi rājāno mamapi tāva vacanaṃ suṇantu.
atk-s0514a1:2860_5: Bhārāti sabbe ete jeṭṭhena vahitabbā paṭijaggitabbāti tassa bhārā nāma.
atk-s0514a1:2860_6: Nāviko viyāti yathā nāvāya garuṃ bhāraṃ ādiyitvā samuddamajjhe nāvaṃ sotthinā netuṃ nāviko ussaheti vāyamati,
atk-s0514a1:2860_7: saha nāvāya sabbabhaṇḍañca jano ca tasseva bhāro hoti,
atk-s0514a1:2860_13: tasmā ahameva saddhiṃ nandena paṭijaggituṃ yuttoti.
atk-s0514a1:2861_0: Taṃ sutvā sabbepi te rājāno attamanā hutvā “jeṭṭhabhātikassa kira avasesā bhārāti ajja amhehi ñāta”nti
atk-s0514a1:2861_1: nandapaṇḍitaṃ pahāya mahāsattaṃ sannissitā hutvā tassa thutiṃ karontā dve gāthā abhāsiṃsu –
atk-s0514a1:2864_0: Evameva no bhavaṃ dhammaṃ, kosiyo pavidaṃsayi.
atk-s0514a1:2868_0: Evameva no bhavaṃ dhammaṃ, kosiyo pavidaṃsayī”ti.
atk-s0514a1:2869_0: Tattha adhigamāti mayaṃ ito pubbe jeṭṭhāpacāyanadhammapaṭicchādake tame vattamānā na jānāma,
atk-s0514a1:2869_2: Evameva noti yathā mahandhakāre pabbatamatthake jalito jātavedo samantā ālokaṃ pharanto rūpāni dasseti,
atk-s0514a1:2869_3: tathā no bhavaṃ kosiyagotto dhammaṃ pavidaṃsayīti attho.
atk-s0514a1:2870_0: Iti mahāsatto ettakaṃ kālaṃ nandapaṇḍitassa pāṭihāriyāni disvā tasmiṃ pasannacitte te rājāno ñāṇabalena
atk-s0514a1:2870_1: tasmiṃ pasādaṃ bhinditvā attano kathaṃ gāhāpetvā sabbeva attano mukhaṃ ullokite akāsi.
atk-s0514a1:2870_2: Atha nandapaṇḍito “bhātā me paṇḍito byatto dhammakathiko sabbepime rājāno bhinditvā attano pakkhe kari,
atk-s0514a1:2870_3: ṭhapetvā imaṃ añño mayhaṃ paṭisaraṇaṃ natthi,
atk-s0514a1:2874_1: sace tumhe mama evaṃ yācamānassa khamāpanatthāya paggahitaṃ añjaliṃ nāvabujjhatha na paṭiggaṇhatha,
atk-s0514a1:2874_3: ahaṃ pana tumhākaṃ baddhacaro veyyāvaccakaro hessaṃ,
atk-s0514a1:2874_4: rattindivaṃ analasabhāvena vuṭṭhito paricārako ahaṃ tumhe paṭijaggissāmīti.
atk-s0514a1:2875_0: Mahāsattassa pakatiyāpi nandapaṇḍite doso vā veraṃ vā natthi,
atk-s0514a1:2875_1: atithaddhaṃ vacanaṃ kathentassa panassa mānahāpanatthaṃ niggahavasena tathā katvā idānissa vacanaṃ sutvā
atk-s0514a1:2875_2: tuṭṭhacitto tasmiṃ pasādaṃ uppādetvā “idāni te khamāmi,
atk-s0514a1:2875_3: mātāpitaro ca paṭijaggituṃ labhissasī”ti tassa guṇaṃ pakāsento āha –
atk-s0514a1:2878_0: Ariyo ariyasamācāro, bāḷhaṃ tvaṃ mama ruccasi.
atk-s0514a1:2881_0: Nāyaṃ bhāro bhāramato, ahu mayhaṃ kudācanaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:2887_0: Nandaṃ vo varatha eko, kaṃ nando upatiṭṭhatū”ti.
atk-s0514a1:2888_2: Bāḷhanti idāni tvaṃ mama ativiya ruccasi.
atk-s0514a1:2888_3: Suṇāthāti amma tātā tumhe mama vacanaṃ suṇātha.
atk-s0514a1:2888_4: Nāyaṃ bhāroti ayaṃ tumhākaṃ paṭijagganabhāro na kadāci mama bhāramato ahu.
atk-s0514a1:2888_5: Taṃ manti taṃ bhāroti amaññitvāva maṃ tumhe upaṭṭhitaṃ samānaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:2888_6: Upaṭṭhānāya yācatīti tumhe upaṭṭhātuṃ maṃ yācati.
atk-s0514a1:2888_7: Yo ve icchatīti mayhañhi tvaṃ me mātaraṃ vā pitaraṃ vā upaṭṭhahāti vattuṃ na yuttaṃ,
atk-s0514a1:2888_8: tumhākaṃ pana santānaṃ brahmacārīnaṃ yo eko icchati,
atk-s0514a1:2888_9: taṃ vadāmi kāmena nandaṃ vo varatha,
atk-s0514a1:2889_3: evaṃ cirāgatampi taṃ yācituṃ na visahāmi,
atk-s0514a1:2889_5: idāni pana tayā anuññātā ahaṃ etaṃ brahmacārinaṃ bāhāhi upagūhitvā sīse upasiṅghāyituṃ labheyya”nti imamatthaṃ pakāsentī gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:2891_0: “Tayā tāta anuññātā, soṇa taṃ nissitā mayaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:2893_3: puttaṃ nandaṃ āliṅgitvā sīse ghāyitvā cumbitvā tava hadaye sokaṃ nibbāpehī”ti āha.
atk-s0514a1:2893_4: Sā tassa santikaṃ gantvā nandapaṇḍitaṃ parisamajjheyeva āliṅgitvā sīsaṃ ghāyitvā cumbitvā hadaye sokaṃ nibbāpetvā mahāsattena saddhiṃ sallapantī āha –
atk-s0514a1:2896_0: Cirassaṃ nandaṃ disvāna, hadayaṃ me pavedhati.
atk-s0514a1:2899_0: Udaggā sumanā homi, nando no āgato ayaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:2905_0: Bhattucca mayhañca piyo, nando no pāvisī gharaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:2907_0: “Pitupi nando suppiyo, yaṃ nando nappavase gharā;
atk-s0514a1:2908_0: Labhatū tāta nando taṃ, maṃ nando upatiṭṭhatū”ti.
atk-s0514a1:2909_0: Tattha māluteritanti yathā vātāhataṃ assatthassa pallavaṃ kampati,
atk-s0514a1:2909_1: evaṃ cirassaṃ nandaṃ disvā ajja mama hadayaṃ kampatīti vadati. Suttāti,
atk-s0514a1:2909_3: yadāhaṃ suttāpi supine nandaṃ āgataṃ passāmi,
atk-s0514a1:2909_5: Bhattuccāti sāmikassa ca me mayhañca piyo.
atk-s0514a1:2909_9: tasmā puna imamhā gharā na vippavaseyya.
atk-s0514a1:2910_3: appamatto hutvā paṭijaggeyyāsī”ti ovaditvā mātu guṇaṃ pakāsento dve gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0514a1:2912_0: “Anukampikā patiṭṭhā ca, pubbe rasadadī ca no;
atk-s0514a1:2913_0: Maggo saggassa lokassa, mātā taṃ varate ise.
atk-s0514a1:2916_0: Maggo saggassa lokassa, mātā taṃ varate ise”ti.
atk-s0514a1:2917_1: Pubbe rasadadīti paṭhamameva attano khīrasaṅkhātassa rasassa dāyikā.
atk-s0514a1:2917_2: Mātā tanti mama mātā maṃ na icchati,
atk-s0514a1:2918_0: Evaṃ mahāsatto dvīhi gāthāhi mātu guṇaṃ kathetvā punāgantvā tassā āsane nisinnakāle “nanda,
atk-s0514a1:2918_4: amadhurāni phalāphalāni mā khādāpehī”ti vatvā parisamajjheyeva mātu dukkarakārikataṃ pakāsento āha –
atk-s0514a1:2924_0: Tena dohaḷinī hoti, suhadā tena vuccati.
atk-s0514a1:2927_0: Tena sā janayantīti, janetti tena vuccati.
atk-s0514a1:2930_0: Rodantaṃ puttaṃ toseti, tosentī tena vuccati.
atk-s0514a1:2936_0: Ubhayampetassa gopeti, api puttassa no siyā.
atk-s0514a1:2938_0: “Evaṃ putta aduṃ putta, iti mātā vihaññati;
atk-s0514a1:2940_0: Sāyaṃ puttaṃ anāyantaṃ, iti mātā vihaññati.
atk-s0514a1:2949_0: Mātaraṃ aparicaritvāna, kicchaṃ vā so nigacchati.
atk-s0514a1:2952_0: Pitaraṃ aparicaritvāna, kicchaṃ vā so nigacchati.
atk-s0514a1:2960_0: “Dānañca piyavācā ca, atthacariyā ca yā idha;
atk-s0514a1:2961_0: Samānattatā ca dhammesu, tattha tattha yathārahaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:2962_0: Ete kho saṅgahā loke, rathassāṇīva yāyato.
atk-s0514a1:2964_0: “Ete ca saṅgahā nāssu, na mātā puttakāraṇā;
atk-s0514a1:2965_0: Labhetha mānaṃ pūjaṃ vā, pitā vā puttakāraṇā.
atk-s0514a1:2968_0: Tasmā mahattaṃ papponti, pāsaṃsā ca bhavanti te.
atk-s0514a1:2973_0: “Tasmā hi ne namasseyya, sakkareyya ca paṇḍito;
atk-s0514a1:2974_0: Annena atho pānena, vatthena sayanena ca;
atk-s0514a1:2978_0: Idheva naṃ pasaṃsanti, pecca sagge pamodatī”ti.
atk-s0514a1:2979_1: Devatāya namassatīti “putto me uppajjatū”ti devatāya namakkāraṃ karoti āyācati.
atk-s0514a1:2979_2: Pucchatīti “katarena nakkhattena jāto putto dīghāyuko hoti,
atk-s0514a1:2979_3: katarena appāyuko”ti evaṃ nakkhattāni ca pucchati.
atk-s0514a1:2979_4: Utusaṃvaccharāni cāti “channaṃ utūnaṃ katarasmiṃ utumhi jāto dīghāyuko hoti,
atk-s0514a1:2979_6: kativassāya vā mātuyā jāto putto dīghāyuko hoti,
atk-s0514a1:2979_7: kativassāya appāyuko”ti evaṃ utusaṃvaccharāni ca pucchati.
atk-s0514a1:2979_8: Utumhi nhātāyāti pupphe uppanne utumhi nhātāya.
atk-s0514a1:2979_11: Tenāti tena gabbhena sā dohaḷinī hoti.
atk-s0514a1:2979_12: Tenāti tadā tassā kucchimhi nibbattapajāya sineho uppajjati,
atk-s0514a1:2979_14: Tenāti tena kāraṇena sā “janayantī”ti ca “janettī”ti ca vuccati.
atk-s0514a1:2980_0: Aṅgapāvuraṇena cāti thanantare nipajjāpetvā sarīrasamphassaṃ pharāpentī aṅgasaṅkhāteneva pāvuraṇena.
atk-s0514a1:2980_2: Mamaṃ katvā udikkhatīti “puttassa me upari vāto paharati,
atk-s0514a1:2980_3: ātapo pharatī”ti evaṃ mamaṃkāraṃ katvā siniddhena hadayena udikkhati.
atk-s0514a1:2980_4: Ubhayampetassāti ubhayampi etaṃ dhanaṃ etassa puttassa atthāya aññesaṃ adassetvā sāragabbhādīsu mātā gopeti.
atk-s0514a1:2980_8: aduñca kammaṃ mā karohī”ti sikkhāpentī iti mātā vihaññati kilamati.
atk-s0514a1:2980_9: Pattayobbaneti putte pattayobbane taṃ puttaṃ nisīthe paradāresu pamattaṃ sāyaṃ anāgacchantaṃ ñatvā assupuṇṇehi
atk-s0514a1:2981_5: dhanakāmānaṃ uppannaṃ dhanampi mātaraṃ apaṭijaggantānaṃ nassatīti me sutanti.
atk-s0514a1:2981_6: Kicchaṃ vā soti iti dhanaṃ vā tassa nassati,
atk-s0514a1:2981_8: Labbhametanti etaṃ idhaloke ca paraloke ca ānandādisukhaṃ mātaraṃ paricaritvā vijānato paṇḍitassa labbhaṃ,
atk-s0514a1:2982_3: Dhammesūti jeṭṭhāpacāyanadhammesu tattha tattha parisamajjhe vā rahogatānaṃ vā abhivādanādivasena samānattatā kātabbā,
atk-s0514a1:2982_4: na raho abhivādanādīni katvā parisati na kātabbāni,
atk-s0514a1:2982_6: Ete ca saṅgahā nāssūti sace ete cattāro saṅgahā na bhaveyyuṃ.
atk-s0514a1:2982_11: Āhuneyyāti āhunapaṭiggāhakā yassa kassaci sakkārassa anucchavikā.
atk-s0514a1:2982_12: Annena athoti annena ceva attho pānena ca.
atk-s0514a1:2982_13: Peccāti kālakiriyāya pariyosāne ito gantvā sagge pamodatīti.
atk-s0514a1:2983_0: Evaṃ mahasatto sineruṃ pavaṭṭento viya dhammadesanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0514a1:2983_1: Taṃ sutvā sabbepi te rājāno balakāyā ca pasīdiṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:2983_2: Atha ne pañcasu sīlesu patiṭṭhāpetvā “dānādīsu appamattā hothā”ti ovaditvā uyyojesi.
atk-s0514a1:2983_3: Sabbepi dhammena rajjaṃ kāretvā āyupariyosāne devanagaraṃ pūrayiṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:2983_4: Soṇapaṇḍitanandapaṇḍitāpi yāvatāyukaṃ mātāpitaro paricaritvā brahmalokaparāyaṇā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0514a1:2984_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi,
atk-s0514a1:2988_0: Atha soṇasunandavaro ca puna, abhivāsitasattatimamhi suteti.
atk-s0514a1:2993_0: Sumukhāti idaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto āyasmato ānandassa jīvitapariccāgaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0514a1:2993_1: Devadattena hi tathāgataṃ jīvitā voropetuṃ payojitesu dhanuggahesu sabbapaṭhamaṃ pesitena āgantvā “nāhaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0514a1:2993_3: mahiddhiko so bhagavā mahānubhāvo”ti vutte devadatto “alaṃ, āvuso,
atk-s0514a1:2993_4: mā tvaṃ samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ jīvitā voropehi,
atk-s0514a1:2993_5: ahameva samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ jīvitā voropessāmī”ti vatvā tathāgate gijjhakūṭapabbatassa pacchimachāyāya caṅkamante
atk-s0514a1:2993_6: sayaṃ gijjhakūṭaṃ pabbataṃ abhiruhitvā yantavegena mahatiṃ silaṃ pavijjhi,
atk-s0514a1:2993_8: Tadā dve pabbatakūṭā samāgantvā taṃ silaṃ sampaṭicchiṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:2993_9: Tato papaṭikā uppatitvā bhagavato pādaṃ paharitvā ruhiraṃ uppādesi,
atk-s0514a1:2993_11: Jīvako tathāgatassa pādaṃ satthakena phāletvā duṭṭhalohitaṃ vametvā pūtimaṃsaṃ apanetvā dhovitvā bhesajjaṃ ālimpitvā nirogamakāsi.
atk-s0514a1:2993_12: Satthā purimasadisameva bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto mahatiyā buddhalīlāya vicari.
atk-s0514a1:2994_1: “samaṇassa gotamassa rūpasobhaggappattaṃ sarīraṃ disvā koci manussabhūto upasaṅkamituṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0514a1:2994_2: rañño kho pana nāḷāgiri nāma hatthī caṇḍo pharuso manussaghātako buddhadhammasaṅghaguṇe na jānāti,
atk-s0514a1:2994_6: sve nāḷāgiriṃ mattaṃ katvā pātova samaṇena gotamena paṭipannavīthiyaṃ vissajjehī”ti āha.
atk-s0514a1:2994_7: Devadattopi naṃ “aññesu divasesu hatthī kittakaṃ suraṃ pivatī”ti pucchitvā “aṭṭha ghaṭe,
atk-s0514a1:2994_8: bhante”ti vutte “tena hi sve tvaṃ taṃ soḷasa ghaṭe pāyetvā samaṇena gotamena paṭipannavīthiyaṃ abhimukhaṃ kareyyāsī”ti āha.
atk-s0514a1:2994_12: nāgarā pātova sabbakiccāni katvā antaravīthiṃ mā paṭipajjiṃsū”ti.
atk-s0514a1:2994_13: Devadattopi rājanivesanā oruyha hatthisālaṃ gantvā hatthigopake āmantetvā “mayaṃ bhaṇe uccaṭṭhāniyaṃ nīcaṭṭhāne,
atk-s0514a1:2994_16: sve pātova nāḷāgiriṃ tikhiṇasurāya soḷasa ghaṭe pāyetvā samaṇassa gotamassa āgamanavelāya tuttatomarehi
atk-s0514a1:2994_17: vijjhitvā kujjhāpetvā hatthisālaṃ bhindāpetvā samaṇena gotamena paṭipannavīthiyaṃ abhimukhaṃ katvā samaṇaṃ
atk-s0514a1:2995_1: Buddhadhammasaṅghamāmakā upāsakā taṃ sutvā satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā “bhante,
atk-s0514a1:2995_2: devadatto raññā saddhiṃ ekato hutvā sve tumhehi paṭipannavīthiyaṃ nāḷāgiriṃ vissajjāpessati,
atk-s0514a1:2995_4: mayaṃ vihāreyeva buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa bhikkhaṃ dassāmā”ti vadiṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:2995_5: Satthāpi “sve piṇḍāya na pavisissāmī”ti avatvāva “ahaṃ sve nāḷāgiriṃ dametvā pāṭihāriyaṃ katvā titthiye
atk-s0514a1:2995_6: madditvā rājagahe piṇḍāya acaritvāva bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto nagarā nikkhamitvā veḷuvanameva āgamissāmi,
atk-s0514a1:2995_7: rājagahavāsinopi bahūni bhattabhājanāni gahetvā veḷuvanameva āgamissanti,
atk-s0514a1:2995_8: sve vihāreyeva bhattaggaṃ bhavissatī”ti iminā kāraṇena tesaṃ adhivāsesi.
atk-s0514a1:2995_9: Te tathāgatassa adhivāsanaṃ viditvā bhattabhājanāni āharitvā “vihāreyeva dānaṃ dassāmā”ti pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:2996_0: Satthāpi paṭhamayāme dhammaṃ desetvā majjhimayāme devatānaṃ pañhaṃ vissajjetvā pacchimayāmassa paṭhamakoṭṭhāse
atk-s0514a1:2996_1: sīhaseyyaṃ kappetvā dutiyakoṭṭhāse phalasamāpattiyā vītināmetvā tatiyakoṭṭhāse mahākaruṇāsamāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā
atk-s0514a1:2996_2: vuṭṭhāya bodhaneyyabandhave olokento nāḷāgiridamane caturāsītiyā pāṇasahassānaṃ dhammābhisamayaṃ disvā
atk-s0514a1:2996_3: vibhātāya rattiyā katasarīrapaṭijaggano hutvā āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ āmantetvā, “ānanda,
atk-s0514a1:2996_4: ajja rājagahaparivattakesu aṭṭhārasasu mahāvihāresu sabbesampi bhikkhūnaṃ mayāsaddhiṃ rājagahaṃ pavisituṃ ārocehī”ti āha.
atk-s0514a1:2996_10: Saddhāsampannā manussā “ajja kira buddhanāgassa tiracchānanāgena saṅgāmo bhavissati,
atk-s0514a1:2996_11: anūpamāya buddhalīlāya nāḷāgiridamanaṃ passissāmā”ti pāsādahammiyagehacchadanādīni abhiruhitvā aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:2996_12: Asaddhā pana micchādiṭṭhikā “ayaṃ nāḷāgiri caṇḍo pharuso manussaghātako buddhādīnaṃ guṇaṃ na jānāti,
atk-s0514a1:2996_13: so ajja samaṇassa gotamassa suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ sarīraṃ viddhaṃsetvā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpessati,
atk-s0514a1:2996_14: ajja paccāmittassa piṭṭhiṃ passissāmā”ti pāsādādīsu aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:2997_0: Hatthīpi bhagavantaṃ āgacchantaṃ disvā manusse tāsento gehāni viddhaṃsento sakaṭāni saṃcuṇṇento soṇḍaṃ
atk-s0514a1:2997_1: ussāpetvā pahaṭṭhakaṇṇavālo pabbato viya ajjhottharanto yena bhagavā tenābhidhāvi.
atk-s0514a1:2997_2: Taṃ āgacchantaṃ disvā bhikkhū bhagavantaṃ etadavocuṃ – “ayaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0514a1:2997_3: nāḷāgiri caṇḍo pharuso manussaghātako imaṃ racchaṃ paṭipanno,
atk-s0514a1:2997_20: Atha āyasmā ānando satthari balavasinehena adhivāsetuṃ asakkonto “ayaṃ hatthī paṭhamaṃ maṃ māretū”ti
atk-s0514a1:2997_21: tathāgatassatthāya jīvitaṃ pariccajitvā gantvā satthu purato aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0514a1:2997_24: ayaṃ hatthī caṇḍo pharuso manussaghātako kappuṭṭhānaggisadiso paṭhamaṃ maṃ māretvā pacchā tumhākaṃ santikaṃ āgacchatū”ti thero avaca.
atk-s0514a1:2997_25: Yāvatatiyaṃ vuccamānopi tatheva aṭṭhāsi na paṭikkami.
atk-s0514a1:2997_26: Atha naṃ bhagavā iddhibalena paṭikkamāpetvā bhikkhūnaṃ antare ṭhapesi.
atk-s0514a1:2998_0: Tasmiṃ khaṇe ekā itthī nāḷāgiriṃ disvā maraṇabhayabhītā palāyamānā aṅkena gahitaṃ dārakaṃ hatthino ca tathāgatassa ca antare chaḍḍetvā palāyi.
atk-s0514a1:2998_1: Hatthī taṃ anubandhitvā nivattitvā dārakassa santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0514a1:2998_3: Satthā nāḷāgiriṃ odissakamettāya pharitvā sumadhuraṃ brahmassaraṃ nicchāretvā “ambho nāḷāgiri taṃ soḷasa
atk-s0514a1:2998_4: surāghaṭe pāyetvā mattaṃ karontā na ‘aññaṃ gaṇhissatī’ti kariṃsu,
atk-s0514a1:2998_8: So satthu vacanaṃ sutvā akkhīni ummīletvā bhagavato rūpasiriṃ oloketvā paṭiladdhasaṃvego buddhatejena
atk-s0514a1:2998_9: pacchinnasurāmado soṇḍaṃ olambento kaṇṇe cālento āgantvā tathāgatassa pādesu pati.
atk-s0514a1:2998_14: ito paṭṭhāya mā caṇḍo pharuso manussaghātako bhava,
atk-s0514a1:2998_15: sabbasattesu mettacittaṃ paṭilabhā”ti vatvā dakkhiṇahatthaṃ pasāretvā kumbhe parāmasitvā –
atk-s0514a1:2999_0: “Mā kuñjara nāgamāsado, dukkho hi kuñjara nāgamāsado;
atk-s0514a1:3000_0: Na hi nāgahatassa kuñjara, sugati hoti ito paraṃ yato.
atk-s0514a1:3001_0: “Mā ca mado mā ca pamādo, na hi pamattā sugatiṃ vajanti te;
atk-s0514a1:3002_0: Tvaññeva tathā karissasi, yena tvaṃ sugatiṃ gamissasī”ti. –
atk-s0514a1:3004_0: Tassa sakalasarīraṃ pītiyā nirantaraṃ phuṭaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0514a1:3004_3: Manussā taṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ disvā unnadiṃsu apphoṭiṃsu,
atk-s0514a1:3004_6: Tato paṭṭhāya nāḷāgiri dhanapālako nāma jāto.
atk-s0514a1:3004_7: Tasmiṃ kho pana dhanapālakasamāgame caturāsīti pāṇasahassāni amataṃ piviṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:3004_9: So soṇḍāya bhagavato pāde paṃsūni gahetvā upari muddhani ākiritvā paṭikuṭitova paṭikkamitvā dassanūpacāre
atk-s0514a1:3004_10: ṭhito dasabalaṃ vanditvā nivattitvā hatthisālaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0514a1:3004_11: Tato paṭṭhāya dantasudanto hutvā na kañci viheṭheti.
atk-s0514a1:3004_13: tesaññeva taṃ hotū”ti adhiṭṭhāya “ajja mayā mahantaṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ kataṃ,
atk-s0514a1:3004_14: imasmiṃ nagare piṇḍāya caraṇaṃ appaṭirūpa”nti titthiye madditvā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto jayappatto viya khattiyo nagarā nikkhamitvā veḷuvanameva gato.
atk-s0514a1:3004_15: Nagaravāsino bahuṃ annapānakhādanīyaṃ ādāya vihāraṃ gantvā mahādānaṃ pavattayiṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:3005_0: Taṃ divasaṃ sāyanhasamaye dhammasabhaṃ pūretvā sannisinnā bhikkhū kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ – “āvuso,
atk-s0514a1:3005_1: āyasmatā ānandena tathāgatassatthāya attano jīvitaṃ pariccajantena dukkaraṃ kataṃ,
atk-s0514a1:3005_2: nāḷāgiriṃ disvā satthārā tikkhattuṃ paṭibāhiyamānopi nāpagato,
atk-s0514a1:3005_6: gantabbaṃ mayā etthā”ti gandhakuṭito nikkhamitvā āgantvā “kāya nuttha,
atk-s0514a1:3005_8: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na,
atk-s0514a1:3005_10: pubbepi ānando tiracchānayoniyaṃ nibbattopi mamatthāya jīvitaṃ pariccajiyevā”ti vatvā tehi yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0514a1:3006_0: Atīte mahiṃsakaraṭṭhe sāgalanagare sāgalo nāma rājā dhammena rajjaṃ kāresi.
atk-s0514a1:3006_1: Tadā nagarato avidūre ekasmiṃ nesādagāmake aññataro nesādo pāsehi sakuṇe bandhitvā nagare vikkiṇanto jīvikaṃ kappesi.
atk-s0514a1:3006_2: Nagarato ca avidūre āvaṭṭato dvādasayojano mānusiyo nāma padumasaro ahosi pañcavaṇṇapadumasañchanno.
atk-s0514a1:3006_4: So nesādo tattha aniyāmena pāse oḍḍesi.
atk-s0514a1:3006_5: Tasmiṃ kāle dhataraṭṭho haṃsarājā channavutihaṃsasahassaparivāro cittakūṭapabbate suvaṇṇaguhāyaṃ vasati,
atk-s0514a1:3006_7: Athekadivasaṃ tato haṃsayūthā katipayā suvaṇṇahaṃsā mānusiyaṃ saraṃ gantvā pahūtagocare tasmiṃ yathāsukhaṃ
atk-s0514a1:3006_8: vicaritvā suhitā cittakūṭaṃ āgantvā dhataraṭṭhassa ārocesuṃ –
atk-s0514a1:3006_13: mā vo ruccitthā”ti paṭikkhipitvāpi tehi punappunaṃ vuccamāno “sace tumhākaṃ ruccati,
atk-s0514a1:3006_15: So ākāsā otaranto pādaṃ pāse pavesentoyeva otari.
atk-s0514a1:3006_16: Athassa pāso pādaṃ ayapaṭṭakena kaḍḍhanto viya ābandhitvā gaṇhi.
atk-s0514a1:3006_17: Athassa “chindissāmi na”nti ākaḍḍhantassa paṭhamavāre cammaṃ chijji,
atk-s0514a1:3007_2: ñātakā me utrastā hutvā gocaraṃ aggaṇhitvā chātajjhattāva palāyantā dubbalatāya mahāsamudde patissantī”ti.
atk-s0514a1:3007_3: So vedanaṃ adhivāsetvā ñātīnaṃ yāvadatthaṃ caritvā haṃsānaṃ kīḷanakāle mahantena saddena baddharavaṃ ravi.
atk-s0514a1:3007_4: Taṃ sutvā te haṃsā maraṇabhayatajjitā vaggavaggā hutvā cittakūṭābhimukhā pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:3007_5: Tesu pakkantesu sumukho haṃsasenāpati “kacci nu kho idaṃ bhayaṃ mahārājassa uppannaṃ,
atk-s0514a1:3007_6: jānissāmi na”nti vegena pakkhanditvā purato gacchantassa haṃsagaṇassa antare mahāsattaṃ adisvā majjhimahaṃsagaṇaṃ vicini,
atk-s0514a1:3007_8: tatthapi adisvā “nissaṃsayaṃ tassevedaṃ bhayaṃ uppanna”nti nivattitvā āgacchanto mahāsattaṃ pāse baddhaṃ
atk-s0514a1:3007_9: lohitamakkhitaṃ dukkhāturaṃ paṅkapiṭṭhe nipannaṃ disvā “mā bhāyi, mahārāja,
atk-s0514a1:3007_10: ahaṃ mama jīvitaṃ pariccajitvā tumhe pāsato mocessāmī”ti vadanto otaritvā mahāsattaṃ assāsentova paṅkapiṭṭhe nisīdi.
atk-s0514a1:3007_11: Atha naṃ vīmaṃsanto mahāsatto paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:3010_0: Gaccha tuvampi mā kaṅkhi, natthi baddhe sahāyatā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:3011_1: Pakkamantīti ete channavuti haṃsasahassā ñātivihaṅgamā maṃ chaḍḍetvā gacchanti,
atk-s0514a1:3011_4: evañhi pāsena baddhe mayi sahāyatā nāma natthi,
atk-s0514a1:3011_5: na hi te ahaṃ idāni kiñci sahāyakiccaṃ kātuṃ sakkhissāmi,
atk-s0514a1:3014_0: “Gacche vāhaṃ na vā gacche, na tena amaro siyaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:3015_0: Sukhitaṃ taṃ upāsitvā, dukkhitaṃ taṃ kathaṃ jahe.
atk-s0514a1:3017_0: “Maraṇaṃ vā tayā saddhiṃ, jīvitaṃ vā tayā vinā;
atk-s0514a1:3018_0: Tadeva maraṇaṃ seyyo, yañce jīve tayā vinā.
atk-s0514a1:3020_0: “Nesa dhammo mahārāja, yaṃ taṃ evaṃ gataṃ jahe;
atk-s0514a1:3021_0: Yā gati tuyhaṃ sā mayhaṃ, ruccate vihagādhipa.
atk-s0514a1:3023_0: “Kā nu pāsena baddhassa, gati aññā mahānasā;
atk-s0514a1:3024_0: Sā kathaṃ cetayānassa, muttassa tava ruccati.
atk-s0514a1:3026_0: “Kaṃ vā tvaṃ passase atthaṃ, mama tuyhañca pakkhima;
atk-s0514a1:3032_0: “Kathaṃ nu patataṃ seṭṭha, dhamme atthaṃ na bujjhasi;
atk-s0514a1:3033_0: Dhammo apacito santo, atthaṃ dasseti pāṇinaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:3037_0: 10. “Addhā eso sataṃ dhammo, yo mitto mittamāpade.
atk-s0514a1:3040_0: “Svāyaṃ dhammo ca te ciṇṇo, bhatti ca viditā mayi;
atk-s0514a1:3043_0: “Api tvevaṃ gate kāle, yaṃ khaṇḍaṃ ñātinaṃ mayā;
atk-s0514a1:3064_0: “Yaṃ nu pāsena mahatā, baddho na kurute disaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:3065_0: Atha kasmā abaddho tvaṃ, balī pakkhi na gacchasi.
atk-s0514a1:3067_0: “Kiṃ nu tyāyaṃ dijo hoti, mutto baddhaṃ upāsasi;
atk-s0514a1:3068_0: Ohāya sakuṇā yanti, kiṃ eko avahīyasi.
atk-s0514a1:3070_0: “Rājā me so dijāmitta, sakhā pāṇasamo ca me;
atk-s0514a1:3071_0: Neva naṃ vijahissāmi, yāva kālassa pariyāyaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:3077_0: Atha jālañca pāsañca, āsajjāpi na bujjhati.
atk-s0514a1:3082_1: ahaṃ ito gaccheyyaṃ vā na vā,
atk-s0514a1:3082_2: nāhaṃ tena gamanena vā agamanena vā amaro siyaṃ,
atk-s0514a1:3082_3: ahañhi ito gatopi agatopi maraṇato amuttova,
atk-s0514a1:3082_4: ito pubbe pana sukhitaṃ taṃ upāsitvā idāni dukkhitaṃ taṃ kathaṃ jaheyyanti vadati.
atk-s0514a1:3082_5: Maraṇaṃ vāti mama agacchantassa vā tayā saddhiṃ maraṇaṃ bhaveyya,
atk-s0514a1:3082_7: Tesu dvīsu yaṃ tayā saddhiṃ maraṇaṃ,
atk-s0514a1:3082_13: Sā kathanti samma sumukha mama tāva daḷhena vālapāsena baddhassa parahatthaṃ gatassa sā gati ruccatu,
atk-s0514a1:3082_14: tava pana cetayānassa sacetanassa paññavato muttassa kathaṃ ruccati.
atk-s0514a1:3083_1: Ubhinnanti amhākaṃ dvinnaṃ jīvitakkhaye sati tvaṃ mama vā tava vā avasiṭṭhañātīnaṃ vā kaṃ atthaṃ passasi.
atk-s0514a1:3083_14: tayi pāṇaṃ cajantepi acajantepi mama jīvitassa abhāvā yaṃ tava pāṇasañcajanaṃ,
atk-s0514a1:3083_15: taṃ andhena tamasi kataṃ viya kiñcideva rūpakammaṃ apaccakkhaguṇaṃ,
atk-s0514a1:3083_16: tādise tava apaccakkhaguṇe pāṇasañcajane tvaṃ pāṇaṃ sañcajanto kamatthaṃ joteyyāsīti.
atk-s0514a1:3084_0: Dhammo apacito santoti dhammo pūjito mānito samāno.
atk-s0514a1:3084_3: Dhammā catthanti dhammato ca atthaṃ samuṭṭhitaṃ passanto.
atk-s0514a1:3084_6: Yo mittoti yo mitto āpadāsu mittaṃ na caje,
atk-s0514a1:3084_7: tassa acajantassa mittassa esa sabhāvo nāma addhā sataṃ dhammo.
atk-s0514a1:3084_9: Kāmaṃ karassūti etaṃ mama kāmaṃ mayā icchitaṃ mama vacanaṃ karassu.
atk-s0514a1:3084_10: Api tvevaṃ gate kāleti api tu evaṃ gate kāle mayi imasmiṃ ṭhāne pāsena baddhe.
atk-s0514a1:3085_1: na gacchāmī”ti evaṃ kathentānaṃ ariyānanti ācāraariyānaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:3085_2: Paccadissathāti kāsāyāni nivāsetvā rattamālaṃ piḷandhitvā muggaraṃ ādāya āgacchanto adissatha.
atk-s0514a1:3085_10: Sumukho pana “ayaṃ nesādo āgantvā paharanto maṃ paṭhamaṃ paharatū”ti cintetvā mahāsattaṃ pacchato katvā nisīdi.
atk-s0514a1:3086_1: Samuḍḍenteti maraṇabhayena ito cito ca uppatante disvā.
atk-s0514a1:3086_6: Āsajja baddhamāsīnanti baddhaṃ mahāsattaṃ upagantvā nisinnaṃ sumukhaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:3086_8: Vimatoti kiṃ nu kho abaddho baddhassa santike nisinno,
atk-s0514a1:3086_14: Yaṃ nūti yaṃ tāva eso mahāpāsena baddho.
atk-s0514a1:3086_15: Na kurute disanti palāyanatthāya ekaṃ disaṃ na bhajati,
atk-s0514a1:3087_1: Yāva kālassa pariyāyanti yāva maraṇassa vāro āgacchati.
atk-s0514a1:3087_2: Kathaṃ panāyanti tvaṃ rājā me soti vadasi,
atk-s0514a1:3087_4: itipi paṇḍito samāno kena kāraṇena oḍḍitaṃ pāsaṃ na addasa.
atk-s0514a1:3087_5: Padaṃ hetanti yasamahattaṃ vā ñāṇamahattaṃ vā pattānaṃ attano āpadabujjhanaṃ nāma padaṃ kāraṇaṃ,
atk-s0514a1:3087_10: Guyhamāsajjāti tesu pāsesu yo guḷho paṭicchanno pāso,
atk-s0514a1:3087_12: Athevanti atha evaṃ jīvitakkhaye bajjhantevāti attho.
atk-s0514a1:3088_0: Iti naṃ so kathāsallāpena muduhadayaṃ katvā mahāsattassa jīvitaṃ yācanto gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:3091_0: Api no anumaññāsi, api no jīvitaṃ dade”ti.
atk-s0514a1:3092_0: Tattha api nāyanti api nu ayaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:3092_2: Api no anumaññāsīti cittakūṭaṃ gantvā ñātake passituṃ tvaṃ api no anujāneyyāsi.
atk-s0514a1:3092_3: Api no jīvitaṃ dadeti api no imāya kathāya uppannavissāso na māreyyāsīti.
atk-s0514a1:3095_0: “Na ceva me tvaṃ baddhosi, napi icchāmi te vadhaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:3096_0: Kāmaṃ khippamito gantvā, jīva tvaṃ anigho cira”nti.
atk-s0514a1:3100_0: Sace ekena tuṭṭhosi, muñcetaṃ mañca bhakkhaya.
atk-s0514a1:3103_0: Na te lābhena jīvatthi, etena niminā tuvaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:3106_0: Maṃ pubbe bandha pāsena, pacchā muñca dijādhipaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:3108_0: “Tāvadeva ca te lābho, katāssa yācanāya ca;
atk-s0514a1:3109_0: Mitti ca dhataraṭṭhehi, yāvajīvāya te siyā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:3110_0: Tattha etanti yaṃ aññatra etassa jīvitā mama jīvitaṃ,
atk-s0514a1:3111_0: Iti so tāya dhammadesanāya tele pakkhittakappāsapicu viya mudugatahadayo mahāsattaṃ tassa dāyaṃ katvā dadanto āha –
atk-s0514a1:3113_0: “Passantu no mahāsaṅghā, tayā muttaṃ ito gataṃ;
atk-s0514a1:3114_0: Mittāmaccā ca bhaccā ca, puttadārā ca bandhavā.
atk-s0514a1:3116_0: “Na ca te tādisā mittā, bahūnaṃ idha vijjati;
atk-s0514a1:3119_0: “So te sahāyaṃ muñcāmi, hotu rājā tavānugo;
atk-s0514a1:3121_1: Tayā muttanti imañhi tvaññeva muñcasi nāma,
atk-s0514a1:3121_2: tasmā imaṃ tayā muttaṃ ito cittakūṭapabbataṃ gataṃ mahantā ñātisaṅghā ete ca mittādayo passantu.
atk-s0514a1:3121_7: etādisā aññesaṃ bahūnaṃ mittā nāma na vijjanti.
atk-s0514a1:3121_8: Tavānugoti etaṃ dukkhitaṃ ādāya purato gacchantassa tava ayaṃ anugo hotūti.
atk-s0514a1:3122_0: Evaṃ vatvā pana nesādaputto mettacittena mahāsattaṃ upasaṅkamitvā bandhanaṃ chinditvā āliṅgitvā sarato
atk-s0514a1:3122_1: nikkhāmetvā saratīre taruṇadabbatiṇapiṭṭhe nisīdāpetvā pāde bandhanapāsaṃ muducittena saṇikaṃ mocetvā
atk-s0514a1:3122_2: dūre khipitvā mahāsatte balavasinehaṃ paccupaṭṭhāpetvā mettacittena udakaṃ ādāya lohitaṃ dhovitvā punappunaṃ
atk-s0514a1:3122_4: Tassa mettacittānubhāvena bodhisattassa pāde sirā sirāhi,
atk-s0514a1:3122_7: tāvadeva pādo saṃruḷho sañjātachavisañjātalomo ahosi abaddhapādena nibbiseso.
atk-s0514a1:3122_9: Atha sumukho attānaṃ nissāya mahāsattassa sukhitabhāvaṃ disvā sañjātasomanasso nesādassa thutimakāsi.
atk-s0514a1:3130_0: Evaṃ luddassa thutiṃ katvā sumukho bodhisattaṃ āha –
atk-s0514a1:3130_3: ayañhi amhākaṃ vacanaṃ akatvā kīḷāhaṃse no katvā issarānaṃ dento bahuṃ dhanaṃ labheyya,
atk-s0514a1:3130_5: attano pana jīvitaṃ anoloketvā amhākaṃ vacanaṃ akari,
atk-s0514a1:3130_6: imaṃ rañño santikaṃ netvā sukhajīvitaṃ karomā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:3130_8: Sumukho attano bhāsāya mahāsattena saddhiṃ kathetvā puna manussabhāsāya luddaputtaṃ āmantetvā “samma,
atk-s0514a1:3130_9: tvaṃ kimatthaṃ pāse oḍḍesī”ti pucchitvā “dhanattha”nti vutte “evaṃ sante amhe ādāya nagaraṃ pavisitvā rañño dassehi,
atk-s0514a1:3130_10: bahuṃ te dhanaṃ dāpessāmī”ti vatvā āha –
atk-s0514a1:3133_0: Lābhaṃ tavāyaṃ dhataraṭṭho, pāpaṃ kiñci na dakkhati.
atk-s0514a1:3141_0: Patīto sumano vitto, bahuṃ dassati te dhana”nti.
atk-s0514a1:3142_2: Rañño dassehi no ubhoti amhe ubhopi rañño dassehi.
atk-s0514a1:3142_6: rañño sīlesu patiṭṭhāpanatthañcāti catūhi kāraṇehi evamāha.
atk-s0514a1:3142_7: Dhataraṭṭhāti netvā ca pana rañño evaṃ ācikkheyyāsi,
atk-s0514a1:3143_3: kīḷāhaṃse vā vo kareyyuṃ mārāpeyyuṃ vā”ti vatvā, “samma, mā bhāyi,
atk-s0514a1:3143_4: ahaṃ tādisaṃ kakkhaḷaṃ luddaṃ lohitapāṇiṃ dhammakathāya mudukaṃ katvā mama pādesu pātesiṃ,
atk-s0514a1:3143_5: rājāno nāma puññavanto paññavanto ca subhāsitadubbhāsitaññū ca,
atk-s0514a1:3143_6: khippaṃ amhe rañño dassehī”ti vutte “tena hi mā mayhaṃ kujjhittha,
atk-s0514a1:3143_7: ahaṃ avassaṃ tumhākaṃ ruciyā nemī”ti vatvā ubhopi kājaṃ āropetvā rājakulaṃ gantvā rañño dassetvā raññā puṭṭho yathābhūtaṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0514a1:3153_0: Kathaṃ luddo mahantānaṃ, issare idha ajjhagā.
atk-s0514a1:3168_0: Tato naṃ pāmuciṃ pāsā, anuññāsiṃ sukhena ca.
atk-s0514a1:3177_0: Lābhaṃ tavāyaṃ dhataraṭṭho, pāpaṃ kiñci na dakkhati.
atk-s0514a1:3186_0: Patīto sumano vitto, bahuṃ dassati te dhanaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:3189_0: Ettheva hi ime āsuṃ, ubho anumatā mayā.
atk-s0514a1:3196_0: Tattha kammunā upapādayīti yaṃ so avaca,
atk-s0514a1:3196_3: senāpatinā nisinnakājakoṭiṃ thokaṃ nīcaṃ katvā ubhopi te ukkhipitvā “haṃsarājā ca senāpati ca rājānaṃ passituṃ gacchanti,
atk-s0514a1:3196_4: ussaratha ussarathā”ti janaṃ ussārento “evarūpā nāma sobhaggappattā suvaṇṇavaṇṇā haṃsarājāno na diṭṭhapubbā”ti
atk-s0514a1:3196_6: Adassayīti “haṃsarājāno tumhe daṭṭhuṃ āgatā”ti rañño ārocāpetvā tena tuṭṭhacittena “āgacchantū”ti pakkosāpito abhiharitvā dassesi.
atk-s0514a1:3196_9: Mahantānanti yasamahantappattānaṃ suvaṇṇavaṇṇānaṃ dhataraṭṭhahaṃsānaṃ issare sāmino kathaṃ tvaṃ luddo hutvā adhigatoti pucchati.
atk-s0514a1:3196_11: etesaṃ issariyaṃ tvaṃ kathaṃ ajjhagāti attho.
atk-s0514a1:3197_2: yaṃ yaṃ samosaraṇaṭṭhānaṃ dijānaṃ pāṇarodhanaṃ jīvitakkhayakaraṃ maññāmi,
atk-s0514a1:3197_3: tattha tattha mayā pallalesu pāsā vihitā.
atk-s0514a1:3197_4: Tādisanti mānusiyasare tathāvidhaṃ pāṇarodhanaṃ mayā vihitaṃ pāsaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:3197_6: Upāsinoti attano jīvitaṃ agaṇetvā upagantvā nisinno.
atk-s0514a1:3197_9: Sudukkaranti tasmiṃ khaṇe esa amhādisehi anariyehi sudukkaraṃ akāsi.
atk-s0514a1:3197_12: attano uttamaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ dahati vidahati pakāseti.
atk-s0514a1:3197_14: Anutthunantoti bhattuguṇe vaṇṇento tassa jīvitaṃ muñcāti maṃ yāci.
atk-s0514a1:3198_1: Sukhena cāti yathāsukhena cittakūṭaṃ gantvā ñātisaṅghaṃ passathāti ca anujāniṃ.
atk-s0514a1:3198_2: Ettheva hīti mayā pana ime dve ettha mānusiyasareyeva cittakūṭagamanāya anumatā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0514a1:3198_6: Sabbasākuṇikāgāmeti sabbasmimpi sākuṇikagāme nāhaṃ aññaṃ tava evarūpaṃ kenaci sākuṇikena ābhatapubbaṃ upāyanaṃ passāmi.
atk-s0514a1:3198_7: Taṃ passāti taṃ mayā ābhataṃ upāyanaṃ passa manujādhipāti.
atk-s0514a1:3199_0: Evaṃ so ṭhitakova sumukhassa guṇaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0514a1:3199_2: sumukhassa ca suvaṇṇabhaddapīṭhakaṃ dāpetvā tesaṃ tattha nisinnānaṃ suvaṇṇabhājanehi lājamadhuphāṇitādīni
atk-s0514a1:3199_3: dāpetvā niṭṭhite pānabhojanakicce añjaliṃ paggayha mahāsattaṃ dhammakathaṃ yācitvā suvaṇṇapīṭhake nisīdi.
atk-s0514a1:3199_4: So tena yācito paṭisanthāraṃ tāva akāsi.
atk-s0514a1:3204_0: “Kacci nu bhoto kusalaṃ, kacci bhoto anāmayaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:3210_0: “Kacci bhoto amaccesu, doso koci na vijjati;
atk-s0514a1:3211_0: Kacci ca te tavatthesu, nāvakaṅkhanti jīvitaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:3213_0: “Athopi me amaccesu, doso koci na vijjati;
atk-s0514a1:3221_5: Nāvakaṅkhantīti uraṃ datvā pariccajantā kicci attano jīvitaṃ na patthenti,
atk-s0514a1:3221_9: Puttarūpayasūpetāti puttehi ca rūpena ca yasena ca upetā.
atk-s0514a1:3221_10: Tava chandavasānugāti kacci tava ajjhāsayaṃ tava vasaṃ anuvattati,
atk-s0514a1:3222_0: Evaṃ bodhisattena paṭisanthāre kate puna rājā tena saddhiṃ kathento āha –
atk-s0514a1:3231_0: Na cāyaṃ kiñci rasmāsu, sattūva samapajjatha.
atk-s0514a1:3237_0: Tato maṃ pāmucī pāsā, anuññāsi sukhena ca.
atk-s0514a1:3243_0: Eso cāpi bahuṃ vittaṃ, labhataṃ yāvadicchatī”ti.
atk-s0514a1:3244_0: Tattha mahāsattuhatthattataṃ gatoti mahantassa sattuno hatthattaṃ gato.
atk-s0514a1:3244_5: etesañhi jammānaṃ tāvadeva evaṃ pākatikaṃ hoti,
atk-s0514a1:3244_6: sakuṇe daṇḍena pothetvā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpento dhanavetanaṃ labhatīti.
atk-s0514a1:3244_10: esa amhe disvā baddhāti saññāya thokaṃ osakkittha.
atk-s0514a1:3244_14: Dhanamicchatāti etassa dhanaṃ icchantena tava santikaṃ amhākaṃ āgamanaṃ cintitaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:3245_0: Evañca pana vatvā rājā aññataraṃ amaccaṃ oloketvā “kiṃ karomi devā”ti vutte “imaṃ nesādaṃ kappitakesamassuṃ
atk-s0514a1:3245_1: nhātānulittaṃ sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ kāretvā ānehī”ti vatvā tena tathā katvā ānītassa tassa saṃvacchare
atk-s0514a1:3245_3: dve vīthiyo gahetvā ṭhitaṃ mahantaṃ gehaṃ,
atk-s0514a1:3249_1: So tassa dhammakathaṃ sutvā tuṭṭhahadayo “dhammakathikassa sakkāraṃ karissāmī”ti setacchattaṃ datvā rajjaṃ paṭicchāpento āha –
atk-s0514a1:3255_0: Etaṃ dadāmi vo vittaṃ, issariyaṃ vissajāmi vo”ti.
atk-s0514a1:3256_0: Tattha vaso vattatīti yattha mama vaso vattati.
atk-s0514a1:3256_3: Yaṃ caññaṃ upakappatīti puññakāmatāya dānatthaṃ vā chattaṃ ussāpetvā rajjameva upabhottuṃ vā yaṃ vā aññaṃ tumhākaṃ ruccati,
atk-s0514a1:3256_6: saddhiṃyeva setacchattena mama santakaṃ issariyaṃ vissajjāmi voti.
atk-s0514a1:3257_0: Atha mahāsatto raññā dinnaṃ setacchattaṃ puna tasseva adāsi.
atk-s0514a1:3257_3: luddaputtena pana ‘ayaṃ sumukho mudhurakatho’ti ativiya vaṇṇito,
atk-s0514a1:3257_5: So tena saddhiṃ sallapanto anantaraṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:3261_2: yadi ca me ayaṃ sumukho paṇḍito buddhisampanno kāmasā attano ruciyā ajjhabhāseyya,
atk-s0514a1:3265_0: Paṭivattuṃ na sakkomi, na me so vinayo siyā.
atk-s0514a1:3272_0: Tattha nāgarājārivantaranti peḷāya abbhantaraṃ paviṭṭho nāgarājā viya.
atk-s0514a1:3272_1: Paṭivattunti tumhākaṃ dvinnaṃ antare vattuṃ na sakkomi.
atk-s0514a1:3272_6: Pūjāti ubho tumhe mayhaṃ bahūhi kāraṇehi pūjārahā ceva pasaṃsārahā ca.
atk-s0514a1:3273_0: Rājā tassa vacanaṃ sutvā tuṭṭhahadayo “nesādaputto taṃ vaṇṇeti,
atk-s0514a1:3273_1: na aññena tumhādisena madhuradhammakathikena nāma bhavitabba”nti vatvā āha –
atk-s0514a1:3279_0: Yāvatatthi mayā diṭṭhā, nāññaṃ passāmi edisaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:3282_0: Eso cāpi mamacchando, ciraṃ passeyya vo ubho”ti.
atk-s0514a1:3283_5: Yāvatatthīti yāvatā mayā diṭṭhā nāma atthi.
atk-s0514a1:3283_6: Nāññanti tasmiṃ mayā diṭṭhaṭṭhāne aññaṃ evarūpaṃ na passāmi.
atk-s0514a1:3283_7: Tuṭṭhosmi vo pakatiyāti samma haṃsarāja ahaṃ pakatiyā paṭhamameva tumhākaṃ dassanena tuṭṭho.
atk-s0514a1:3283_8: Vākyenāti idāni pana vo madhuravacanena tuṭṭhosmi.
atk-s0514a1:3283_9: Ciraṃ passeyya voti idheva vasāpetvā muhuttampi avippavāsanto ciraṃ tumhe passeyyanti esa me chandoti vadati.
atk-s0514a1:3286_0: “Yaṃ kiccaṃ parame mitte, katamasmāsu taṃ tayā;
atk-s0514a1:3287_0: Pattā nissaṃsayaṃ tyāmhā, bhattirasmāsu yā tava.
atk-s0514a1:3296_0: Eso cāpi mahā attho, ñātivissāsanā siyā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:3297_1: Pattā nissaṃsayaṃ tyāmhāti mayaṃ nissaṃsayena tayā pattāyeva.
atk-s0514a1:3297_2: Bhattirasmāsu yā tavāti yā tava amhesu bhatti,
atk-s0514a1:3297_3: tāya bhattiyā mayaṃ tayā asaṃsayena pattāyeva,
atk-s0514a1:3297_6: Aduñca nūna sumahāti etañca ekaṃseneva sumahantaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:3297_7: Ñātisaṅghassa mantaranti amhehi dvīhi janehi virahitassa mama ñātisaṅghassa antaraṃ chiddaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:3297_8: Asmākanti amhākaṃ dvinnaṃ adassanena bahūsu pakkhīsu dukkhaṃ uppannaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:3297_11: Eso cāpi mahā atthoti yā esā ñātisaṅghasaṅkhātā ñātivissāsanā siyā,
atk-s0514a1:3298_0: Evaṃ vutte rājā tesaṃ gamanaṃ anujāni.
atk-s0514a1:3298_2: sīle ca ānisaṃsaṃ kathetvā “imaṃ sīlaṃ rakkha,
atk-s0514a1:3298_4: catūhi saṅgahavatthūhi janaṃ saṅgaṇhāhī”ti ovaditvā cittakūṭaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0514a1:3308_0: Tattha upāgamunti aruṇuggamanavelāyameva lājamadhuphāṇitādīni paribhuñjitvā raññā ca deviyā ca dvīhi
atk-s0514a1:3308_1: suvaṇṇatālavaṇṭehi ukkhipitvā gandhamālādīhi katasakkārā tālavaṇṭehi otaritvā rājānaṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā
atk-s0514a1:3308_2: vehāsaṃ uppatitvā raññā añjaliṃ paggayha “gacchatha sāmino”ti vutte sīhapañjarena nikkhantā uttamena
atk-s0514a1:3308_7: Parikiriṃsūti bhattuno muttabhāvena tuṭṭhā taṃ bhattāraṃ samantā parivārayiṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:3309_0: Evaṃ parivāretvā pana te haṃsā “kathaṃ muttosi,
atk-s0514a1:3309_4: Taṃ sutvā tuṭṭho haṃsagaṇo “sumukhasenāpati ca rājā ca luddaputto ca sukhitā niddukkhā ciraṃ jīvantū”ti thutimakāsi.
atk-s0514a1:3313_2: Dhataraṭṭhāti haṃsarājā sumukho raññā ceva luddaputtena cāti dvīhi evaṃ ubhopi te dhataraṭṭhā kalyāṇamittasampannā yathā ñātisaṅghaṃ upāgamuṃ,
atk-s0514a1:3313_4: evaṃ aññesampi mittavataṃ atthā padakkhiṇā hontīti.
atk-s0514a1:3314_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā “na bhikkhave idāneva,
atk-s0514a1:3314_1: pubbepānando mamatthāya jīvitaṃ pariccajī”ti vatvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi “tadā nesādo channo ahosi,
atk-s0514a1:3318_0: Ete haṃsā pakkamantīti idaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto ānandatherassa jīvitapariccāgameva ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0514a1:3318_2: idha pana satthā atītaṃ āharanto idamāhari.
atk-s0514a1:3319_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ saṃyamassa nāma bārāṇasirañño khemā nāma aggamahesī ahosi.
atk-s0514a1:3319_2: Athekadivasaṃ khemā devī paccūsasamaye supinaṃ addasa.
atk-s0514a1:3319_3: Suvaṇṇavaṇṇā haṃsā āgantvā rājapallaṅke nisīditvā madhurassarena dhammakathaṃ kathesuṃ.
atk-s0514a1:3319_4: Deviyā sādhukāraṃ datvā dhammaṃ suṇantiyā dhammassavanena atittāya eva ratti vibhāyi.
atk-s0514a1:3319_5: Haṃsā dhammaṃ kathetvā sīhapañjarena nikkhamitvā agamaṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:3319_6: Sā vegenuṭṭhāya “palāyamāne haṃse gaṇhatha gaṇhathā”ti vatvā hatthaṃ pasārentīyeva pabujjhi.
atk-s0514a1:3319_7: Tassā kathaṃ sutvā paricārikāyo “kuhiṃ haṃsā”ti thokaṃ avahasiṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:3319_8: Sā tasmiṃ khaṇe supinabhāvaṃ ñatvā cintesi –
atk-s0514a1:3319_10: addhā imasmiṃ loke suvaṇṇavaṇṇā haṃsā bhavissanti,
atk-s0514a1:3319_11: sace kho pana ‘suvaṇṇahaṃsānaṃ dhammaṃ sotukāmāmhī’ti rājānaṃ vakkhāmi,
atk-s0514a1:3319_13: haṃsānañca kathā nāma abhūtāyevā’ti vatvā nirussukko bhavissati,
atk-s0514a1:3319_14: ‘dohaḷo’ti vutte pana yena kenaci upāyena pariyesissati,
atk-s0514a1:3319_16: Sā gilānālayaṃ dassetvā paricārikānaṃ saññaṃ datvā nipajji.
atk-s0514a1:3320_0: Rājā rājāsane nisinno tassā dassanavelāya taṃ adisvā “kahaṃ,
atk-s0514a1:3320_1: khemā devī”ti pucchitvā “gilānā”ti sutvā tassā santikaṃ gantvā sayanekadese nisīditvā piṭṭhiṃ parimajjanto “kiṃ te aphāsuka”nti pucchi.
atk-s0514a1:3320_8: ahamekassa suvaṇṇahaṃsassa samussitasetacchatte rājapallaṅke nisinnassa gandhamālādīhi pūjaṃ katvā sādhukāraṃ dadamānā dhammakathaṃ sotumicchāmi,
atk-s0514a1:3320_14: mā cintayī”ti assāsetvā sirigabbhato nikkhamma amaccehi saddhiṃ mantesi – “ambho,
atk-s0514a1:3320_22: Rājā brāhmaṇe pakkosāpetvā sakkāraṃ katvā pucchi –
atk-s0514a1:3320_26: haṃsāti cha ete tiracchānagatā suvaṇṇavaṇṇā hontīti āgatā,
atk-s0514a1:3320_28: iti manussehi saddhiṃ satta suvaṇṇavaṇṇā hontī”ti.
atk-s0514a1:3321_0: Taṃ sutvā rājā attamano hutvā “kahaṃ nu kho ācariyā dhataraṭṭhahaṃsā vasantī”ti pucchitvā “na jānāma,
atk-s0514a1:3321_1: mahārājā”ti vutte “atha ke pana jānissantī”ti vatvā “luddaputtā”ti vutte sabbe attano vijite luddake sannipātāpetvā pucchi – “tātā,
atk-s0514a1:3321_9: So brāhmaṇapaṇḍite pakkosāpetvā cittakūṭapabbate suvaṇṇavaṇṇānaṃ haṃsānaṃ atthibhāvaṃ ārocetvā “jānātha nu kho tesaṃ gahaṇūpāya”nti pucchi.
atk-s0514a1:3321_15: nagarato avidūre uttarena tigāvutamatte tigāvutappamāṇaṃ khemaṃ nāma saraṃ kārāpetvā udakassa pūretvā
atk-s0514a1:3321_16: nānādhaññāni ropetvā pañcavaṇṇapadumasañchannaṃ kārāpetvā ekaṃ paṇḍitaṃ nesādaṃ paṭicchāpetvā manussānaṃ
atk-s0514a1:3321_17: upagantuṃ adatvā catūsu kaṇṇesu ṭhitehi abhayaṃ ghosāpetha,
atk-s0514a1:3321_18: taṃ sutvā nānāsakuṇā dasa disā otarissanti,
atk-s0514a1:3321_19: tepi haṃsā paramparāya tassa sarassa khemabhāvaṃ sutvā āgacchissanti,
atk-s0514a1:3322_0: Taṃ sutvā rājā tehi vuttapadese vuttappakāraṃ saraṃ kārāpetvā chekaṃ nesādaṃ pakkosāpetvā tassa sahassaṃ
atk-s0514a1:3322_1: dāpetvā “tvaṃ ito paṭṭhāya attano kammaṃ mā kari,
atk-s0514a1:3322_3: tvaṃ appamatto khemaṃ saraṃ rakkhanto manusse paṭikkamāpetvā catūsu kaṇṇesu abhayaṃ ghosāpetvā āgatāgate sakuṇe mama ācikkheyyāsi,
atk-s0514a1:3322_4: suvaṇṇahaṃsesu āgatesu mahantaṃ sakkāraṃ labhissasī”ti tamassāsetvā khemaṃ saraṃ paṭicchāpesi.
atk-s0514a1:3322_5: So tato paṭṭhāya raññā vuttanayeneva tattha paṭipajji,
atk-s0514a1:3322_7: Tato paṭṭhāya ca nānappakārā sakuṇā otariṃsu,
atk-s0514a1:3322_15: pañcavaṇṇā haṃsā āgantvā sare gocaraṃ gaṇhanti,
atk-s0514a1:3322_16: pākahaṃsānaṃ āgatattā idāni katipāheneva suvaṇṇahaṃsā āgamissanti,
atk-s0514a1:3323_0: Taṃ sutvā rājā “aññena tattha na gantabbaṃ,
atk-s0514a1:3323_2: hatthapādachedanañca gharavilopañca pāpuṇissatī”ti nagara bheriṃ carāpesi.
atk-s0514a1:3323_3: Tato paṭṭhāya tattha koci na gacchati.
atk-s0514a1:3323_8: So taṃ dhataraṭṭhamahissarassa anurūpāti tassa pādaparicārikaṃ katvā pesesi.
atk-s0514a1:3323_10: teneva ca kāraṇena tāni dve haṃsakulāni aññamaññaṃ vissāsikāni jātāni.
atk-s0514a1:3324_5: so hi saro ramaṇīyo nānāsakuṇasamākiṇṇo pañcavaṇṇapadumasañchanno nānādhaññaphalasampanno nānappakārabhamaragaṇanikūjito
atk-s0514a1:3324_7: koci naṃ upasaṅkamituṃ samattho nāma natthi,
atk-s0514a1:3324_10: Te tesaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā “bārāṇasiyā samīpe kira evarūpo khemo nāma saro atthi,
atk-s0514a1:3324_14: mayampi tattha gantvā gocaraṃ gaṇheyyāmā”ti sumukhassa kathesuṃ.
atk-s0514a1:3324_23: na so saro tehi sudhammatāya kato,
atk-s0514a1:3325_0: Suvaṇṇahaṃsā “khemaṃ saraṃ gantukāmamhā”ti dutiyampi tatiyampi sumukhassa ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0514a1:3325_1: So tesaṃ tattha gantukāmataṃ mahāsattassa ārocesi.
atk-s0514a1:3325_2: Atha mahāsatto “mama ñātakā maṃ nissāya mā kilamantu,
atk-s0514a1:3325_3: tena hi gacchāmā”ti navutihaṃsasahassaparivuto tattha gantvā gocaraṃ gahetvā haṃsakīḷaṃ kīḷitvā cittakūṭameva paccāgami.
atk-s0514a1:3325_4: Khemako tesaṃ gocaraṃ caritvā gatakāle gantvā tesaṃ āgatabhāvaṃ rañño ārocesi.
atk-s0514a1:3325_7: ekaṃ vā dve vā haṃse gaṇhituṃ vāyama,
atk-s0514a1:3325_8: mahantaṃ te yasaṃ dassāmī”ti vatvā paribbayaṃ datvā taṃ uyyojesi.
atk-s0514a1:3325_9: So tattha gantvā cāṭipañjare nisīditvā haṃsānaṃ caraṇaṭṭhānaṃ vīmaṃsi.
atk-s0514a1:3325_11: tasmā mahāsatto otiṇṇaṭṭhānato paṭṭhāya sapadānaṃ sāliṃ khādanto agamāsi.
atk-s0514a1:3325_12: Sesā ito cito ca khādantā vicariṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:3326_1: imaṃ bandhituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā punadivase haṃsesu saraṃ anotiṇṇesuyeva cāṭipañjare nisinno taṃ ṭhānaṃ
atk-s0514a1:3326_2: gantvā avidūre pañjare attānaṃ paṭicchādetvā chiddena olokento acchi.
atk-s0514a1:3326_3: Tasmiṃ khaṇe mahāsatto navutihaṃsasahassapurakkhato hiyyo otiṇṇaṭṭhāneyeva otaritvā odhiyaṃ nisīditvā sāliṃ khādanto pāyāsi.
atk-s0514a1:3326_4: Nesādo pañjarachiddena olokento tassa rūpasobhaggappattaṃ attabhāvaṃ disvā “ayaṃ haṃso sakaṭanābhippamāṇasarīro suvaṇṇavaṇṇo,
atk-s0514a1:3326_6: tisso rājiyo galena otaritvā urantarena gatā,
atk-s0514a1:3326_11: Haṃsarājāpi bahuṃ gocaraṃ caritvā jalakīḷaṃ kīḷitvā haṃsagaṇaparivuto cittakūṭameva agamāsi.
atk-s0514a1:3326_12: Iminā niyāmeneva pañca divase gocaraṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0514a1:3326_13: Chaṭṭhe divase khemako kāḷaassavālamayaṃ daḷhaṃ mahārajjuṃ vaṭṭitvā yaṭṭhiyā pāsaṃ katvā “sve haṃsarājā
atk-s0514a1:3326_14: imasmiṃ okāse otarissatī”ti tathato ñatvā antoudake yaṭṭhipāsaṃ oḍḍi.
atk-s0514a1:3327_0: Punadivase haṃsarājā otaranto pādaṃ pāse pavesantoyeva otari.
atk-s0514a1:3327_1: Athassa pāso pādaṃ ayapaṭṭakena kaḍḍhanto viya ābandhitvā gaṇhi.
atk-s0514a1:3327_2: So “chindissāmi na”nti vegaṃ janetvā kaḍḍhitvā pātesi.
atk-s0514a1:3327_7: rañño pana hīnaṅgatā nāma ananucchavikā”ti na vāyāmaṃ akāsi,
atk-s0514a1:3327_11: ñātakā me ñatrastā hutvā gocaraṃ aggahetvā chātajjhattāva palāyantā dubbalattā samudde patissantī”ti.
atk-s0514a1:3327_12: So vedanaṃ adhivāsetvā pāsavase vattetvā sāliṃ khādanto viya hutvā tesaṃ yāvadatthaṃ caritvā haṃsakīḷaṃ kīḷanakāle mahantena saddena baddharavaṃ ravi.
atk-s0514a1:3327_13: Taṃ sutvā haṃsā maraṇabhayatajjitā vaggavaggā cittakūṭābhimukhā purimanayeneva pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:3328_0: Sumukhopi heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva cintetvā vicinitvā tīsupi koṭṭhāsesu mahāsattaṃ adisvā “addhā tassevedaṃ
atk-s0514a1:3328_1: bhayaṃ uppanna”nti nivattitvā āgato mahāsattaṃ pāsena baddhaṃ lohitamakkhitaṃ dukkhāturaṃ paṅkapiṭṭhe
atk-s0514a1:3328_3: ahaṃ mama jīvitaṃ pariccajitvā tumhe mocessāmī”ti vadanto otaritvā mahāsattaṃ assāsento paṅkapiṭṭhe nisīdi.
atk-s0514a1:3328_4: Mahāsatto “navutihaṃsasahassesu maṃ chaḍḍetvā palāyantesu ayaṃ sumukho ekakova āgato,
atk-s0514a1:3328_5: kiṃ nu kho luddaputtassa āgatakāle maṃ chaḍḍetvā palāyissati,
atk-s0514a1:3328_6: udāhu no”ti vīmaṃsanavasena lohitamakkhito pāsayaṭṭhiyaṃ olambantoyeva tisso gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0514a1:3337_0: Mā anīghāya hāpesi, kāmaṃ sumukha pakkamā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:3338_0: Tattha bhayameritāti bhayena eritā bhayaṭṭitā bhayacalitā.
atk-s0514a1:3338_5: Anapekkhamānāti tava ñātakā maṃ anolokentā nirālayā hutvā.
atk-s0514a1:3338_7: Mā anīghāyāti ito gantvā pattabbāya nidukkhabhāvāya vīriyaṃ mā hāpesi.
atk-s0514a1:3339_0: Taṃ sutvā sumukho “ayaṃ haṃsarājā mama piyamittabhāvaṃ na jānāti,
atk-s0514a1:3339_2: sinehabhāvamassa dassessāmī”ti cintetvā catasso gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0514a1:3342_0: Jīvitaṃ maraṇaṃ vā me, tayā saddhiṃ bhavissati.
atk-s0514a1:3351_0: Taṃ hitvā patataṃ seṭṭha, kiṃ te vakkhāmito gato;
atk-s0514a1:3353_1: kāyikacetasikena dukkhena phuṭṭhopi taṃ na jahāmi.
atk-s0514a1:3353_2: Anariyasaṃyutteti mittadubbhīhi ahirikehi kattabbatāya anariyabhāvena saṃyutte.
atk-s0514a1:3353_5: ekadivaseneva paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā ekadivase aṇḍakosaṃ padāletvā ekato vaḍḍhitakumāroti attho.
atk-s0514a1:3353_7: Sacitteti tava sake citte ahaṃ ṭhito tava vase vattāmi,
atk-s0514a1:3353_11: tava citte ahaṃ saṇṭhito suṭṭhu ṭhitoti attho.
atk-s0514a1:3353_13: Vikattissanti “kuhiṃ haṃsarājā”ti pucchito ahaṃ kinti kathessāmi.
atk-s0514a1:3353_14: Kiṃ te vakkhāmīti te tava pavattiṃ pucchante haṃsagaṇe kiṃ vakkhāmi.
atk-s0514a1:3354_0: Evaṃ sumukhena catūhi gāthāhi sīhanāde nadite tassa guṇaṃ pakāsento mahāsatto āha –
atk-s0514a1:3356_0: “Eso hi dhammo sumukha, yaṃ tvaṃ ariyapathe ṭhito;
atk-s0514a1:3357_0: Yo bhattāraṃ sakhāraṃ maṃ, na pariccattumussahe.
atk-s0514a1:3359_0: “Tañhi me pekkhamānassa, bhayaṃ na tveva jāyati;
atk-s0514a1:3361_0: Tattha eso dhammoti esa porāṇakapaṇḍitānaṃ sabhāvo.
atk-s0514a1:3361_1: Bhattāraṃ sakhāraṃ manti sāmikañca sahāyañca maṃ.
atk-s0514a1:3362_0: Evaṃ tesaṃ kathentānaññeva luddaputto sarapariyante ṭhito haṃse tīhi khandhehi palāyante disvā “kiṃ nu
atk-s0514a1:3362_1: kho”ti pāsaṭṭhānaṃ olokento bodhisattaṃ pāsayaṭṭhiyaṃ olambantaṃ disvā sañjātasomanasso kacchaṃ daḷhaṃ
atk-s0514a1:3362_2: bandhitvā muggaraṃ gahetvā kappuṭṭhānaggi viya avattharamāno paṇhiyā akkantakalale uparisīsena gantvā
atk-s0514a1:3368_0: Aṭṭhāsi purato rañño, haṃso vissāsayaṃ byathaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:3370_0: “Mā bhāyi patataṃ seṭṭha, na hi bhāyanti tādisā;
atk-s0514a1:3373_2: Atibrūhayīti anantaragāthāya āgataṃ “mā bhāyī”ti vacanaṃ vadanto atibrūhesi mahāsaddaṃ nicchāresi.
atk-s0514a1:3373_4: ahaṃ pahāraṃ sampaṭicchissāmīti jīvitaṃ pariccajitvā purato aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0514a1:3373_6: Byathanti byathitaṃ bhītaṃ rājānaṃ “mā bhāyī”ti iminā vacanena vissāsento.
atk-s0514a1:3373_11: Tena pariyāpadānenāti tena mayā payuttena yogena parisuddhena.
atk-s0514a1:3374_0: Evaṃ sumukho mahāsattaṃ assāsetvā luddaputtassa santikaṃ gantvā madhuraṃ mānusiṃ vācaṃ nicchārento, “samma,
atk-s0514a1:3374_4: ‘tayā oḍḍitavālapāse yo vā so vā haṃso baddho’ti saññaṃ mā kari,
atk-s0514a1:3374_5: navutiyā haṃsasahassānaṃ pavaro dhataraṭṭhahaṃsarājā te pāse baddho,
atk-s0514a1:3374_22: nirayādīhi na muccissasī”ti taṃ nirayādibhayena santajjetvā attano madhurakathaṃ gaṇhāpetvā puna bodhisattassa santikaṃ gantvā taṃ assāsento aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0514a1:3374_23: Nesādo tassa kathaṃ sutvā “ayaṃ tiracchānagato samāno manussehipi kātuṃ asakkuṇeyyaṃ evarūpaṃ mittadhammaṃ karoti,
atk-s0514a1:3374_24: manussāpi evaṃ mittadhamme ṭhātuṃ na sakkonti,
atk-s0514a1:3374_25: aho esa ñāṇasampanno madhurakatho dhammiko”ti sakalasarīraṃ pītisomanassaparipuṇṇaṃ katvā pahaṭṭhalomo
atk-s0514a1:3374_26: daṇḍaṃ chaḍḍetvā sirasi añjaliṃ patiṭṭhapetvā sūriyaṃ namassanto viya sumukhassa guṇaṃ kittento aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0514a1:3379_0: “Na me sutaṃ vā diṭṭhaṃ vā, bhāsanto mānusiṃ dijo;
atk-s0514a1:3380_0: Ariyaṃ bruvāno vakkaṅgo, cajanto mānusiṃ giraṃ.
atk-s0514a1:3382_0: “Kiṃ nu tāyaṃ dijo hoti, mutto baddhaṃ upāsasi;
atk-s0514a1:3383_0: Ohāya sakuṇā yanti, kiṃ eko avahīyasī”ti.
atk-s0514a1:3384_0: Tattha añjalissa paṇāmayīti añjaliṃ assa upanāmayi,
atk-s0514a1:3384_6: tvaṃ dijo samāno ajja mayā saddhiṃ mānusiṃ vācaṃ bhāsanto niddosaṃ bruvāno mānusiṃ giraṃ cajanto paccakkhato diṭṭho,
atk-s0514a1:3384_7: ito pubbe pana idaṃ acchariyaṃ mayā neva sutaṃ na diṭṭhanti.
atk-s0514a1:3384_8: Kiṃ nu tāyanti yaṃ etaṃ tvaṃ upāsasi,
atk-s0514a1:3385_0: Evaṃ tuṭṭhacittena nesādena puṭṭho sumukho “ayaṃ muduko jāto,
atk-s0514a1:3385_1: idānissa bhiyyosomattāya mudubhāvatthaṃ mama guṇaṃ dassesāmī”ti cintetvā āha –
atk-s0514a1:3390_0: “Mahāgaṇāya bhattā me, mā eko byasanaṃ agā;
atk-s0514a1:3391_0: Tathā taṃ samma nesāda, bhattāyaṃ abhito rame”ti.
atk-s0514a1:3392_2: Mā ekoti mādise sevake vijjamāne mā ekako byasanaṃ agā.
atk-s0514a1:3392_6: Bhattāyaṃ abhito rameti bhattā ayaṃ mama,
atk-s0514a1:3392_7: ahamassa abhito rame santike ramāmi na ukkaṇṭhāmīti.
atk-s0514a1:3393_0: Nesādo taṃ tassa dhammanissitaṃ madhurakathaṃ sutvā somanassappatto pahaṭṭhalomo “sacāhaṃ etaṃ sīlādiguṇasaṃyuttaṃ haṃsarājānaṃ vadhissāmi,
atk-s0514a1:3393_4: ahametaṃ sumukhassa dāyaṃ katvā vissajjessāmī”ti cintetvā gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:3396_0: Cajāmi te taṃ bhattāraṃ, gacchathūbho yathāsukha”nti.
atk-s0514a1:3397_0: Tattha ariyavattasīti mittadhammarakkhaṇasaṅkhātena ācāraariyānaṃ vattena samannāgatosi.
atk-s0514a1:3397_1: Piṇḍamapacāyasīti bhattu santikā laddhaṃ piṇḍaṃ senāpatiṭṭhānaṃ pūjesi.
atk-s0514a1:3397_2: Gacchathūbhoti dvepi janā assumukhe ñātisaṅghe hāsayamānā yathāsukhaṃ gacchathāti.
atk-s0514a1:3398_0: Evaṃ vatvā nesādo muducittena mahāsattaṃ upasaṅkamitvā yaṭṭhiṃ onāmetvā paṅkapiṭṭhe nisīdāpetvā pāsayaṭṭhiyā
atk-s0514a1:3398_1: mocetvā taṃ ukkhipitvā sarato nīharitvā taruṇadabbatiṇapiṭṭhe nisīdāpetvā pāde baddhapāsaṃ saṇikaṃ mocetvā
atk-s0514a1:3398_2: mahāsatte balavasinehaṃ paccupaṭṭhāpetvā mettacittena udakaṃ ādāya lohitaṃ dhovitvā punappunaṃ parimajji,
atk-s0514a1:3398_9: Sumukho attānaṃ nissāya rañño sukhitabhāvaṃ disvā sañjātasomanasso cintesi –
atk-s0514a1:3398_11: amhehi etassa kato upakāro nāma natthi,
atk-s0514a1:3398_12: sace esa rājarājamahāmattānaṃ atthāya amhe gaṇhi,
atk-s0514a1:3398_13: tesaṃ santikaṃ netvā bahuṃ dhanaṃ labhissati,
atk-s0514a1:3398_17: Atha naṃ upakāraṃ kātukāmatāya pucchanto āha –
atk-s0514a1:3405_2: sace tayā attano payogena attano atthāya haṃsānañceva sesapakkhīnañca pāso ohito.
atk-s0514a1:3405_3: Anissaroti anissaro hutvā amhe muñcanto yenāsi āṇatto,
atk-s0514a1:3406_0: Taṃ sutvā nesādo “nāhaṃ tumhe attano atthāya gaṇhiṃ,
atk-s0514a1:3406_1: bārāṇasiraññā pana saṃyamena gaṇhāpitomhī”ti vatvā deviyā diṭṭhasupinakālato paṭṭhāya yāva raññā tesaṃ āgatabhāvaṃ sutvā,
atk-s0514a1:3406_3: ekaṃ vā dve vā haṃse gaṇhituṃ vāyama,
atk-s0514a1:3406_4: mahantaṃ te yasaṃ dassāmī”ti vatvā paribbayaṃ datvā uyyojitabhāvo,
atk-s0514a1:3406_6: Taṃ sutvā sumukho “iminā nesādena attano jīvitaṃ agaṇetvā amhe vissajjentena dukkaraṃ kataṃ,
atk-s0514a1:3406_12: na deviyā manoratho matthakaṃ pāpuṇissatī”ti cintetvā, “samma,
atk-s0514a1:3406_13: evaṃ sante amhe vissajjetuṃ na labhasi,
atk-s0514a1:3406_15: so amhe yathāruciṃ karissatī”ti imamatthaṃ pakāsento gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:3408_0: “Yassa tvaṃ bhatako rañño, kāmaṃ tasseva pāpaya;
atk-s0514a1:3411_0: Taṃ sutvā nesādo “mā vo bhaddante rājadassanaṃ ruccittha,
atk-s0514a1:3411_2: kīḷāhaṃse vā vo kareyyuṃ māreyyuṃ vā”ti āha.
atk-s0514a1:3411_5: ahaṃ tādisassa kakkhaḷassa dhammakathāya maddavaṃ janesiṃ,
atk-s0514a1:3411_12: mama khuddakaṃ rattapadumasañchannaṃ katvā dhataraṭṭhaṃ purato,
atk-s0514a1:3411_13: mamaṃ pacchato nīcataraṃ katvā ādāya khippaṃ netvā rañño dassehī”ti āha.
atk-s0514a1:3411_14: So tassa vacanaṃ sutvā “sumukho rājānaṃ disvā mama mahantaṃ yasaṃ dātukāmo bhavissatī”ti sañjātasomanasso
atk-s0514a1:3411_15: mudūhi latāhi pañjare katvā padumehi chādetvā vuttanayeneva te gahetvā agamāsi.
atk-s0514a1:3418_0: Tattha ajjhavodahīti odahi ṭhapesi. Bhassaravaṇṇineti pabhāsampannavaṇṇe.
atk-s0514a1:3419_0: Evaṃ luddassa te ādāya pakkamanakāle dhataraṭṭho pākahaṃsarājadhītaraṃ attano bhariyaṃ saritvā sumukhaṃ āmantetvā kilesavasena vilapi.
atk-s0514a1:3427_3: Vacamaññāyāti vadhaṃ jānitvā “mama piyasāmiko mārito”ti saññī hutvā.
atk-s0514a1:3427_4: Vadhissatīti kiṃ me piyasāmike mate jīvitenāti marissati.
atk-s0514a1:3427_8: Rucchatīti yathā loṇisaṅkhātaṃ samuddaṃ otaritvā mate patimhi koñcī sakuṇikā kapaṇā rodati,
atk-s0514a1:3428_0: Taṃ sutvā sumukho “ayaṃ haṃsarājā aññe ovadituṃ yutto mātugāmaṃ nissāya kilesavasena vilapati,
atk-s0514a1:3428_1: udakassa ādittakālo viya vatiyā uṭṭhāya kedārakhādanakālo viya ca jāto,
atk-s0514a1:3428_2: yaṃnūnāhaṃ attano balena mātugāmassa dosaṃ pakāsetvā etaṃ saññāpeyya”nti cintetvā gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:3442_0: “Māyā cetā marīcī ca, sokā rogā cupaddavā;
atk-s0514a1:3443_0: Kharā ca bandhanā cetā, maccupāsā guhāsayā;
atk-s0514a1:3444_0: Tāsu yo vissase poso, so naresu narādhamo”ti.
atk-s0514a1:3445_4: Ekitthinti yaṃ evarūpo bhavaṃ ekaṃ itthiṃ anusoceyya,
atk-s0514a1:3445_6: tenāhaṃ ajja taṃ bāloti maññāmīti adhippāyenevamāha.
atk-s0514a1:3446_5: yathā nāma vāto padumasarādīni paharitvā sugandhampi saṅkāraṭṭhānādīni paharitvā duggandhampīti ubhayaṃ chekapāpakaṃ gandhaṃ ādiyati,
atk-s0514a1:3446_6: yathā ca bālo kumārako ambajambūnaṃ heṭṭhā nisinno hatthaṃ pasāretvā patitapatitaṃ āmakampi pakkampi phalaṃ gahetvā khādati,
atk-s0514a1:3446_7: yathā ca rasalolo andho bhatte upanīte yaṃkiñci samakkhikampi nimmakkhikampi āmisaṃ ādiyati,
atk-s0514a1:3446_8: evaṃ itthiyo nāma kilesavasena aḍḍhampi duggatampi kulīnampi akulīnampi abhirūpampi virūpampi gaṇhanti bhajanti,
atk-s0514a1:3447_3: Kālapariyāyanti evarūpaṃ maraṇakālaṃ patto “imasmiṃ kāle idaṃ kattabbaṃ,
atk-s0514a1:3447_6: idaṃ na vattabba”nti na jānāsi devāti.
atk-s0514a1:3447_8: Udīresīti yathā suraṃ pivitvā nātimatto puriso yaṃ vā taṃ vā palapati,
atk-s0514a1:3448_6: Tā hi nissāya andubandhanādīhi bandhanato bandhanā cetā,
atk-s0514a1:3448_7: itthiyo nāma sarīraguhāsayavaseneva maccu nāma etā, devāti.
atk-s0514a1:3448_11: kāmānameva hetu rājāno coraṃ gahetvā”ti suttenapesa attho dīpetabbo.
atk-s0514a1:3449_0: Tato dhataraṭṭho mātugāme paṭibaddhacittatāya “tvaṃ mātugāmassa guṇaṃ na jānāsi,
atk-s0514a1:3455_0: Bījāni tyāsu rūhanti, yadidaṃ sattā pajāyare;
atk-s0514a1:3456_0: Tāsu ko nibbide poso, pāṇamāsajja pāṇibhi.
atk-s0514a1:3459_0: Tassa tyajja bhaye jāte, bhīte na jāyate mati.
atk-s0514a1:3461_0: “Sabbo hi saṃsayaṃ patto, bhayaṃ bhīrū titikkhati;
atk-s0514a1:3462_0: Paṇḍitā ca mahantāno, atthe yuñjanti duyyuje.
atk-s0514a1:3467_0: “Mā no ajja vikantiṃsu, rañño sūdā mahānase;
atk-s0514a1:3468_0: Tathā hi vaṇṇo pattānaṃ, phalaṃ veḷuṃva taṃ vadhi.
atk-s0514a1:3470_0: “Muttopi na icchi uḍḍetuṃ, sayaṃ bandhaṃ upāgami;
atk-s0514a1:3471_0: Sopajja saṃsayaṃ patto, atthaṃ gaṇhāhi mā mukha”nti.
atk-s0514a1:3472_0: Tattha yanti yaṃ mātugāmasaṅkhātaṃ vatthu paññāvuddhehi ñātaṃ,
atk-s0514a1:3472_4: Udapajjisunti paṭhamakappikakāle itthiliṅgasseva paṭhamaṃ pātubhūtattā paṭhamaṃ nibbattāti attho.
atk-s0514a1:3472_5: Tyāsūti sumukha tāsu itthīsu kāyavacīkhiḍḍā ca paṇihitā ohitā ṭhapitā,
atk-s0514a1:3472_9: Pajāyareti sabbe tāsaññeva kucchimhi saṃvaddhāti dīpeti.
atk-s0514a1:3472_11: Pāṇamāsajja pāṇibhīti attano pāṇehipi tāsaṃ pāṇaṃ āsādetvā attano jīvitaṃ cajantopi tā labhitvā ko nibbindeyyāti attho.
atk-s0514a1:3473_1: mayā cittakūṭatale haṃsagaṇamajjhe nisinnena taṃ adisvā “kahaṃ nu sumukho”ti vutte “esa mātugāmaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0514a1:3473_3: evaṃ tvameva thīnaṃ atthesu yuñjasi yuttapayutto hosi,
atk-s0514a1:3473_5: Tassa tyajjāti tassa te ajja maraṇabhaye jāte iminā bhītena maraṇabhayena bhīto maññe,
atk-s0514a1:3473_6: ayaṃ mātugāmassa dosadassane nipuṇā mati jāyateti adhippāyenevamāha.
atk-s0514a1:3474_3: Mahantānoti ye pana paṇḍitā ca honti mahante ca ṭhāne ṭhitā mahantāno,
atk-s0514a1:3474_4: te duyyuje atthe yuñjanti ghaṭenti vāyamanti,
atk-s0514a1:3474_7: Āpadanti sāmino āgataṃ āpadaṃ esa sūro paṭibāhati,
atk-s0514a1:3474_9: Attapariyāyanti attano parittāṇampi ca kātuṃ sakkotīti adhippāyo.
atk-s0514a1:3475_3: tvaṃ mayā attano anantare ṭhāne ṭhapito,
atk-s0514a1:3475_4: tasmā yathā ajja rañño sūdā amhe maṃsatthāya na vikantiṃsu,
atk-s0514a1:3475_7: Taṃ vadhīti svāyaṃ vaṇṇo yathā nāma veḷuṃ nissāya jātaṃ phalaṃ veḷumeva vadhati,
atk-s0514a1:3476_0: Muttopīti yathāsukhaṃ cittakūṭapabbataṃ gacchāti evaṃ luddaputtena mayā saddhiṃ mutto vissajjito samānopi uḍḍituṃ na icchi.
atk-s0514a1:3476_1: Sayanti rājānaṃ daṭṭhukāmo hutvā sayameva bandhaṃ upagatoti evamidaṃ amhākaṃ bhayaṃ taṃ nissāya āgataṃ.
atk-s0514a1:3476_3: Atthaṃ gaṇhāhi mā mukhanti idāni amhākaṃ muñcanakāraṇaṃ gaṇha,
atk-s0514a1:3476_6: “vātova gandhamādetī”tiādīni vadanto itthigarahatthāya mukhaṃ mā pasārayi.
atk-s0514a1:3477_0: Evaṃ mahāsatto mātugāmaṃ vaṇṇetvā sumukhaṃ appaṭibhāṇaṃ katvā tassa anattamanabhāvaṃ viditvā idāni naṃ paggaṇhanto gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:3481_2: Taṃ yoganti yaṃ pubbe “ahaṃ yogaṃ payuñjissaṃ,
atk-s0514a1:3481_5: Tava pariyāpadānenāti tava tena yogena parisuddhena.
atk-s0514a1:3481_8: tayā katattā tava santakena parittāṇena mama jīvitapariyesanaṃ carāti adhippāyo.
atk-s0514a1:3482_0: Atha sumukho “ayaṃ ativiya maraṇabhayabhīto mama ñāṇabalaṃ na jānāti,
atk-s0514a1:3482_1: rājānaṃ disvā thokaṃ kathaṃ labhitvā jānissāmi,
atk-s0514a1:3484_0: “Mā bhāyi patataṃ seṭṭha, na hi bhāyanti tādisā;
atk-s0514a1:3488_0: Iti tesaṃ sakuṇabhāsāya kathentānaṃ luddaputto na kiñci aññāsi,
atk-s0514a1:3488_1: kevalaṃ pana te kājenādāya bārāṇasiṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0514a1:3488_2: Acchariyabbhutajātena añjalinā mahājanena anuggacchamāno so rājadvāraṃ patvā attano āgatabhāvaṃ rañño ārocāpesi.
atk-s0514a1:3492_0: Tattha paṭivedetha manti khemako āgatoti evaṃ maṃ rañño nivedetha.
atk-s0514a1:3493_1: Rājā sañjātasomanasso “khippaṃ āgacchatū”ti vatvā amaccagaṇaparivuto samussitasetacchatte rājapallaṅke
atk-s0514a1:3493_2: nisinno khemakaṃ haṃsakājaṃ ādāya mahātalaṃ abhiruḷhaṃ disvā suvaṇṇavaṇṇe haṃse oloketvā “sampuṇṇo me
atk-s0514a1:3500_5: Tattha kāmaṃkaro hiraññassāti hiraññaṃ assa kāmakiriyā atthu.
atk-s0514a1:3501_0: Evaṃ pasannākāraṃ kāretvā pītisomanassāsamussahito “gacchatha naṃ alaṅkaritvā ānethā”ti āha.
atk-s0514a1:3501_1: Atha naṃ amaccā rājanivesanā otāretvā kappitakesamassuṃ nhātānulittaṃ sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ katvā rañño dassesuṃ.
atk-s0514a1:3501_2: Athassa rājā saṃvacchare satasahassuṭṭhānake dvādasa gāme ājaññayuttaṃ rathaṃ alaṅkatamahāgehañcāti mahantaṃ yasaṃ dāpesi.
atk-s0514a1:3501_3: So mahantaṃ yasaṃ labhitvā attano kammaṃ pakāsetuṃ “na te, deva,
atk-s0514a1:3501_4: mayā yo vā so vā haṃso ānīto,
atk-s0514a1:3501_5: ayaṃ pana navutiyā haṃsasahassānaṃ rājā dhataraṭṭho nāma,
atk-s0514a1:3504_0: Yadyāyaṃ samma khemaka, puṇṇā haṃsehi tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0514a1:3508_3: yadi ayaṃ amhākaṃ pokkharaṇī navutihaṃsasahassehi puṇṇā tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0514a1:3508_4: Kathaṃ rucimajjhagatanti evaṃ sante tvaṃ tesaṃ rucīnaṃ piyadassanānaṃ haṃsānaṃ majjhagataṃ etaṃ ñātisaṅghehi okiṇṇaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:3508_5: Nimmajjhimanti neva majjhimaṃ neva kaniṭṭhaṃ uttamaṃ haṃsarājānaṃ kathaṃ pāsahattho upāgami kathaṃ gaṇhīti.
atk-s0514a1:3515_0: Tatthāhaṃ odahiṃ pāsaṃ, evaṃ taṃ dijamaggahi”nti.
atk-s0514a1:3516_6: Athassāti atha chaṭṭhe divase etassa adanesanaṃ carantassa padaṃ addakkhiṃ.
atk-s0514a1:3516_7: Evaṃ tanti evaṃ taṃ dijaṃ aggahinti sabbaṃ gahitopāyaṃ ācikkhi.
atk-s0514a1:3517_0: Taṃ sutvā rājā “ayaṃ dvāre ṭhatvā paṭivedentopi dhataraṭṭhassevāgamanaṃ paṭivedesi,
atk-s0514a1:3517_2: kiṃ nu kho ettha kāraṇa”nti cintetvā gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:3519_0: “Ludda dve ime sakuṇā, atha ekoti bhāsasi;
atk-s0514a1:3520_0: Cittaṃ nu te vipariyattaṃ, adu kiṃ nu jigīsasī”ti.
atk-s0514a1:3521_1: Adu kiṃ nu jigīsasīti udāhu kiṃ nu cintesi,
atk-s0514a1:3521_2: kiṃ itaraṃ gahetvā aññassa dātukāmo hutvā cintesīti pucchati.
atk-s0514a1:3522_3: apica kho pana mayā ohite pāse ekova baddho”ti āvi karonto āha –
atk-s0514a1:3525_0: Uraṃ saṃhacca tiṭṭhanti, so me bandhaṃ upāgami.
atk-s0514a1:3528_0: Ariyaṃ bruvāno aṭṭhāsi, cajanto mānusiṃ gira”nti.
atk-s0514a1:3529_4: yassetā rattasuvaṇṇasappaṭibhāgā tisso lohitakā rājiyo gīvaṃ parikkhipitvā uraṃ āhacca tiṭṭhanti,
atk-s0514a1:3529_5: so ekova mama pāse bandhaṃ upāgatoti.
atk-s0514a1:3530_0: Atha dhataraṭṭhassa baddhabhāvaṃ ñatvā nivattitvā etaṃ samassāsetvā mamāgamanakāle ca paccuggamanaṃ katvā
atk-s0514a1:3530_1: ākāseyeva mayā saddhiṃ madhurapaṭisanthāraṃ katvā manussabhāsāya dhataraṭṭhassa guṇaṃ kathento aṭṭhāsi,
atk-s0514a1:3530_2: mama hadayaṃ mudukaṃ katvā puna etasseva purato aṭṭhāsi. Athāhaṃ, deva,
atk-s0514a1:3530_3: sumukhassa subhāsitaṃ sutvā pasannacitto dhataraṭṭhaṃ vissajjesiṃ,
atk-s0514a1:3530_5: ime haṃse ādāya mama idhāgamanañca sumukheneva katanti.
atk-s0514a1:3530_7: Taṃ sutvā rājā sumukhassa dhammakathaṃ sotukāmo ahosi.
