atk-s0514a1:4308_13: Tato paṭṭhāya ca pana tāya sammatto neva vinicchayaṃ paṭṭhapesi,
atk-s0514a1:4308_16: Sā ekadivasaṃ dvinnaṃ rājūnaṃ aggamahesibhāvassa supine nimittaṃ disvā rañño ārocesi.
atk-s0514a1:4308_17: Rājā supinapāṭhake pakkosāpetvā “evarūpe supine diṭṭhe kiṃ hotī”ti pucchi.
atk-s0514a1:4308_18: Te itarāsaṃ itthīnaṃ santikā lañjaṃ gahetvā –
atk-s0514a1:4308_20: deviyā sabbasetassa hatthino khandhe nisinnabhāvo tumhākaṃ maraṇassa pubbanimittaṃ,
atk-s0514a1:4308_21: hatthikhandhagatāya pana candaparāmasanaṃ tumhākaṃ paccāmittarājānayanassa pubbanimitta”nti vatvā “idāni
atk-s0514a1:4308_22: kiṃ kātabba”nti vutte “deva imaṃ māretuṃ na sakkā,
atk-s0514a1:4308_23: nāvāya pana naṃ ṭhapetvā nadiyaṃ vissajjetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vadiṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:4308_24: Rājā āhāravatthālaṅkārehi saddhiṃ rattibhāge naṃ nāvāya ṭhapetvā nadiyaṃ vissajjesi.
atk-s0514a1:4309_0: Sā nadiyā vuyhamānā heṭṭhānadiyā nāvāya udakaṃ kīḷantassa bāvarikarañño abhimukhaṭṭhānaṃ pattā.
atk-s0514a1:4309_1: Tassa senāpati nāvaṃ disvā “ayaṃ nāvā mayha”nti āha.
atk-s0514a1:4309_2: Rājā “nāvāya bhaṇḍaṃ mayha”nti vatvā āgatāya nāvāya taṃ disvā “kā nāma tvaṃ pisācīsadisā”ti pucchi.
atk-s0514a1:4309_3: Sā sitaṃ katvā bakassa rañño aggamahesibhāvaṃ kathetvā sabbaṃ taṃ pavattiṃ tassa kathesi.
atk-s0514a1:4309_5: Atha naṃ rājā hatthe gahetvā ukkhipi,
atk-s0514a1:4309_6: saha gahaṇeneva phassarāgaratto aññāsu itthīsu itthisaññaṃ akatvā taṃ aggamahesiṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
atk-s0514a1:4309_8: Bako taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā “nāhaṃ tassa aggamahesiṃ kātuṃ dassāmī”ti senaṃ saṅkaḍḍhitvā tassa paṭititthe nivesanaṃ katvā paṇṇaṃ pesesi –
atk-s0514a1:4309_15: tasmā ekekassa gehe satta satta divasāni hotū”ti mantetvā dvepi rājāno saññāpesuṃ.
atk-s0514a1:4309_16: Te ubhopi attamanā hutvā titthapaṭititthe nagarāni māpetvā vasiṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:4309_19: Sā pana ekassa ghare sattāhaṃ vasitvā nāvāya itarassa gharaṃ gacchantī nāvaṃ pājetvā nentena ekena mahallakakhujjakevaṭṭena
atk-s0514a1:4309_22: tasmā idaṃ attanā diṭṭhakāraṇaṃ āharitvā dassento gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:4311_0: “Bakassa ca bāvarikassa ca rañño, accantakāmānugatassa bhariyā;
atk-s0514a1:4312_0: Avācarī paṭṭhavasānugassa, kaṃ vāpi itthī nāticare tadañña”nti.
atk-s0514a1:4313_6: Tadaññanti kataraṃ taṃ aññaṃ purisaṃ nāticareyyāti attho.
atk-s0514a1:4314_0: Aparāpi atīte brahmadattassa bhariyā piṅgiyānī nāma aggamahesī sīhapañjaraṃ vivaritvā olokentī maṅgalaassagopakaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4314_1: disvā rañño niddupagamanakāle vātapānena oruyha tena saddhiṃ aticaritvā puna pāsādaṃ āruyha gandhehi
atk-s0514a1:4314_3: Athekadivasaṃ rājā “kiṃ nu kho deviyā aḍḍharattasamaye niccaṃ sarīraṃ sītaṃ hoti,
atk-s0514a1:4314_4: pariggaṇhissāmi na”nti ekadivasaṃ niddupagato viya hutvā taṃ uṭṭhāya gacchantiṃ anugantvā assabandhena
atk-s0514a1:4314_5: saddhiṃ aticarantiṃ disvā nivattitvā sayanaṃ abhiruhi.
atk-s0514a1:4314_7: Punadivase rājā amaccagaṇamajjheyeva taṃ pakkosāpetvā taṃ kiccaṃ āvikatvā “sabbāva itthiyo pāpadhammā”ti
atk-s0514a1:4314_8: tassā vadhabandhachejjabhejjārahaṃ dosaṃ khamitvā ṭhānā cāvetvā aññaṃ aggamahesiṃ akāsi.
atk-s0514a1:4314_10: tena taṃ attanā diṭṭhaṃ āharitvā dassento gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:4317_0: Avācarī paṭṭhavasānugassa, taṃ vāpi sā nājjhagā kāmakāminī”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4318_0: Tattha taṃ vāti sā evaṃ aticarantī taṃ vā assabandhaṃ taṃ vā aggamahesiṭṭhānanti ubhayampi nājjhagā,
atk-s0514a1:4319_0: Evaṃ pāpadhammā itthiyoti atītavatthūhi itthīnaṃ dosaṃ kathetvā aparenapi pariyāyena tāsaṃ dosameva kathento āha –
atk-s0514a1:4324_0: “Na tā pajānanti kataṃ na kiccaṃ, na mātaraṃ pitaraṃ bhātaraṃ vā;
atk-s0514a1:4325_0: Anariyā samatikkantadhammā, sasseva cittassa vasaṃ vajanti.
atk-s0514a1:4328_0: Āvāsu kiccesu ca naṃ jahanti, tasmāhamitthīnaṃ na vissasāmi.
atk-s0514a1:4330_0: “Thīnañhi cittaṃ yathā vānarassa, kannappakannaṃ yathā rukkhachāyā;
atk-s0514a1:4331_0: Calācalaṃ hadayamitthiyānaṃ, cakkassa nemi viya parivattati.
atk-s0514a1:4333_0: “Yadā tā passanti samekkhamānā, ādeyyarūpaṃ purisassa vittaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:4334_0: Saṇhāhi vācāhi nayanti menaṃ, kambojakā jalajeneva assaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:4336_0: “Yadā na passanti samekkhamānā, ādeyyarūpaṃ purisassa vittaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:4337_0: Samantato naṃ parivajjayanti, tiṇṇo nadīpāragatova kullaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:4340_0: Sevanti hetā piyamappiyañca, nāvā yathā orakulaṃ parañca.
atk-s0514a1:4342_0: “Na tā ekassa na dvinnaṃ, āpaṇova pasārito;
atk-s0514a1:4343_0: Yo tā mayhanti maññeyya, vātaṃ jālena bādhaye.
atk-s0514a1:4345_0: “Yathā nadī ca pantho ca, pānāgāraṃ sabhā papā;
atk-s0514a1:4346_0: Evaṃ lokitthiyo nāma, velā tāsaṃ na vijjati.
atk-s0514a1:4349_0: Gāvo bahi tiṇasseva, omasanti varaṃ varaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:4351_0: “Ghatāsanaṃ kuñjaraṃ kaṇhasappaṃ, muddhābhisittaṃ pamadā ca sabbā;
atk-s0514a1:4352_0: Ete naro niccayato bhajetha, tesaṃ have dubbidu sabbabhāvo.
atk-s0514a1:4354_0: “Naccantavaṇṇā na bahūna kantā, na dakkhiṇā pamadā sevitabbā;
atk-s0514a1:4355_0: Na parassa bhariyā na dhanassa hetu, etitthiyo pañca na sevitabbā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4356_1: Kaṇaverajātake viya baddhacorepi sārajjanaṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:4356_4: Akataññutā pana etāsaṃ ekakanipāte takkāriyajātakena dīpetabbā.
atk-s0514a1:4356_5: Nādevasattoti na adevasatto devena anāsatto ayakkhagahitako abhūtaviṭṭho puriso thīnaṃ sīlavantataṃ saddhātuṃ nārahati,
atk-s0514a1:4356_9: Na mātaranti sabbepi ñātake chaḍḍetvā yasmiṃ paṭibaddhacittā honti,
atk-s0514a1:4356_10: taññeva anubandhanato ete mātādayo na jānanti nāma mahāpanthakamātā viya.
atk-s0514a1:4357_1: Yathā hi visame padese rukkhachāyā ninnampiorohati,
atk-s0514a1:4357_3: tathā etāsampi cittaṃ na kañci uttamādhamaṃ vajjeti.
atk-s0514a1:4357_5: Nemi viyāti sakaṭassa gacchato cakkanemi viya.
atk-s0514a1:4357_10: Kambojaraṭṭhavāsino kira yadā aṭavito asse gaṇhitukāmā honti,
atk-s0514a1:4357_11: tadā ekasmiṃ ṭhāne vatiṃ parikkhipitvā dvāraṃ yojetvā assānaṃ udakapānatitthe sevālaṃ madhunā makkhetvā
atk-s0514a1:4357_12: sevālasambandhāni tīre tiṇāni ādiṃ katvā yāva parikkhepadvārā makkhenti,
atk-s0514a1:4357_13: assā pānīyaṃ pivitvā rasagiddhena madhunā makkhitāni tāni tiṇāni khādantā anukkamena taṃ ṭhānaṃ pavisanti.
atk-s0514a1:4357_14: Iti yathā te jalajena palobhetvā asse vasaṃ nenti,
atk-s0514a1:4357_15: tathā etāpi dhanaṃ disvā tassa gahaṇatthāya saṇhāhi vācāhipi purisaṃ vasaṃ nentīti attho.
atk-s0514a1:4358_4: Āpaṇovāti yathā ca pasāritāpaṇo yesaṃ mūlaṃ atthi,
atk-s0514a1:4358_7: Yo tāti yo puriso tā itthiyo.
atk-s0514a1:4358_9: Velā tāsaṃ na vijjatīti yathā etesaṃ nadīādīnaṃ “asukavelāyameva ettha gantabba”nti velā natthi,
atk-s0514a1:4359_0: Ghatāsanasamā etāti yathā aggi indhanena na tappati,
atk-s0514a1:4359_2: Kaṇhasappasirūpamāti kodhanatāya upanāhitāya ghoravisatāya dujivhatāya mittadubbhitāyāti pañcahi kāraṇehi kaṇhasappasirasadisā.
atk-s0514a1:4359_6: Gāvo bahi tiṇassevāti yathā gāvo khāditaṭṭhānaṃ chaḍḍetvā bahi manāpamanāpassa tiṇassa varaṃ varaṃ omasanti khādanti,
atk-s0514a1:4359_7: evametāpi niddhanaṃ chaḍḍetvā aññaṃ sadhanameva bhajantīti attho.
atk-s0514a1:4359_9: Pamadā ca sabbāti sabbā ca itthiyo.
atk-s0514a1:4360_1: Na bahūna kantāti aḍḍhakāsigaṇikā viya bahūnaṃ piyā manāpā.
atk-s0514a1:4360_5: Na dhanassa hetūti yā dhanahetuyeva bhajati,
atk-s0514a1:4361_0: Evaṃ vutte mahājano mahāsattassa “aho sukathita”nti sādhukāramadāsi.
atk-s0514a1:4361_1: Sopi ettakehi kāraṇehi itthīnaṃ aguṇaṃ kathetvā tuṇhī ahosi.
atk-s0514a1:4361_4: ahampi attano ñāṇabalena itthīnaṃ aguṇaṃ kathessāmī”ti vatvā aguṇakathaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0514a1:4362_1: ānando gijjharājā kuṇālassa ādimajjhakathāpariyosānaṃ viditvā tāyaṃ velāyaṃ imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0514a1:4364_0: “Puṇṇampi cemaṃ pathaviṃ dhanena, dajjitthiyā puriso sammatāya;
atk-s0514a1:4365_0: Laddhā khaṇaṃ atimaññeyya tampi, tāsaṃ vasaṃ asatīnaṃ na gacche.
atk-s0514a1:4368_0: Āvāsu kiccesu ca naṃ jahanti, tasmāhamitthīnaṃ na vissasāmi.
atk-s0514a1:4370_0: “Na vissase ‘icchati ma’nti poso, na vissase ‘rodati me sakāse’;
atk-s0514a1:4371_0: Sevanti hetā piyamappiyañca, nāvā yathā orakūlaṃ parañca.
atk-s0514a1:4374_0: Na vissase rājānaṃ ‘sakhā mama’nti, na vissase itthi dasanna mātaraṃ.
atk-s0514a1:4377_0: Accantapemānugatassa bhariyā, na vissase titthasamā hi nāriyo.
atk-s0514a1:4379_0: “Haneyyuṃ chindeyyuṃ chedāpeyyumpi, kaṇṭhepi chetvā rudhiraṃ piveyyuṃ;
atk-s0514a1:4380_0: Mā dīnakāmāsu asaññatāsu, bhāvaṃ kare gaṅgatitthūpamāsu.
atk-s0514a1:4382_0: “Musā tāsaṃ yathā saccaṃ, saccaṃ tāsaṃ yathā musā;
atk-s0514a1:4383_0: Gāvo bahi tiṇasseva, omasanti varaṃ varaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:4389_0: Na tā kiñci na jānanti, yaṃ manussesu vañcanaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:4391_0: “Asā lokitthiyo nāma, velā tāsaṃ na vijjati;
atk-s0514a1:4392_0: Sārattā ca pagabbhā ca, sikhī sabbaghaso yathā.
atk-s0514a1:4395_0: Sevanti hetā piyamappiyañca, nāvā yathā orakūlaṃ parañca.
atk-s0514a1:4405_2: Icchati manti maṃ esā icchatīti puriso itthiṃ na vissaseyya.
atk-s0514a1:4405_3: Sākhapurāṇasanthatanti hiyyo vā pare vā santhataṃ purāṇasākhāsanthataṃ na vissase,
atk-s0514a1:4405_5: Tatra hi dīghajātiko vā pavisitvā tiṭṭheyye,
atk-s0514a1:4405_7: Mittapurāṇacoranti panthadūhanaṭṭhāne ṭhitaṃ coraṃ “purāṇamitto me”ti na vissaseyya.
atk-s0514a1:4405_8: Corā hi ye sañjānanti teyeva mārenti.
atk-s0514a1:4405_9: Sakhā mamanti so hi khippameva kujjhati,
atk-s0514a1:4405_11: Dasannamātaranti “ayaṃ mahallikā idāni maṃ na aticarissati,
atk-s0514a1:4406_0: Haneyyunti kuddhā vā aññapurisasārattā vā hutvā sabbametaṃ hananādiṃ kareyyuṃ.
atk-s0514a1:4406_20: Latāvāti yathā latā rukkhanissitā rukkhaṃ veṭhenti,
atk-s0514a1:4407_7: tena nibbisesampi purisaṃ gacchanti bhajanti. Kasmā?
atk-s0514a1:4408_0: Evaṃ attano ñāṇe ṭhatvā ānando gijjharājā itthīnaṃ aguṇaṃ kathetvā tuṇhī ahosi.
atk-s0514a1:4408_1: Tassa vacanaṃ sutvā nāradopi attano ñāṇe ṭhatvā tāsaṃ aguṇaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0514a1:4409_1: nārado devabrāhmaṇo ānandassa gijjharājassa ādimajjhakathāpariyosānaṃ viditvā tāyaṃ velāyaṃ imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0514a1:4411_0: “‘Cattārome na pūrenti, te me suṇātha bhāsato;
atk-s0514a1:4412_0: Samuddo brāhmaṇo rājā, itthī cāpi dijampati.
atk-s0514a1:4415_0: Tā samuddaṃ na pūrenti, ūnattā hi na pūrati.
atk-s0514a1:4418_0: Bhiyyopi sutamiccheyya, ūnattā hi na pūrati.
atk-s0514a1:4422_0: Pāraṃ samuddaṃ pattheti ūnattā hi na pūrati.
atk-s0514a1:4426_0: Kareyya navame chandaṃ, ūnattā hi na pūrati.
atk-s0514a1:4429_0: Sabbitthiyo kaṇṭakānaṃva sākhā, sabbitthiyo dhanahetu vajanti.
atk-s0514a1:4432_0: Sakena hatthena kareyya ghosaṃ, yo sabbabhāvaṃ pamadāsu ossaje.
atk-s0514a1:4443_0: “Yaṃ etā upasevanti, chandasā vā dhanena vā;
atk-s0514a1:4445_5: Ūnattāti so hi ajjhāsayamahantatāya sikkhitabbassa na pūrati.
atk-s0514a1:4445_7: Ūnattāti so hi taṇhāmahantatāya na pūrati.
atk-s0514a1:4445_12: Sā pana dasamepi vīsatimepi tato uttaritarepi chandaṃ karoteva.
atk-s0514a1:4445_13: Ūnattāti sā hi kāmataṇhāya mahantatāya na pūrati.
atk-s0514a1:4445_17: Yathā sākhā hatthādīsu vijjhitvā dukkhaṃ uppādeti,
atk-s0514a1:4445_18: evaṃ etāpi phuṭṭhamattā sarīrasamphassena vijjhitvā mahāvināsaṃ pāpenti.
atk-s0514a1:4446_1: Osiñcayeti nhāyituṃ otiṇṇo ekena pāṇinā sakalasamuddaudakaṃ osiñceyya gahetvā chaḍḍeyya.
atk-s0514a1:4446_2: Sakenāti ekena attano hatthena tameva hatthaṃ haritvā ghosaṃ uppādeyya.
atk-s0514a1:4446_3: Sabbabhāvanti “tvameva iṭṭho kanto piyo manāpo”ti vuccamāno yo puriso “evameta”nti saddahanto sabbaṃ attano ajjhāsayaṃ pamadāsu ossajeyya,
atk-s0514a1:4446_9: Sīdanti naṃ viditvānāti ettha nanti nipātamattaṃ,
atk-s0514a1:4446_10: itthiyo allīnā catūsu apāyesu sīdantīti viditvā.
atk-s0514a1:4446_11: Āvaṭṭanīti yathā āvaṭṭanī mahājanassa hadayaṃ mohetvā attano vase vatteti,
atk-s0514a1:4446_13: Vikopanāti nāsanatthena ca garahatthena ca brahmacariyassa kopikā.
atk-s0514a1:4446_16: Saṃṭhānanti yathā jātavedo attano ṭhānaṃ yaṃ yaṃ padesaṃ allīyati,
atk-s0514a1:4446_18: tathā etāpi yaṃ yaṃ purisaṃ kilesavasena allīyanti,
atk-s0514a1:4447_0: Evaṃ nāradena itthīnaṃ aguṇe pakāsite puna mahāsatto visesetvā tāsaṃ aguṇaṃ pakāseti.
atk-s0514a1:4448_1: kuṇālo sakuṇo nāradassa devabrāhmaṇassa ādimajjhakathāpariyosānaṃ viditvā tāyaṃ velāyaṃ imā gāthāyo ajjhabhāsi –
atk-s0514a1:4451_0: Uggatejamuragampi āside, eko ekāya pamadāya nālape.
atk-s0514a1:4456_0: “Natthi tāsaṃ vinayo na saṃvaro, majjamaṃsaniratā asaññatā;
atk-s0514a1:4457_0: Tā gilanti purisassa pābhataṃ, sāgareva makaraṃ timiṅgalo.
atk-s0514a1:4462_0: “Yaṃ naraṃ upalapenti nāriyo, chandasā vā ratiyā dhanena vā;
atk-s0514a1:4465_0: “Aḍḍhaṃ ñatvā purisaṃ mahaddhanaṃ, osaranti sadhanaṃ sahattanā;
atk-s0514a1:4474_0: “Tejavāpi hi naro vicakkhaṇo, sakkato bahujanassa pūjito;
atk-s0514a1:4475_0: Nārinaṃ vasagato na bhāsati, rāhunā upahatova candimā.
atk-s0514a1:4477_0: “Yaṃ kareyya kupito diso disaṃ, duṭṭhacitto vasamāgataṃ ariṃ;
atk-s0514a1:4478_0: Tena bhiyyo byasanaṃ nigacchati, nārinaṃ vasagato apekkhavā.
atk-s0514a1:4481_0: Hīnamevupagatā hi nāriyo, tā ramanti kuṇapeva makkhikā.
atk-s0514a1:4483_0: “Tā kulesu visikhantaresu vā, rājadhāninigamesu vā puna;
atk-s0514a1:4489_0: “So idha garahito parattha ca, dummatī upahato sakammunā;
atk-s0514a1:4496_0: Nāsayanti pamadā pamādinaṃ, duggatiñca paṭipādayanti naṃ.
atk-s0514a1:4499_0: Soṇṇabyamhanilayā ca accharā, ye caranti pamadāhanatthikā.
atk-s0514a1:4505_0: Nibbutehi sucihī na dullabhaṃ, ye caranti pamadāhanatthikā”’ti.
atk-s0514a1:4506_1: sīsaṃ te pātessāmī”ti vatvā khaggaṃ ādāya ṭhitenāpi,
atk-s0514a1:4506_2: “sallapitamatteyeva taṃ khāditvā jīvitavināsaṃ pāpessāmī”ti dosinā hutvā ṭhitenāpi pisācena saddhiṃ sallape.
atk-s0514a1:4506_3: “Upagataṃ ḍaṃsitvā nāsessāmī”ti ṭhitaṃ uggatejaṃ uragampi āside.
atk-s0514a1:4506_4: Eko pana hutvā raho ekāya pamadāya na hi ālape.
atk-s0514a1:4506_6: Dīpe rakkhasigaṇoti yathā dīpe rakkhasigaṇo manussavesena vāṇije upalāpetvā attano vase gate katvā khādati,
atk-s0514a1:4506_7: evaṃ imāpi pañcahi kāmaguṇehi attano vase katvā satte mahāvināsaṃ pāpentīti attho.
atk-s0514a1:4506_10: Purisassa pābhatanti dukkhasambhataṃ dhanaṃ gilanti nāsenti.
atk-s0514a1:4507_12: Osarantīti dhanagahaṇatthāya madhuravacanena taṃ bandhantiyo upagacchanti.
atk-s0514a1:4507_15: vatthālaṅkāratthāya kiñci attano dhanaṃ datvāpi osarantīti attho.
atk-s0514a1:4507_16: Sahattanāti attabhāvena saddhiṃ attabhāvampi tasseva pariccajantiyo viya honti.
atk-s0514a1:4508_4: Sambarovāti māyākārapuriso viya asurindo viya ca.
atk-s0514a1:4508_5: Dānavaṃva hadayantarassitāti yathā “kuto nu āgacchatha, bho,
atk-s0514a1:4508_6: tayo janā”ti karaṇḍakajātake hadayantaranissitā antoudaragatāpi dānavaṃ aticari,
atk-s0514a1:4508_9: Na bhāsatīti na virocati haritacalomasakassapakusarājāno viya.
atk-s0514a1:4508_10: Tenāti tamhā amittena katā byasanā atirekataraṃ byasananti attho.
atk-s0514a1:4509_0: Kesalūnanakhachinnatajjitāti ākaḍḍhitvā lūnakesā nakhehi chinnagattā tajjitā pādādīhi ca tāḷitāva hutvā.
atk-s0514a1:4509_5: Kuṇapeva makkhikāti yasmā jegucchahatthikuṇapādimhi makkhikā viya tā hīneyeva ramantīti attho.
atk-s0514a1:4509_7: atha kho imesu ṭhānesu namucino kilesamārassa migapakkhigahaṇatthaṃ luddakehi oḍḍitaṃ pāsañca vākarañcāti
atk-s0514a1:4509_8: maññamāno paññācakkhumā puriso dibbamānusikena sukhena atthiko parivajjeyya.
atk-s0514a1:4510_1: Yoti yo puriso anariyesu aparisuddhesu kāmaguṇesu kāmaraticaritāni ācarati.
atk-s0514a1:4510_2: Devatāhi nirayaṃ nimissatīti so devalokena parivattitvā nirayaṃ gaṇhissati.
atk-s0514a1:4510_3: Chedagāmimaṇiyaṃva vāṇijoti yathā bālavāṇijo satasahassagghabhaṇḍaṃ datvā chedagāmimaṇikaṃ gaṇhāti,
atk-s0514a1:4510_6: Aniyatoti ettakaṃ nāma kālaṃ apāyesu paccissatīti aniyato.
atk-s0514a1:4510_7: Gaḷāgaḷanti devalokā vā manussalokā vā gaḷitvā apāyameva gacchatīti attho.
atk-s0514a1:4510_10: yathā kūṭagadrabhayuttaratho maggā okkamitvā uppatheyeva gacchati, tathā.
atk-s0514a1:4510_11: Sattisimbalivananti sattisadisehi kaṇṭakehi yuttaṃ āyasaṃ simbalivanaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:4511_1: Te hi pamadāsu pamattā tāsaṃ sampattīnaṃ mūlabhūtaṃ kusalaṃ na karonti,
atk-s0514a1:4511_2: iti tesaṃ pamadā sabbā tā nāsenti nāma.
atk-s0514a1:4511_3: Paṭipādayantīti tathāvidhaṃ purisaṃ tā pamādavaseneva akusalaṃ kāretvā duggatiṃ paṭipādenti nāma.
atk-s0514a1:4511_5: Pamadāhanatthikāti ye purisā pamadāhi anatthikā hutvā brahmacariyaṃ caranti.
atk-s0514a1:4511_7: Rūpadhātuyā bhāvoti yo kāmadhātusamatikkamagatisaṅkhāto rūpadhātuyā bhāvo,
atk-s0514a1:4511_9: Vītarāgavisayūpapatti yāti yā vītarāgavisaye suddhāvāsaloke upapatti,
atk-s0514a1:4511_14: Sucihīti sucīhi parisuddhehi evarūpaṃ nibbānaṃ na dullabhanti.
atk-s0514a1:4512_0: Evaṃ mahāsatto amatamahānibbānaṃ pāpetvā desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0514a1:4512_1: Himavante kinnaramahoragādayo ākāse ṭhitā devatā ca “aho buddhalīlāya kathitā”ti sādhukāraṃ adaṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:4512_2: Ānando gijjharājā nārado devabrāhmaṇo puṇṇamukho ca phussakokilo attano attano parisaṃ ādāya yathāṭhānameva gamiṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:4512_4: Itare pana antarantarā gantvā mahāsattassa santike ovādaṃ gahetvā tasmiṃ ovāde ṭhatvā saggaparāyaṇā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0514a1:4513_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānento osānagāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0514a1:4518_0: Te pana bhikkhū gamanakāle satthānubhāvena gantvā āgamanakāle attano attanova ānubhāvena āgatā.
atk-s0514a1:4518_2: Sabbepi te taṃ divasameva arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:4522_0: Kasmā tuvaṃ rasaka edisānīti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto aṅgulimālattheradamanaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0514a1:4522_1: Tassa uppatti ca pabbajjā ca upasampadā ca aṅgulimālasuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayena vitthārato veditabbā.
atk-s0514a1:4522_2: So pana saccakiriyāya mūḷhagabbhāya itthiyā sotthibhāvaṃ katvā tato paṭṭhāya sulabhapiṇḍo hutvā vivekamanubrūhanto
atk-s0514a1:4522_3: aparabhāge arahattaṃ patvā abhiññātova asītiyā mahātherānaṃ abbhantaro ahosi.
atk-s0514a1:4522_5: aho vata bhagavatā tathārūpaṃ luddaṃ lohitapāṇiṃ mahācoraṃ aṅgulimālaṃ adaṇḍena asatthena dametvā nibbisevanaṃ karontena dukkaraṃ kataṃ,
atk-s0514a1:4522_7: Satthā gandhakuṭiyaṃ ṭhitova dibbasotena taṃ kathaṃ sutvā “ajja mama gamanaṃ bahupakāraṃ bhavissati,
atk-s0514a1:4522_8: mahādhammadesanā pavattissatī”ti ñatvā anopamāya buddhalīlāya dhammasabhaṃ gantvā varapaññattāsane nisīditvā “kāya nuttha,
atk-s0514a1:4522_10: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “anacchariyaṃ,
atk-s0514a1:4522_12: idāneva paramābhisambodhiṃ pattena mayā etassa damanaṃ,
atk-s0514a1:4522_13: svāhaṃ pubbacariyaṃ caranto padesañāṇe ṭhitopi etaṃ damesi”nti vatvā tehi yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0514a1:4523_0: Atīte kururaṭṭhe indapatthanagare korabyo nāma rājā dhammena rajjaṃ kāresi.
atk-s0514a1:4523_1: Tadā bodhisatto tassa aggamahesiyā kucchimhi nibbatti.
atk-s0514a1:4523_4: Tamenaṃ rājā vayappattaṃ nikkhasahassaṃ datvā disāpāmokkhassa ācariyassa santike sippuggahaṇatthāya takkasilaṃ pesesi.
atk-s0514a1:4523_5: So ācariyabhāgaṃ ādāya nagarā nikkhamitvā maggaṃ paṭipajji.
atk-s0514a1:4523_6: Tadā bārāṇasiyaṃ kāsirañño putto brahmadattakumāropi tatheva vatvā pitarā pesito nagarā nikkhamitvā tameva maggaṃ paṭipajji.
atk-s0514a1:4523_7: Atha sutasomo maggaṃ gantvā nagaradvāre sālāya phalake vissamatthāya nisīdi.
atk-s0514a1:4523_8: Brahmadattakumāropi gantvā tena saddhiṃ ekaphalake nisīdi.
atk-s0514a1:4523_11: kuto āgacchasī”ti pucchitvā “bārāṇasito”ti vutte “kassa puttosī”ti vatvā “kāsirañño puttomhī”ti vutte
atk-s0514a1:4523_12: “ko nāmosī”ti vatvā “ahaṃ brahmadattakumāro nāmā”ti vutte “kena kāraṇena idhāgatosī”ti pucchi.
atk-s0514a1:4523_14: kuto āgacchasī”ti teneva nayena itaraṃ pucchi.
atk-s0514a1:4523_17: ekācariyasseva santike sippuggahaṇatthāya gacchāmā”ti aññamaññaṃ mittabhāvaṃ katvā nagaraṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0514a1:4523_18: ācariyakulaṃ gantvā ācariyaṃ vanditvā attano jātiādiṃ kathetvā sippuggahaṇatthāya āgatabhāvaṃ kathesuṃ.
atk-s0514a1:4524_1: aññepi tadā jambudīpe ekasatamattā rājaputtā tassa santike sippaṃ uggaṇhanti.
atk-s0514a1:4524_2: Sutasomo tesaṃ jeṭṭhantevāsiko hutvā sippaṃ upadisanto nacirasseva nipphattiṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0514a1:4524_3: So aññassa santikaṃ agantvā “sahāyo me”ti brahmadattassa kumārasseva santikaṃ gantvā tassa piṭṭhiācariyo hutvā sippaṃ sikkhāpesi.
atk-s0514a1:4524_5: Te anuyogaṃ datvā ācariyaṃ vanditvā sutasomaṃ parivāretvā nikkhamiṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:4524_6: Atha ne sutasomo maggantare ṭhatvā uyyojento “tumhe attano attano pitūnaṃ sippaṃ dassetvā rajjesu patiṭṭhahissatha,
atk-s0514a1:4524_7: patiṭṭhitā ca pana mamovādaṃ kareyyāthā”ti āha. “Kiṃ,
atk-s0514a1:4524_11: Bodhisattopi aṅgavijjāpāṭhakattā “anāgate bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadattakumāraṃ nissāya mahābhayaṃ uppajjissatī”ti ñatvā te evaṃ ovaditvā uyyojesi.
atk-s0514a1:4524_12: Te sabbepi attano attano janapadaṃ gantvā pitūnaṃ sippaṃ dassetvā rajjesu patiṭṭhāya patiṭṭhitabhāvañceva
atk-s0514a1:4524_13: ovāde vattanabhāvañca jānāpetuṃ paṇṇākārena saddhiṃ paṇṇāni pahiṇiṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:4524_14: Mahāsatto taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā “appamattāva hothā”ti paṇṇāni paṭipesesi.
atk-s0514a1:4525_0: Tesu bārāṇasirājā vinā maṃsena bhattaṃ na bhuñjati.
atk-s0514a1:4525_2: Athekadivasaṃ evaṃ ṭhapitamaṃsaṃ bhattakārakassa pamādena rājagehe koleyyakasunakhā khādiṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:4525_3: Bhattakārako taṃ maṃsaṃ aditvā kahāpaṇamuṭṭhiṃ ādāya carantopi maṃsaṃ uppādetuṃ asakkonto “sace amaṃsakabhattaṃ upanāmessāmi,
atk-s0514a1:4525_5: kiṃ nu kho karissāmī”ti cintetvā “attheso upāyo”ti vikāle āmakasusānaṃ gantvā muhuttamatassa purisassa
atk-s0514a1:4525_6: ūrumaṃsaṃ āharitvā supakkaṃ pacitvā bhattaṃ upanāmesi.
atk-s0514a1:4525_7: Rañño maṃsakhaṇḍaṃ jivhagge ṭhapitamattameva satta rasaharaṇisahassāni phari,
atk-s0514a1:4525_11: So kira atītānantare attabhāve yakkho hutvā bahuṃ manussamaṃsaṃ khāditapubbo,
atk-s0514a1:4525_14: na me ayaṃ imaṃ maṃsaṃ kathessatī”ti cintetvā saha kheḷena bhūmiyaṃ pātesi.
atk-s0514a1:4525_16: khādāhī”ti vutte manusse paṭikkamāpetvā “ahametassa niddosabhāvaṃ jānāmi,
atk-s0514a1:4525_27: pakatiyā pacanakamaṃsaṃ tvaṃ khāditvā mayhaṃ manussamaṃsameva pacāhī”ti āha.
atk-s0514a1:4526_0: Aparabhāge bandhanāgāre manussesu khīṇesu “idāni kiṃ karissāmi,
atk-s0514a1:4526_5: Aparabhāge rājabhayena sahassabhaṇḍikaṃ olokentampi adisvā “idāni kiṃ karissāmī”ti āha.
atk-s0514a1:4526_7: tadā tvaṃ pana ekasmiṃ gharasandhimhi vā vīthiyaṃ vā catukke vā ṭhatvā manusse māretvā maṃsaṃ gaṇhāhī”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4526_8: So tato paṭṭhāya tathā katvā thūlamaṃsaṃ ādāya gacchati.
atk-s0514a1:4526_12: mama bhātā bhaginī ca na paññāyati,
atk-s0514a1:4526_14: Nāgarā bhītatasitā “ime manusse sīho nu kho khādati,
atk-s0514a1:4526_16: yakkho nu kho khādatī”ti olokentā pahāramukhaṃ disvā “eko manussakhādako coro ime khādatī”ti maññanti.
atk-s0514a1:4527_1: kāḷahatthisenāpatissa ācikkhissāmā”ti gantvā tassa taṃ kathetvā “coraṃ pariyesituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vadiṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:4527_3: pariyesitvā coraṃ dassāmī”ti mahājane uyyojetvā purise āṇāpesi, “tātā,
atk-s0514a1:4527_5: tumhe tesu tesu ṭhānesu nilīyitvā taṃ gaṇhathā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4527_6: Te “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā tato paṭṭhāya nagaraṃ pariggaṇhanti.
atk-s0514a1:4527_7: Bhattakārakopi ekasmiṃ gharasandhimhi sampaṭicchanno hutvā ekaṃ itthiṃ māretvā ghanaghanamaṃsaṃ ādāya pacchiyaṃ pūretuṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0514a1:4527_8: Atha naṃ te purisā gahetvā pothetvā pacchābāhaṃ bandhitvā “gahito manussakhādako coro”ti mahāsaddaṃ kariṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:4527_10: Atha naṃ suṭṭhu bandhitvā maṃsapacchiṃ gīvāya bandhitvā ādāya senāpatissa dassesuṃ.
atk-s0514a1:4527_11: Senāpati taṃ disvā “kiṃ nu kho esa imaṃ maṃsaṃ khādati,
atk-s0514a1:4527_13: udāhu aññassa vacanena māretī”ti cintetvā tamatthaṃ pucchanto paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:4529_0: “Kasmā tuvaṃ rasaka edisāni, karosi kammāni sudāruṇāni;
atk-s0514a1:4530_0: Hanāsi itthī purise ca mūḷho, maṃsassa hetu adu dhanassa kāraṇā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4532_0: Ito paraṃ uttānasambandhāni vacanapaṭivacanāni pāḷivaseneva veditabbāni –
atk-s0514a1:4534_0: “Na attahetū na dhanassa kāraṇā, na puttadārassa sahāyañātinaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:4535_0: Bhattā ca me bhagavā bhūmipālo, so khādati maṃsaṃ bhadantedisaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:4537_0: “Sace tuvaṃ bhatturatthe payutto, karosi kammāni sudāruṇāni;
atk-s0514a1:4538_0: Pātova antepuraṃ pāpuṇitvā, lapeyyāsi me rājino sammukhe taṃ.
atk-s0514a1:4540_0: “Tathā karissāmi ahaṃ bhadante, yathā tuvaṃ bhāsasi kāḷahatthi;
atk-s0514a1:4541_0: Pātova antepuraṃ pāpuṇitvā, vakkhāmi te rājino sammukhe ta”nti.
atk-s0514a1:4542_2: udāhu maraṇabhayena musā bhaṇatī”ti vīmaṃsanto evamāha.
atk-s0514a1:4542_4: Sammukhe tanti sammukhe ṭhatvā evaṃ vadeyyāsīti.
atk-s0514a1:4543_0: Atha naṃ senāpati gāḷhabandhanameva sayāpetvā vibhātāya rattiyā amaccehi ca nāgarehi ca saddhiṃ mantetvā
atk-s0514a1:4543_1: sabbesu ekacchandesu jātesu sabbaṭṭhānesu ārakkhaṃ ṭhapetvā nagaraṃ hatthagataṃ katvā rasakassa gīvāyaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4543_4: Rājā hiyyo bhuttapātarāso sāyamāsampi alabhitvā “rasako idāni āgacchissati,
atk-s0514a1:4543_5: idāni āgacchassatī”ti nisinnova taṃ rattiṃ vītināmetvā “ajjapi rasako nāgacchati,
atk-s0514a1:4543_7: kiṃ nū kho eta”nti vātapānena olokento taṃ tathā ānīyamānaṃ disvā “pākaṭaṃ idaṃ kāraṇaṃ jāta”nti cintetvā satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā pallaṅkeyeva nisīdi.
atk-s0514a1:4554_1: Evamevāti tena senāpatinā tejavantena anuyutto rājā musā vattuṃ asakkonto evamāha.
atk-s0514a1:4554_7: kāḷahatthi tvaṃ nāma aññaṃ coraṃ aggahetvā mama pesanakārakaṃ gaṇhāsīti tassa bhayaṃ janento kathesi.
atk-s0514a1:4555_0: Taṃ sutvā senāpati “ayaṃ sakeneva mukhena paṭijānāti,
atk-s0514a1:4555_2: ettakaṃ nāma kālaṃ ime manussā etena khāditā,
atk-s0514a1:4555_12: “Evaṃ nassantepi ahaṃ neva tato viramituṃ sakkomī”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4555_13: Tato senāpati tassa saññāpanatthāya vatthuṃ āharitvā dasseti –
atk-s0514a1:4555_14: atītasmiñhi kāle mahāsamudde cha mahāmacchā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0514a1:4555_15: Tesu ānando timinando ajjhārohoti ime tayo macchā pañcayojanasatikā,
atk-s0514a1:4555_16: timiṅgalo timirapiṅgalo mahātimirapiṅgaloti ime tayo macchā sahassayojanikā honti.
atk-s0514a1:4555_22: mayampetaṃ rājānaṃ karissāmā”ti cintetvā sabbe ekacchandā hutvā ānandaṃ rājānaṃ kariṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:4555_23: Te macchā tato paṭṭhāya tassa sāyaṃ pātova upaṭṭhānaṃ gacchanti.
atk-s0514a1:4556_0: Athekadivasaṃ ānando ekasmiṃ pabbate pāsāṇasevālaṃ khādanto ajānitvā “sevālo”ti saññāya ekaṃ macchaṃ khādi.
atk-s0514a1:4556_1: Tassa taṃ maṃsaṃ khādantassa sakalasarīraṃ saṅkhobhesi.
atk-s0514a1:4556_2: So “kiṃ nu kho idaṃ ativiya madhura”nti nīharitvā olokento macchamaṃsakhaṇḍaṃ disvā “ettakaṃ kālaṃ ajānitvā
atk-s0514a1:4556_3: na khādāmī”ti cintetvā “sāyaṃ pātopi macchānaṃ āgantvā gamanakāle ekaṃ dve macche khādissāmi,
atk-s0514a1:4556_4: pākaṭaṃ katvā khādiyamāne ekopi maṃ na upasaṅkamissati,
atk-s0514a1:4556_6: paṭicchanno hutvā pacchā osakkitosakkitaṃ paharitvā khādissāmī”ti tathā katvā khādi.
atk-s0514a1:4556_9: Atheko paṇḍito maccho “mayhaṃ ānandassa kiriyā na ruccati,
atk-s0514a1:4556_10: pariggaṇhissāmi na”nti macchesu upaṭṭhānaṃ gatesu ānandassa kaṇṇapatte paṭicchanno aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0514a1:4556_11: Ānando macche uyyojetvā sabbapacchato gacchantaṃ macchaṃ khādi.
atk-s0514a1:4556_12: So paṇḍitamaccho tassa kiriyaṃ disvā itaresaṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0514a1:4557_0: Ānando tato paṭṭhāya macchamaṃsagiddhena aññaṃ gocaraṃ na gaṇhi.
atk-s0514a1:4557_1: So jighacchāya pīḷito kilanto “kahaṃ nu kho ime gatā”ti te macche pariyesanto ekaṃ pabbataṃ disvā “mama bhayena imaṃ pabbataṃ nissāya vasanti maññe,
atk-s0514a1:4557_2: pabbataṃ parikkhipitvā upadhāressāmī”ti naṅguṭṭhena ca sīsena ca ubho passe parikkhipitvā gaṇhi.
atk-s0514a1:4557_4: palāyissantī”ti pabbataṃ parikkhipantaṃ attano naṅguṭṭhaṃ disvā “ayaṃ maccho maṃ vañcetvā pabbataṃ nissāya
atk-s0514a1:4557_5: vasatī”ti kuddho paṇṇāsayojanamattaṃ sakanaṅguṭṭhakhaṇḍaṃ aññamacchasaññāya daḷhaṃ gahetvā murumurāyanto khādi,
atk-s0514a1:4557_7: Lohitagandhena macchā sannipatitvā luñjitvā khādantā yāva sīsā āgamaṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:4557_8: Mahāsarīratāya parivattetuṃ asakkonto tattheva jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpuṇi,
atk-s0514a1:4557_12: Taṃ vatthuṃ āharitvā dassento kāḷahatthi āha –
atk-s0514a1:4562_0: “Evaṃ pamatto rasagārave ratto, bālo yadī āyati nāvabujjhati;
atk-s0514a1:4563_0: Vidhamma putte caji ñātake ca, parivattiya attānaññeva khādati.
atk-s0514a1:4565_0: “Idaṃ te sutvāna vigetu chando, mā bhakkhayī rāja manussamaṃsaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:4566_0: Mā tvaṃ imaṃ kevalaṃ vārijova, dvipadādhipa suññamakāsi raṭṭha”nti.
atk-s0514a1:4567_1: atītasmiṃ kāle mahāsamudde pañcasatayojaniko ānando nāma mahāmaccho sabbesaṃ macchānaṃ rājā mahāsamuddassa ekapasse ṭhito.
atk-s0514a1:4567_2: Khāditvāti sakajātikānaṃ macchānaṃ rasagiddhimā macche khāditvā.
atk-s0514a1:4567_4: Attānanti aññaṃ gocaraṃ aggahetvā pabbataṃ parikkhipanto paṇṇāsayojanamattaṃ attano naṅguṭṭhakhaṇḍaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4567_5: aññamacchasaññāya khāditvā mato maraṇappatto hutvā idāni mahāsamudde pabbatamatto aṭṭhirāsi ahosi.
atk-s0514a1:4567_7: evampi tathā tvaṃ taṇhārasagiddhiko hutvā pamatto pamādabhāvappatto.
atk-s0514a1:4568_0: Rasagārave rattoti manussamaṃsassa rasagārave ratto atirattacitto hoti.
atk-s0514a1:4568_1: Bāloti yadi bālo duppañño āyatiṃ anāgate kāle uppajjanakadukkhaṃ nāvabujjhati na jānāti.
atk-s0514a1:4568_4: Ñātake cāti sesañātake ca sahāye ca,
atk-s0514a1:4568_5: vidhamma putte ca cajitvā ñātake cāti attho.
atk-s0514a1:4568_6: Parivattiyāti aññaṃ āhāraṃ alabhitvā jighacchāya pīḷito sakalanagaraṃ parivattiya vicaritvā manussamaṃsaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4568_7: alabhitvā attānaṃ khādanto ānando maccho viya attānaññeva khādati.
atk-s0514a1:4569_1: te tuyhaṃ mayā ānītaṃ idaṃ udāharaṇaṃ sutvā chando manussamaṃsakhādanacchando vigetu vigacchatu viramatu.
atk-s0514a1:4569_2: Mā bhakkhayīti rāja manussamaṃsaṃ mā bhakkhayi mā khādi.
atk-s0514a1:4569_3: Mā tvaṃ imaṃ kevalanti mahāsamuddaṃ suññaṃ karonto vārijo ānando maccho iva,
atk-s0514a1:4569_7: tvaṃ kevalaṃ saccato imaṃ tava kāsiraṭṭhaṃ nagaraṃ suññaṃ mā akāsīti attho.
atk-s0514a1:4570_3: ahampi jānāmī”ti manussamaṃsagiddhatāya porāṇakavatthuṃ āharitvā dassento āha –
atk-s0514a1:4576_0: Aladdhā mānusaṃ maṃsaṃ, maññe hissāmi jīvita”nti.
atk-s0514a1:4577_0: Tattha sujāto nāmāti kāḷahatthi kuṭumbiko nāmena sujāto nāma,
atk-s0514a1:4577_1: tassa atrajo putto oraso jambupesiṃ aladdhāna alabhitvāna.
atk-s0514a1:4577_2: Matoti yathā tassā jambupesiyā saṅkhaye so kuṭumbikaputto mato,
atk-s0514a1:4577_3: evameva ahaṃ rasuttamaṃ aññarasānaṃ uttamaṃ manussānaṃ maṃsaṃ bhutvā bhuñjitvā aladdhā manussamaṃsaṃ jīvitaṃ hissāmīti maññe maññāmi.
atk-s0514a1:4578_0: Atīte kira bārāṇasiyaṃ sujāto nāma kuṭumbiko loṇambilasevanatthāya himavantato āgatāni pañca isisatāni attano uyyāne vasāpetvā upaṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0514a1:4578_1: Ghare cassa nibaddhaṃ pañcasatamattā bhikkhā ahosi.
atk-s0514a1:4578_2: Te pana tāpasā kadāci janapadepi bhikkhāya caranti,
atk-s0514a1:4578_4: Tesaṃ jambupesiṃ āharitvā khādanakāle sujāto cintesi –
atk-s0514a1:4578_7: So attano puttakaṃ aṅguliyaṃ gāhāpetvā tesaṃ bhattakiccakāle tattha agamāsi.
atk-s0514a1:4578_8: Tasmiṃ samaye mahallakānaṃ mukhavikkhālanakāle udakaṃ datvā sabbanavako jambupesiṃ khādati.
atk-s0514a1:4578_18: gehaṃ gantvā khādissasī”ti taṃ vañcetvā “imaṃ nissāya bhadantā ukkaṇṭheyyu”nti taṃ samassāsento isigaṇaṃ anāpucchitvā gehaṃ gato.
atk-s0514a1:4578_19: Gatakālato paṭṭhāya cassa putto “jambupesiṃ me dethā”ti paridevi.
atk-s0514a1:4578_21: Te isayopi “idha ciraṃ vasimhā”ti himavantameva gatā.
atk-s0514a1:4578_22: Ārāme isayo apassanto tassa jambuambapanasamocādīnaṃ pesiyo madhusakkharacuṇṇasaṃyuttā adāsi.
atk-s0514a1:4578_23: Tā tassa jivhagge ṭhapitamattā halāhalavisasadisā honti.
atk-s0514a1:4578_24: So sattāhaṃ nirāhāro hutvā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0514a1:4578_25: Rājā idaṃ kāraṇaṃ āharitvā dassento evamāha.
atk-s0514a1:4579_6: tuvaṃ ñātimaṇḍalato ceva rajjasirito ca parihāyissasi.
atk-s0514a1:4579_10: So mātāpitūnaṃ piyo manāpo ahosi paṇḍito byatto tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ pāragū.
atk-s0514a1:4579_11: So samavayehi taruṇehi saddhiṃ gaṇabandhanena vicari.
atk-s0514a1:4579_12: Sesā gaṇabandhā macchamaṃsādīni khādantā suraṃ pivanti.
atk-s0514a1:4579_16: “ayaṃ surāya apivanato amhākaṃ mūlaṃ na deti,
atk-s0514a1:4579_25: Dhuttā uyyānaṃ gantvā paduminipattesu tikhiṇasuraṃ bandhāpetvā ṭhapayiṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:4579_26: Atha nesaṃ pānakāle māṇavassa khīraṃ upanayiṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:4579_28: āharā”ti āharāpetvā paduminipattapuṭaṃ heṭṭhā chiddaṃ katvā aṅgulīhi mukhe ṭhapetvā ākaḍḍhi.
atk-s0514a1:4580_0: Evamassa punappunaṃ pivantassa mattakāle “na etaṃ pokkharamadhu,
atk-s0514a1:4580_2: So “ettakaṃ kālaṃ evaṃ madhurarasaṃ na jāniṃ, āharatha, bho,
atk-s0514a1:4580_9: so sakaladivasaṃ tehi saddhiṃ pivitvā matto rattakkho kampanto vilapanto gehaṃ gantvā nipajji.
atk-s0514a1:4580_10: Athassa pitā surāya pivitabhāvaṃ ñatvā vigate matte, “tāta,
atk-s0514a1:4580_11: ayuttaṃ te kataṃ sottiyakule jātena suraṃ pivantena,
atk-s0514a1:4580_16: mayā evarūpaṃ madhurarasaṃ ettakaṃ kālaṃ aladdhapubba”nti.
atk-s0514a1:4580_19: Atha brāhmaṇo “evaṃ sante amhākaṃ kulavaṃso ca ucchijjissati,
atk-s0514a1:4583_0: Na tvaṃ arahasi tāta, abhakkhaṃ bhakkhayetave”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4585_4: Māṇavo “evaṃ santepi ahaṃ suraṃ jahituṃ na sakkomī”ti vatvā gāthādvayamāha –
atk-s0514a1:4587_0: “Rasānaṃ aññataraṃ etaṃ, kasmā maṃ tvaṃ nivāraye;
atk-s0514a1:4588_0: Sohaṃ tattha gamissāmi, yattha lacchāmi edisaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:4591_0: Yassa me dassanena tvaṃ, nābhinandasi brāhmaṇā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4592_0: Tattha rasānanti loṇambilatittakakaṭukakhārikamadhurakasāvasaṅkhātānaṃ sattannaṃ rasānaṃ aññataraṃ uttamarasametaṃ majjaṃ nāma.
atk-s0514a1:4593_3: Atha brāhmaṇo “tayi amhe pariccajante mayampi taṃ pariccajissāmā”ti vatvā gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:4596_0: Tvañca jamma vinassasu, yattha pattaṃ na taṃ suṇe”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4597_0: Tattha yattha pattanti yattha gataṃ taṃ “asukaṭṭhāne nāma vasatī”ti na suṇoma,
atk-s0514a1:4598_0: Atha naṃ vinicchayaṃ netvā aputtabhāvaṃ katvā nīharāpesi.
atk-s0514a1:4598_1: So aparabhāge nippaccayo kapaṇo jiṇṇapilotikaṃ nivāsetvā kapālahattho piṇḍāya caranto aññataraṃ kuṭṭaṃ nissāya kālamakāsi.
atk-s0514a1:4598_2: Idaṃ kāraṇaṃ āharitvā kāḷahatthi rañño dassetvā,
atk-s0514a1:4598_4: sace tvaṃ amhākaṃ vacanaṃ na karissasi,
atk-s0514a1:4601_0: Pabbājessanti taṃ raṭṭhā, soṇḍaṃ māṇavakaṃ yathā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4602_3: evameva soṇḍaṃ māṇavakaṃ yathā taṃ bhavantaṃ raṭṭhato pabbājessanti.
atk-s0514a1:4603_0: Evaṃ kāḷahatthinā upamāya āhaṭāyapi rājā tato viramituṃ asakkonto aparampi udāharaṇaṃ dassetuṃ āha –
atk-s0514a1:4606_0: Accharaṃ kāmayantova, na so bhuñji na so pivi.
atk-s0514a1:4612_0: Aladdhā mānusaṃ maṃsaṃ, maññe hissāmi jīvita”nti.
atk-s0514a1:4614_0: Tattha bhāvitattānāti bhāvitacittānaṃ tesaṃ pañcannaṃ isisatānaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:4614_1: Accharaṃ kāmayantovāti so kira tesaṃ isīnaṃ mahājambupesiyā khādanakāle anāgamanaṃ viditvā “kiṃ nu kho kāraṇā na āgacchanti,
atk-s0514a1:4614_4: atha nesaṃ santike dhammaṃ suṇissāmī”ti uyyānaṃ gantvā isigaṇe vanditvā gaṇajeṭṭhakassa santike dhammaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4614_5: suṇanto nisinnova sūriye atthaṅgate uyyojiyamānopi “ajja idheva vasissāmī”ti vatvā isigaṇaṃ vanditvā
atk-s0514a1:4614_7: Rattibhāge sakko devarājā devaccharāsaṅghaparivuto saddhiṃ attano paricārikāhi isigaṇaṃ vandituṃ āgato,
atk-s0514a1:4614_9: Sujāto “kiṃ nu kho eta”nti uṭṭhāya paṇṇasālachiddena olokento sakkaṃ isigaṇaṃ vandituṃ āgataṃ devaccharāparivutaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4614_10: disvā accharānaṃ saha dassanena rāgaratto ahosi.
atk-s0514a1:4614_11: Sakko nisīditvā dhammakathaṃ sutvā sakaṭṭhānameva gato.
atk-s0514a1:4614_13: ko nāmesa rattibhāge tumhākaṃ vandanatthāya āgato”ti? “Sakko, āvuso”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4614_16: So isigaṇaṃ vanditvā gehaṃ gantvā gatakālato paṭṭhāya “accharaṃ me detha,
atk-s0514a1:4614_18: Ñātakā parivāretvā “bhūtāviṭṭho nu kho”ti accharaṃ pahariṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:4614_20: devaccharaṃ kathemī”ti vatvā “ayaṃ accharā”ti alaṅkaritvā ānītaṃ bhariyampi gaṇikampi olokento “nāyaṃ accharā,
atk-s0514a1:4614_22: devaccharaṃ me dethā”ti vilapanto nirāhāro hutvā tattheva jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0514a1:4615_0: “Accharaṃ kāmayantova, na so bhuñji na so pivī”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4616_3: yo kusaggeneva udakaṃ gahetvā “ettakaṃ siyā mahāsamudde udaka”nti tena saddhiṃ upamāya mineyya,
atk-s0514a1:4616_8: tasmā so sujāto aññaṃ itthiṃ na olokesi,
atk-s0514a1:4616_10: Evamevāti yathā so dibbakāmaṃ alabhanto jīvitaṃ jahi,
atk-s0514a1:4616_11: evaṃ ahampi uttamarasaṃ manussamaṃsaṃ alabhanto jīvitaṃ jahissāmīti vadati.
atk-s0514a1:4617_0: Taṃ sutvā kāḷahatthi “ayaṃ rājā ativiya rasagiddho,
atk-s0514a1:4617_1: saññāpessāmi na”nti sakajātikānaṃ maṃsaṃ khāditvā ākāsacarā suvaṇṇahaṃsāpi tāva vinaṭṭhāti dassetuṃ gāthādvayamāha –
atk-s0514a1:4623_0: Abhakkhaṃ rāja bhakkhesi, tasmā pabbājayanti ta”nti.
atk-s0514a1:4624_2: Atīte kira cittakūṭe suvaṇṇaguhāyaṃ navuti haṃsasahassāni vasanti.
atk-s0514a1:4624_3: Te vassike cattāro māse na nikkhamanti,
atk-s0514a1:4624_5: udakapuṇṇehi pattehi uppatituṃ asakkontā mahāsamuddeyeva pateyyuṃ,
atk-s0514a1:4624_7: Upakaṭṭhe pana vassakāle jātassarato sayaṃjātasāliyo āharitvā guhaṃ pūretvā sāliṃ khādantā vasanti.
atk-s0514a1:4624_8: Tesaṃ pana guhaṃ paviṭṭhakāle guhadvāre eko rathacakkappamāṇo uṇṇanābhi nāma makkaṭako ekekasmiṃ māse ekekaṃ jālaṃ vinandhati.
atk-s0514a1:4624_10: Haṃsā “taṃ jālaṃ bhindissatī”ti ekassa taruṇahaṃsassa dve koṭṭhāse denti.
atk-s0514a1:4624_11: So vigate deve purato gantvā taṃ jālaṃ bhindati.
atk-s0514a1:4624_13: Athekasmiṃ kāle pañca māse vasso vuṭṭho ahosi.
atk-s0514a1:4624_14: Haṃsā khīṇagocarā “kiṃ nu kho kattabba”nti mantetvā “mayaṃ jīvantā aṇḍāni labhissāmā”ti paṭhamaṃ aṇḍāni khādiṃsu,
atk-s0514a1:4624_19: Haṃsā sakajātikānaṃ maṃsaṃ khāditvā appathāmā jātā.
atk-s0514a1:4624_20: Dviguṇakoṭṭhāsalābhī haṃsataruṇo jāle paharitvā cattāri bhindi,
atk-s0514a1:4624_23: Athassa sīsaṃ vijjhitvā makkaṭako lohitaṃ pivi.
atk-s0514a1:4624_25: sopi tattheva laggīti evaṃ sabbesaṃ makkaṭako lohitaṃ pivi.
atk-s0514a1:4625_0: Evameva tuvanti yathā ete haṃsā abhakkhaṃ sakajātikamaṃsaṃ khādiṃsu,
atk-s0514a1:4625_4: Tasmā pabbājayanti tanti yasmā abhakkhaṃ sakajātikamaṃsaṃ bhakkhesi,
atk-s0514a1:4625_5: tasmā ime nagaravāsino taṃ raṭṭhā pabbājayanti.
atk-s0514a1:4626_6: raṭṭhato naṃ pabbājehī”ti vatvā nāssa kathetuṃ adaṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:4626_7: Rājā bahūnaṃ kathaṃ sutvā bhīto puna vattuṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0514a1:4626_8: Punapi naṃ senāpati “kiṃ mahārāja viramituṃ sakkhissasi,
atk-s0514a1:4626_9: udāhu na sakkhissasī”ti vatvā “na sakkomī”ti vutte sabbaṃ orodhagaṇañca puttadhītaro ca sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍite passe ṭhapetvā,
atk-s0514a1:4626_11: ime ñātimaṇḍale ceva amaccagaṇañca rajjasiriñca olokehi,
atk-s0514a1:4626_14: Rājā “na mayhaṃ ete manussamaṃsato piyatarā”ti vatvā “tena hi, mahārāja,
atk-s0514a1:4626_15: imamhā nagarā ca raṭṭhā ca nikkhamathā”ti vutte,
atk-s0514a1:4626_19: ekaṃ pana me khaggañca rasakañca bhājanañca dehī”ti āha.
atk-s0514a1:4626_20: Athassa khaggañca maṃsapacanabhājanañca pacchiñca ukkhipāpetvā rasakañca datvā raṭṭhā pabbājanīyakammaṃ kariṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:4627_0: So khaggañca rasakañca ādāya nagarā nikkhamitvā araññaṃ pavisitvā ekasmiṃ nigrodhamūle vasanaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4627_1: katvā tattha vasanto aṭavimagge ṭhatvā manusse māretvā āharitvā rasakassa deti.
atk-s0514a1:4627_4: Manussagahaṇakāle “ahaṃ are manussacoro porisādo”ti vatvā tasmiṃ pakkhante koci sakabhāvena saṇṭhātuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0514a1:4627_7: taṃ uddhaṃpādaṃ adhosīsaṃ katvā āharitvā rasakassa deti.
atk-s0514a1:4627_8: So ekadivasaṃ araññe kañci manussaṃ alabhitvā āgato rasakena “kiṃ devā”ti vutte “uddhane ukkhaliṃ āropehī”ti āha.
atk-s0514a1:4627_11: So “natthi me dāni jīvita”nti kampamāno uddhane aggiṃ katvā ukkhaliṃ āropesi.
atk-s0514a1:4627_12: Atha naṃ porisādo asinā māretvā maṃsaṃ pacitvā khādi.
atk-s0514a1:4627_13: Tato paṭṭhāya ekakova jāto sayameva pacitvā khādati.
atk-s0514a1:4627_14: “Porisādo magge maggapaṭipanne hanatī”ti sakalajambudīpe pākaṭo ahosi.
atk-s0514a1:4628_0: Tadā eko sampannavibhavo brāhmaṇo pañcahi sakaṭasatehi vohāraṃ karonto pubbantato aparantaṃ sañcarati.
atk-s0514a1:4628_2: “porisādo nāma kira coro antarāmagge manusse māresi,
atk-s0514a1:4628_4: So aṭavimukhavāsīnaṃ manussānaṃ “tumhe maṃ aṭavito atikkāmethā”ti sahassaṃ datvā tehi saddhiṃ maggaṃ paṭipajji.
atk-s0514a1:4628_5: Gacchanto ca brāhmaṇo sabbasatthaṃ purato katvā sayaṃ nhātānulitto sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍito setagoṇayutte
atk-s0514a1:4628_6: sukhayānake nisinno tehi aṭavivāsikapurisehi parivuto sabbapacchato agamāsi.
atk-s0514a1:4628_7: Tasmiṃ khaṇe porisādo rukkhaṃ āruyha purise upadhārento sesamanussesu “kiṃ imesu mayā khāditabbaṃ atthī”ti
atk-s0514a1:4628_8: vigatacchando hutvā brāhmaṇaṃ diṭṭhakālato paṭṭhāya taṃ khāditukāmatāya paggharitakheḷo ahosi.
atk-s0514a1:4628_9: So tasmiṃ attano santikaṃ āgate rukkhato oruyha “ahaṃ are porisādo”ti nāmaṃ tikkhattuṃ sāvetvā khaggaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4628_10: parivattento vālukāya tesaṃ akkhīni pūrento viya pakkhandi.
atk-s0514a1:4628_13: So sukhayānake nisinnaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ pāde gahetvā piṭṭhiyaṃ adhosīsakaṃ olambetvā sīsaṃ gopphakehi paharanto ukkhipitvā pāyāsi.
atk-s0514a1:4629_1: purisā mayaṃ brāhmaṇassa hatthato kahāpaṇasahassaṃ gaṇhimhā,
atk-s0514a1:4629_3: sakkontā vā asakkontā vā thokaṃ anubandhāmā”ti vatvā anubandhiṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:4629_4: Porisādopi nivattitvā olokento kañci aditvā saṇikaṃ pāyāsi.
atk-s0514a1:4629_5: Tasmiṃ khaṇe thāmasampanno eko sūrapuriso vegena taṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0514a1:4629_6: So taṃ disvā ekaṃ vatiṃ laṅghanto khadirakhāṇukaṃ akkami,
atk-s0514a1:4629_14: So tehi anubaddhabhāvaṃ ñatvā brāhmaṇaṃ vissajjetvā attānaṃ sotthimakāsi.
atk-s0514a1:4629_15: Atha aṭavivāsikapurisā brāhmaṇassa laddhakālato paṭṭhāya “kiṃ amhākaṃ corenā”ti tato nivattiṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:4630_0: Porisādopi attano nigrodhamūlaṃ gantvā pārohantaraṃ pavisitvā nipanno,
atk-s0514a1:4630_2: sace me sattāhabbhantareyeva vaṇaṃ phāsukaṃ kātuṃ sakkhissasi,
atk-s0514a1:4630_3: sakalajambudīpe ekasatakhattiyānaṃ galalohitena tava khandhaṃ dhovitvā antehi parikkhipitvā pañcamadhuramaṃsena balikammaṃ karissāmī”ti āyācanaṃ kari.
atk-s0514a1:4630_4: Tassa annapānamaṃsaṃ alabhantassa sarīraṃ sussitvā antosattāheyeva vaṇo phāsuko ahosi.
atk-s0514a1:4630_6: So katipāhaṃ manussamaṃsaṃ khāditvā balaṃ gahetvā cintesi –
atk-s0514a1:4630_9: So khaggaṃ ādāya rukkhamūlato nikkhamitvā “rājāno ānessāmī”ti pāyāsi.
atk-s0514a1:4630_10: Atha naṃ purimabhave yakkhakāle ekato manussamaṃsakhādako sahāyakayakkho anuvicarantaṃ disvā “ayaṃ mama atītabhave sahāyo”ti ñatvā, “samma,
atk-s0514a1:4630_15: “Kahaṃ nibbattosī”ti puṭṭho nibbattaṭṭhānañca raṭṭhā pabbājitakāraṇañca idāni vasanaṭṭhānañca khāṇunā
atk-s0514a1:4630_16: viddhakāraṇañca devatāya āyācanāmocanatthaṃ gamanakāraṇañca sabbaṃ ārocetvā “tayāpi mametaṃ kiccaṃ nittharitabbaṃ,
atk-s0514a1:4630_21: ahaṃ kho pana anagghaṃ padalakkhaṇaṃ nāma ekaṃ mantaṃ jānāmi,
atk-s0514a1:4631_0: Porisādo mantaṃ uggahetvā tato paṭṭhāya vātajavo atisūro ahosi.
atk-s0514a1:4631_1: So sattāhabbhantareyeva ekasatarājāno uyyānādīni gacchante disvā vātavegena pakkhanditvā “ahaṃ are manussacoro
atk-s0514a1:4631_2: porisādo”ti nāmaṃ sāvetvā vagganto nadanto bhayappatte katvā pāde gahetvā adhosīsake katvā paṇhiyā sīsaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4631_3: paharanto vātavegena netvā hatthatalesu chiddāni katvā rajjuyā āvunitvā nigrodharukkhe olambesi aggapādaṅgulīhi
atk-s0514a1:4631_5: Te sabbe rājāno vāte paharante milātakuraṇḍakadāmāni viya parivattantā olambiṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:4631_8: sakalajambudīpo tuccho bhavissatī”ti taṃ na nesi.
atk-s0514a1:4631_9: So “balikammaṃ karissāmī”ti aggiṃ katvā sūle tacchanto nisīdi.
atk-s0514a1:4631_10: Rukkhadevatā taṃ kiriyaṃ disvā “mayhaṃ kiresa balikammaṃ karoti,
atk-s0514a1:4631_11: vaṇampissa mayā kiñci phāsukaṃ kataṃ natthi,
atk-s0514a1:4631_13: kiṃ nu kho kattabba”nti cintetvā “ahaṃ etaṃ vāretuṃ na sakkhissāmī”ti cātumahārājikānaṃ santikaṃ gantvā tamatthaṃ kathetvā “nivāretha na”nti āha.
atk-s0514a1:4631_14: Tehipi “na mayaṃ porisādassa kammaṃ nivāretuṃ sakkhissāmā”ti vutte “ko sakkhissatī”ti pucchitvā “sakko,
atk-s0514a1:4631_15: devarājā”ti sutvā sakkaṃ upasaṅkamitvā tamatthaṃ kathetvā “nivāretha na”nti āha.
atk-s0514a1:4631_17: samatthaṃ pana ācikkhissāmī”ti vatvā “konāmo”ti vutte “sadevake loke añño natthi,
atk-s0514a1:4631_18: kururaṭṭhe pana indapatthanagare korabyarājaputto sutasomo nāma taṃ nibbisevanaṃ katvā damessati,
atk-s0514a1:4631_23: ‘sutasomaṃ ānetvā balikammaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī’ti vadehī”ti āha.
atk-s0514a1:4632_0: Sā “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā khippaṃ āgantvā pabbajitavesena tassa avidūre pāyāsi.
atk-s0514a1:4632_1: So padasaddena “rājā nu kho koci palāto bhavissatī”ti olokento taṃ disvā “pabbajitā nāma khattiyāva,
atk-s0514a1:4632_2: imaṃ gahetvā ekasataṃ pūretvā balikammaṃ karissāmī”ti uṭṭhāya asihattho anubandhi,
atk-s0514a1:4632_6: “ahaṃ pubbe hatthimpi assampi rathampi dhāvantaṃ anubandhitvā gaṇhāmi,
atk-s0514a1:4632_7: ajja imaṃ pabbajitaṃ sakāya gatiyā gacchantaṃ sabbathāmena dhāvantopi gaṇhituṃ na sakkomi,
atk-s0514a1:4632_13: tvaṃ pana dhāvituṃ vāyāmamakāsī”ti. Atha naṃ, “bho,
atk-s0514a1:4632_14: pabbajitā nāma jīvitahetupi alikaṃ na bhaṇanti,
atk-s0514a1:4632_15: tvaṃ pana musāvādaṃ kathesī”ti vatvā gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:4634_0: “Tiṭṭhāhīti mayā vutto, so tvaṃ gacchasi pammukho;
atk-s0514a1:4636_0: Idaṃ te samaṇāyuttaṃ, asiñca me maññasi kaṅkapatta”nti.
atk-s0514a1:4637_1: tiṭṭhāhi iti vacanaṃ mayā vutto so tvaṃ pammukho parammukho hutvā gacchasi,
atk-s0514a1:4637_2: brahmacārini aṭṭhito samāno tvaṃ ṭhito amhi iti lapasi,
atk-s0514a1:4644_0: “Sace tvaṃ saddahasi rāja, sutaṃ gaṇhāhi khattiya;
atk-s0514a1:4645_0: Tena yaññaṃ yajitvāna, evaṃ saggaṃ gamissasī”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4646_1: ahaṃ sakesu dasasu kusalakammapathadhammesu ṭhito asmi bhavāmi.
atk-s0514a1:4646_2: Na nāmagottanti tvaṃ pubbe daharakāle brahmadatto hutvā pitari kālakate bārāṇasiṃ rajjaṃ labhitvā bārāṇasirājā jāto,
atk-s0514a1:4646_3: taṃ nāmaṃ jahitvā porisādo hutvā idāni kammāsapādo jāto,
atk-s0514a1:4646_4: khattiyakule jātopi abhakkhaṃ manussamaṃsaṃ yasmā bhakkhesi,
atk-s0514a1:4646_6: tathā ahaṃ attano nāmagottaṃ na parivattayāmi.
atk-s0514a1:4646_7: Corañcāti loke corañca dasakusalakammapathesu aṭhitaṃ nāma vadanti.
atk-s0514a1:4646_8: Ito cutanti ito cutaṃ hutvā apāye niraye patiṭṭhitaṃ. Khattiya,
atk-s0514a1:4646_12: tena sutasomena yaññaṃ yajitvāna evaṃ saggaṃ gamissasi. Bho,
atk-s0514a1:4646_13: porisāda musāvādi tayā mayhaṃ “sakalajambudīpe rājāno ānetvā bahikammaṃ karissāmī”ti paṭissutaṃ,
atk-s0514a1:4646_14: idāni ye vā te vā dubbalarājāno ānesi,
atk-s0514a1:4646_15: jambudīpatale jeṭṭhakaṃ sutasomarājānaṃ sace tvaṃ na ānessasi,
atk-s0514a1:4647_0: Evañca pana vatvā devatā pabbajitavesaṃ antaradhāpetvā sakena vaṇṇena ākāse taruṇasūriyo viya jalamānā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0514a1:4647_1: So tassā kathaṃ sutvā rūpañca oloketvā “kāsi tva”nti āha.
atk-s0514a1:4647_17: asaṃvihite ārakkhe paṭhamayāmeyeva migājinaṃ uyyānaṃ gantvā maṅgalapokkharaṇiṃ otaritvā ṭhassāmī”ti cintetvā
atk-s0514a1:4647_18: tattha gantvā pokkharaṇiṃ oruyha padumapattena sīsaṃ paṭicchādetvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0514a1:4647_19: Tassa tejena macchakacchapādayo osakkitvā udakapariyante vaggavaggā hutvā vicariṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:4648_2: So hi kasapadasabalassa kāle khīrasalākabhattaṃ paṭṭhapesi,
atk-s0514a1:4648_4: Aggisālañca kāretvā bhikkhusaṅghassa sītavinodanatthaṃ aggiñca dārūni ca dārucchedanavāsiñca pharasuñca adāsi,
atk-s0514a1:4649_0: Evaṃ tasmiṃ antouyyānaṃ gateyeva balavapaccūsasamaye samantā tiyojanaṃ ārakkhaṃ gaṇhiṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:4649_1: Rājāpi pātova bhuttapātarāso alaṅkatahatthikkhandhavaragato caturaṅginiyā senāya parivuto nagarato nikkhami.
atk-s0514a1:4649_2: Tadā takkasilato nando nāma brāhmaṇo catasso satārahā gāthāyo ādāya vīsatiyonajasataṃ maggaṃ atikkamitvā
atk-s0514a1:4649_3: taṃ nagaraṃ patvā dvāragāme vasitvā sūriye uggate nagaraṃ pavisanto rājānaṃ pācīnadvārena nikkhantaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4649_5: Rājā disācakkhuko hutvā gacchanto unnatappadese ṭhitassa brāhmaṇassa pasāritahatthaṃ disvā hatthinā taṃ upasaṅkamitvā pucchi –
atk-s0514a1:4651_0: “Kismiṃ nu raṭṭhe tava jātibhūmi, atha kena atthena idhānupatto;
atk-s0514a1:4652_0: Akkhāhi me brāhmaṇa etamatthaṃ, kimicchasī demi tayajja patthita”nti.
atk-s0514a1:4653_2: tava jātibhūmi kismiṃ raṭṭhe atthi nu,
atk-s0514a1:4653_3: kena atthena payojanena hetubhūtena ida imasmiṃ nagare anuppatto,
atk-s0514a1:4653_5: mayā pucchito so tvaṃ etamatthaṃ etaṃ payojanaṃ me mayhaṃ akkhāhi kathehi,
atk-s0514a1:4653_6: tayā patthitavatthuṃ te tuyhaṃ ajja idāni dadāmi,
atk-s0514a1:4657_0: Taveva atthāya idhāgatosmi, suṇohi gāthā paramatthasaṃhitā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4658_0: Tattha dharaṇīmahissarāti bhūmipāla catasso gāthā kiṃ bhūtā?.
atk-s0514a1:4658_2: taveva tava eva atthāya idha ṭhānaṃ anuppatto asmi bhavāmi.
atk-s0514a1:4658_3: Suṇohīti kassapadasabalena desitā paramatthasaṃhitā imā satārahā gāthāyo suṇohīti attho.
atk-s0514a1:4659_2: imā kassapadasabalena desitā catasso satārahā gāthāyo “tumhe sutavittakā’ti sutvā tumhākaṃ desetuṃ āgatomhī”ti āha.
atk-s0514a1:4659_8: tvaṃ mā ukkaṇṭhī”ti vatvā “gacchatha brāhmaṇassa asukagehe sayanaṃ paññāpetvā ghāsacchādanaṃ saṃvidahathā”ti amacce āṇāpetvā uyyānaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0514a1:4659_10: Taṃ aññamaññaṃ saṅghaṭṭentā samantā hatthino parikkhipiṃsu,
atk-s0514a1:4659_16: Atha rājā oḷārikāni ābharaṇāni omuñcitvā massukammaṃ kāretvā ubbaṭṭitasarīro pokkharaṇiyā anto rājavibhavena
atk-s0514a1:4659_22: So nadanto vagganto udake macchaṃ āluḷento vijjulatā viya matthake khaggaṃ paribbhamento “ahaṃ are manussacoro
atk-s0514a1:4659_23: porisādo”ti nāmaṃ sāvetvā aṅguliṃ nalāṭe ṭhapetvā udakā uttari.
atk-s0514a1:4659_27: Balakāyo gahitagahitāni āvudhāni chaḍḍetvā urena bhūmiyaṃ nipajji.
atk-s0514a1:4660_1: sesarājāno pāde gahetvā adhosīsake katvā paṇhiyā sīsaṃ paharanto gacchati.
atk-s0514a1:4660_2: Bodhisattaṃ pana upagantvā onato ukkhipitvā khandhe nisīdāpesi.
atk-s0514a1:4660_3: So “dvārena gamanaṃ papañco bhavissatī”ti sammukhaṭṭhāneyeva aṭṭhārasahatthaṃ pākāraṃ laṅghitvā purato
atk-s0514a1:4660_4: galitamadamattavāraṇakumbhe akkamitvā pabbatakūṭāni pātento viya vātajavānaṃ assatarānaṃ piṭṭhe akkamanto
atk-s0514a1:4660_5: pātetvā rathadhurarathasīsesu akkamitvā bhamikaṃ bhamanto viya nīlaphalakāni nigrodhapattāni maddanto
atk-s0514a1:4660_6: viya ekavegeneva tiyojanamattaṃ maggaṃ gantvā “atthi nu kho koci sutasomassatthāya pacchato āgacchanto”ti
atk-s0514a1:4660_7: oloketvā kañci aditvā saṇikaṃ gacchanto sutasomassa kesehi udakabindūni attano ure patitāni disvā “maraṇassa
atk-s0514a1:4660_9: sutasomopi maraṇabhayena rodati maññe”ti cintetvā āha –
atk-s0514a1:4662_0: “Na ve rudanti matimanto sapaññā, bahussutā ye bahuṭhānacintino;
atk-s0514a1:4663_0: Dīpañhi etaṃ paramaṃ narānaṃ, yaṃ paṇḍitā sokanudā bhavanti.
atk-s0514a1:4665_0: “Attānaṃ ñātī udāhu puttadāraṃ, dhaññaṃ dhanaṃ rajataṃ jātarūpaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:4666_0: Kimeva tvaṃ sutasomānutappe, korabyaseṭṭha vacanaṃ suṇoma teta”nti.
atk-s0514a1:4667_6: te paṇḍitā maraṇabhaye uppanne sati bhītā hutvā ve ekantena na rudanti na paridevanti.
atk-s0514a1:4667_8: bho sutasoma mahārāja hi kasmā pana vadāmi,
atk-s0514a1:4667_9: mahāsamudde bhinnanāvānaṃ vāṇijakānaṃ janānaṃ patiṭṭhābhūtaṃ mahādīpaṃ iva,
atk-s0514a1:4667_10: evampi tathā etaṃ paṇḍitaṃ appaṭisaraṇānaṃ narānaṃ paramaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:4667_11: Yaṃ yena kāraṇena ye paṇḍitā sokīnaṃ janānaṃ sokanudā bhavanti,
atk-s0514a1:4667_16: attahetu udāhu ñātihetu puttadārahetu udāhu dhaññadhanarajatajātarūpahetu kimeva tvaṃ kimeva dhammajātaṃ tvaṃ anutappe anutappeyyāsi.
atk-s0514a1:4670_0: “Nevāhamattānamanutthunāmi, na puttadāraṃ na dhanaṃ na raṭṭhaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:4671_0: Satañca dhammo carito purāṇo, taṃ saṅgaraṃ brāhmaṇassānutappe.
atk-s0514a1:4673_0: “Kato mayā saṅgaro brāhmaṇena, raṭṭhe sake issariye ṭhitena;
atk-s0514a1:4675_0: Tattha nevāhamattānamanutthunāmīti ahaṃ tāva attatthāya neva rodāmi na socāmi,
atk-s0514a1:4675_1: imesampi puttādīnaṃ atthāya na rodāmi na socāmi,
atk-s0514a1:4675_2: apica kho pana sataṃ paṇḍitānaṃ carito purāṇadhammo atthi,
atk-s0514a1:4675_3: yaṃ saṅgaraṃ katvā pacchā anutappanaṃ nāma,
atk-s0514a1:4675_4: taṃ saṅgaraṃ brāhmaṇassa ahaṃ anusocāmīti attho.
atk-s0514a1:4675_6: So hi brāhmaṇo takkasilato kassapadasabalena desitā catasso satārahā gāthāyo ādāya āgato,
atk-s0514a1:4675_8: yāva mamāgamanā āgamehī”ti saṅgaraṃ katvā āgato,
atk-s0514a1:4675_9: tvaṃ tā gāthāyo sotuṃ adatvāva maṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0514a1:4675_11: taṃ dhammaṃ sutvā saccānurakkhī punarāvajissāmīti vadati.
atk-s0514a1:4679_0: Amittahatthaṃ punarāvajeyya, korabyaseṭṭha na hi maṃ upesi.
atk-s0514a1:4681_0: “Mutto tuvaṃ porisādassa hatthā, gantvā sakaṃ mandiraṃ kāmakāmī;
atk-s0514a1:4682_0: Madhuraṃ piyaṃ jīvitaṃ laddha rāja, kuto tuvaṃ ehisi me sakāsa”nti.
atk-s0514a1:4683_1: Maccumukhā pamuttoti mādisassa corassa hatthato muttatāya maraṇamukhā mutto nāma hutvā amittahatthaṃ punarāvajeyya āgaccheyya,
atk-s0514a1:4683_3: korabyaseṭṭha tvaṃ mama santikaṃ na hi upesi.
atk-s0514a1:4683_4: Muttoti sutasoma tuvaṃ porisādassa hatthato mutto.
atk-s0514a1:4683_7: Laddhāti ativiya piyaṃ jīvitaṃ labhitvā tuvaṃ me mama santike kuto kena nāma kāraṇena ehisi.
atk-s0514a1:4684_0: Taṃ sutvā mahāsatto sīho viya asambhito āha –
atk-s0514a1:4686_0: “Mataṃ vareyya parisuddhasīlo, na jīvitaṃ garahito pāpadhammo;
atk-s0514a1:4687_0: Na hi taṃ naraṃ tāyati duggatīhi, yassāpi hetu alikaṃ bhaṇeyya.
atk-s0514a1:4689_0: “Sacepi vāto girimāvaheyya, cando ca sūriyo ca chamā pateyyuṃ;
atk-s0514a1:4690_0: Sabbā ca najjo paṭisotaṃ vajeyyuṃ, na tvevahaṃ rāja musā bhaṇeyyaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:4692_0: “Nabhaṃ phaleyya udadhīpi susse, saṃvattaye bhūtadharā vasundharā;
atk-s0514a1:4693_0: Siluccayo meru samūlamuppate, na tvevahaṃ rāja musā bhaṇeyya”nti.
atk-s0514a1:4694_0: Tattha mataṃ vareyyāti porisāda yo naro parisuddhasīlo jīvitahetu aṇumattampi pāpaṃ na karoti,
atk-s0514a1:4694_1: sīlasampanno hutvā vareyya taṃ maraṇaṃ iccheyya,
atk-s0514a1:4694_2: garahito pāpadhammo taṃ jīvitaṃ na seyyo,
atk-s0514a1:4694_3: dussīlo puggalo yassāpi hetu attādinopi hetu alikaṃ vacanaṃ bhaṇeyya,
atk-s0514a1:4694_4: taṃ naraṃ evarūpaṃ duggatīhi taṃ alikaṃ na tāyate.
atk-s0514a1:4694_7: tayā saddhiṃ ekācariyakule sikkhito evarūpo sahāyako hutvā ahaṃ jīvitahetu musā na kathemi,
atk-s0514a1:4694_9: Sace puratthimādibhedo vāto uṭṭhāya mahantaṃ giriṃ tūlapicuṃ viya ākāse āvaheyya,
atk-s0514a1:4694_10: cando ca sūriyo ca attano attano vimānena saddhiṃ chamā pathaviyaṃ pateyyuṃ,
atk-s0514a1:4694_15: ahaṃ musā bhaṇeyyaṃ iti vacanaṃ tuyhaṃ janehi vuttaṃ,
atk-s0514a1:4695_5: sapathaṃ katvā taṃ saddahāpessāmī”ti vutte tena otāretvā bhūmiyaṃ ṭhapito sapathaṃ karonto āha –
atk-s0514a1:4697_0: “Asiñca sattiñca parāmasāmi, sapathampi te samma ahaṃ karomi;
atk-s0514a1:4698_0: Tayā pamutto anaṇo bhavitvā, saccānurakkhī punarāvajissa”nti.
atk-s0514a1:4699_3: evarūpehi āvudhehi saṃvihitārakkhe khattiyakule me nibbatti nāma mā hotūti asiñca sattiñca parāmasāmi.
atk-s0514a1:4699_4: Sace aññehi rājūhi akattabbaṃ aññaṃ vā yaṃ icchasi,
atk-s0514a1:4699_7: Yathāhaṃ tayā pamutto gantvā brāhmaṇassa anaṇo hutvā saccamanurakkhanto punarāgamissāmīti.
atk-s0514a1:4700_0: Tato porisādo “ayaṃ sutasomo khattiyehi akattabbaṃ sapathaṃ karoti,
atk-s0514a1:4700_4: mameva bāhulohitaṃ gahetvā devatāya balikammaṃ karissāmi,
atk-s0514a1:4702_0: “Yo te kato saṅgaro brāhmaṇena, raṭṭhe sake issariye ṭhitena;
atk-s0514a1:4705_2: catasso satārahā gāthā sutvā dhammakathikassa pūjaṃ katvā pātovāgamissāmī”ti vatvā gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:4707_0: “Yo me kato saṅgaro brāhmaṇena, raṭṭhe sake issariye ṭhitena;
atk-s0514a1:4709_7: sohaṃ idāni rajje patiṭṭhito dhammādhammaṃ jānanto kiṃ musā kathessāmi,
atk-s0514a1:4709_9: ahaṃ te sve balikammaṃ pāpuṇissāmī”ti saddahāpito “tena hi gaccha, mahārāja,
atk-s0514a1:4709_12: mā me balikammassa antarāyaṃ karitthā”ti mahāsattaṃ uyyojesi.
atk-s0514a1:4709_13: So rāhumukhā muttacando viya nāgabalo thāmasampanno khippameva nagaraṃ sampāpuṇi.
atk-s0514a1:4709_14: Senāpissa “sutasomo rājā paṇḍito madhuradhammakathiko ekaṃ dve kathā kathetuṃ labhanto porisādaṃ dametvā sīhamukhā muttamattavāraṇo viya āgamissati,
atk-s0514a1:4709_15: ‘ime rājānaṃ porisādassa datvā āgatā’ti mahājano garahissatī”ti cintetvā bahinagareyeva khandhāvāraṃ
atk-s0514a1:4709_16: katvā ṭhitā taṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ disvā paccuggantvā vanditvā “kacci, mahārāja,
atk-s0514a1:4709_17: porisādena kilamito”ti paṭisanthāraṃ katvā “porisādena mayhaṃ mātāpitūhipi dukkaraṃ kataṃ,
atk-s0514a1:4709_18: tathārūpo nāma caṇḍo sāhasiko porisādo mama dhammakathaṃ sutvā maṃ vissajjesī”ti vutte rājānaṃ alaṅkaritvā
atk-s0514a1:4710_0: Sopi dhammagarutāya dhammasoṇḍatāya mātāpitaro adisvāva “pacchāpi ne passissāmī”ti rājanivesanaṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0514a1:4710_1: rājāsane nisīditvā brāhmaṇaṃ pakkosāpetvā massukammādīnissa āṇāpetvā taṃ kappitakesamassuṃ nhātānulittaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4710_2: vatthālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ katvā ānetvā dassitakāle sayaṃ pacchā nhatvā tassa attano bhojanaṃ dāpetvā
atk-s0514a1:4710_3: tasmiṃ bhutte sayaṃ bhuñjitvā taṃ mahārahe pallaṅke nisīdāpetvā dhammagarukatāya assa gandhamālādīhi
atk-s0514a1:4710_4: pūjaṃ katvā sayaṃ nīce āsane nisīditvā “tumhehi mayhaṃ ābhatā satārahā gāthā suṇoma ācariyā”ti yāci.
atk-s0514a1:4712_0: “Mutto ca so porisādassa hatthā, gantvāna taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ etadavoca;
atk-s0514a1:4713_0: Suṇomi gāthāyo satārahāyo, yā me sutā assu hitāya brahme”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4715_0: Atha brāhmaṇo bodhisattena yācitakāle gandhehi hatthe ubbaṭṭetvā pasibbakā manoramaṃ potthakaṃ nīharitvā ubhohi hatthehi gahetvā “tena hi, mahārāja,
atk-s0514a1:4715_1: kassapadasabalena desitā rāgamadādinimmadanā amatamahānibbānasampāpikā catasso satārahā gāthāyo suṇohī”ti vatvā potthakaṃ olokento āha –
atk-s0514a1:4718_0: Sā naṃ saṅgati pāleti, nāsabbhi bahu saṅgamo.
atk-s0514a1:4721_0: Sataṃ saddhammamaññāya, seyyo hoti na pāpiyo.
atk-s0514a1:4723_0: “Jīranti ve rājarathā sucittā, atho sarīrampi jaraṃ upeti;
atk-s0514a1:4724_0: Satañca dhammo na jaraṃ upeti, santo have sabbhi pavedayanti.
atk-s0514a1:4726_0: “Nabhañca dūre pathavī ca dūre, pāraṃ samuddassa tadāhu dūre;
atk-s0514a1:4727_0: Tato have dūrataraṃ vadanti, satañca dhammo asatañca rājā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4728_2: Sā nanti sā sabbhi sappurisehi saṅgati samāgamo ekavāraṃ pavattopi taṃ puggalaṃ pāleti rakkhati.
atk-s0514a1:4728_3: Nāsabbhīti asappurisehi pana bahu sucirampi kato saṅgamo ekaṭṭhāne nivāso na pāleti,
atk-s0514a1:4728_6: sabbepi iriyāpathe paṇḍiteheva saddhiṃ pavatteyyāti attho.
atk-s0514a1:4728_8: Sataṃ saddhammanti paṇḍitānaṃ buddhādīnaṃ sattatiṃsabodhipakkhiyadhammasaṅkhātaṃ saddhammaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:4728_9: Seyyoti etaṃ dhammaṃ ñatvā vaḍḍhiyeva hoti,
atk-s0514a1:4728_13: Sabbhi pavedayantīti buddhādayo santo “sabbhī”ti saṅkhaṃ gataṃ sobhanaṃ uttamaṃ nibbānaṃ pavedenti thomenti,
atk-s0514a1:4728_14: so nibbānasaṅkhāto sataṃ dhammo jaraṃ na upeti na jīrati.
atk-s0514a1:4728_18: iti ubho ete ekābaddhāpi visaṃyogaṭṭhena anupalittaṭṭhena ca dūre nāma honti.
atk-s0514a1:4729_0: Iti brāhmaṇo catasso satārahā gāthā kassapadasabalena desitaniyāmena desetvā tuṇhī ahosi.
atk-s0514a1:4729_1: Taṃ sutvā mahāsatto “sapphalaṃ vata me āgamana”nti tuṭṭhacitto hutvā “imā gāthā neva sāvakabhāsitā,
atk-s0514a1:4729_5: kiṃ nu kho agghantī”ti cintetvā “imāsaṃ sakalampi cakkavāḷaṃ yāva brahmalokā sattaratanapuṇṇaṃ katvā dadamānopi neva anucchavikaṃ kātuṃ sakkoti,
atk-s0514a1:4729_6: ahaṃ kho panassa tiyojanasate kururaṭṭhe sattayojanike indapatthanagare rajjaṃ dātuṃ pahomi,
atk-s0514a1:4729_7: atthi nu khvassa rajjaṃ kāretuṃ bhāgya”nti aṅgavijjānubhāvena olokento nāddasa.
atk-s0514a1:4729_8: Tato senāpatiṭṭhānādīni olokento ekagāmabhojakamattassapi bhāgyaṃ adisvā dhanalābhassa olokento koṭidhanato
atk-s0514a1:4729_9: paṭṭhāya oloketvā catunnaṃyeva kahāpaṇasahassānaṃ bhāgyaṃ disvā “ettakena naṃ pūjessāmī”ti catasso sahassatthavikā dāpetvā, “ācariya,
atk-s0514a1:4729_10: tumhe aññesaṃ khattiyānaṃ imā gāthā desetvā kittakaṃ dhanaṃ labhathā”ti pucchati.
atk-s0514a1:4729_14: tvaṃ attanā gahetvā vikkeyyabhaṇḍassa agghampi na jānāsi,
atk-s0514a1:4729_15: ito paṭṭhāya ekekā gāthā sahassārahā nāma hontū”ti vatvā gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:4732_0: Cattāri tvaṃ sahassāni, khippaṃ gaṇhāhi brāhmaṇā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4733_2: imā gāthā satārahā na hi hontu, brāhmaṇa,
atk-s0514a1:4734_0: Athassa ekaṃ sukhayānakaṃ datvā “brāhmaṇaṃ sotthinā gehaṃ sampāpethā”ti purise āṇāpetvā taṃ uyyojesi.
atk-s0514a1:4734_1: Tasmiṃ khaṇe “sutasomaraññā satārahā gāthā sahassārahā katvā pūjitā sādhu sādhū”ti mahāsādhukārasaddo ahosi.
atk-s0514a1:4734_2: Tassa mātāpitaro taṃ saddaṃ sutvā “kiṃ saddo nāmesā”ti pucchitvā yathābhūtaṃ sutvā attano dhanalobhatāya mahāsattassa kujjhiṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:4734_3: Sopi brāhmaṇaṃ uyyojetvā tesaṃ santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0514a1:4734_5: evarūpassa sāhasikassa corassa hatthato muttosī”ti paṭisanthāramattampi akatvā attano dhanalobhatāya “saccaṃ kira, tāta,
atk-s0514a1:4734_6: tayā catasso gāthā sutvā cattāri sahassāni dinnānī”ti pucchitvā “sacca”nti vutte gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:4736_0: “Āsītiyā nāvutiyā ca gāthā, satārahā cāpi bhaveyya gāthā;
atk-s0514a1:4737_0: Paccattameva sutasoma jānahi, sahassiyā nāma kā atthi gāthā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4738_2: āsītiyā ca nāvutiyā ca satārahā cāpi bhaveyya,
atk-s0514a1:4738_4: sahassārahā nāma gāthā kā kassa santike atthīti.
atk-s0514a1:4739_0: Atha naṃ mahāsatto “nāhaṃ, tāta, dhanena vuddhiṃ icchāmi, sutena pana icchāmī”ti saññāpento āha –
atk-s0514a1:4741_0: “Icchāmi vohaṃ sutavuddhimattano, santoti maṃ sappurisā bhajeyyuṃ;
atk-s0514a1:4742_0: Ahaṃ savantīhi mahodadhīva, na hi tāta tappāmi subhāsitena.
atk-s0514a1:4744_0: “Aggi yathā tiṇakaṭṭhaṃ dahanto, na kappatī sāgarova nadībhi;
atk-s0514a1:4745_0: Evampi te paṇḍitā rājaseṭṭha, sutvā na tappanti subhāsitena.
atk-s0514a1:4747_0: “Sakassa dāsassa yadā suṇomi, gāthaṃ ahaṃ atthavatiṃ janinda;
atk-s0514a1:4748_0: Tameva sakkacca nisāmayāmi, na hi tāta dhammesu mamatthi tittī”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4749_1: “Santo”ti ete ca maṃ bhajeyyuṃ iti icchāmi.
atk-s0514a1:4749_4: yadā ahaṃ attano dāsassapi santike suṇomi, tāta,
atk-s0514a1:4749_5: dhammesu mama titti na hi atthīti.
atk-s0514a1:4750_2: ahaṃ dhammaṃ sutvā āgamissāmī”ti sapathaṃ katvā āgato,
atk-s0514a1:4750_4: idaṃ te rajjaṃ gaṇhathā”ti rajjaṃ niyyādento gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:4752_0: “Idaṃ te raṭṭhaṃ sadhanaṃ sayoggaṃ, sakāyuraṃ sabbakāmūpapannaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:4753_0: Kiṃ kāmahetu paribhāsasi maṃ, gacchāmahaṃ porisādassa ñatte”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4755_0: Tasmiṃ samaye piturañño hadayaṃ uṇhaṃ ahosi. So,
atk-s0514a1:4755_3: mayaṃ caturaṅginiyā senāya coraṃ gahessāmā”ti vatvā gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:4757_0: “Attānurakkhāya bhavanti hete, hatthārohā rathikā pattikā ca;
atk-s0514a1:4758_0: Assārohā ye ca dhanuggahāse, senaṃ payuñjāma hanāma sattu”nti.
atk-s0514a1:4759_0: Tattha hanāmāti sace evaṃ payojitā senā taṃ gahetuṃ na sakkonti,
atk-s0514a1:4759_1: atha naṃ sakalaraṭṭhavāsino gahetvā gantvā hanāma sattuṃ,
atk-s0514a1:4760_0: Atha naṃ mātāpitaro assupuṇṇamukhā rodamānā vilapantā, “tāta,
atk-s0514a1:4760_3: Soḷasasahassā nāṭakitthiyopi sesaparijanopi “amhe anāthe katvā kuhiṃ gacchasi,
atk-s0514a1:4760_5: Sakalanagare koci sakabhāvena saṇṭhātuṃ asakkonto “sutasomo porisādassa kira paṭiññaṃ datvā āgato,
atk-s0514a1:4760_6: idāni catasso satārahā gāthā sutvā dhammakathikassa sakkāraṃ katvā mātāpitaro vanditvā punapi kira corassa
atk-s0514a1:4762_0: “Sudukkaraṃ porisādo akāsi, jīvaṃ gahetvāna avassajī maṃ;
atk-s0514a1:4763_0: Taṃ tādisaṃ pubbakiccaṃ saranto, dubbhe ahaṃ tassa kathaṃ janindā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4764_1: Taṃ tādisanti taṃ tena kataṃ tathārūpaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:4765_4: mama chakāmassaggissariyaṃ na dullabha”nti mātāpitaro vanditvā āpucchitvā sesajanaṃ anusāsitvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0514a1:4767_0: “Vanditvā so pitaraṃ mātarañca, anusāsitvā negamañca balañca;
atk-s0514a1:4768_0: Saccavādī saccānurakkhamāno, agamāsi so yattha porisādo”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4769_1: Agamāsīti taṃ rattiṃ nivesaneyeva vasitvā punadivase aruṇuggamanavelāya mātāpitaro vanditvā āpucchitvā
atk-s0514a1:4769_2: sesajanaṃ anusāsitvā assumukhena nānappakāraṃ paridevantena itthāgārādinā mahājanena anugato nagarā nikkhamma
atk-s0514a1:4769_3: taṃ janaṃ nivattetuṃ asakkonto mahāmagge daṇḍakena tiriyaṃ lekhaṃ kaḍḍhitvā “sace mayi sineho atthi,
atk-s0514a1:4769_5: Mahājano sīlavato tejavantassa āṇaṃ atikkamituṃ asakkonto mahāsaddena paridevamāno taṃ sīhavijambhitena
atk-s0514a1:4769_6: gacchantaṃ oloketvā tasmiṃ dassanūpacāraṃ atikkante ekaravaṃ ravanto nagaraṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0514a1:4770_7: ime rājāno māretvā pañcamadhuramaṃsena balikammaṃ karissāmī”ti citakaṃ katvā aggiṃ jāletvā “aṅgārarāsi
atk-s0514a1:4770_8: tāva hotū”ti tassa sūle tacchantassa nisinnakāle sutasomo āgato.
atk-s0514a1:4770_15: tasmā gantvā kattabbakiccaṃ kataṃ nāma hotī”ti dassetuṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:4772_0: “Kato mayā saṅgaro brāhmaṇena, raṭṭhe sake issariye ṭhitena;
atk-s0514a1:4775_0: Tattha yajassūti maṃ māretvā devatāya vā yaññaṃ yajassu, maṃsaṃ vā me khādāhīti attho.
atk-s0514a1:4776_0: Taṃ sutvā porisādo “ayaṃ rājā na bhāyati,
atk-s0514a1:4776_2: kissa nu kho esa ānubhāvo”ti cintetvā “aññaṃ natthi,
atk-s0514a1:4776_3: ayaṃ ‘kassapadasabalena desitā gāthā me sutā’ti vadati,
atk-s0514a1:4776_5: ahampi taṃ kathāpetvā tā gāthāyo sossāmi,
atk-s0514a1:4776_6: evaṃ ahampi nibbhayo bhavissāmī”ti sanniṭṭhānaṃ katvā gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:4778_0: “Na hāyate khāditaṃ mayhaṃ pacchā, citakā ayaṃ tāva sadhūmikāva;
atk-s0514a1:4779_0: Niddhūmake pacitaṃ sādhupakkaṃ, suṇomi gāthāyo satārahāyo”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4780_1: Taṃ khādanaṃ mayhaṃ pacchā vā pure vā na parihāyati,
atk-s0514a1:4780_3: Niddhūmake pacitanti niddhūme nijjhāle aggimhi pakkamaṃsaṃ sādhupakkaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-s0514a1:4781_1: imaṃ thokaṃ niggahetvā lajjāpetvā kathessāmī”ti cintetvā āha –
atk-s0514a1:4783_0: “Adhammiko tvaṃ porisādakāsi, raṭṭhā ca bhaṭṭho udarassa hetu;
atk-s0514a1:4784_0: Dhammañcimā abhivadanti gāthā, dhammo ca adhammo ca kuhiṃ sameti.
atk-s0514a1:4787_0: Natthi saccaṃ kuto dhammo, kiṃ sutena karissasī”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4788_0: Tattha dhammañcimāti imā ca gāthā navalokuttaradhammaṃ abhivadanti.
atk-s0514a1:4788_2: Dhammo hi sugatiṃ pāpeti nibbānaṃ vā,
atk-s0514a1:4788_6: Kiṃ sutenāti tvaṃ etena sutena kiṃ karissasi,
atk-s0514a1:4788_7: mattikābhājanaṃ viya hi sīhavasāya abhājanaṃ tvaṃ dhammassa.
atk-s0514a1:4789_0: So evaṃ kathitepi neva kujjhi. Kasmā?
atk-s0514a1:4789_2: Atha naṃ “kiṃ pana samma sutasoma ahameva adhammiko”ti vatvā gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:4791_0: “Yo maṃsahetu migavaṃ careyya, yo vā hane purisamattahetu;
atk-s0514a1:4792_0: Ubhopi te pecca samā bhavanti, kasmā no adhammikaṃ brūsi maṃ tva”nti.
atk-s0514a1:4793_0: Tattha kasmā noti ye jambudīpatale rājāno alaṅkatapaṭiyattā mahābalaparivārā rathavaragatā migavaṃ carantā tikhiṇehi sarehi mige vijjhitvā mārenti,
atk-s0514a1:4793_1: te avatvā kasmā tvaṃ maññeva adhammikanti vadati.
atk-s0514a1:4794_0: Taṃ sutvā mahāsatto tassa laddhiṃ bhindanto gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:4796_0: “Pañca pañca na khā bhakkhā, khattiyena pajānatā;
atk-s0514a1:4797_0: Abhakkhaṃ rāja bhakkhesi, tasmā adhammiko tuva”nti.
atk-s0514a1:4798_2: khattiyena nāma khattiyadhammaṃ jānantena pañca pañca hatthiādayo daseva sattā maṃsavasena na khā bhakkhā na kho khāditabbayuttakā.
atk-s0514a1:4798_4: Aparo nayo khattiyena khattiyadhammaṃ jānantena pañcanakhesu sattesu sasako, sallako, godhā,
atk-s0514a1:4798_5: kapi kummoti ime pañceva sattā bhakkhitabbayuttakā, na aññe,
atk-s0514a1:4799_0: Iti so niggahaṃ patvā aññaṃ nissaraṇaṃ adisvā attano pāpaṃ paṭicchādento gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:4801_0: “Mutto tuvaṃ porisādassa hatthā, gantvā sakaṃ mandiraṃ kāmakāmī;
atk-s0514a1:4802_0: Amittahatthaṃ punarāgatosi, na khattadhamme kusalosi rājā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4803_0: Tattha na khattadhammeti tvaṃ khattiyadhammasaṅkhāte nītisatthe na kusalosi,
atk-s0514a1:4803_2: akāraṇeneva te loke paṇḍitoti kitti patthaṭā,
atk-s0514a1:4803_3: ahaṃ pana te paṇḍitabhāvaṃ na passāmi na jānāmi,
atk-s0514a1:4804_3: na pana tadatthāya paṭipajjāmī”ti vatvā gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:4806_0: “Ye khattadhamme kusalā bhavanti, pāyena te nerayikā bhavanti;
atk-s0514a1:4807_0: Tasmā ahaṃ khattadhammaṃ pahāya, saccānurakkhī punarāgatosmi;
atk-s0514a1:4813_0: Sabbaṃ tahiṃ labhasi sāmitāya, saccena kiṃ passasi ānisaṃsa”nti.
atk-s0514a1:4814_2: tava tiṇṇaṃ utūnaṃ anucchavikā dibbavimānakappā tayo nivāsapāsādā.
atk-s0514a1:4814_3: Pathavīgavāssāti pathavī ca gāvo ca assā ca bahū.
atk-s0514a1:4814_6: Sabbaṃ tahinti etañca aññañca upabhogaparibhogaṃ sabbaṃ tvaṃ tahiṃ attano nagare sāmitāya labhasi,
atk-s0514a1:4814_9: so tvaṃ sabbametaṃ pahāya saccānurakkhī idhāgacchanto saccena kiṃ ānisaṃsaṃ passasīti.
atk-s0514a1:4817_0: “Ye kecime atthi rasā pathabyā, saccaṃ tesaṃ sādutaraṃ rasānaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:4818_0: Sacce ṭhitā samaṇabrāhmaṇā ca, taranti jātimaraṇassa pāra”nti.
atk-s0514a1:4819_0: Tattha sādutaranti yasmā sabbepi rasā sattānaṃ saccakāleyeva paṇītā madhurā honti,
atk-s0514a1:4819_2: yasmā vā viratisaccavacīsacce ṭhitā jātimaraṇasaṅkhātassa tebhūmakavaṭṭassa pāraṃ amatamahānibbānaṃ taranti pāpuṇanti,
atk-s0514a1:4820_1: Tato porisādo vikasitapadumapuṇṇacandasassirikamevassa mukhaṃ oloketvā “ayaṃ sutasomo aṅgāracitakaṃ mañca sūlaṃ tacchantaṃ passati,
atk-s0514a1:4820_3: kiṃ nu kho esa satārahagāthānaṃ ānubhāvo,
atk-s0514a1:4820_5: aññasseva vā kassacī”ti cintetvā “pucchissāmi tāva na”nti pucchanto gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:4822_0: “Mutto tuvaṃ porisādassa hatthā, gantvā sakaṃ mandiraṃ kāmakāmī;
atk-s0514a1:4823_0: Amittahatthaṃ punarāgatosi, na hi nūna te maraṇabhayaṃ janinda;
atk-s0514a1:4827_0: “Katā me kalyāṇā anekarūpā, yaññā yiṭṭhā ye vipulā pasatthā;
atk-s0514a1:4828_0: Visodhito paralokassa maggo, dhamme ṭhito ko maraṇassa bhāye.
atk-s0514a1:4830_0: “Katā me kalyāṇā anekarūpā, yaññā yiṭṭhā ye vipulā pasatthā;
atk-s0514a1:4831_0: Anānutappaṃ paralokaṃ gamissaṃ, yajassu yaññaṃ ada maṃ porisāda.
atk-s0514a1:4833_0: “Pitā ca mātā ca upaṭṭhitā me, dhammena me issariyaṃ pasatthaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:4834_0: Visodhito paralokassa maggo, dhamme ṭhito ko maraṇassa bhāye.
atk-s0514a1:4836_0: “Pitā ca mātā ca upaṭṭhitā me, dhammena me issariyaṃ pasatthaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:4837_0: Anānutappaṃ paralokaṃ gamissaṃ, yajassu yaññaṃ ada maṃ porisāda.
atk-s0514a1:4839_0: “Ñātīsu mittesu katā me kārā, dhammena me issariyaṃ pasatthaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:4840_0: Visodhito paralokassa maggo, dhamme ṭhito ko maraṇassa bhāye.
atk-s0514a1:4842_0: “Ñātīsu mittesu katā me kārā, dhammena me issariyaṃ pasatthaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:4843_0: Anānutappaṃ paralokaṃ gamissaṃ, yajassu yaññaṃ ada maṃ porisāda.
atk-s0514a1:4845_0: “Dinnaṃ me dānaṃ bahudhā bahūnaṃ, santappitā samaṇabrāhmaṇā ca;
atk-s0514a1:4846_0: Visodhito paralokassa maggo, dhamme ṭhito ko maraṇassa bhāye.
atk-s0514a1:4848_0: “Dinnaṃ me dānaṃ bahudhā bahūnaṃ, santappitā samaṇabrāhmaṇā ca;
atk-s0514a1:4849_0: Anānutappaṃ paralokaṃ gamissaṃ, yajassu yaññaṃ ada maṃ porisādā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4850_2: Yaññāti dasavidhadānavatthupariccāgavasena ativipulā paṇḍitehi pasatthā yaññāpi yiṭṭhā pavattitā.
atk-s0514a1:4850_3: Dhamme ṭhitoti evaṃ dhamme patiṭṭhito mādiso ko nāma maraṇassa bhāyeyya.
atk-s0514a1:4850_5: Dhammena me issariyaṃ pasatthanti dasavidhaṃ rājadhammaṃ akopetvā dhammeneva mayā rajjaṃ pasāsitaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:4851_0: Taṃ sutvā porisādo “ayaṃ sutasomamahārājā sappuriso ñāṇasampanno madhuradhammakathiko,
atk-s0514a1:4851_3: pathavī vā pana me vivaraṃ dadeyyā”ti bhītatasito hutvā, “samma,
atk-s0514a1:4851_4: na tvaṃ mayā khāditabbarūpo”ti vatvā gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:4854_0: Muddhāpi tassa viphaleyya sattadhā, yo tādisaṃ saccavādiṃ adeyyā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4855_1: Jalitanti attano visatejena jalitaṃ teneva uggatejaṃ aggikkhandhaṃ viya carantaṃ āsīvisaṃ vā pana so gīvāya gaṇheyya.
atk-s0514a1:4856_1: ko taṃ khādissatī”ti vatvā gāthā sotukāmo taṃ yācitvā tena dhammagāravajananatthaṃ “evarūpānaṃ anavajjagāthānaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4856_2: tvaṃ abhājana”nti paṭikkhittopi “sakalajambudīpe iminā sadiso paṇḍito natthi,
atk-s0514a1:4856_3: ayaṃ mama hatthā muccitvā gantvā tā gāthā sutvā dhammakathikassa sakkāraṃ katvā nalāṭena maccuṃ ādāya punāgato,
atk-s0514a1:4856_4: ativiya sādhurūpā gāthā bhavissantī”ti suṭṭhutaraṃ sañjātadhammassavanādaro hutvā taṃ yācanto gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:4859_0: Api gāthā suṇitvāna, dhamme me ramate mano”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4860_2: narā nāma dhammaṃ sutvā kalyāṇampi pāpakampi jānanti,
atk-s0514a1:4860_3: appeva nāma tā gāthā sutvā mamapi kusalakammapathadhamme mano rameyyā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4861_2: sādhukaṃ suṇāhī”ti taṃ ohitasotaṃ katvā nandabrāhmaṇena kathitaniyāmeneva gāthānaṃ thutiṃ katvā chasu
atk-s0514a1:4861_3: kāmāvacaradevesu ekakolāhalaṃ katvā devatāsu sādhukāraṃ dadamānāsu porisādassa dhammaṃ kathesi –
atk-s0514a1:4864_0: Sā naṃ saṅgati pāleti, nāsabbhi bahu saṅgamo.
atk-s0514a1:4867_0: Sataṃ sandhammamaññāya, seyyo hoti na pāpiyo.
atk-s0514a1:4869_0: “Jīranti ve rājarathā sucittā, atho sarīrampi jaraṃ upeti;
atk-s0514a1:4870_0: Satañca dhammo na jaraṃ upeti, santo have sabbhi pavedayanti.
atk-s0514a1:4872_0: “Nabhañca dūre pathavī ca dūre, pāraṃ samuddassa tadāhu dūre;
atk-s0514a1:4873_0: Tato have dūrataraṃ vadanti, satañca dhammo asatañca rājā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4874_0: Tassa tena sukathitattā ceva attano paṇḍitabhāvena ca tā gāthā sabbaññubuddhakathitā viyāti cintentassa sakalasarīraṃ pañcavaṇṇāya pītiyā paripūri,
atk-s0514a1:4874_3: So “ahaṃ sutasomassa dātabbaṃ kiñci hiraññasuvaṇṇaṃ na passāmi,
atk-s0514a1:4874_4: ekekāya panassa gāthāya ekekaṃ varaṃ dassāmī”ti cintetvā gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:4876_0: “Gāthā imā atthavatī subyañjanā, subhāsitā tuyha janinda sutvā;
atk-s0514a1:4877_0: Ānandi vitto sumano patīto, cattāri te samma vare dadāmī”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4878_0: Tattha ānandīti ānandajāto. Sesāni tasseva vevacanāni. Cattāropi hete tuṭṭhākārā eva.
atk-s0514a1:4879_0: Atha naṃ mahāsatto “kiṃ nāma tvaṃ varaṃ dassasī”ti apasādento gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:4881_0: “Yo nattano maraṇaṃ bujjhasi tuvaṃ, hitāhitaṃ vinipātañca saggaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:4882_0: Giddho rase duccarite niviṭṭho, kiṃ tvaṃ varaṃ dassasi pāpadhamma.
atk-s0514a1:4884_0: “Ahañca taṃ ‘dehi vara’nti vajjaṃ, tvaṃ cāpi datvā na avākareyya;
atk-s0514a1:4885_0: Sandiṭṭhikaṃ kalahamimaṃ vivādaṃ, ko paṇḍito jānamupabbajeyyā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4886_0: Tattha yoti yo tvaṃ “maraṇadhammohamasmī”ti attanopi maraṇaṃ na bujjhasi na jānāsi,
atk-s0514a1:4886_8: Na avākareyyāti vācāya datvā “dehi me vara”nti vuccamāno na avākareyyāsi na dadeyyāsi.
atk-s0514a1:4886_9: Upabbajeyyāti ko imaṃ kalahaṃ paṇḍito upagaccheyya.
atk-s0514a1:4887_0: Tato porisādo “nāyaṃ mayhaṃ saddahati, saddahāpessāmi na”nti gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:4889_0: “Na taṃ varaṃ arahati jantu dātuṃ, yaṃ vāpi datvā na avākareyya;
atk-s0514a1:4890_0: Varassu samma avikampamāno, pāṇaṃ cajitvānapi dassamevā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4892_0: Atha mahāsatto “ayaṃ ativiya sūro hutvā katheti,
atk-s0514a1:4892_3: sace pana “manussamaṃsaṃ na khāditabba’nti paṭhamameva varaṃ vārayissaṃ,
atk-s0514a1:4892_5: paṭhamaṃ aññe tayo vare gahetvā pacchā etaṃ gaṇhissāmī”ti cintetvā āha –
atk-s0514a1:4894_0: “Ariyassa ariyena sameti sakhyaṃ, paññassa paññāṇavatā sameti;
atk-s0514a1:4895_0: Passeyya taṃ vassasataṃ arogaṃ, etaṃ varānaṃ paṭhamaṃ varāmī”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4896_5: Passeyya tanti sutasomo porisādassa ciraṃ jīvitaṃ icchanto viya paṭhamaṃ attano jīvitavaraṃ yācati.
atk-s0514a1:4896_6: Paṇḍitassa hi “mama jīvitaṃ dehī”ti vattuṃ ayuttaṃ,
atk-s0514a1:4896_7: apica so ‘mayhameva esa ārogyaṃ icchatī’ti cintetvā tussissatīti evamāha.
atk-s0514a1:4897_0: Sopi taṃ sutvāva “ayaṃ issariyā dhaṃsetvā idāni maṃsaṃ khāditukāmassa evaṃ mahāanatthakarassa mahācorassa mayhameva jīvitaṃ icchati,
atk-s0514a1:4897_1: aho mama hitakāmo”ti tuṭṭhamānaso vañcetvā varassa gahitabhāvaṃ ajānitvā taṃ varaṃ dadamāno gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:4899_0: “Ariyassa ariyena sameti sakhyaṃ, paññassa paññāṇavatā sameti;
atk-s0514a1:4900_0: Passāsi maṃ vassasataṃ arogaṃ, etaṃ varānaṃ paṭhamaṃ dadāmī”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4905_0: Na tādise bhūmipatī adesi, etaṃ varānaṃ dutiyaṃ varāmī”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4906_1: Na tādiseti tādise khattiye na adesi mā khādi.
atk-s0514a1:4907_0: Iti so dutiyaṃ varaṃ gaṇhanto parosatānaṃ khattiyānaṃ jīvitavaraṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0514a1:4910_0: Na tādise bhūmipatī ademi, etaṃ varānaṃ dutiyaṃ dadāmī”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4911_0: Kiṃ pana te tesaṃ saddaṃ suṇanti,
atk-s0514a1:4911_3: Porisādena hi rukkhassa dhūmajālaupaddavabhayena paṭikkamitvā aggi kato,
atk-s0514a1:4911_4: aggino ca rukkhassa ca antare nisīditvā mahāsatto tena saddhiṃ kathesi,
atk-s0514a1:4913_0: “Parosataṃ khattiyā te gahītā, talāvutā assumukhā rudantā;
atk-s0514a1:4914_0: Sake te raṭṭhe paṭipādayāhi, etaṃ varānaṃ tatiyaṃ varāmī”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4915_0: Tattha parosatanti atirekasataṃ. Te gahītāti tayā gahitā. Talāvutāti hatthatalesu āvutā.
atk-s0514a1:4916_0: Iti mahāsatto tatiyaṃ varaṃ gaṇhanto tesaṃ khattiyānaṃ sakaraṭṭhaniyyātanavaraṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0514a1:4916_2: So akhādantopi verabhayena sabbe te dāse katvā araññeyeva vāseyya,
atk-s0514a1:4918_0: “Parosataṃ khattiyā me gahītā, talāvutā assumukhā rudantā;
atk-s0514a1:4919_0: Sake te raṭṭhe paṭipādayāmi, etaṃ varānaṃ tatiyaṃ dadāmī”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4920_0: Catutthaṃ pana varaṃ gaṇhanto bodhisatto imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:4922_0: “Chiddaṃ te raṭṭhaṃ byathitā bhayā hi, puthū narā leṇamanuppaviṭṭhā;
atk-s0514a1:4923_0: Manussamaṃsaṃ viramehi rāja, etaṃ varānaṃ catutthaṃ varāmī”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4924_0: Tattha chiddanti na ghanavāsaṃ tattha tattha gāmādīnaṃ uṭṭhitattā savivaraṃ.
atk-s0514a1:4924_1: Byathitā bhayāhīti “porisādo idāni āgamissatī”ti tava bhayena kampitā.
atk-s0514a1:4924_2: Leṇamanuppaviṭṭhāti dārake hatthesu gahetvā tiṇagahanādinilīyanaṭṭhānaṃ paviṭṭhā.
atk-s0514a1:4924_3: Manussamaṃsanti duggandhaṃ jegucchaṃ paṭikkūlaṃ manussamaṃsaṃ pajaha.
atk-s0514a1:4925_0: Evaṃ vutte porisādo pāṇiṃ paharitvā hasanto “samma sutasoma kiṃ nāmetaṃ kathesi,
atk-s0514a1:4927_0: “Addhā hi so bhakkho mama manāpo, etassa hetumhi vanaṃ paviṭṭho;
atk-s0514a1:4928_0: Sohaṃ kathaṃ etto upārameyyaṃ, aññaṃ varānaṃ catutthaṃ varassū”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4929_0: Tattha vananti rajjaṃ pahāya imaṃ vanaṃ paviṭṭho.
atk-s0514a1:4930_0: Atha naṃ mahāsatto “tvaṃ ‘manussamaṃsassa piyatarattā tato viramituṃ na sakkomī”ti vadasi.
atk-s0514a1:4930_1: Yo hi piyaṃ nissāya pāpaṃ karoti,
atk-s0514a1:4932_0: “Na ve ‘piyaṃ me’ti janinda tādiso, attaṃ niraṃkacca piyāni sevati;
atk-s0514a1:4933_0: Attāva seyyo paramā ca seyyo, labbhā piyā ocitatthena pacchā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4934_0: Tattha tādisoti janinda tādiso yuvā abhirūpo mahāyaso “idaṃ nāma me piya”nti piyavatthulobhena tattha
atk-s0514a1:4934_1: attānaṃ niraṃkatvā sabbasugatīhi ceva sukhavisesehi ca cavitvā niraye pātetvā na ve piyāni sevati.
atk-s0514a1:4934_2: Paramā ca seyyoti purisassa hi paramā piyavatthumhā attāva varataro.
atk-s0514a1:4934_5: piyā nāma visayavasena ceva puññena ca ocitatthena vaḍḍhitatthena diṭṭhadhamme ceva parattha ca devamanussasampattiṃ patvā sakkā laddhuṃ.
atk-s0514a1:4935_0: Evaṃ vutte porisādo bhayappatto hutvā “ahaṃ sutasomena gahitaṃ varaṃ vissajjāpetumpi manussamaṃsato viramitumpi na sakkomi,
atk-s0514a1:4935_1: kiṃ nu kho karissāmī”ti assupuṇṇehi nettehi gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:4938_0: Namhi sakkā nivāretuṃ, aññaṃ varaṃ samma varassū”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4942_0: “Yo ve ‘piyaṃ me’ti piyānurakkhī, attaṃ niraṃkacca piyāni sevati;
atk-s0514a1:4943_0: Soṇḍova pitvā visamissapānaṃ, teneva so hoti dukkhī parattha.
atk-s0514a1:4945_0: “Yo cīdha saṅkhāya piyāni hitvā, kicchenapi sevati ariyadhamme;
atk-s0514a1:4946_0: Dukkhitova pitvāna yathosadhāni, teneva so hoti sukhī paratthā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4947_2: yo puriso “idaṃ me piya”nti pāpakiriyāya attānaṃ niraṃkatvā piyāni vatthūni sevati,
atk-s0514a1:4947_3: so surāpemena visamissaṃ suraṃ pitvā soṇḍo viya tena pāpakammena parattha nirayādīsu dukkhī hoti.
atk-s0514a1:4948_0: Evaṃ vutte porisādo kalūnaṃ paridevanto gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:4950_0: “Ohāyahaṃ pitaraṃ mātarañca, manāpiye kāmaguṇe ca pañca;
atk-s0514a1:4951_0: Etassa hetumhi vanaṃ paviṭṭho, taṃ te varaṃ kinti mahaṃ dadāmī”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4952_0: Tattha etassāti manussamaṃsassa. Kinti mahanti kinti katvā ahaṃ taṃ varaṃ demi.
atk-s0514a1:4955_0: “Na paṇḍitā diguṇamāhu vākyaṃ, saccappaṭiññāva bhavanti santo;
atk-s0514a1:4956_0: ‘Varassu samma’ iti maṃ avoca, iccabravī tvaṃ na hi te sametī”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4957_2: paṇḍitā nāma ekaṃ vatvā puna taṃ visaṃvādentā dutiyaṃ vacanaṃ na kathenti.
atk-s0514a1:4957_4: “samma sutasoma varassu vara”nti evaṃ maṃ abhāsasi.
atk-s0514a1:4957_5: Iccabravīti tasmā yaṃ tvaṃ iti abravi,
atk-s0514a1:4960_0: “Apuññalābhaṃ ayasaṃ akittiṃ, pāpaṃ bahuṃ duccaritaṃ kilesaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:4961_0: Manussamaṃsassa kate upāgā, taṃ te varaṃ kinti mahaṃ dadeyya”nti.
atk-s0514a1:4962_5: Taṃ teti taṃ tuyhaṃ kathāhaṃ varaṃ demi,
atk-s0514a1:4965_0: “Na taṃ varaṃ arahati jantu dātuṃ, yaṃ vāpi datvā na avākareyya;
atk-s0514a1:4966_0: Varassu samma avikampamāno, pāṇaṃ cajitvānapi dassamevā”ti.
