atk-s0514a1:4967_0: Evaṃ tena paṭhamaṃ vuttagāthaṃ āharitvā dassetvā varadāne ussāhento gāthā āha –
atk-s0514a1:4969_0: “Pāṇaṃ cajanti santo nāpi dhammaṃ, saccappaṭiññāva bhavanti santo;
atk-s0514a1:4970_0: Datvā varaṃ khippamavākarohi, etena sampajja surājaseṭṭha.
atk-s0514a1:4972_0: “Caje dhanaṃ aṅgavarassa hetu, aṅgaṃ caje jīvitaṃ rakkhamāno;
atk-s0514a1:4973_0: Aṅgaṃ dhanaṃ jīvitañcāpi sabbaṃ, caje naro dhammamanussaranto”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4974_3: Khippamavākarohīti idha khippaṃ mayhaṃ dehīti attho.
atk-s0514a1:4974_4: Etenāti etena dhammena ceva saccena ca sampajja sampanno upapanno hohi.
atk-s0514a1:4974_8: paṇḍito puriso hatthapādādimhi aṅge chijjamāne tassa rakkhaṇatthāya bahumpi dhanaṃ cajeyya.
atk-s0514a1:4974_9: Dhammamanussarantoti aṅgadhanajīvitāni pariccajantopi “sataṃ dhammaṃ na vītikkamissāmī”ti evaṃ dhammaṃ anussaranto.
atk-s0514a1:4975_0: Evaṃ mahāsatto imehi kāraṇehi taṃ sacce patiṭṭhāpetvā idāni attano gurubhāvaṃ dassetuṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:4977_0: “Yasmā hi dhammaṃ puriso vijaññā, ye cassa kaṅkhaṃ vinayanti santo;
atk-s0514a1:4978_0: Taṃ hissa dīpañca parāyaṇañca, na tena mittiṃ jirayetha pañño”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4979_3: Taṃ hissāti taṃ ācariyakulaṃ etassa puggalassa patiṭṭhānaṭṭhena dīpaṃ,
atk-s0514a1:4979_5: Na tena mittinti tena ācariyapuggalena saha so paṇḍito kenacipi kāraṇena mittiṃ na jīrayetha na vināseyya.
atk-s0514a1:4980_2: guṇavantassa ācariyassa vacanaṃ nāma bhindituṃ na vaṭṭati,
atk-s0514a1:4980_3: ahañca taruṇakālepi tava piṭṭhiācariyo hutvā bahuṃ sikkhaṃ sikkhāpesiṃ,
atk-s0514a1:4980_4: idānipi buddhalīlāya satārahā gāthā te kathesiṃ,
atk-s0514a1:4980_5: tena me vacanaṃ kātuṃ arahasī”ti āha.
atk-s0514a1:4980_6: Taṃ sutvā porisādo “ayaṃ sutasomo mayhaṃ ācariyo ceva paṇḍito ca,
atk-s0514a1:4980_11: dassāmissa vara”nti assudhārāhi pavattamānāhi uṭṭhāya sutasomanarindassa pādesu patitvā varaṃ dadamāno imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:4982_0: “Addhā hi so bhakkho mama manāpo, etassa hetumhi vanaṃ paviṭṭho;
atk-s0514a1:4983_0: Sace ca maṃ yācasi etamatthaṃ, etampi te samma varaṃ dadāmī”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4984_1: sīle ṭhitassa maraṇampi varaṃ, gaṇhāmi, mahārāja,
atk-s0514a1:4984_10: So mahāsattaṃ pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
atk-s0514a1:4984_12: Tasmiṃ khaṇe tattha sannipatitā bhummā devā mahāsatte pītiṃ janetvā “avīcito yāva bhavaggā añño porisādaṃ
atk-s0514a1:4984_14: aho sutasomena dukkarataraṃ kata”nti mahantena saddena vanaṃ unnādentā sādhukāraṃ adaṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:4984_15: Tesaṃ saddaṃ sutvā cātumahārājikāti evaṃ yāva brahmalokā ekakolāhalaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0514a1:4984_16: Rukkhe laggitarājānopi taṃ devatānaṃ sādhukārasaddaṃ suṇiṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:4984_22: dukkaraṃ kataṃ sutasomena porisādaṃ damentenā”ti bodhisattassa thutiṃ kariṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:4984_23: Porisādo mahāsattassa pāde vanditvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0514a1:4984_27: ete mayā mocitā ‘gaṇhatha no paccāmitta’nti maṃ hiṃseyyuṃ,
atk-s0514a1:4984_28: mayā jīvitaṃ cajantenapi na sakkā sutasomassa santikā gahitaṃ sīlaṃ bhindituṃ,
atk-s0514a1:4984_33: ubhopi gantvā khattiye mocessāmā”ti vatvā gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:4986_0: “Satthā ca me hosi sakhā ca mesi, vacanampi te samma ahaṃ akāsiṃ;
atk-s0514a1:4987_0: Tuvampi me samma karohi vākyaṃ, ubhopi gantvāna pamocayāmā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4988_0: Tattha satthāti saggamaggassa desitattā satthā ca, taruṇakālato paṭṭhāya sakhā ca.
atk-s0514a1:4991_0: “Satthā ca te homi sakhā ca tyamhi, vacanampi me samma tuvaṃ akāsi;
atk-s0514a1:4992_0: Ahampi te samma karomi vākyaṃ, ubhopi gantvāna pamocayāmā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4996_0: Na jātu dubbhetha imassa rañño, saccappaṭiññaṃ me paṭissuṇāthā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:4997_0: Tattha kammāsapādenāti idaṃ mahāsatto “ubhopi gantvāna pamocayāmā”ti sampaṭicchitvā “khattiyā nāma mānathaddhā honti,
atk-s0514a1:4997_1: muttamattāva ‘iminā mayaṃ viheṭhitamhā’ti porisādaṃ potheyyumpi haneyyumpi,
atk-s0514a1:4997_3: ahaṃ ekakova gantvā paṭiññaṃ tāva nesaṃ gaṇhissāmī”ti cintetvā tattha gantvā te hatthatale āvunitvā aggapādaṅgulīhi
atk-s0514a1:4997_4: bhūmiṃ phusamānāhi rukkhasākhāsu olaggite vātappaharaṇakāle nāgadantesu olaggitakuraṇḍakadāmāni viya
atk-s0514a1:4997_6: Tepi taṃ disvā “idānimhā mayaṃ arogā”ti ekappahāreneva mahāviravaṃ raviṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:4997_7: Atha ne mahāsatto “mā bhāyitthā”ti assāsetvā “mayā porisādo damito,
atk-s0514a1:4997_9: tumhe pana me vacanaṃ karothā”ti vatvā evamāha.
atk-s0514a1:4997_10: Tattha na jātūti ekaṃseneva na dubbhetha.
atk-s0514a1:5001_0: Na jātu dubbhema imassa rañño, saccappaṭiññaṃ te paṭissuṇāmā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:5002_1: apica kho pana mayaṃ kilantā kathetuṃ na sakkoma,
atk-s0514a1:5002_4: mayaṃ vo vacanaṃ sutvā paṭiññaṃ dassāmā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:5003_0: Atha ne bodhisatto “tena hi paṭiññaṃ dethā”ti vatvā gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a1:5005_0: “Yathā pitā vā atha vāpi mātā, anukampakā atthakāmā pajānaṃ,.
atk-s0514a1:5006_0: Evameva vo hotu ayañca rājā, tumhe ca vo hotha yatheva puttā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:5007_0: Atha naṃ tepi sampaṭicchamānā imaṃ gāthamāhaṃsu –
atk-s0514a1:5009_0: “Yathā pitā vā atha vāpi mātā, anukampakā atthakāmā pajānaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:5010_0: Evameva no hotu ayañca rājā, mayampi hessāma yatheva puttā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:5011_0: Tattha tumhe ca voti vo-kāro nipātamattaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:5012_0: Iti mahāsatto tesaṃ paṭiññaṃ gahetvā porisādaṃ pakkositvā “ehi, samma,
atk-s0514a1:5012_2: So khaggaṃ gahetvā ekassa rañño bandhanaṃ chindi.
atk-s0514a1:5012_3: Rājā sattāhaṃ nirāhāro vedanappatto saha bandhanachedā mucchito bhūmiyaṃ pati.
atk-s0514a1:5012_6: mā evaṃ chindī”ti ekaṃ rājānaṃ ubhohi hatthehi daḷhaṃ gahetvā ure katvā “idāni bandhanaṃ chindāhī”ti āha.
atk-s0514a1:5012_8: Mahāsatto thāmasampannatāya naṃ ure nipajjāpetvā orasaputtaṃ viya muducittena otāretvā bhūmiyaṃ nipajjāpesi.
atk-s0514a1:5012_9: Evaṃ sabbepi te bhūmiyaṃ nipajjāpetvā vaṇe dhovitvā dārakānaṃ kaṇṇato suttakaṃ viya saṇikaṃ rajjuyo nikkaḍḍhitvā
atk-s0514a1:5012_12: ekaṃ rukkhatacaṃ pāsāṇe ghaṃsitvā āharā”ti āharāpetvā saccakiriyaṃ katvā tesaṃ hatthatalāni makkhesi.
atk-s0514a1:5012_18: Punadivase pāto ca majjhanhike ca sāyañca taralameva pāyetvā tatiyadivase sasitthakayāguṃ pāyesuṃ,
atk-s0514a1:5013_0: Atha ne mahāsatto “gantuṃ sakkhissathā”ti pucchitvā “gacchāmā”ti vutte “ehi,
atk-s0514a1:5013_3: So rodamāno tassa pādesu patitvā “tvaṃ, samma,
atk-s0514a1:5013_5: ahaṃ idheva vanamūlaphalāni khādanto vasissāmī”ti āha. “Samma,
atk-s0514a1:5013_15: ‘gaṇhatha imaṃ cora’nti ekekadaṇḍena vā ekekaleḍḍunā vā maṃ jīvitā voropessanti,
atk-s0514a1:5013_17: jīvitahetupi na sakkā mayā paraṃ māretuṃ,
atk-s0514a1:5013_20: idāni mama tumhākaṃ dassanaṃ natthī”ti roditvā “gacchatha tumhe”ti āha.
atk-s0514a1:5013_28: asakkonto attano rajjaṃ dvidhā bhinditvā dassāmī”ti vatvā “tumhākampi nagare mama verino atthiyevā”ti
atk-s0514a1:5013_29: vutte “iminā mama vacanaṃ karontena dukkaraṃ kataṃ,
atk-s0514a1:5013_30: yena kenaci upāyena porāṇakayase patiṭṭhapetabbo esa mayā”ti cintetvā tassa palobhanatthāya nagarasampattiṃ vaṇṇento āha –
atk-s0514a1:5015_0: “Catuppadaṃ sakuṇañcāpi maṃsaṃ, sūdehi randhaṃ sukataṃ suniṭṭhitaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:5016_0: Sudhaṃva indo paribhuñjiyāna, hitvā katheko ramasī araññe.
atk-s0514a1:5019_0: Indaṃva devesu pamodayiṃsu, hitvā katheko ramasī araññe.
atk-s0514a1:5025_0: “Pāṇissaraṃ kumbhathūṇaṃ nisīthe, athopi ve nippurisampi tūriyaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:5026_0: Bahuṃ sugītañca suvāditañca, hitvā katheko ramasī araññe.
atk-s0514a1:5029_0: Hayehi nāgehi rathehupetaṃ, hitvā katheko ramasī araññe”ti.
atk-s0514a1:5030_3: Ramasīti mūlaphalādīni khādanto kathaṃ ramissasi, “ehi, mahārāja,
atk-s0514a1:5030_8: Devesūti devalokesu accharā indaṃ viya ramaṇīye bārāṇasinagare pubbe taṃ pamodayiṃsu,
atk-s0514a1:5030_9: tā hitvā idha kiṃ karissasi, “ehi, samma,
atk-s0514a1:5030_13: Saṅgeti anekabhūmike dassetvā addharattaaṅgayutte tattha tvaṃ pubbe sayīti attho.
atk-s0514a1:5030_14: Sukhanti tādisassa sayanassa majjhamhi sukhaṃ sayitvāna idāni kathaṃ araññe ramissasi,
atk-s0514a1:5030_20: Migājinūpetaṃ puraṃ surammanti taṃ uyyānaṃ migājinaṃ nāma nāmena,
atk-s0514a1:5030_21: tena upetaṃ purampi te suṭṭhu rammaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:5031_0: Iti mahāsatto “appeva nāmesa pubbe upabhuttaparibhogarasaṃ saritvā gantukāmo bhaveyyā”ti paṭhamaṃ bhojanena palobhesi,
atk-s0514a1:5031_4: pañcamaṃ uyyānena ceva nagarena cāti imehi ettakehi palobhetvā “ehi, mahārāja,
atk-s0514a1:5031_5: ahaṃ taṃ ādāya gantvā bārāṇasiyaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā pacchā sakaraṭṭhaṃ gamissāmi,
atk-s0514a1:5031_10: So tassa vacanaṃ sutvā gantukāmo hutvā “sutasomo mayhaṃ atthakāmo anukampako,
atk-s0514a1:5031_11: paṭhamaṃ maṃ kalyāṇe patiṭṭhāpetvā ‘idāni porāṇakayaseva patiṭṭhāpessāmī’ti vadati,
atk-s0514a1:5031_14: kiṃ me araññavāsenā”ti cintetvā tuṭṭhacitto tassa guṇaṃ nissāya vaṇṇaṃ kathetukāmo “samma, sutasoma,
atk-s0514a1:5031_16: pāpamittasaṃsaggato vā pāpataraṃ nāma natthī”ti vatvā āha –
atk-s0514a1:5037_0: Akāsiṃ pāpakaṃ kammaṃ, yena gacchāmi duggatiṃ.
atk-s0514a1:5043_0: Kāhāmi kusalaṃ kammaṃ, yena gacchāmi suggatiṃ.
atk-s0514a1:5045_0: “Thale yathā vāri janinda vuṭṭhaṃ, anaddhaneyyaṃ na ciraṭṭhitīkaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:5046_0: Evampi hoti asataṃ samāgamo, anaddhaneyyo udakaṃ thaleva.
atk-s0514a1:5048_0: “Sare yathā vāri janinda vuṭṭhaṃ, ciraṭṭhitīkaṃ naravīraseṭṭha;
atk-s0514a1:5049_0: Evampi ve hoti sataṃ samāgamo, ciraṭṭhitīko udakaṃ sareva.
atk-s0514a1:5051_0: “Abyāyiko hoti sataṃ samāgamo, yāvampi tiṭṭheyya tatheva hoti;
atk-s0514a1:5052_0: Khippañhi veti asataṃ samāgamo, tasmā sataṃ dhammo asabbhi ārakā”ti.
atk-s0514a1:5053_6: Yāvampi tiṭṭheyyāti yattakaṃ kālaṃ jīvitaṃ tiṭṭheyya,
atk-s0514a1:5054_0: Iti porisādo sattahi gāthāhi mahāsattasseva vaṇṇaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0514a1:5054_1: Mahāsattopi porisādañca te ca rājāno gahetvā attano paccantagāmaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0514a1:5054_2: Paccantagāmavāsino mahāsattaṃ disvā nagaraṃ gantvā amaccānaṃ ācikkhiṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:5054_5: Antarāmagge janapadavāsino bodhisattassa paṇṇākāraṃ datvā anugacchiṃsu,
atk-s0514a1:5054_12: sutasomo kira porisādaṃ dametvā ādāya idhāgacchati,
atk-s0514a1:5054_13: nagaramassa pavisituṃ na dassāmā”ti sīghaṃ nagaradvārāni pidahitvā āvudhahatthā aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:5054_14: Mahāsatto dvārānaṃ pihitabhāvaṃ ñatvā porisādañca parosatañca rājāno ohāya katipayehi amaccehi saddhiṃ āgantvā “ahaṃ sutasomarājā,
atk-s0514a1:5054_19: Rājā ca kāḷahatthi cassa paccuggamanaṃ katvā ādāya pāsādaṃ āropayiṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:5055_0: So rājapallaṅke nisīditvā porisādassa aggamahesiṃ sesāmacce ca pakkosāpetvā kāḷahatthiṃ āha –
atk-s0514a1:5055_2: kasmā rañño nagaraṃ pavisituṃ na dethā”ti?
atk-s0514a1:5055_3: “So rajjaṃ kārento imasmiṃ nagare bahū manusse khādi,
atk-s0514a1:5055_15: itare niraya”nti evaṃ so nicāsane nisinnassa puttarājassa ovādaṃ datvā,
atk-s0514a1:5055_17: tvaṃ rañño sahāyo ceva sevako ca,
atk-s0514a1:5055_19: tayāpi rañño atthaṃ carituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti senāpatimpi anusāsitvā, “devi,
atk-s0514a1:5055_20: tvampi kulagehā āgantvā tassa santike aggamahesiṭṭhānaṃ patvā puttadhītāhi vaḍḍhippattā,
atk-s0514a1:5055_21: tayāpi tassa atthaṃ carituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti deviyāpi ovādaṃ datvā tamevatthaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetuṃ dhammaṃ desento gāthā āha –
atk-s0514a1:5057_0: “Na so rājā yo ajeyyaṃ jināti, na so sakhā yo sakhāraṃ jināti;
atk-s0514a1:5058_0: Na sā bhariyā yā patino na vibheti, na te puttā ye na bharanti jiṇṇaṃ.
atk-s0514a1:5060_0: “Na sā sabhā yattha na santi santo, na te santo ye na bhaṇanti dhammaṃ;
atk-s0514a1:5061_0: Rāgañca dosañca pahāya mohaṃ, dhammaṃ bhaṇantāva bhavanti santo.
atk-s0514a1:5067_0: Subhāsitaddhajā isayo, dhammo hi isinaṃ dhajo”ti.
atk-s0514a1:5068_1: te jinanto rājā nāma na hoti.
atk-s0514a1:5068_2: Sace tvampi pitu santakaṃ rajjaṃ labhitvā tassa paṭisattu hosi,
atk-s0514a1:5068_14: Tasmiñhi kāle abharantā puttā puttā nāma na honti.
atk-s0514a1:5069_1: Ye na bhaṇanti dhammanti ye pucchitā saccasabhāvaṃ na vadanti,
atk-s0514a1:5069_3: Dhammaṃ bhaṇantāvāti ete rāgādayo pahāya parassa hitānukampakā hutvā sabhāvaṃ bhaṇantāva paṇḍitā nāma honti.
atk-s0514a1:5069_6: teneva porisādo maṃ ñatvā pasannacitto cattāro vare datvā pañcasu sīlesu patiṭṭhito.
atk-s0514a1:5069_7: Bhāsayeti paṇḍito puriso dhammaṃ bhāseyya joteyya,
atk-s0514a1:5069_8: buddhādayo isayo yasmā dhammo etesaṃ dhajo,
atk-s0514a1:5069_10: bālā pana subhāsitaṃ paggaṇhantā nāma natthīti.
atk-s0514a1:5070_0: Imassa dhammakathaṃ sutvā rājā ca senāpati ca devī ca tuṭṭhā “gacchāma, mahārāja,
atk-s0514a1:5070_1: ānemā”ti vatvā nagare bheriṃ carāpetvā nāgare sannipātetvā “tumhe mā bhāyittha,
atk-s0514a1:5070_3: etha naṃ ānemā”ti mahājanaṃ ādāya mahāsattaṃ purato katvā rañño santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā kappake upaṭṭhāpetvā
atk-s0514a1:5070_4: kappitakesamassuṃ nhātānulittapasādhitaṃ rājānaṃ ratanarāsimhi ṭhapetvā abhisiñcitvā nagaraṃ pavesesuṃ.
atk-s0514a1:5070_5: Porisādo rājā hutvā parosatānaṃ khattiyānaṃ mahāsattassa ca mahāsakkāraṃ kāresi.
atk-s0514a1:5070_6: “Sutasomanarindena kira porisādaṃ dametvā rajje patiṭṭhāpito”ti sakalajambudīpe mahākolāhalaṃ udapādi.
atk-s0514a1:5070_11: nagaradvāresu ca majjhe cāti pañca dānasālāyo kārehi,
atk-s0514a1:5070_12: dasa rājadhamme akopetvā agatigamanaṃ pariharā”ti porisādaṃ ovadi.
atk-s0514a1:5070_14: So tena balakāyena parivuto bārāṇasito nikkhami.
atk-s0514a1:5070_16: Mahāsatto avāhanānaṃ rājūnaṃ vāhanāni datvā uyyojesi.
atk-s0514a1:5070_17: Tepi rājāno tena saddhiṃ sammoditvā mahāsattaṃ vandanādīni katvā attano attano janapadaṃ agamiṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:5071_0: Mahāsattopi nagaraṃ patvā indapatthanagaravāsīhi devanagaraṃ viya alaṅkatanagaraṃ pavisitvā mātāpitaro
atk-s0514a1:5071_5: So tassa nigrodhassa avidūre mahantaṃ taḷākaṃ kāretvā bahūni kulāni pesetvā gāmaṃ nivesesi.
atk-s0514a1:5071_7: Tampi rukkhamūlaṃ sākhantato paṭṭhāya samatalaṃ kāretvā parikkhittavedikatoraṇadvārayuttaṃ akāsi,
atk-s0514a1:5071_9: Kammāsapādassa damitaṭṭhāne nivuṭṭhattā pana so gāmo kammāsadammanigamo nāma jāto.
atk-s0514a1:5071_10: Tepi sabbe rājāno mahāsattassa ovāde ṭhatvā dānādīni puññāni katvā āyupariyosāne saggaṃ pūrayiṃsu.
atk-s0514a1:5072_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsetvā “na,
atk-s0514a1:5072_3: pubbepesa mayā damitoyevā”ti vatvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi “tadā porisādo rājā aṅgulimālo ahosi,
atk-s0514a1:5075_0: Sumukho pana haṃsavaro ca mahā, sudhabhojaniko ca paro pavaro;
